name: Pool Villa 10 bedrooms amazing  sea view (1490m2)
address: Tambon Patong, จ.ภูเก็ต, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to your ideal group retreat villa for friends’ trip or family reunion, the spot is the best choice for your holiday and it totally private for you , we have the most breathtaking view in town, and you will only be surrounded by a Thai tropical vegetation overlooking the Patong city bay and the Andaman Sea.

WHY CHOOSE US

-	No extra charge , all included
Most of Airbnb host are charging for extra cleaning and checkout cleaning, we don’t,
Cleaning is included, bed linens and towels changed if needed otherwise every 2 days
While most of Thai villa owners are charging for electricity consumption at checkout, we don’t,
And that is a big money save for you especially with this kind of huge property 
-	24hour staff assistance , our villa manager is living nearby and always around if needed to help you during your stay, it will enable you to save precious time (airport transfer, taxi booking, BBQ assistance, advises for activities, laundry service and more )
-	A rate of satisfaction which speaks for itself , hundreds of group hosted for and we keep working to meet your expectations
-	The guarantee that everything is functional ,if not we are making the commitment to replace it immediately
But no worries about that, all aircon are new from 2019 so is the pool system (and pool tiles)
-	A partnership with the best companies for years, good deals for all kind of activities on the island , the experience and feedbacks from satisfied customers 
No need to pre book activities from your home, it will cost you way too much money … the offer is huge in Phuket, we can discuss about your schedule and arrange it with on your arrival time 


LOCATION AND ENVIRONNEMENT

The villa is located on the hill of Patong city which the main city of Phuket island for tourism (restaurants, nightlife and activities center)							
Our place is totally private, no adjacent neighbor to disturb your peace of mind … your only trouble would be to avoid missing the picturesque sunset every day.
The extensive view is our attraction, daytime or nighttime overlooking the Patong Bay and the Andaman Sea, it will offer you an unequalled festival of colors in the perfect relaxing environment. The neighborhood is quiet, only small familial restaurants, guest-houses and offices. 
Two restaurants are located just a few step away from you, one small and cheap and delicious Thai place and another good one with western food and Thai food. 
We are located just 1 minutes to 7/11 shop and 5 to 10 minutes from the city center, walking street, night market and patong beach.

Property arrangement 

All the property is private for you, everything is behind the main entrance door with access code. 1490m2 of exclusive space for your group, totally secure by 8 outside cameras and also a 24 security guard stay few meters away from the villa. Also High speed WIFI is running in every centime of the property .Please find hereafter the precise arrangement with the outside area and the 3 buildings surrounding the pool:	

-	Common outside area 

New pool from April 2019, bar just up the pool stairs with: drinking water fountain, freezer, fridge, glasses for everyone and more 
You can also enjoy on the deck: dining table with benches with 16 seats, garden furniture with 8 seats, 6 sunbeds, outside shower and BBQ. 

-	1st building 

Ground floor: 2 bedrooms apartment of 112 sqm with 2 individual bathrooms connected, big living room with TV and outside terrace overlooking the vegetation.
1st floor: 2 bedrooms apartment of 112 sqm with 2 individual bathrooms connected, big living room with TV and outside terrace overlooking the vegetation.

-	2nd building

Ground floor: 1 bedroom apartment of 52 sqm with 1 bathroom, 1 living room with outside terrace overlooking the bay and the sea. 
Another 1 bedroom apartment of 52 sqm with 1 bathroom, 1 living room with outside terrace overlooking the bay and the sea.
Lower level 1 : 2 bedrooms apartment of 102 sqm with 1 bathroom , 1 kitchen with all kitchenware you might need , big living room with the largest couch of the property with 10 seats and 55 screen TV , outside terrace with huge bean bags and tropical garden view . 
Lower level 2: pool table room with garden view 
	
-	3rd building 

2 bedroom apartment of 78 sqm over the swimming pool , 1 bathroom and 1 living room with TV and outside terrace with the highest point of view of the property .

Not included
-	Airport transfer service: 800 baht for a taxi up to 3 persons plus luggage , 1200 baht for a minivan up to 9 people plus luggage
-	Breakfast can be provided , please advise us before checking if you would like to book it 
-	Laundry service : our staff is taking care of that , clothes wash and iron for 60 baht per kilo equivalent 2 USD

LOCATION AND ENVIRONNEMENT

The villa is located on the hill of Patong city which the main city of Phuket island for tourism (restaurants, nightlife and activities center)	

We are located just 1 minutes to 7/11 shop and 5 to 10 minutes from the city center, BANGLA road walking street, night market and PATONG beach.
						
Our place is totally private and safe with 24h STAFF service, cctv, safety boxes, access with gate code door, 24 hours security guard and  NO neighbor to disturb your peace of mind so NO NOISY RESTRICTION … your only trouble would be to avoid missing the picturesque sunset every day.

The extensive view is our attraction, daytime or nighttime overlooking the Patong Bay and the Andaman Sea, it will offer you an unequalled festival of colors in the perfect relaxing environment. 

Adjacent at 10m to the villa we have a delicious thai around 60 thb per dish (btw the cheapest of patong) and western food around 150 thb per dish who can also bring it to the villa.

For the transportation on 24H they have BOLT app the best and cheapest one and many others apps or TUKTUK numbers 200 bath for 10 people not per person.

NO additional charges. free electric during your stay free drinking water and cleaning everyday if you want as we have 24h STAFF service who also can assist you and advice you for not loosing time and available for any request.

Feel free to let us know for more information.

We have a private car and motorbike parking and 24 hours taxi tuktuk and motorbike taxi service and also motorbike and car rental.

Let us know if you need more information thank you.

Partners 
As stated before , almost all island trip  don’t  required pre booking and are always cheaper with us , you might take a look and advise us few week before if you are interested with the Hype Luxury Boat ( website )
We have a long time partnership with them and it is definitely a friend trip bachelor party must do.

name: Villa Yoosook sea view billiard sauna fitness
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Yoosook is a luxury seven bedroom villa, boasting entertaining facilities, in Phuket's most sought after location, Patong Beach. The private swimming pool overlooks the Andaman sea, and Patong city. Shops and restaurants are less than five minutes away by car.  All bedrooms have sea views, a private balcony and en suite bathroom. The villa is ideal for holidaymakers looking for privacy and comfort with luxury facilities including  billiard, and sauna. Daily cleaning service is included.

The villa is built on four levels and includes seven equal sized bedrooms, each with ensuite bathroom. The upper level includes two king size bedrooms, each bedrooms has a private balcony with sea views and a private attached bathroom with large jacuzzi bath tub, and walk in shower and twin wash basins.  

Steps down lead to the main living area which includes a living room with television and a sea view lounge with wall to ceiling glass doors that completely open onto a sensational terrace with outdoor dining. The fully equipped kitchen includes two refrigerators, a freezer, an oven, a stove,  microwave, toaster, blender, pots and pans and all cutlery. The dining area is open to the main kitchen and can seat up to 14 guests. 

Outdoor stairs lead to the pool level which includes a superb outdoor covered living area with comfortable seating for up to 10 people. In addition there is a Sala with stools and high table for up to 6 people. And plenty of sun chairs. An outdoor shower is available as well as a pool side bathroom with toilet, shower and wash basin. The views from the pool are exceptional, overlooking Patong Bay and at night one can see the twinkling lights of the town and enjoy breath taking sunsets. 

More outdoor stairs lead to a lower level which includes a dedicated apartment for the live in staff, this area is specifically designed to not disturb our guests privacy. 

Steps lead down to the lowest level which includes three bedrooms. Two kind size bedrooms and a twin bedroom. One of the king bedrooms includes a large jacuzzi bath tub, separate shower and wash basin, while the two other en suite bathrooms include a walk in shower, wash basin and toilet. 

Down the hall , is a separate bathroom, and steps lead down to the entertainment and fitness area. The giant entertainment rooms includes a pool table, kitchenette, and comfortable sofas and TV, and PlayStation. And on the other side of the stair case is the fitness room, sauna and shower room. 

The villa is ideally located overlooking Patong Beach, in a private oasis surrounded by nature and beauty.

Guests have access to their very own private  swimming pool, their own private fitness room and sauna, and games room with pool table.  The villa is rented to only one group at a time. Guests will have access to the entire villa.

Although I will not be on site to greet you, I will connect you with your villa manager once the booking is confirmed, and will assist you before and during your stay alongside the villa manager.

Villa Yoosook is located on a tropical mountain overlooking Patong Ocean and sunsets and town. Villa Yoosook is in a natural setting surrounded by tropical vegetation offering peace and quiet. The villas advantage is proximity to all of the islands hot spots and at the same time offering guests the dream of a Thai essence holiday.

Transport can be organized before or upon check in to facilitate your stay. Please note that the driveway leading to the villa is steep, so we recommend hiring our transport services who can drive easily down the slope.

Only those guests stipulated on the booking form may reside in the villa, additional guests will be charged extra.

The villa staff works from 8am until 5pm. Overtime is charged at 300 baht per hour per staff until maximum 10pm. The villa staff includes two maids and an English speaking manager.

The kitchen is available for personal guest use. Grocery shopping by the villa staff is available during working hours, groceries are charged at market price + 20% service charge. Linens and towels are changed after every 3 nights. Complimentary toiletries are offered.  

A 15,000 Thai Baht refundable security deposit is due on check in date, cash only, paid to the villa manager and returned on check out less any loss or damage.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
A 15,000 Thai Baht cash refundable security deposit is due on check in date, paid to the villa manager, and will be returned on check out date, less any loss or damage.

Passport photos of every guest residing in the villa are required before check in, we are required by Thai Law, to register each guest residing at the villa with immigration

Like anywhere we kindly request that our guests respect the villa and the staff. Our villa is of high standard and our staff is very accommodating.  It is customary in Thailand to not wear shoes inside the villas. Smoking outside using ashtrays is allowed, but please refrain from smoking inside. Guest can celebrate but we kindly ask that no large parties with many outside guests be held at the villa without prior permission in writing.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Although I will not be on site to greet you, I will connect you with your villa manager once the booking is confirmed, and will assist you before and during your stay alongside the villa manager.

name: Summoon
address: 普吉岛, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome  to  Summoon

Located in Cape Yamu overlooking the Phang Nga Bay- a World Heritage Site chosen by UNESCO, the tropical luxurious villa is a masterpiece designed by Paola Navoneamous, a well-known Italian designer. The style is modern, simple and lively. The villa is named by its owner as "Summoon" , signifying the beauty of moonlight night in late summer and early autumn.


This villa occupies an area of 1500 square meters. It consists of a living room of 200 square meters, large terrace of 300 square meters. The terrace includes breakfast area, barbecue area. The private infinity swimming pool and bedrooms overlook the Andaman Sea.


The villa has 7 bedrooms. All bedrooms are furnished a king-size bed or standard twin beds. Lying in bed, the guests can enjoy the fantastic sea view. Both bedrooms and living room are equipped with luxurious sanitary equipments and delicate decoration. This villa has audiovisual room, gym, and wine cellar. The owner of this villa is a Hi-fi fancier. The home theater is equipped with Dolby Atmos 5.1.4 with superb sound effect. The home theater could bring guests incredible audiovisual experience. Guests can not only enjoy thousands of Blue-ray films, but also play Nintendo switch games in front of the large 200-inches screen. Gym with Johnson fitness package and outside infinity swimming pool with an amazing sea view are free to use. All the red wines are the wholesale price. Guests can use self-help service. Free wi-fi is covered throughout the house.

The kitchen of this villa is equipped with full set of cabinets and electrical appliances imported from Germany. Living room and bedrooms are equipped with furniture made from Southeast Asian slope wood, acacia wood and other hardwoods. These woods are the raw materials of bracelets in China.

Cleaning and catering service is provided by Thai-maid, who works full time to attend to the needs of the guests. They will prepare breakfast free of charge. For other services, like shopping errands for food or daily necessities, tips are required to be given to the maid.
 For family party, guests can ask the Thai maids to buy authentic local ingredients. Facing the sea, guests can prepare for a table of delicious dishes for their family. For business party, professional chefs can be offered by the owner to prepare for guests an exotic bite of Thailand.

For each booking of 7 days or more, you can enjoy one free pick-up and one free drop-off from the airport for 12-seat Toyota van . Besides on the day of pick-up and drop off, 12-seat luxury Toyota chartered car will be available for 8 hours daily with driver (the guest pays 1,000 baht for gas), with no extra charge.

name: Classic Thai style Cozy Villa fancy pool+garden
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Patong Thai-style four-bedroom villa with stone reliefs in the interior and colorful sandalwood carvings in each room, especially the artistic atmosphere of the villa, taking you through the time, returning to ancient Thailand, the time of prosperity, marvel the fabulous art.

The villa's poolside gazebo is the perfect place to enjoy a delicious outdoor BBQ

The thai-style traditional villa is hidden in the downtown with a big private pool and private garden with a pavilion.

Professional maid service provides pool and gardens clean 2 times a week.

Full function kitchen and laundry room, you will enjoy the journey if you like to cook the fresh seafood by yourself.

We also provide motorcycles and car rental service at any time, our guide can arrange you experience all kinds of activities on the island if you like.

the whole area of the villa

I would like to assist guests to make the trip better

10mins to Patong Beach by motorcycle,
 A huge amount of restaurants around the villa by drive less than 10mins.

Nearby the Patong Beach and Banzaan Market, 1.5km from villa to market.

1.2km to Patong night market;

1km to Simon Show;

1.1km to Malin Plaza Mall

500m to FamilyMart Convenience store

50mins to Airport by drive.

We currently offer a special price, so the electricity bill is excluded from the price, it's 7 baht per kWh, guests will pay 5000baht for a deposit and we'll refund before checkout.
Thanks in advance for your understanding :-)

name: 5 Bedroom Andaman View: Seaview, Pool, Sleeps 15
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Andaman View has 5 bedrooms and a stunning seaview.  The villa provides luxury accommodation for up to 15 guests looking for the perfect private escape. The villa boasts 180 degree seaviews.  Nearby to Nai Harn Beach, fully serviced and equipped, with WIFI, maid, cook & driver.

Located within the prestigious development of Baan Sawan the villa is accessed by a steep sporting driveway of winding concrete, on a lush hillside. The driveway, however, is more than compensated for by the unrivalled 180 degree views over the Andaman Sea. Although perfectly safe, the driveway does require you to use first gear and concentrate when driving up. The villa is a 5–6 minute drive from Nai Harn beach, and a vehicle is recommended to access near-by shops and restaurants.

Located above the enchanting enclave of Nai Harn and Rawai Villages, this luxurious villa is the perfect space for those seeking total privacy and optimum comfort. The opulent surroundings and 180 degree sea and sunrise views are beyond comparison. It combines the spirit of contemporary tropical living with the practical elegance of European design and technology.

On arrival at the villa, the view is stunning. The spacious living room, infinity-edge swimming pool, sun deck and outside dining table, as well as the Western-style kitchen and four large double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, offer a serene environment for a larger group or two families desiring pure luxury.

Outside there are beautifully landscaped gardens, a two car garage adjacent to the villa and a stylish lily pond to complete the tranquility.

With great attention to detail, the villa is tastefully furnished with a mixture of modern and traditional teak furniture, which is both stylish and comfortable. The beautiful Thai ornaments and silks complete the feeling of luxury and enhance your enjoyment of your time in paradise.

Accommodation is comprised of five bedrooms split on two levels, all with en-suite bathrooms and roomy showers, two of which also have Jacuzzi baths. There is an additional standalone cloakroom including only a toilet and wash basin. The villa readily accommodates 12 people, with four of the five bedrooms having sliding doors that open onto private balconies, allowing you to fully appreciation the fantastic sea views. Three of these bedrooms offer king-sized beds, and one offers two large single beds (3.5'). The fifth bedroom, although not having a sea view, has a king-sized bed, TV and DVD player, it's own kitchen, and direct access onto the street.

As you enter the villa you find the large main living room which leads directly onto the covered terrace where you can relax and swim in the infinity-edge swimming pool. Alternatively, you can dine on delicious Thai meals, that can be prepared in house at an extra charge, at the 8-seater dining table, or enjoy a relaxed BBQ. The villa has the convenience of a fully-fitted luxury Western-style kitchen equipped to meet all your needs.

Additionally on this level of the villa, you can escape into the comfortable TV room and watch the 50", multi-channeled, flat screen television or enjoy a movie supported by a Bose surround sound system.

Moving downstairs you will find a games room equipped with another 50" TV and DVD player, pool table, table tennis table, foosball table and a bar with ample seating. This room also enjoys stunning sea views. Adjacent to the games room there is a generous utility room with washing machine and tumble dryer, as well as large storage facilities.

Located within the prestigious development of Baan Sawan, part way up a hill, the villa is up a  "sporting" driveway of winding concrete. Guests have access to the entirety of this private villa, entered through a double front door in this private escape. Although perfectly safe, the driveway does require you to use first gear and concentrate when driving up, and transport can be arranged to take you to and from the villa to the bottom of the drive way.

The villa is very close to Nai Harn beach, recently voted the best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser, as well as Rawai beach, which offers restaurants, bars, nightlife, and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands. There are a number of delicious up-scale and relaxed restaurants within walking distance or short drive of the villa. 

Our team can arrange motorbike or car rentals, along with day trips and activities.

The villa's team and myself all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from our Guest Relations Manager, Tour Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

Situated on the lush hillside above Nai Harn village, the villa is in a quiet location within a prestigious exclusive development of five similar properties.  The villa is a short driving distance to a selection or restaurants, shops and bars, and it is easy to get around using local transport. 

Nai Harn beach is within a 10-minute drive of the villa and is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island.  It not only offers golden sands and azure water, but a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Nai Harn beach is a spectacular pristine beach and is a perfect place to unwind, whether it be having a massage or sipping a refreshing beverage in one of the many restaurants that overlook it. It is an ideal spot for surfing at the end of the dry season and offers a perfect secluded bay for mooring yachts.  There is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants locally along with many beach and viewpoint bars. People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 10-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

At nearby villages, Rawai and Chalong, (which are a 10-15 minute drive away) you will find long tail and speedboats available, so you can visit any of the beautiful islands a short distance from Phuket. Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, activities such as seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips can be arranged by our Tour Manager. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

It is easy and safe to walk around the area, however transport can be arranged to take you up and down from the villa. Additionally, we can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

Andaman View villa is located in a quiet, private estate, a 5-minute drive from Nai Harn Beach. The villa offers privacy and is not over looked by anyone.  Far enough away from the main roads, there are no road noises, and it is safe and secure for children. The villa is designed and furnished as a western family home (in Phuket) to give you all your home comforts while experiencing Thailand. The villa has a daily maid and Thai meals can be prepared and served upon request, at a charge. Additionally, the villa offers the support of being managed by an English owner who is experienced at traveling (with children) and living abroad, so can easily answer any of your questions.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Treat our home as you would your own please! We take a small security deposit in cash on arrival (10,000 THB) and this will be returned to you in full as long as you do not damage anything.

We are happy to hosts events at our villa, please contact the host for additional details and costs.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa's team and myself all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from our Guest Relations Manager, Tour Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing. sectionedDescription/space:
Located within the prestigious development of Baan Sawan the villa is accessed by a steep sporting driveway of winding concrete, on a lush hillside. The driveway, however, is more than compensated for by the unrivalled 180 degree views over the Andaman Sea. Although perfectly safe, the driveway does require you to use first gear and concentrate when driving up. The villa is a 5–6 minute drive from Nai Harn beach, and a vehicle is recommended to access near-by shops and restaurants.

Located above the enchanting enclave of Nai Harn and Rawai Villages, this luxurious villa is the perfect space for those seeking total privacy and optimum comfort. The opulent surroundings and 180 degree sea and sunrise views are beyond comparison. It combines the spirit of contemporary tropical living with the practical elegance of European design and technology.

On arrival at the villa, the view is stunning. The spacious living room, infinity-edge swimming pool, sun deck and outside dining table, as well as the Western-style kitchen and four large double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, offer a serene environment for a larger group or two families desiring pure luxury.

Outside there are beautifully landscaped gardens, a two car garage adjacent to the villa and a stylish lily pond to complete the tranquility.

With great attention to detail, the villa is tastefully furnished with a mixture of modern and traditional teak furniture, which is both stylish and comfortable. The beautiful Thai ornaments and silks complete the feeling of luxury and enhance your enjoyment of your time in paradise.

Accommodation is comprised of five bedrooms split on two levels, all with en-suite bathrooms and roomy showers, two of which also have Jacuzzi baths. There is an additional standalone cloakroom including only a toilet and wash basin. The villa readily accommodates 12 people, with four of the five bedrooms having sliding doors that open onto private balconies, allowing you to fully appreciation the fantastic sea views. Three of these bedrooms offer king-sized beds, and one offers two large single beds (3.5'). The fifth bedroom, although not having a sea view, has a king-sized bed, TV and DVD player, it's own kitchen, and direct access onto the street.

As you enter the villa you find the large main living room which leads directly onto the covered terrace where you can relax and swim in the infinity-edge swimming pool. Alternatively, you can dine on delicious Thai meals, that can be prepared in house at an extra charge, at the 8-seater dining table, or enjoy a relaxed BBQ. The villa has the convenience of a fully-fitted luxury Western-style kitchen equipped to meet all your needs.

Additionally on this level of the villa, you can escape into the comfortable TV room and watch the 50", multi-channeled, flat screen television or enjoy a movie supported by a Bose surround sound system.

Moving downstairs you will find a games room equipped with another 50" TV and DVD player, pool table, table tennis table, foosball table and a bar with ample seating. This room also enjoys stunning sea views. Adjacent to the games room there is a generous utility room with washing machine and tumble dryer, as well as large storage facilities.
sectionedDescription/summary: Andaman View has 5 bedrooms and a stunning seaview.  The villa provides luxury accommodation for up to 15 guests looking for the perfect private escape. The villa boasts 180 degree seaviews.  Nearby to Nai Harn Beach, fully serviced and equipped, with WIFI, maid, cook & driver.
sectionedDescription/transit:

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

name: State-Of-The-Art 4 bedroom Seaview Pool Villa
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
STUNNING MODERN 4BEDROOM SEAVIEW, SUNSET, POOL VILLA IN KAMALA
EXQUISITE WITH SWEEPING VIEWS OF THE SUNSET INTO THE ANDAMAN SEA.FULLY RENOVATED with UPGRADED touches in JULY 2022
Set into the mountain top surrounded by stone and jungle. Modern yet accepting of nature, seamless indoor/outdoor living space! You've come to Thailand to explore but you won't want to leave these luxurious. Wind blowing through the trees,silence,nature with accessibility to all conveniences you desire just steps away.

The master bedroom is set upon a mezzanine with beautiful sea and mountain views, engulfed by the greenery of the surrounding jungle. Take a Jacuzzi bath while gazing out at the Andaman sea. Wrapping around to the shower and dressing area, it's a space of its own. A large flat screen SMART TV and neon pink lights under the bed make for a perfect cinema experience from the comfort of your bed.

The additional big three bedrooms all feature king size beds, two upstairs with ensuite bathrooms, one downstairs with a half bath. Each has its own jungle view and charm.

The main floor features an open concept fully-equipped kitchen and living space. Perfect for entertaining or a romantic night together under the stars. Large Smart TV with surround sound speakers for cozy nights at home or ambiance music complete your experience. 

The 250 sq M rooftop features 360 views of jungle, mountains and sea. With a petanque court and solarium. View Kamala like no one else with complete privacy, from the top of the world surrounded by lush trees and peace and quiet.

Don’t dream your life, live your dream.
Welcome to your home away from home.

FEATURES
24 hour security & CCTV
Butler available 24 hours for any services required
High speed internet throughout the house encourages productivity 
SmartTV with IPTV & NETFLIX
BlueTooth Surround Sound System in Living Area
Private Pool
Petanque Court on rooftop
Fully Equipped Kitchen with Oven
Air Conditioning Units throughout the entire house

AREA
30 minute drive from Phuket International Airport
10 minute drive from Patong
2 km from Cafe Del Mar Phuket
2 km from the beach
1 km from 7/11, open 24 hours for all your immediate needs
Fresh local fruit stand at the bottom of the hill

All space of the villa can be access

Electricity is included

Cleaning service is included at check in and check out, any extra request during stay will be extra cost.

Our villa capacity is 8 guests/night. Additional guests will be charged at 3000 baht per person per night.

No Pets
No Smoking Indoors
No Shoes inside - Thai Household
No large gatherings will be allowed on this property.

Please respect the house rules and enjoy your stay
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No smoking inside and No shoes inside the house (Thai Rules)

name: 8 Bedroom Opal Villa: Pool, Near Beach, Sleeps 20
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Opal Villa is a spacious and beautifully furnished  accommodating up to 18 guests in 8 bedrooms, with a large living room, private swimming pool, outside sun deck & dining areas, complete with gas BBQ, daily maid and is just a 3-minute drive to Nai Harn Beach.

This stunning family villa offers indoor and outdoor living to suit all ages. Located at the top of a valley within the private development, it has luscious hillside tropical views. Complete with games room it is an ideal venue for large groups or 2 to 3 families.

This extensive 8 bedroom villa is complimented by the large sun terrace and landscaped gardens, complete with sun beds to soak up the sun, leading to the large infinity edged pool with integral Jacuzzi. Adjacent to the swimming pool is the sala, containing another dining table for 12, plus ample additional seating, gas BBQ and fridge. This makes an ideal outside setting for evening BBQs and entertaining.

With great attention to detail, Opal Villa is tastefully furnished with a mixture of solid teak beds and rich wooden furniture, stylish poly rattan outdoor furniture and huge comfortable sofas, all complimented by Thai silks and artwork throughout.

For entertainment, Opal Villa boasts a spacious games room with a pool table, dart board and gym equipment.

Accommodation comprises of 8 bedrooms, which are all en-suite with ceiling fans and remote control air conditioning units. Bedrooms are split over two levels, offering 5 king-sized beds, 3 single beds, 1 room with queen/single bunk bed (perfect for 3 guests) and 1 room with a queen sized bed. Therefore, comfortably accommodating 18 people.

Upstairs, the master bedroom suite has a king-sized bed, walk-in wardrobes, and large en-suite bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower and large oval bath. A twin bedroom is also located upstairs, ideal for young children who need to be closer to their parents at night.

The remaining 6 bedrooms are all on the lower level. Bedrooms 3, 4, 5 and 7 have king-sized beds, with bedroom 3 including an additional single bed (3.5'), large en-suite bathrooms with spacious walk-in showers or baths, plus built-in wardrobes. Sliding double doors take you directly onto the sun terrace and allow access to the private swimming pool. Bedroom 6 has 1 set of queen/single bunk beds (with a queen bed below and a single bed above) and shares an en-suite bathroom with bedroom 5. Finally bedroom 8 comprises of a queen size bed and ensuite bathroom with shower. 

Downstairs also boasts a large games room with pool table, dart board, running machine and cross trainer. A second living room is also located on this floor, with 50" TV, DVD player and cable TV.

Returning upstairs, you will find the main living room, with ample seating to relax and watch the 50" flat screen television with DVD player (plus a selection of movies) and cable TV, as well as a bluetooth speaker system. Additionally there is a cloakroom providing a toilet and wash basin. Moving outside you can relax, or dine at the 18-seater dining table, on the under-cover balcony taking in the valley views.

The fully-fitted luxury Western-style kitchen is fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax in while meals are being prepared.

Opal Villa also offers wireless internet access throughout the villa, and a landline telephone for local calls.

Guests have access to the entirety of this private villa, entered through a double front door, off a quiet road in a private estate.  The two level villa has a private swimming pool with surrounding patio/sun deck and secluded garden away from main roads and noises, making it safe for children and relaxing for adults. 

The villa is very close to Nai Harn beach, recently voted the best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser, as well as Rawai beach, which offers restaurants, bars, nightlife, and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands. There are a number of delicious up-scale and relaxed restaurants within walking distance or short drive of the villa. 

Our team can arrange motorbike or car rentals, along with day trips and activities.

The villa's team and myself all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from our Guest Relations Manager, Tour Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

The villa is located within a 3-minute drive, or easy 15-20 minute walk, of Nai Harn beach (voted the BEST beach in Phuket for the last three years), located in the South of Phuket. Nai Harn beach is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island.  It not only offers golden sands and azure water, but a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Nai Harn beach is a spectacular pristine beach and is a perfect place to unwind, whether it be having a massage or sipping a refreshing beverage in one of the many restaurants that overlook it. It is an ideal spot for surfing at the end of the dry season and offers a perfect secluded bay for mooring yachts.  There is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants locally along with many beach and viewpoint bars. People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

At nearby villages, Rawai and Chalong, (which are a 5- and 10-minute drive away) you will find long tail and speedboats available, so you can visit any of the beautiful islands a short distance from Phuket. Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, activities such as seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips can be arranged by our Tour Manager. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

We can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  We can arrange one for you with 24-hours notice.

Opal villa is located in a quiet, secluded valley, but is easily accessible, just over 1 km from Nai Harn Beach. The villa offers privacy and is not over looked by anyone. The villa is designed and furnished as a western family home (in Phuket) to give you all your home comforts while experiencing Thailand. sectionedDescription/summary: Opal Villa is a spacious and beautifully furnished  accommodating up to 18 guests in 8 bedrooms, with a large living room, private swimming pool, outside sun deck & dining areas, complete with gas BBQ, daily maid and is just a 3-minute drive to Nai Harn Beach.
sectionedDescription/transit:
We can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  We can arrange one for you with 24-hours notice.

name: Villa Dok-Kaew
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Dok-Kaew, Phuket Vacation Home Rentals, located in 'Karon Beach Pool Villas' – a private pool villas for holiday rental, located at walking distance to Karon beach, Phuket, on the west coast, between Patong and Kata beach.

Peaceful and relaxing estate compound, four holiday rental villas; four with 3 bedrooms and one with 4 bedrooms, all fully furnished and equipped for holiday comfort with private swimming pool, sun decks, with a large terrace and surrounding by the beautiful tropical landscape. All villas well designed with open plan living area open out to the pool; living, kitchen and dining area make sure you will have space and comfort whether cooking, eating or relaxing. The kitchen offers a wonderful self-catering, equipped with all utensils, cooking appliance required for your lazy day.

Villa Dok-Kaew (ดอกแก้ว), 4 bedrooms, 4 bedrooms with private swimming pool.

The perfect escape set in a peaceful estate, beautiful 4 bedroom vacation home situated near a charming village of Karon beach, very convenient location, not necessary to rent a car during your stay, everything you need just within a walking distance; bars, shops and restaurants, and the beach is just a 10 - 15 minutes walk away. Suitable for every holiday group and themes; a family & friend holiday re-union, or a bachelor party, romantic escape, wedding venue or a company retreat.

Enjoy the serenity, breezy and a tropical ambiance, upon entering the house you will enjoy the airy open plan living area; living/TV/dining and kitchen open out to the pool via the sliding glass door offering the advantage of having a full view of the swimming pool from every corner. A temporary design, enjoys a refreshing breeze all year round, with a private 6 X 15 m. swimming pool (1.5 m depth).

A modern kitchen comes fully equipped with standard appliances such as microwave, oven, cooking hobs, oven, toaster and coffee maker, etc. The dining table comfortably seats 6 - 8 people.

Bedrooms:
* Master Bedroom, open out directly to the swimming pool, with a king-size bed and en-suite bathroom.
* Guest Bedroom 1, with a king-size bed and en-suite bathroom.
* Guest Bedroom 2, with a king-size bed and en-suite bathroom.
* Guest Bedroom 3, with a queen-size bed and en-suite bathroom.

Full air-conditioning is provided throughout the entire house along with free Wi-Fi.  

The big advantage of renting 'Villa Dok-Kaew', especially if you are a big group of friends and family, there are another 4 holiday houses 'Villa An-Chan', 'Villa Da-Laah', 'Villa Jum-Paa' and 'Villa Cha-Ba', which all located right next to each other, allow your extended family or guests to rent the next door where you will always have a good time together.

The Facilities and Services offer by 'Karon Beach Pool Villas';

* Daily maid cleaning (bed linens and towels change every 3 days)
* Pool cleaning
* Gardener
* WIFI Internet
* Cable TV
* Toiletries
* First set of drinking water and soft drinks

Optional Services:
* Airport transfer is available on request (extra charge).

'Karon Beach Pool Villas' location distances;
About 10 - 15 minutes walk to Karon Beach
About 5 - 10 minutes walk to supermarkets, various shops, souvenir shops , massages & spas, local market, cafes and restaurants
About 10 - 15 minutes drive to Patong & Kata Beach
About 20 - 30 minutes drive to Kamala/Surin beach & Town.
About 40 – 50 minutes from Phuket Int'l Airport.

Convenient location, easy access just with-in 5 - 10 minutes walk to shopping, restaurants, massages & spas, etc.

Peak Season minimum 2 weeks stay required.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No smoking allow inside the villa.

name: Diamond View -35% off sleeps 25 - sea view
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This huge 1,200sqm sea view villa was built in 2015, has new 2024 management implementing villa upgrades, fulltime maid, handyman fixing any issues immediately, 9 ensuite bedrooms, infinity edge pool, stunning sea views and a huge games room. It offers large groups affordable sea views in a great location from $95-$190 per room - unbeatable value! Airbnb guests (not others) sometimes leave deliberate false reviews which we ignore as over 95% of our guests rate the villa and staff very highly.

When people come to Phuket they dream of seaviews and being as close as possible to famous Nai Harn beach - and its beautiful sand and crystal clear warm water - this beach is voted Phuket's no. 1 beach every year.  

From your villa you look out over the islands off Rawai - yet you are only a 1 minute walk from Rawai beach,  a 15 minute walk to the secluded Yanui beach -  or a 4 minute drive to world famous Nai Harn beach.  Add in a fulltime maid, your own private pool, and numerous beach front restaurants - it makes for a great holiday. 

Nai Harn/Rawai is also the main area for tourist attractions like boat trips to the nearby islands, elephant treks, snake and monkey shows, quad biking - all of this and none of the tourist crowds found in Patong or Kata - all of this makes this part of Phuket the no. 1 place to be for your holiday.

This 13,000 sqft modern villa is situated on the hillside in a quiet development overlooking Rawai Beach and the outlying Islands visible across the Andaman Sea. The villas 9 bedrooms all have private ensuites and offer 6 king beds, 8 single beds and 2 single bunk beds - giving beds for up to 24 people - large groups over 15 are at our discretion and extra people incur a $20/person/night fee, this is because we price the villa for our typical group of up to 15 people. . The villa offers not one but two master bedroom suites each with their own sofa area.

The spacious villa offers a choice of three living rooms, a Thai siting area, an exclusive 12 seat cinema room, immense games room (with two pool tables, a table tennis table, a dart board), various gym equipment and large sun decks and balcony areas. Multiple living areas and 2 master bedrooms with their own private suites offer groups privacy to relax individually, all perfectly combining to make Diamond View one of Phuket’s top residences for larger groups or extended families.

The main living room, and huge games room,  both have TVs (up to 60" in the main living room, TVs in the bedrooms are not provided due to a high breakage rate with guests). The outside undercover 16-seater dining table is in an unequaled location for appreciating the exceptional view and beautiful sunsets, while enjoying al fresco dining on delicious Thai food or a hearty BBQ.

A fully-fitted large Western-style kitchen, with all appliances, offers the opportunity for any residents to prepare desired meals. 

The large infinity edge 12 x 5 metre swimming pool has an integral Jacuzzi which offers a breath-taking venue to enjoy the tranquil 180 degree ocean views. Extending beyond the swimming pool is a unique raised balcony, equipped with sun-beds, tables and chairs so you can soak in the sun and the sea views.

Diamond View enjoys close proximity to Rawai beach, and is a short walk to a good selection of restaurants, bars, night life and of course easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats that can whisk you away to the golden sands and azure waters of the many outlying Islands. Alternatively you can stay closer to home and enjoy the benefits of Phuket's "number one" beach, Nai Harn, just a few minutes’ drive away.

VILLA LAYOUT – seaviews from all 3 levels:
•Top level - bedrooms 1-3, large living area and outside balcony with magnificent views.
•Middle/Entrance level –  bedrooms 4-5, huge kitchen, main living area, outside balconies and pool with living areas and dining table.
•Lower level -  bedrooms 6-9,  laundry, a 12 seater cinema room (however we cannot guarantee this is working as guests frequently break it)  and a vast games room, offering sofa seating and bar stools to relax on while others play games of pool, table tennis or darts. Alternatively you can spend time exercising on the gym equipment, while pondering your thoughts looking out across the ocean.

Bedroom layout:
Bedroom 1 - king bed, single bed and ensuite
Bedroom 2 -king bed and single bed and ensuite
Bedroom 3 - king bed, two single beds and ensuite
Bedroom 4 - king bed, sofa sititng area d and ensuite
Bedroom 5 - king bed, single bed and ensuite
Bedroom 6 - king bed, 2 single beds and ensuite
Bedroom 7 - king bed, single bed and ensuite
Bedroom 8 - 3 single beds and ensuite
Bedroom 9 - single bed, bunk bed and ensuite

The full villa can be used.

Groups over 15 - an extra charge for large groups over 15 of $20/person/night applies (only for the excess people over 15 including children and babies).

Airport transfers – these will be arranged at a discounted rate of just US$35 each way for a 14 seater van which takes 10 people plus luggage and the driver will stop at shops on the way to the villa if requested.  If your booking is over US$2,000 1 free transfer each way will be provided. For bookings over US$3,000 2 free transfers each way will be provided.

1 day bookings - A 1 day booking will be charged at least 150% of the standard rate - all guests usually take 3 or more days.

Peak periods New Year and Chinese New Year - Usually a 12 -14 day minimum booking applies to New Year and a 7 day minimum booking applies to other peak public holiday periods.  However shorter periods may be accepted depending on what existing bookings have already been made.

Electricity - Phuket is undertaking major projects to upgrade electricity supply, however partial or full electricity failures may happen from time to time especially in stormy weather conditions, they usually last 30 minutes to 2 hours and are usually only partial power cuts (but these may effect water supply, aircons or wifi). As with hotels we are unable to accept any claims for electricity outages as they are beyond our control.

Hot water -  if 7 or more guests chose to have baths and showers at the same time then water pressure may drop - while multiple showers generally do not effect  hot water , running baths for children can use a lot of hot water very quickly.  For 99% of guests this is not an issue but please note for large groups you should avoid having numerous simultaneous baths and showers.  We are unable to accept any claims for low water pressure or low hot water as some guests like to make false claims simply by them using excessive water especially childrens' baths or groups of 15 or more.

Aircons - We recommend guests set aircons at the hotel standard of 25C.  Some guests insist on setting aircons at 18C and leaving them running all day and considerable expense and damage to the units.  Staff are instructed to turn off all aircons and reset them to 25C when guests are not in the room or the room has a door open.  Most bedrooms are large and thus and take about 15-20 minutes to reach 25C.  Living areas are open planned over 3 levels and thus cooling them to 25C during the day is difficult.

Cinema room - the in-house cinema requires your own laptop with Netflix and a hdmi connection.  We unfortunately cannot guarantee it will be working as guests frequently damage it requiring up to 2 weeks to repair.

Van hire - a 14 seater van with driver (10 people plus luggage) is very popular with our guests and costs 3,000b (about US$85) per 14 hr day (including petrol).  If you use the van for more than 14 hrs then an extra 100b ($3) is payable per hour. Ask you maid when you need a van.  A trip to Patong  for the evening will usually cost 1,600 ($45) per van.

Scooters - these are also very popular and can be hired for about 200b ($6) per day.  Ask your maid if you need scooters.

Meals - your maid will cook breakfast at about 9am, and for an extra 1,000b will cook dinner. You must pay your maid for all food she buys for you. All meals are sorted out directly between yourself and your maid. If you need an early breakfast for some reason you need to pay your maid 400b to come in early. There is a menu in the villa.

Extra maid - if you have a large group you may want to hire a second maid for 500b a day.  Again you can arrange this directly with your maid and she will try and find someone to help, but this is not always possible.

Beach – Rawai beach is only 200m away - but the nearest quality swimming beach is Yanui beach and is only 1.2km walk away.

Restaurants – There are numerous restaurants within walking distance.

7Eleven – the nearest 7Eleven is 400m away.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
INVOICES- while your booking is with Airbnb we wish to point out that charging for the villa is split between NHV Ltd (which charges for the villa), NHV or TV Ltd  (which charges a certain amount for the land) and NHM Ltd  (which charges  a certain amount for providing services which are potentially subject to VAT in Thailand).  If you need an invoice please use either the Airbnb invoice or ask us to provide direct invoices. 

VILLA CHANGE - if necessary (eg when maintenance is required) we reserve the right to change your villa to an identicle or larger villa in the same development.  This is permitted under Airbnb rules provided you receive substantilly the same villa.  Changes of villa are very rare.

MAID - If you need a maid she will start work about 8.45am (often buying food on the way to the villa), she will cook breakfast from about 9am (you pay her only for food she buys) and then tidy beds and bathrooms before lunch. She has 1 hr for lunch and cannot cook lunch for guests.  She will work until 4.30pm.  If you need her to cook dinner then you must pay her 1,000b for up to 16 people, 1,500b for over 16 - plus give her  money for food,.  She will serve dinner at about 7.45pm. Your Maid will not work on Sundays or Public Holidays (unless you agree directly with her and pay her 600b/day).

AIRCONS - Some guests insist on running most/all  aircons all day (even when not there) set on very cold temperatures with doors open which is very expensive and not good for the environment.  We include reasonable electricity usage of approximately 1,000b a day but excessive usage above this may be charged at 6b/kwhr.

NOISE - Outside noise, especially music or loud voices around the pool, must be kept quieter after 10pm weekdays and 11pm weekends as neighbours may be sleeping. 

EXTRA GUESTS - No guests may visit the villa other than those staying there.  This is to avoid people holding parties and inviting extra people above the agreed booking number.  The owner reserves the right to charge $20/night per extra guest that visits the villa.  You must inform the host on booking if you will have more than 16 people in your group. Over 15 people there is a $20 per person per night extra charge. 

DISHONEST CLAIMS - Unfortunately we have seen a recent increase in a very small group of guests bringing dishonest claims simply to make a financial gain. While these claims amount to less than 1% of our bookings, guests acknowledge that all claims must be bought to Airbnb's attention in good faith and the guest hereby instructs Airbnb that any ruling it gives must be proportional to the period and size of the inconvenience encountered - eg if one bathroom in a 7 bathroom villa does not work for 1 night then the maximum refund would be approximately 1/14th of one nights booking cost - attempts to claim a 10%+ refund of the total booking will be rejected by Airbnb.

name: Pool Villa 6 Bedrooms Sea View Patong (750m2)
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our Swimming Pool Sea view and Mountain view Villa in the hearth of Patong Phuket 6 bedrooms with all private balcony and king size beds, 4 bathrooms, 4 living rooms and kitchen with a swimming Pool and we also have a pool fresh bar and delicious Thai food who delivery in your room or in pool area. Peaceful and private place give a real serene time and amazing sea view sunsets.
Our 24 hours staff service can support you for ALL your Request like taxi, island, BBQ and more...
sectionedDescription/name: Pool Villa 6 Bedrooms Sea View Patong (750m2)
sectionedDescription/summary:

Peaceful and private place give a real serene time and amazing sea view sunsets.
Our 24 hours staff service can support you for ALL your Request like taxi, island, BBQ and more...

name: 5 Bedroom Villa Maria: Pool, Near Beach, Sleeps 14
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
With 5 bedrooms, and 4 extra pull out beds, this villa provides ample accommodation for groups or large families (up to 14 people) looking for the perfect hideaway. Close to Nai Harn Beach, fully serviced and equipped, with WIFI, maid, cook & driver

Set in a private development of three villas, Villa Maria is nestled between a luscious rubber plantation and a coconut grove. It provides ample accommodation for groups or large families looking for the perfect hideaway. This exclusive villa comes complete with a live-in housekeeper to look after the residence.

The extensive outside area includes a stunning, child friendly, kidney-shaped swimming pool with poolside shower and detachable safety fence. The beautifully landscaped gardens surrounded by mature coconut trees house a substantial sala, containing a kitchenette and 10-seater dining table, making it ideal for al fresco dining or a BBQ.

With great attention to detail it is tastefully furnished with a mixture of contemporary furniture, Chinese antiques, Asian artworks and Thai silks. These complement the rich wooden flooring throughout the whole upstairs living area. The stunning master bedroom, with its beautiful, hard wood vaulted ceiling is the height of romantic opulence.

Accommodation is comprised of 5 double bedrooms split over two levels, all with en-suite bathrooms. It can readily accommodate 10-14 people.

The ground floor is split between a 2 bedroom self-contained area and the main living area and kitchen. One of the bedrooms (bedroom 4) has a king-size bed, and the other (bedroom 5) has two 3.5' single beds, which two extra single beds can be pulled out from underneath of. This self-contained area has a kitchenette, living room and dining room.

The huge main lounge connects to the open plan fully-fitted luxury kitchen, and comes complete with 3 large leather sofas and a home theatre system lending itself to perfect entertaining. This living area also contains an impressive 3m dining room table seating 12 along with a cloakroom comprised of a toilet and wash basin. All rooms downstairs open onto the sundeck and pool through sliding doors.

Upstairs comprises of the 3 further double bedrooms. The master bedroom has a super king-size four-poster bed, bedroom 2 has a queen-size bed, and bedroom 3 has two 3.5' single beds, which again two extra single beds can be pulled out from underneath of. There is a cloakroom, containing a toilet and a wash basin, a study and a lounge opening onto an alternative seating area on a surround balcony over looking the pool area and coconut trees.

Guests have access to the entirety of this private villa, entered through a double front door, off a quiet road.  The two level villa has a private swimming pool with surrounding patio/sun deck and secluded garden away from main roads and noises, making it safe for children and relaxing for adults. 

The villa is very close to Nai Harn beach, recently voted the best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser, as well as Rawai beach, which offers restaurants, bars, nightlife, and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands. There are a number of delicious up-scale and relaxed restaurants within walking distance or short drive of the villa. 

Our team can arrange motorbike or car rentals, along with day trips and activities.

The villa's team and myself all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from our Guest Relations Manager, Tour Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

The villa is located within a 3-minute drive, or easy 15-20 minute walk, of Nai Harn beach (voted the BEST beach in Phuket for the last three years), located in the South of Phuket. Nai Harn beach is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island.  It not only offers golden sands and azure water, but a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Nai Harn beach is a spectacular pristine beach and is a perfect place to unwind, whether it be having a massage or sipping a refreshing beverage in one of the many restaurants that overlook it. It is an ideal spot for surfing at the end of the dry season and offers a perfect secluded bay for mooring yachts.  There is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants locally along with many beach and viewpoint bars. People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

At nearby villages, Rawai and Chalong, (which are a 5- and 10-minute drive away) you will find long tail and speedboats available, so you can visit any of the beautiful islands a short distance from Phuket. Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, activities such as seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips can be arranged by our Tour Manager. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

We can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  We can arrange one for you with 24-hours notice.

Villa Maria is located in a quiet area of beautiful Nai Harn village, just over 1 km from Nai Harn Beach. The villa offers privacy and is not over looked by anyone.  Far enough away from the main roads, there are no road noises, and it is safe and secure for children. The villa is designed and furnished as a western family home (in Phuket) to give you all your home comforts while experiencing Thailand. The villa has a daily maid and Thai meals can be prepared and served upon request, at a charge. Additionally, the villa offers the support of being managed by an English owner who is experienced at traveling (with children) and living abroad, so can easily answer any of your questions.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Treat our home as you would your own please! We take a small security deposit in cash on arrival and this will be returned to you in full as long as you do not damage anything.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa's team and myself all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from our Guest Relations Manager, Tour Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.
