sectionedDescription/space:
Set in a private development of three villas, Villa Maria is nestled between a luscious rubber plantation and a coconut grove. It provides ample accommodation for groups or large families looking for the perfect hideaway. This exclusive villa comes complete with a live-in housekeeper to look after the residence.

The extensive outside area includes a stunning, child friendly, kidney-shaped swimming pool with poolside shower and detachable safety fence. The beautifully landscaped gardens surrounded by mature coconut trees house a substantial sala, containing a kitchenette and 10-seater dining table, making it ideal for al fresco dining or a BBQ.

With great attention to detail it is tastefully furnished with a mixture of contemporary furniture, Chinese antiques, Asian artworks and Thai silks. These complement the rich wooden flooring throughout the whole upstairs living area. The stunning master bedroom, with its beautiful, hard wood vaulted ceiling is the height of romantic opulence.

Accommodation is comprised of 5 double bedrooms split over two levels, all with en-suite bathrooms. It can readily accommodate 10-14 people.

The ground floor is split between a 2 bedroom self-contained area and the main living area and kitchen. One of the bedrooms (bedroom 4) has a king-size bed, and the other (bedroom 5) has two 3.5' single beds, which two extra single beds can be pulled out from underneath of. This self-contained area has a kitchenette, living room and dining room.

The huge main lounge connects to the open plan fully-fitted luxury kitchen, and comes complete with 3 large leather sofas and a home theatre system lending itself to perfect entertaining. This living area also contains an impressive 3m dining room table seating 12 along with a cloakroom comprised of a toilet and wash basin. All rooms downstairs open onto the sundeck and pool through sliding doors.

Upstairs comprises of the 3 further double bedrooms. The master bedroom has a super king-size four-poster bed, bedroom 2 has a queen-size bed, and bedroom 3 has two 3.5' single beds, which again two extra single beds can be pulled out from underneath of. There is a cloakroom, containing a toilet and a wash basin, a study and a lounge opening onto an alternative seating area on a surround balcony over looking the pool area and coconut trees.
sectionedDescription/summary: With 5 bedrooms, and 4 extra pull out beds, this villa provides ample accommodation for groups or large families (up to 14 people) looking for the perfect hideaway. Close to Nai Harn Beach, fully serviced and equipped, with WIFI, maid, cook & driver
sectionedDescription/transit:
We can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  We can arrange one for you with 24-hours notice.

name: 9 Bedrm: Turquoise View: Seaview, Pool, Sleeps 24
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Turquoise View is a modern 1,000 sqm, 9 bedroom / 9 baths villa, with stunning seaviews, providing spacious accommodation for 23 guests (PLUS 2 extra beds in the cinema room, ideal for teenagers) looking for the perfect private escape for large groups, Entertaining or Events. The villa is walking distance to Rawai Beach, a short drive to Nai Harn Beach, with maid/cook, WiFi, pool, games room with pool tables & table tennis table. Plus a unique 12 seater in-house cinema, all at exceptional value.

This extensive contemporary villa is situated on the hillside in a quiet development overlooking Rawai Beach and the outlaying Islands protruding from the Andaman Sea. The relaxing aquamarine colours that decorate this villa promote tranquility and harmony with the surrounding sea and sky of the stunning 180 degree views. The turquoise accents contrast perfectly with the comfortable furnishings and the Asian touches, echoing the exceptional and unspoiled corner of Phuket's tropical Island.

The villa offers ample living and entertainment space, boasting a 12 recliner seat cinema room, substantial games room (with two pool tables, a table tennis table and a dart board) and sizeable sun decks and balcony areas. Separate living areas and private bedroom suites all offer smaller groups privacy to relax individually, all perfectly combining to make Turquoise View the ideal residence for larger groups or extended families.

The magnitude of the accommodation is illustrated by the 9 bedrooms, accommodating up to 21 people. The two large living rooms, Thai sitting area, games room, and every bedroom, all have TVs (up to 50"). The outside undercover 16-seater dining table is perfect for enjoying the sunset and al fresco dining on delicious Thai food or a hearty BBQ.

A fully-fitted large Western-style kitchen, with all appliances, offers the opportunity for any residents to prepare desired meals.

The infinity edge 9 x 4 metre swimming pool has an integral Jacuzzi and is the perfect place to cool down and unwind, while taking in the exceptional view across the Andaman Sea.

Turquoise View enjoys close proximity to Rawai beach, and is a short walk to a good selection of restaurants, bars, night life and of course easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats that can whisk you away to the golden sands and azure waters of the many outlying Islands. Alternatively you can stay closer to home and enjoy the benefits of Phuket's "number one" beach: Nai Harn, just a short drive away.

Accommodation is comprised of 9 bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes, en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans, remote control air conditioning units, the majority of which have large flat screen TVs with DVD players and cable TV. Bedroom suites are split over three levels, offering 6 king-size beds and 9 3.5' single beds, therefore comfortably accommodating 21 people.

As you enter the villa onto the middle level you will be instantly aware of the breathtaking seaview, seen through the huge sliding doors that open up entirely from the main living room onto the spacious balcony and infinity edge swimming pool. The private 9 x 4 metre swimming pool with integral Jacuzzi is surrounded by a spacious sun deck with sun beds, comfortable modern furniture and a large undercover dining table with seating for everyone. The second sun terrace on the upper balcony can be accessed by an external spiral staircase.

Upstairs on the upper-most level you can enter three of the 9 bedrooms. The master bedroom suite has a king-size bed with a large en-suite bathroom, comprising of bath, walk-in shower, two hand basins, vanity units and toilet. A spacious dressing area offers extensive wardrobe space and drawers, and a personal safe. The suite also offers it's own private living room with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV. It has stunning sea views and leads to it's own private balcony with dining table for intimate dining or private breakfasts.

The second master suite is also located on this level, with king-size bed, en-suite bathroom, with bath, shower and twin wash hand basins. The sliding doors from the bedroom again open onto private balcony with views over the Andaman Sea. Located next to this bedroom is the third of the upstairs bedrooms, which includes 3 single beds (3.5'), with a huge private bathroom including a walk-in shower and vanity unit with wash hand basin. Suitable for children that need to be close to their parents, or three people who wish to room together. Both bedrooms are complete with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV.

A spacious second living room is also found on this level, with sizeable sofa, 50" flat screen TV and DVD player, perfect for comfortably relaxing at the end of the day. Furthermore, there is a dedicated office with a work desk for those who have to spend a little time working, made convenient with the high speed WIFI connection and land line telephone.

As you return down the stairs to the middle level of the property, you will find yourself in the main living area, again with comfortable sofa, TV and DVD player. This living area has access to the fitted Western-style kitchen, fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax whilst meals are being prepared.

Located on this level are two more king-size bedroom suites, both with en-suite bathrooms offering baths, walk-in showers and twin vanity units with wash hand basins.

Taking the stairs to the lower level brings you to the enormous games room, offering sofa seating and bar stools to relax on or games of pool, table tennis or darts for you to enjoy. Alternatively you can spend time exercising on the gym equipment, while pondering your thoughts and looking out across the ocean.

This level of the villa also houses the remaining 4 bedrooms, two of which include a king-sized bed each, along with a single (3.5') bed. The third bedroom on this floor contains 3 single (3.5') beds, again perfect for children or 3 people who wish to room together. The final room, originally designed as a staff room, includes 1 single (3.5') bed. All of these bedrooms include  private en-suite bathrooms, additionally, majority of the bedrooms include flat screen TVs. Bedroom 9 also includes the villa's laundry room comprising of washing machine, tumble dryer, linen airing and storage areas.

Finally, the lower level boasts the unique Cinema Room, complete with 6 double reclining, lounger chairs, seating 12. This allows you to watch your choice of movie on the large projector screen.

Turquoise View is situated on the hillside in a quiet, underdeveloped private estate overlooking Rawai Beach. Being bordered by only one other similar property it is enjoys total privacy and 180 degree views out across the Andaman Sea. The private development only has a few other similar designed smaller villas comfortably spread throughout the gardens. Turquoise View is located less than a 10-minute walk to Rawai beach, where there are a good selection of restaurants and bars and easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats making visiting outlaying islands an easy option.

Guests have full access to the entire villa spread over three floors, with private swimming pool and surrounding patio and sun deck.  Situated away from any main road, there is no noise and safe for children. Close by to the popular Rawai beach with restaurants, bars and nightlife and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands.  A short 5-minutes to Nai Harn beach, recently voted THE best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser. The team can arrange motorbike or car rentals.

The villa's team and owner all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from a Villa Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

Turquoise View is situated on the hillside in a quiet, underdeveloped private estate overlooking Rawai Beach and within a 5-minute drive to Nai Harn village. Nai Harn beach has been voted the best beach in Thailand and offers golden sands and azure water as well as a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Along Rawai beach, located at the bottom of the villa’s driveway, as well as in Nai Harn village, there is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants along with many beach and viewpoint bars.  Here you will also find long tail and speedboats available, a number of exciting activities and some lively bars.  People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips are worth a trip. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

Taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans can be arranged, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

Airport transfers will be arranged for a discounted rate of only $30 each way for a van which seats 12 - please email us your flight details if you require a transfer.  If your booking is over $2,000 1 free 12 seater van transfer each way will be provided. For bookings over $3,000 2 free van transfers each way will be provided (if required).

Van hire - a 12 seater van with driver is very popular with our guests and costs 3,000b (about US$85) per 14 hr day (including petrol). If you use the van for more than 14 hrs then an extra 100b ($3) is payable per hour. Ask you maid when you need a van. A trip to Patong for the evening will usually cost 1,600 ($45) per van.

Scooters - these are also very popular and can be hired for about 200b ($6) per day. Ask your maid if you need scooters.

Meals - your maid will cook breakfast at about 9am, and for an extra 1,000b will cook dinner. The cost of the food is paid for by the guests. All meals are sorted out directly between yourself and your maid. If you need an early breakfast for some reason you need to pay your maid 400b to come in early. There is a menu in the villa.

Extra maid - if you have a large group you may want to hire a second maid for 500b a day. Again you can arrange this directly with your maid and she will try and find someone to help, but this is not always possible.

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

name: Patong Sea View Pool Villa 300m to beach
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Teetara Villa Patong (巴东海滩). Experience Thai authenticity and hospitality. We invite you to stay at our 4-bedroom villa. Conveniently located within a 3-minute walking distance to Patong Beach.

Our villa boasts generous room sizes, an enviable living and dining area, 5.5 bathrooms, an exclusive private plunge pool, and a rooftop sun deck and BBQ area with sea views of Patong Bay.

We hope to host you soon and make your stay in Patong an unforgettable one!

We at Teetara are dedicated to ensuring that you have the best possible experience when you stay at our Villa. we as hosts are hospitable and kind. Our aim is to ensure that your stay at our villa is met with all your holiday needs.
 
In addition, we provide full in-room amenities and airport pick-up and drop-off. In addition, we offer car rental and a motorcycle rental.
 
The villa further features flat-screen TVs, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a fridge.
 
Further points of interest close to the villa include Jungceylon Shopping Center( 2km), Patong Boxing Stadium (2km), Bangla Road Nightlife (1.5km), and Phuket Simon Cabaret (4km). The villa is a 50 minutes drive from Phuket International Villa (34km).

Guests have exclusive access to the whole villa including a private swimming pool. This is a gated community and has 24 hours security. We offer the best service to make sure you have a great holiday.
We can arrange for in villa chef service on request.

We understand Phuket well. We are able to guide you in all your needs whether it be Scuba Diving, Boat/Yacht Excursions, local restaurants, sightseeing, shopping, nightlife and entertainment .

Teetara Villa Patong is located in Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand.

Patong is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood located on the west coast of Phuket, a popular island province in Thailand. Renowned for its stunning beaches, exciting nightlife, and a wide array of entertainment options, Patong is often referred to as the party capital of Phuket. Here's a description of the Patong neighborhood:

Beaches: Patong Beach, the main attraction of the neighborhood, stretches along the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea. It is a stunning crescent-shaped beach with powdery white sands, fringed by swaying palm trees. The beach offers various water sports activities, including jet skiing, parasailing, and banana boat rides, attracting adventure enthusiasts from around the world.

Nightlife: Patong's vibrant nightlife scene is legendary. The neighborhood is home to an array of bars, clubs, and discos that come alive after sunset. Bangla Road, the epicenter of the nightlife, is a bustling street lined with neon lights, music blaring from all corners, and a constant buzz of excitement. Here, visitors can dance the night away, enjoy live music performances, and indulge in delicious street food.

Shopping: Patong offers a diverse range of shopping experiences. From bustling local markets to modern shopping malls, visitors can find everything from souvenirs and clothing to electronics and luxury goods. The Jungceylon Shopping Mall is a popular destination, housing a wide variety of international brands, restaurants, and a cinema.

Cuisine: Patong caters to all taste buds, offering a vast array of dining options. From street food stalls serving authentic Thai delicacies to upscale restaurants serving international cuisine, there's something to satisfy every palate. Seafood lovers will find an abundance of fresh catches at the local seafood markets and restaurants.

Entertainment: Beyond its vibrant nightlife, Patong offers a plethora of entertainment choices. Visitors can enjoy cabaret shows at the famous Simon Cabaret or witness the exciting Muay Thai fights at the Patong Boxing Stadium. For those seeking relaxation, numerous spas and wellness centers offer rejuvenating treatments and traditional Thai massages.

Tourist Attractions: Beyond the energetic atmosphere, Patong serves as a gateway to explore other nearby attractions. Patong is conveniently located within a short distance of popular destinations like the Big Buddha, Wat Chalong Temple, and the scenic viewpoints of Karon and Kata beaches. Excursions to the nearby Phi Phi Islands and Phang Nga Bay, known for their stunning landscapes and crystal-clear waters, are also easily accessible from Patong.

Overall, Patong neighborhood offers a vibrant mix of stunning beaches, exciting nightlife, diverse dining options, and a range of entertainment choices. It is a popular destination for travelers seeking a lively and energetic experience during their visit to Phuket, Thailand.

Getting around Patong is relatively easy, with several transportation options available to suit different preferences and budgets. Here's a guide on how to navigate the neighborhood:

Walking: Patong is a compact area, and many of the popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping areas are within walking distance. Strolling along the streets allows you to soak in the vibrant atmosphere and explore the neighborhood at your own pace. However, keep in mind that the streets can get crowded, especially in the evenings.

Tuk-tuks: Tuk-tuks are a common mode of transportation in Patong. These small, open-air vehicles can be found throughout the neighborhood, and they offer a convenient way to get around. Negotiate the price before getting in, as fares are usually not metered. Remember to agree on the price and destination beforehand to avoid any confusion.

Motorbike Taxis: Motorbike taxis are a popular and affordable option for short distances. You'll find motorbike taxi drivers wearing colorful vests stationed at various points around Patong. Simply hop on the back of the motorbike and let the driver whisk you through the traffic. It's essential to wear a helmet for safety.

Songthaews: Songthaews are modified pickup trucks with covered seating in the back. They operate as shared taxis along set routes, and the fares are usually fixed. You can flag down a songthaew and hop on if it's heading in your desired direction. However, note that they may not always be available in all areas of Patong.

Rental Scooters: If you're comfortable riding a scooter, renting one can be a convenient way to explore Patong and its surroundings. There are numerous scooter rental shops in the area, and prices are generally affordable. Remember to wear a helmet, follow traffic rules, and be cautious while driving, as traffic in Patong can be busy.

Private Taxis and Grab: Private taxis and ride-hailing services like Grab are available in Patong. You can book a taxi through your hotel or use smartphone apps to hail a ride. Private taxis typically operate on a meter, ensuring a transparent fare, while Grab offers upfront pricing. This option provides convenience and comfort, especially for longer distances or when traveling with a group.

It's important to note that traffic in Patong can be congested, particularly during peak hours. Allow extra time for travel, especially if you have scheduled activities or need to catch a flight. Additionally, exercise caution while crossing the roads and be mindful of your belongings to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience while getting around Patong.


The room rate includes one round-trip airport transfer which takes about 45 mins one way. 24 hours shuttle bus from the villa to the main road is available on call.

we believe in creating a welcoming and inclusive environment for all. Everyone is welcome here, and we want all of our guests to feel free to be themselves, regardless of their sexual orientation or gender identity. We celebrate diversity and respect all individuals, and we will always strive to create a space where everyone feels safe and accepted.

1. This price includes 150 units/day of electricity usage. If more than 150 units/day you must pay THB 6 per unit. (这价格包括电费150 单位/天，每单位超过 一单位算6 泰铢。)
2. BBQ grills are available. Please wash used kitchen wares and put them back;
3. Cleaning on the request.
4. Smoking is strictly not allowed in the rooms, only outside. it is against the law to smoke in these premises FINE 5,000 THB.
5. Free round-trip airport transfer included in a 12-seat van;
6. Chef service is approx. 2000thb (depending on the cuisine requested), which does not include the cost of groceries (please book at least 1 day in advance);
7. 12-seat van with driver for 8 hours is 3500thb (need to book one day advance);
8. Check-in time: 15:00, Check-out time: 11:00, early check-in and late check-out depending on availability, and are subject to extra costs. Please inform us when booking if required.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1. This price includes 150 units/day of electricity usage. If more than 150 units/day you must pay THB 6 per unit. (这价格包括电费150 单位/天，每单位超过 一单位算6 泰铢。)
2. Check-in time: 15:00, Check-out time: 11:00, early check-in, and late check-out depending on availability, and are subject to extra costs. Please inform us when booking if required. (下午三点入住，上午十一点退房。提前入住或者延时退房，取决于可用性服务，请提前通知房东（可能有额外费用）。)
3. Smoking is strictly not allowed in the rooms, only outside. it is against the law to smoke in these premises FINE 5,000 THB. (严禁在房间内吸烟，只能在室外吸烟。 在这些场所吸烟将处以罚款5,000泰铢。)
4. No pets allowed. (不允许携带宠物。)
5. No unregistered guests are allowed. (未登记人员不得进入别墅。)
6. Please don’t eat or drink in the bedrooms and in the pool. (请不要在卧室内或者在游泳池里用餐。)
7. No excessive noise. (禁止大声喧哗。)
8. Please respect the noise curfew. (在晚上 10 点以后 禁止喧哗。)
9. Please turn off the AC when you go out. (每次外出请关闭空调。)
10. Please take extra care of your keys. Lost keys incur a replacement fee. (请保管好钥匙，如果丢失有费用。)
11. Please take care of the furnishings. You have to pay for damages that exceed the security deposit. (请保持家居家具的保养，如果损坏有费用。)
12. Please don’t rearrange the furniture. (禁止移动家庭家具。)
13. Please do your dishes. (请在当天之间洗碗。)
14. No illegal substances are allowed on the premises. (禁止非法物品进入别墅。)

name: Heavenly Villa 5 Bedrooms
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Featuring a stunning setting perched on the hill side in Patong, Heavenly Villa 5 is the perfect property for family and friends to gather for almost any occassion. The property is an 8-minute walk from Phuket Simon Cabaret and free private parking is available.

Offering direct access to a balcony, this air-conditioned villa comes with 5 separate bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is provided.

An American or Asian breakfast is served at the property for an extra fee.

Expect to be blown away by the view of Patong Bay from the villa. 
A rustic charming villa with a modern touch.

Full access to the property

Jungceylon Shopping Center is 2.3 km from heavenly villa 5, while Bangla Road is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 25.7 km from the property.

We have parking available onsite. We are so close to Patong Beach and Bangla road that there is easy accessability to Tuk Tuks or Taxi's. 

Also the Grab app is very easy to order transportation during your stay with us.

Due to being located on a hill, the road is a little steep. It is a 5 minute walk to the villa if you are dropped at the neighbourhood gate (great exercise : ))

Please contact me to request airport transfer that will drop you right to the door of the villa. 

Also, we are connected to a tuk tuk service that can pick you up at the front door when you want to explore town.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No smoking inside the villa, outisde is ok. Smoking inside will result in a 10,000 THB fine.

Security deposit 5,000 THB paid in cash on arrival to our check in team.

name: 5-6 Bedroom Pool Villa Kamala with service
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
A warm welcome to this spacious pool villa in a very nice location in Kamala, Phuket.

The villa has a total of up to 6 bedrooms all with Ensuite bathrooms. All rooms have double beds and in total there are 7 beds so you can stay up to 14 people. Three of the bedrooms are directly adjacent to the lovely pool accompanied by a nice terrace where you are guaranteed to spend many wonderful hours swimming.

The villa also has a fully equipped kitchen, dining room, and living room. 

On the property, there is another large roof terrace with views of the lovely sunsets and the jungle, down to the pool area. There is also the opportunity to cook or grill and enjoy the tropical evening heat that rarely goes below 25 degrees Celsius.

The area is called Natong House and there is also a clubhouse with another large pool and a smaller gym.

name: 9 Bedroom Diamond View: Seaview, Pool, Sleeps 27
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Diamond View is a modern 1,300 sqm, 9 bedroom / 9 bathroom villa, with stunning seaviews, providing spacious accommodation for 24 guests looking for the perfect private escape for large groups, Entertaining or Events. The villa is walking distance to Rawai Beach, a short drive to Nai Harn Beach, with maid, cook and WiFi, large outdoor pool area, huge games room with two pool tables, table tennis table, darts and gym. Plus a unique 12 seater in-house cinema, all at exceptional value.

This extravagant modern villa is situated on the hillside in a quiet development overlooking Rawai Beach and the outlaying Islands visible across the Andaman Sea. The rich colours throughout this villa suggest opulence and luxury, blending perfectly with the comfortable furnishings and the Asian theme reminding you of the Thai tradition and cultures that are part of Phuket's lifestyle.

The spacious villa offers a choice of living and entertainment areas, boasting a 12 recliner seat cinema room, immense games room (with two pool tables, a table tennis table, a dart board, and an indoor basketball hoop) and large sun decks and balcony areas. Separate living areas and private bedroom suites offer smaller groups privacy to relax individually, all perfectly combining to make Diamond View the ideal residence for larger groups or extended families.

The vast accommodation is comprised of 8 bedrooms, and an optional 9th bedroom, accommodating up to 24 people. The three large living rooms, Thai sitting area, games room, and every bedroom, all have TVs (up to 50"). The outside undercover 16-seater dining table is in an unequaled location for appreciating the exceptional view and beautiful sunsets, while enjoying al fresco dining on delicious Thai food or a hearty BBQ.

A fully-fitted large Western-style kitchen, with all appliances, offers the opportunity for any residents to prepare desired meals.

The over-sized infinity edge 12 x 5 metre swimming pool has an integral Jacuzzi which offers a breath-taking venue to enjoy the tranquil 180 degree ocean views. Extending beyond the swimming pool is a unique garden terrace, equipped with sun-beds, tables and chairs.

Diamond View enjoys close proximity to Rawai beach, and is a short walk to a good selection of restaurants, bars, night life and of course easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats that can whisk you away to the golden sands and azure waters of the many outlying Islands. Alternatively you can stay closer to home and enjoy the benefits of Phuket's number one beach, Nai Harn, which is just a short drive away.

Accommodation is comprised of 8 bedrooms (with an optional 9th bedroom), all with built-in wardrobes, en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans, remote control air conditioning units and large flat screen TVs with DVD players and cable TV. Bedroom suites are split over three levels, offering 6 king-size beds, 8 single (3.5') beds and 2 sets of single bunkbeds (two single 3.5' beds, one on top of the other), sleeping 2 people each. Therefore the villa comfortably accommodates 24 people.

As you enter the villa onto the middle level you will be instantly aware of the breathtaking sea view seen through the huge sliding doors that open up entirely from the main living room onto the spacious balcony and infinity edge swimming pool. The sizeable private 12 x 5 metre swimming pool with integral Jacuzzi is surrounded by a very spacious sun deck with sun beds, comfortable modern furniture and a large undercover dining table with seating for everyone. The second sun terrace on the upper balcony can be accessed by external spiral staircase.

Upstairs on the upper level you can enter three of the 9 bedrooms. The master bedroom suite, which has a king-size bed with a large en-suite bathroom, comprising of bath, walk-in shower, two hand basins, vanity units and toilet. A spacious dressing area offers extensive wardrobe space and drawers, and a personal safe. The suite also offers it's own private living room with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV. It has stunning sea views and leads to it's own private balcony with dining table for intimate dining or private breakfasts.

The second master suite is also located on this level, with king-size bed and en-suite bathroom, with bath, shower and twin wash hand basins. The sliding doors from this bedroom again open onto a private balcony with views over the Andaman Sea. Located next to this bedroom is a twin bedrooms (two 3.5' single beds), with huge private bathroom with walk-in shower and vanity unit with wash hand basin. Suitable for a couple, or for children that need to be close to their parents. Both bedrooms are complete with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV.

A spacious second living room is also found on this level, with sizeable sofa, 50" flat screen TV and DVD player, perfect for comfortably relaxing at the end of the day. Furthermore, there is a dedicated office with a work desk for those who have to spend a little time working, made convenient with the high-speed WIFI connection and landline telephone.

As you return down the stairs to the middle level of the property, you will find yourself in the main living area, again with comfortable sofa, TV and DVD player. This living area has access to the fitted Western-style kitchen, fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax whilst meals are being prepared. 

Located on this level are two further king-size bedroom suites, both with en-suite bathrooms offering baths, walk-in showers and twin vanity units with wash hand basins. Each of these bedrooms has it's own balcony allowing the opportunity to make the very most of the exceptional seaviews.

Taking the stairs to the lower level brings you to the vast games room, offering sofa seating and bar stools to relax on, as well as games of pool, table tennis, darts or indoor basketball, to enjoy. Alternatively you can spend time exercising on the gym equipment, while pondering your thoughts and looking out across the ocean.

This level of the villa also houses the remaining four bedrooms.  Bedroom 6 includes a king-sized bed, along with two 3.5' twin beds. Bedroom 7 includes a king sized bed and one 3.5' twin bed. Bedroom 8 includes two 3.5' twin bed along with one set of single bunk beds (two 3.5' beds, one on top of the other, sleeping 2 people).  Finally, bedroom 9 includes one twin 3.5' bed and one set of single bunk beds (two 3.5' beds, one on top of the other, sleeping 2 people). All of these downstairs bedrooms include a flat screen TV and private en-suite bathrooms. Additionally, bedroom 9 has access to the villa's laundry comprising of washing machine, tumble dryer, linen airing and storage areas.

Finally, the lower level boasts the unique Cinema Room, complete with 6 double reclining, lounger chairs, seating 12. This allows you to watch your choice of movie without leaving the comfort and luxury of the villa!

Diamond View is situated on the hillside in a quiet, underdeveloped private estate overlooking Rawai Beach. Being bordered by only one other similar property it is enjoys total privacy and 180 degree views out across the Andaman Sea. The private development only has a few other similar designed smaller villas comfortably spread throughout the gardens. Diamond View is located less than a 10 minute walk to Rawai beach, where there are a good selection of restaurants and bars and easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats making visiting outlaying islands an easy option.

Guests have full access to the entire villa spread over three floors, with private swimming pool and surrounding patio and sun deck.  Situated away from any main road, there is no noise and safe for children. Close by to the popular Rawai beach with restaurants, bars and nightlife and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands.  A short 5 minutes to Nai Harn beach, recently voted THE best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser. The team can arrange motorbike or car rentals.

The villa's team and owner all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from a Villa Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

Diamond View is situated on the hillside in a quiet, underdeveloped private estate overlooking Rawai Beach and within a 5-minute drive to Nai Harn village. Nai Harn beach has been voted the best beach in Thailand and offers golden sands and azure water as well as a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Along Rawai beach, located at the bottom of the villa’s driveway, as well as in Nai Harn village, there is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants along with many beach and viewpoint bars.  Here you will also find long tail and speedboats available, a number of exciting activities and some lively bars.  People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips are worth a trip. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

Taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans can be arranged, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

Airport transfers will be arranged for a discounted rate of only $30 each way for a van which seats 12 - please email us your flight details if you require a transfer.  If your booking is over $2,000 1 free 12 seater van transfer each way will be provided. For bookings over $3,000 2 free van transfers each way will be provided (if required).

Van hire - a 12 seater van with driver is very popular with our guests and costs 3,000b (about US$85) per 14 hr day (including petrol). If you use the van for more than 14 hrs then an extra 100b ($3) is payable per hour. Ask you maid when you need a van. A trip to Patong for the evening will usually cost 1,600 ($45) per van.

Scooters - these are also very popular and can be hired for about 200b ($6) per day. Ask your maid if you need scooters.

Meals - your maid will cook breakfast at about 9am, and for an extra 1,000b will cook dinner. The cost of the food is paid for by the guests. All meals are sorted out directly between yourself and your maid. If you need an early breakfast for some reason you need to pay your maid 400b to come in early. There is a menu in the villa.

Extra maid - if you have a large group you may want to hire a second maid for 500b a day. Again you can arrange this directly with your maid and she will try and find someone to help, but this is not always possible.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Treat our home as you would your own please! We take a small security deposit in cash on arrival and this will be returned to you in full as long as you do not damage anything.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa's team and owner all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from a Villa Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

sectionedDescription/space:
This extravagant modern villa is situated on the hillside in a quiet development overlooking Rawai Beach and the outlaying Islands visible across the Andaman Sea. The rich colours throughout this villa suggest opulence and luxury, blending perfectly with the comfortable furnishings and the Asian theme reminding you of the Thai tradition and cultures that are part of Phuket's lifestyle.

The spacious villa offers a choice of living and entertainment areas, boasting a 12 recliner seat cinema room, immense games room (with two pool tables, a table tennis table, a dart board, and an indoor basketball hoop) and large sun decks and balcony areas. Separate living areas and private bedroom suites offer smaller groups privacy to relax individually, all perfectly combining to make Diamond View the ideal residence for larger groups or extended families.

The vast accommodation is comprised of 8 bedrooms, and an optional 9th bedroom, accommodating up to 24 people. The three large living rooms, Thai sitting area, games room, and every bedroom, all have TVs (up to 50"). The outside undercover 16-seater dining table is in an unequaled location for appreciating the exceptional view and beautiful sunsets, while enjoying al fresco dining on delicious Thai food or a hearty BBQ.

A fully-fitted large Western-style kitchen, with all appliances, offers the opportunity for any residents to prepare desired meals.

The over-sized infinity edge 12 x 5 metre swimming pool has an integral Jacuzzi which offers a breath-taking venue to enjoy the tranquil 180 degree ocean views. Extending beyond the swimming pool is a unique garden terrace, equipped with sun-beds, tables and chairs.

Diamond View enjoys close proximity to Rawai beach, and is a short walk to a good selection of restaurants, bars, night life and of course easy access to the numerous long tail boats and speed boats that can whisk you away to the golden sands and azure waters of the many outlying Islands. Alternatively you can stay closer to home and enjoy the benefits of Phuket's number one beach, Nai Harn, which is just a short drive away.

Accommodation is comprised of 8 bedrooms (with an optional 9th bedroom), all with built-in wardrobes, en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans, remote control air conditioning units and large flat screen TVs with DVD players and cable TV. Bedroom suites are split over three levels, offering 6 king-size beds, 8 single (3.5') beds and 2 sets of single bunkbeds (two single 3.5' beds, one on top of the other), sleeping 2 people each. Therefore the villa comfortably accommodates 24 people.

As you enter the villa onto the middle level you will be instantly aware of the breathtaking sea view seen through the huge sliding doors that open up entirely from the main living room onto the spacious balcony and infinity edge swimming pool. The sizeable private 12 x 5 metre swimming pool with integral Jacuzzi is surrounded by a very spacious sun deck with sun beds, comfortable modern furniture and a large undercover dining table with seating for everyone. The second sun terrace on the upper balcony can be accessed by external spiral staircase.

Upstairs on the upper level you can enter three of the 9 bedrooms. The master bedroom suite, which has a king-size bed with a large en-suite bathroom, comprising of bath, walk-in shower, two hand basins, vanity units and toilet. A spacious dressing area offers extensive wardrobe space and drawers, and a personal safe. The suite also offers it's own private living room with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV. It has stunning sea views and leads to it's own private balcony with dining table for intimate dining or private breakfasts.

The second master suite is also located on this level, with king-size bed and en-suite bathroom, with bath, shower and twin wash hand basins. The sliding doors from this bedroom again open onto a private balcony with views over the Andaman Sea. Located next to this bedroom is a twin bedrooms (two 3.5' single beds), with huge private bathroom with walk-in shower and vanity unit with wash hand basin. Suitable for a couple, or for children that need to be close to their parents. Both bedrooms are complete with flat screen TV, DVD player and cable TV.

A spacious second living room is also found on this level, with sizeable sofa, 50" flat screen TV and DVD player, perfect for comfortably relaxing at the end of the day. Furthermore, there is a dedicated office with a work desk for those who have to spend a little time working, made convenient with the high-speed WIFI connection and landline telephone.

As you return down the stairs to the middle level of the property, you will find yourself in the main living area, again with comfortable sofa, TV and DVD player. This living area has access to the fitted Western-style kitchen, fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax whilst meals are being prepared. 

Located on this level are two further king-size bedroom suites, both with en-suite bathrooms offering baths, walk-in showers and twin vanity units with wash hand basins. Each of these bedrooms has it's own balcony allowing the opportunity to make the very most of the exceptional seaviews.

Taking the stairs to the lower level brings you to the vast games room, offering sofa seating and bar stools to relax on, as well as games of pool, table tennis, darts or indoor basketball, to enjoy. Alternatively you can spend time exercising on the gym equipment, while pondering your thoughts and looking out across the ocean.

This level of the villa also houses the remaining four bedrooms.  Bedroom 6 includes a king-sized bed, along with two 3.5' twin beds. Bedroom 7 includes a king sized bed and one 3.5' twin bed. Bedroom 8 includes two 3.5' twin bed along with one set of single bunk beds (two 3.5' beds, one on top of the other, sleeping 2 people).  Finally, bedroom 9 includes one twin 3.5' bed and one set of single bunk beds (two 3.5' beds, one on top of the other, sleeping 2 people). All of these downstairs bedrooms include a flat screen TV and private en-suite bathrooms. Additionally, bedroom 9 has access to the villa's laundry comprising of washing machine, tumble dryer, linen airing and storage areas.

Finally, the lower level boasts the unique Cinema Room, complete with 6 double reclining, lounger chairs, seating 12. This allows you to watch your choice of movie without leaving the comfort and luxury of the villa!
sectionedDescription/summary: Diamond View is a modern 1,300 sqm, 9 bedroom / 9 bathroom villa, with stunning seaviews, providing spacious accommodation for 24 guests looking for the perfect private escape for large groups, Entertaining or Events. The villa is walking distance to Rawai Beach, a short drive to Nai Harn Beach, with maid, cook and WiFi, large outdoor pool area, huge games room with two pool tables, table tennis table, darts and gym. Plus a unique 12 seater in-house cinema, all at exceptional value.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans can be arranged, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

name: Villa Talaefun Oceanfront 5-star Service
address: Tambon Kammala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Talaefun Phuket is a gorgeous private 6 bedrooms Thai Style Villa. We provide 5 star amenities & services. Our staff are well-trained.  It's a  stunning ocean front villa with 360 degree Oceanview. Key features are 18 x 6 meters infinity pool, amazing sunset, large lawn and beautiful garden which makes this place perfect for family and a group of friends. Service included, Private Chef, 2 house keepers and concierge services.

Perched on top of the cliff, Villa Talaefun offers complete privacy, combining enchanting Thai style architecture with modern comforts. Its 6 luxurious bedrooms can comfortably accommodate up to 12 guests. All bedrooms boast accompanying walk-in closets and en-suite bathrooms. The villa's separate standalone buildings offer a spacious combined internal living space of 700 square meters.

Among the notable facilities are a beautiful garden with wide lawn areas, a lap pool with infinity edge dropping down to the ocean, raised wooden decking with sun loungers, an ocean facing spa room, plus a comfortable large family kitchen with views towards Kamala bay and Surin beach.

Sitting on a very private 2,700 square meter land plot, Villa Talaefun in Kamala offers ample garden areas to create a luxuriously spacious atmosphere, complete with a 360 degree sea view of the Andaman coastline.

Guest can access entire property!
.

Our staff will be welcoming you when you arrive and take care of you entire of your stay.

Great location where most luxury villa and high-end resort villas are situated. 5 minutes to Kamala beach and 15 minutes to Surin Beach and 40 minutes from Phuket Airport.

We can arrange taxi or car rental for you

Rate Inclusions:
Taxes & Service charges
Daily meal preparation, Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner (cost of ingredients plus 20% shopping fee to be paid by guest)
Wi-Fi internet throughout the villa
Daily complimentary housekeeping service, and turn down service
Daily complimentary bottle water in bedrooms (2 bottles/day)
One way complimentary airport transfer
24-hour on-site security
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
CHECK IN 
Security deposit 1,000 US Dollars may be held in cash upon arrival. 

IN VILLA DINNING  
Our full-time Thai Chef is skilled in the art of local cuisine and International cuisines. Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee. 

SMOKING
Being a family home, we have a NO SMOKING POLICY inside our villa. Guests are welcome to smoke outdoors. Our staff will supply ashtrays at any time for outdoor use. 5,000 Baht/room will be charged for Ozone Treatment in case guest smoke inside the villa.  

SHOES
As is Thai custom and to ensure we keep the floorboards squeaky clean for our guests’ enjoyment, we have a no shoes policy inside all rooms of our home. We provide soft house slippers for your comfort. 

AIR CONDITIONING
A comfortable setting of 24-25°C and is suggested for Phukets' tropical location. To ensure proper climate control, doors and windows are to be kept closed. 

LAUNDRY AND DRY CLEANING
All laundry and dry cleaning needs are sent out to a professional service. Just complete the laundry form located in your suite and our staff will assist with your requests. 

VILLA DAMAGES
We understand that accidents happen. But we do kindly ask that you please let us know when you do, in such cases repair costs may/will be applied against your security deposit.  

STAFF HOURS
Staff hours are daily from 7:00 am -10:00pm. After staff hours may apply at 300 Baht per hour per staff.  

TIPPING STAFF 
Tipping is an expression of your personal satisfaction towards our staff, and will be much appreciated.

name: Heavenly Villa 8 Bedrooms
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The 8 bedroom luxury villa in Patong Phuket sleeps up to 16 adults + kids and includes a private swimming pool with wrap around sun deck.

Giant covered day bed, a billiard room, cinema room with internet TV, all bedrooms with private en suite bathroom, indoor dining for up to 16 people, outdoor dining for 8-10.

A tropical view living room, with folding doors that allow the room to be totally opened, offers great views of Phuket lush tropical rain forest and private swimming pool.

Guests will have access to the whole property.

Jungceylon Shopping Center is 2.3 km from Heavenly Villa 8, while Bangla Road is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 25.7 km from the property.

We have parking available onsite. We are so close to Patong Beach and Bangla road that there is easy accessability to Tuk Tuks or Taxi's.

Also the Grab app is very easy to order transportation during your stay with us.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No smoking inside the property, smoking out side is ok. Smoking inside the villa will incur a 10,000 THB fine. 


Security deposit 5,000 THB paid in cash on arrival to our check in team.

sectionedDescription/description:
Three floors private pool villa with 5 rooms. It can accommodate maximum 12 people and suitable for family travel. Our town home has a dining room and kitchen equipped with an oven, fridge, microwave, cutlery sets and electric kettle. Each room has a private bathroom with free amenities, a hairdryer and towels. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site.

name: Nam Bo oceanfront pool villa, maid & cook included
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our place is perfect for families and friends as there is a lot of space for each one to have privacy or enjoy together.
Set in beautiful tropical gardens this luxurious villa has large living space inside and out to both entertain and relax.
Nam Bo villa is an oceanfront property with stunning panoramic views of the sea and surrounding islands towards Krabi, Phi Phi island, Cape Panwa and Phuket Bay.

The villa has high ceilings and the dining room is set in the main space, the kitchen is fully equipped for any needs, although it will mainly be used by our chef!
Going down some steps the living room has big sofas to enjoy the large TV, either streaming or watching the villa's DVD collection, a wireless speaker can be connected easily to any device to listen to your favorite tunes.
From the living area you can walk to the covered, open-air sofa which looks out to the ocean and venturing further down you can access the swimming pool. The beautiful pool is flanked by an enormous deck for sunbathing with enough loungers for everyone!
 The master bedroom is located in a separate pavilion, has a king-size bed, a large walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with double jacuzzi,  where panoramic corner windows offer amazing ocean views. 
Inside the main building, near the entrance, there is a bedroom with twin beds, adjacent to a bathroom with a walk-in shower. 
On the opposite end of the swimming pool, 2 bedrooms are set next to the garden. The bottom bedroom has 2 single beds that can become a queen bed for couples, the bathroom is en-suite and has a walk-in shower.
 The top bedroom has a private patio with a seating bench, perfect to spot Phi phi island on a clear day. This bedroom has a king-size bed, a closet, and an en-suite toilet and separate shower.
The new addition to the villa is a massage room and an exercise room/private gym. House staff can arrange massage or beauty treatments for you on request at an extra charge.

The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.

The true secret of this villa location is that you are so close to the offshore islands and beaches dotted around this part of the coast line. You can snorkel in crystal clear waters, lie on deserted beaches that are only 15 minutes by boat from the villa.
Phuket town and its vibrant nightlife, colorful and kitschy Sino-Portuguese architecture, Thai and international dining, live music, night markets are just a short drive away!
Visit Central Phuket - a world-class shopping mall with 15 Luxury brands boutiques , 500 stores, 300 food vendors and 3 Main attractions on-site. One of them - Thailand’s largest Aquarium with 10,000sqm aquarium space and the world’s largest underwater restaurant, where you can dine and watch marine life at the same time.

We recommend renting a car, but we can also arrange boats and taxis.
Located on a small private estate on a headland peninsula in the quiet area of Ao Makham it is very quiet and relaxed and yet just 5 minutes drive to the wonderful Ao Yon Bay and beaches with it’s chilled out beach bars and bistros. Many more popular bars are just 10 minutes north in Phuket town or south to Cape Panwa.

PLEASE NOTE. Some bedrooms will be closed if guests number is less than 8 people. For 3-5 guests - max 3 bedrooms open, for 6-7 guests - max 4 bedrooms open. 

The maid will clean daily, the chef will cook breakfast and lunch/or dinner. The cost of the food is not included in the rate and will be charged with a shopping-delivery surcharge of 25%.

Electric usage is not included in the price, it will be charged at 7 baht/kw.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No smoking. Pets not allowed.
Parties and events allowed at an extra fee.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.

sectionedDescription/space:
The villa has high ceilings and the dining room is set in the main space, the kitchen is fully equipped for any needs, although it will mainly be used by our chef!
Going down some steps the living room has big sofas to enjoy the large TV, either streaming or watching the villa's DVD collection, a wireless speaker can be connected easily to any device to listen to your favorite tunes.
From the living area you can walk to the covered, open-air sofa which looks out to the ocean and venturing further down you can access the swimming pool. The beautiful pool is flanked by an enormous deck for sunbathing with enough loungers for everyone!
 The master bedroom is located in a separate pavilion, has a king-size bed, a large walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with double jacuzzi,  where panoramic corner windows offer amazing ocean views. 
Inside the main building, near the entrance, there is a bedroom with twin beds, adjacent to a bathroom with a walk-in shower. 
On the opposite end of the swimming pool, 2 bedrooms are set next to the garden. The bottom bedroom has 2 single beds that can become a queen bed for couples, the bathroom is en-suite and has a walk-in shower.
 The top bedroom has a private patio with a seating bench, perfect to spot Phi phi island on a clear day. This bedroom has a king-size bed, a closet, and an en-suite toilet and separate shower.
The new addition to the villa is a massage room and an exercise room/private gym. House staff can arrange massage or beauty treatments for you on request at an extra charge.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Our place is perfect for families and friends as there is a lot of space for each one to have privacy or enjoy together.
Set in beautiful tropical gardens this luxurious villa has large living space inside and out to both entertain and relax.
Nam Bo villa is an oceanfront property with stunning panoramic views of the sea and surrounding islands towards Krabi, Phi Phi island, Cape Panwa and Phuket Bay.
sectionedDescription/transit:
We recommend renting a car, but we can also arrange boats and taxis.
Located on a small private estate on a headland peninsula in the quiet area of Ao Makham it is very quiet and relaxed and yet just 5 minutes drive to the wonderful Ao Yon Bay and beaches with it’s chilled out beach bars and bistros. Many more popular bars are just 10 minutes north in Phuket town or south to Cape Panwa.

name: Stunning Family-Friendly Villa With Private Pool
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
We welcome you to spend an amazing vacation in our dream home.  At Villa Isara, you will be able to relax completely in what feels like your own private resort. Isara means freedom in Thai - it is our escape from the daily grind of work pressures and stress, and we hope it will be for you as well. 

Your holiday will begin as soon as you arrive in Phuket as the villa is only 10 minutes away from the airport (unlike many common tourist destinations which are one hour+ from the airport).  The villa was completely renovated in 2015 and is truly stunning. 

Ideal for extended families or groups, this spacious holiday retreat set on 4,000 square meters/1 acre of lush tropical landscape and has over 600sqm/6,500 sq ft of interior space. The villa is spread over four pavilions plus two salas and two covered carports. The main house has four large en-suite bedrooms and a spacious open plan living room, dining room and kitchen.  The property also has a two bedroom, two bath guest villa with its own open plan kitchen, dining and living room.   

The master bedroom is spectacular with two and a half walls completely composed of Sun Paradise glass sliding doors. One door looks out over the swimming pool while the other faces a grass-roofed sala sitting over a fishpond filled with spectacularly large fish.  Behind the bedroom extends the spacious and luxurious walk-in closet and master bath which opens out onto a rock garden and plunge pool which are completely private for the occupants of the master bedroom.  

The Orchid and Jasmine bedrooms have king size beds, teak floors, elegant marble bathrooms and beautiful views onto the garden and swimming pool.

The Lotus bedroom is similarly anointed but contains a bunk-bed plus a third rollaway mattress providing comfortable accommodation for three people.  Ideally suited for children.  

One entire pavilion is the home of an expansive open plan living room, dining room and kitchen.  Teak floors, vaulted timber framed ceiling, contemporary western kitchen and a large plush sofa ideal for afternoon naps.  The floor-to-ceiling Sun Paradise glass doors slide back to the wall, opening almost the entire frontage of the room onto the swimming pool. Behind the pavilion is an outdoor Thai kitchen where your chef can prepare meals without impinging on your space. 

The family room is another spacious pavilion ideal for children young and old to play and all to sit back and enjoy a movie. 

The guest house has two large bedrooms and two full bathrooms.  The house also has its own large open plan dining room, living room and kitchen with lovely views over the garden. Ideal for providing extra privacy if you have multiple families or groups travelling together.

At the end of the swimming pool is a large outdoor sala appointed with a wicker sofa and chairs.  The sala is great for outdoor lunches and dinners or to enjoy a beer. The second grass-roofed sala sits over the fishpond in a secluded part of the property and is an ideal place to hide away to read a book. 

Included with the villa is our full-time villa manager who will keep the villa clean and tidy and provide assistance with any requests that come up during your visit. We also employ a full-time property management service to ensure everything is running smoothly. A full-time chef, airport transfers, rental cars, in-villa massage therapists and much more are also available on request.

The vicinity of the Villa offers a wide variety of activities while being well away from the busy tourist areas of the island.  

Just 2 minutes down the road is the amazing Thanyapura Sports and Wellness complex where you will regularly find Olympic-class atheletes training.  This world class sports club boasts comprehensive facilities including open air and covered tennis courts, a 25 meter and a 50 meter swimming pool, a 600sqm/6,500 sq ft gym and an international standard rugby/football pitch.  Many a national Olympic swim team train at the facility and Maria Sharapova trained there between two Asian tournaments last year. 

The secluded and absolutely stunning beaches of Nai Than and the Sirinat National Park are just 10 minutes away.  Mission Hills and Blue Canyon golf courses are also 5 and 10 minutes away respectively. Bangtao, Surin and Laguna are all about 20 minutes away.

All of the great ocean destinations can be accessed via the Ao Po marina which is 15 minutes from the villa.  This marina is much quieter than the marinas in the south of the island and will save you considerable time. Group and private tours are available to Phang Nga Bay & the Phi Phi Islands. John Gray’s Hong by Starlight and Captain Mark’s Phuket Sail Tour’s trips are of particular quality.

We love our home and hope that you will as well.

Guests will have access to the whole Villa except one pavilion for the helper

My property manager and on site staff are available for guests to utilize

Surrounded by lush green farmland, the villa complex neighbors rubber and pineapple plantations, with plenty of tropical flora and fauna to ogle. Nearby, the Thanyapura Sports Complex is the go-to for swimming, tennis, and fitness facilities.

The Villa is located in a lush green landscape away from the city.  The best way to get around is to rent a car and drive yourself or a van with a driver

name: Ideal for large groups sleep 24, Chef, Pool & Bar
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
SERENITY Villa is an 10 bedroom Villa located along west coast of Phuket & only 5  minutes to the beautiful Surin Beach. Centrally located to all popular attractions on the island. 
As soon as you step foot in the Villa you are encased by the feeling of space and freedom, created by the contemporary open plan design of the Villa that boasts stunning panoramic sea and valley view’s to be enjoyed. There are many places to entertain or simply relax including a 13 meter infinity pool, bar & cinema

The Villa is set on a hill that overlooks the Andaman Sea and is surrounded by stunning forest views yet is only 5 minutes to the beach. It is very secluded and no other people can see into the house from any angle. There are numerous areas in the house that can be used for entertaining or to get away from it all.  There is a 14 meter infinity swimming pool, a media room with a 3 metre screen , a bar with pool table, dartboard and disco lights for dancing. A BBQ area on the large balcony with breathtaking Sea views. A large dining table to enjoy meals cooked by our Chefs. Masseuses will come to the villa to relax  and revive you

You will have access to the entire Villa.  You will not share with anyone.

Our staff do not live in the Villa but are their during the day and early evening to clean and cook you delicious meals. Our Villa manager can assist you to book any activity or to arrange transportation. We are available anytime on messengers- Line Chris K ,&  whatsap- CK

Our Villa is surround by a tropical lush forest and is very secluded and private. From the balcony you can see the Andaman  Sea views. Yet it is very central to many activities, restaurants, night markets, beaches -Surin Beach  is 5 minutes away and Bangtoa Beach is 8 minutes away and we have 3 supermarkets within 10 minutes of the Villa

We have a garage to park a few cars or we can arrange 10 seater Vans to transport you anywhere on the island at very competitive rates.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Parties allowed but No loud noise after 10pm.
- Smoking areas provided outside, no smoking inside
- Check in is 3pm
- Check out is 11am

Our Villa manager can assist you to book any activity or to arrange transportation. We are available anytime on messengers- Line Chris K ,&  whatsap- CK

address: Thalang, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
[Free Breakfast, Full Time Maids, Chef Service, Movie Room, Private Gym]

The villa is located in the perfect resort of Yamu Peninsula, covering an area of ​​5,000 square meters and a building of 1,500 square meters. Here, you can enjoy the sea view of the Andaman Sea and the tranquility of Phuket Bay.

The villas are all made of high-quality teak wood and furniture imported from Italy. The design combines modern Thai style with European style, making people feel comfortable and balanced.

Our villa is a true masterpiece of luxury and design, where every detail has been carefully crafted to provide an exquisite and unforgettable stay.

As you enter the villa, you'll be greeted by a spacious and elegantly designed living room and dining area on the first floor. With its high ceilings and expansive windows, this space is flooded with natural light, creating a bright and enjoyable ambiance. The white walls contrast beautifully with the teak wood ceiling, while the black marble floor adds a touch of sophistication to the environment.

The villa boasts a large swimming pool with a pool deck, where you can relax and soak up the sun. Adjacent to the pool, there is a sala area adorned with comfortable cushions and sofas, providing the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the refreshing sea breeze.

The villa covers an area of ​​5000 square meters
- Construction area of ​​1500 square meters, 5 oversized bedrooms and 1 unique cabinet.
- Private cinema and gym
- Outdoor dining and BBQ area with super ocean views
- The super infinity pool is 30 meters long and 8 meters wide

Entire Villa

Yamu pier is a 5-minute walk from the villa, and you can go to Similan Island, Phi Phi Island, Egg Island and other beautiful islands to play with boat.

1、Food and Beverages
Rental fee included Chef Service for
Free Breakfast. ( Rich and characteristic )

 For Lunch and Dinner has extra cost
Charge of service
- 150THB per person for cooking service
- Buying ingredients 10% (Minimum 200B)
- Pre-book 1 day in advance

2、Villa Staff
Free and Full Time Staff service is  from 7 am to 6 pm. On occasion, and with prior notice, they are also available for late-night.

3、Infinity pool 30m with Dept 140-180cm

4、Private cinema with Apple TV，Private Gym

5、A deposit is required when check-in: 20,000 THB
sectionedDescription/name: Super&Spacious&Seafront&6 Bedroom -Villa Serenity

sectionedDescription/space:
Our villa is a true masterpiece of luxury and design, where every detail has been carefully crafted to provide an exquisite and unforgettable stay.

As you enter the villa, you'll be greeted by a spacious and elegantly designed living room and dining area on the first floor. With its high ceilings and expansive windows, this space is flooded with natural light, creating a bright and enjoyable ambiance. The white walls contrast beautifully with the teak wood ceiling, while the black marble floor adds a touch of sophistication to the environment.

The villa boasts a large swimming pool with a pool deck, where you can relax and soak up the sun. Adjacent to the pool, there is a sala area adorned with comfortable cushions and sofas, providing the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the refreshing sea breeze.

The villa covers an area of ​​5000 square meters
- Construction area of ​​1500 square meters, 5 oversized bedrooms and 1 unique cabinet.
- Private cinema and gym
- Outdoor dining and BBQ area with super ocean views
- The super infinity pool is 30 meters long and 8 meters wide
sectionedDescription/summary:
[Free Breakfast, Full Time Maids, Chef Service, Movie Room, Private Gym]

The villa is located in the perfect resort of Yamu Peninsula, covering an area of ​​5,000 square meters and a building of 1,500 square meters. Here, you can enjoy the sea view of the Andaman Sea and the tranquility of Phuket Bay.

The villas are all made of high-quality teak wood and furniture imported from Italy. The design combines modern Thai style with European style, making people feel comfortable and balanced.
