name: Luxury 5-6 Bedroom Pool Villa with private Chef
address: Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 2PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This newly renovated luxury villa is built into Phuket's jungle mountainside.   It offers amazing views of the surrounding hills, and overlooks Kamala valley and the Andaman Sea.  This villa boasts a unique vertical design and its multiple levels.

The private gated driveway leads you up to the main villa where you will be greeted by our smiling staff in our beautiful entrance. The main villa has three levels connected by stairs and has lots of room for large groups or families. The bottom level consists of a 3 Bedroom apartment style floor plan. It includes 2 bathrooms as well as an en-suite bathroom in the main bedroom. There is also a separate kitchen, a large communal living area and it also has its own outdoor patio with a swimming pool. This level is great for friends or even a family to have to themselves.

 The middle level in the villa holds 4 spacious bedrooms including the Master Bedroom of the house. Each bedroom is connected by a colorfully decorated hallway which also links the top and bottom floor and leads out to the main kitchen. The Master Bedroom is the biggest and most luxurious bedroom in the house with a large living area, its own kitchen, a large walk-in closet, a large bath tub, a separate shower and even has its own private steam room. There is also a small room connecting to the bedroom suitable for small children. In total it is about 100 square meters in size. The other 3 bedrooms on this level are identical 21 square meter rooms each with an en-suite bathroom. They are quite spacious and each has been furnished with a king bed as well as a large lounge for relaxing. Each room has its own fridge, flat screen TV and central air conditioning. All 4 bedrooms on this level are quite large so as an extra option for the bigger groups we can also transform the lounges into queen beds so you could fit an extra 2 people in each room quite easily.

 This middle level is also where the main kitchen for the villa is located. The open air kitchen which is completely covered, extremely spacious, comfortable and beautifully decorated, also has a very large seating area. This is where our lovely staff will be serving you breakfast. 

 The top level of the villa is great for entertaining both the kids and the adults. On this floor you will find an outdoor games area with a pool table and couches which is completely covered. This is a great place for the kids to relax out of the heat. Adjacent to this is an even better area for the adults to relax. This consists of a huge 170 square meter outdoor patio area with an infinity swimming pool and a private bar. The view at night time is amazing as you can see the lights of the valley below stretch out towards the ocean. This is a great place to relax even in the rainy season as the majority of the patio is covered.

 Also located on the top level of the villa is another large 35 square meter bedroom with adjoining kids' room and loft. This room is great for small families and provides another small retreat for the kids.

 The interior of the villa is not only elegantly decorated but also designed for comfort to make our guests feel at home. Central air conditioning throughout the villa and in all bedrooms, modern appliances, WiFi Internet, stylish furnishings and decor provide a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere.

Although we are capable of holding large groups we are also very suitable for smaller groups and offer discounted rates for such groups. Be sure to inquire about the discounted rates if you are a smaller group.

In our team we have a Thai manager, A Thai chef and some maids. We also
have a 15 seated minibus with driver on standby. Our service hours are normally from 8 AM until 10 PM

Many who look for a villa in Phuket want an ocean view. Our property provides that but more. It is situated atop a valley where a peaceful Thai village is nestled. The villa offers lot's of privacy, peace and quiet being set back from the busy beachfront area, yet within easy access to the coast or nearby hot-spots by scooters or our private minibus drivers can transport up to 15 guests to any location on Phuket Island including the convenience of an efficient Airport pickup and departure( minimum 4 night stay)

Kamala Beach, with it’s long beautiful beach and small restaurant along it, is a lovely village that many of our guests want to come back and visit again. Baan Sung Thai Villa is located up on the hills of Kamala Beach with a view of the village.

A 5 minutes drive with our 15 seated minibus, that is on stand by all day at the villa ( local prices), and you are down at the beach of Kamala. At Kamala Beach we have two amazing beach lounges, HQ Beach Lounge Phuket and Cafe Del Mar Phuket.For shopping and nightlife, Patong Beach is just a 15 minute drive away. Within a 10 minute drive you will find both Laem Sing Beach and Surin Beach, two beautiful beaches. Bang Tao Beach and Layan Beach, another two beautiful beaches, are just 15 minutes away from the villa. At Bang Tao Beach the famous Catch Beach Club has now opened up its doors, it's a quick 15 minute ride away. Phuket Town and Central Festival Shopping Mall is a 45 minute drive away from the villa for more amazing shopping.

Included in the rates for every group is one airport transfer to and from Phuket International Airport ( minimum 4 night stay), a daily international breakfast buffet, daily cleaning of individual rooms and the daily service from our team of lovely Thai staff including a private chef and a number of maids. Should you wish to book any tours, shows, day trips or even massages our staff are more than happy to help. Also if you would like to celebrate something special in the villa such as a birthday, anniversary or even a family reunion, we are happy to help plan a nice party in the villa.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
In our team we have a Thai manager, A Thai chef and some maids. We also
have a 15 seated minibus with driver on standby. Our service hours are normally from 8 AM until 10 PM

name: Thai-style 8BD art pool villa resort near Naiharn
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Coco palace resort is a five-year hand-made jungle style Thai buildings. Totally we have 4 buildings, 3 buildings with 8 bedrooms and 1 building with kitchen and restaurant. Beautiful garden with a swimming pool , a meditation platform, a yoga platform and public rest area. Located around Naiharn Beach in Rawai in southern Phuket, here is a natural oxygen bar and an intermountain seclusion get away from the hustle and bustle.

A five-year hand-made jungle style Thai resort , each building has different style. Located on Naiharn Beach in southern Phuket, here is known not only as a meditation resort, but also as a natural oxygen bar and an intermountain seclusion get away from the hustle and bustle. 
We hope you will not only get relaxation and entertainment on your vocation but also harvest healthy life style and self-growth both of physical and mind.

all area/yoga platform/meditation platform/restaurant

I will leave my contact number while your staying, contact anytime if you have any problems.

Most beautiful beach of Phuket —— Naiharn beach. Famous of white sands, beautiful sunset and the beach with the least people. 15mins walk from villa.
Most beautiful sunset of Phuket —— Promthep Cape, 5km from villa.
The cheapest seafood market of Phuket —— Rawai seafood market, 2.7km from villa.

First we will suggest you take a walk since you chose to stay this area. Nature Oxygen bar and great plants. Early morning or evening, take a walk to have dinner/naiharn lake/naiharn beach are all good options.
Or you can rent a scooter, which is small, easy to ride and free parking. It will cost different price between scooter and bigger motorbike. Just keep riding on the left side.

no smoking in the room, you can smoke on balcony or outside room.

- No smoking in the room.

name: 普吉岛YAMU海滩五星级度假6卧海景别墅party 独栋
address: Pa Klok, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
普吉岛YaMu五星级海景别墅6室超级Party独栋
          别墅位于YaMu 豪宅度假区，设计简约，富于现代化。独栋私密，周围环境幽静，在这里可以远离城市浮华喧嚣，感受大自然扑面而来的清新，身体和心灵得到净化，享受前所未有的放松之感。海景别墅享有普吉岛最美的风景，是您度假休闲的最佳选择。
     别墅占地 1500平方米，6间卧室，呈现梦幻海景主题， 独立浴室设有浴缸和花洒淋浴，拥有1个海景无边泳池和1个儿童泳池，美丽海景呈现在眼前，一览无余。别墅可提供12人住宿。5张双人床和2张单人床。总有7个卫生间。
地理位置：
距离711便利店200米
距离罗宾逊购物中心3km 
距离芭东海滩 10km
距离卡塔海滩12km
距离免税店  10km 
距离普吉岛国际机场 约15km 

入住须知重点注意：
1：入住别墅的客人需要提供有效的护照信息
2：房子的价格不包含电费，电费是单独计算的，每度8泰铢，按实际发生计算。
3：需要客人支付房租保证金，2天内 需要1万泰铢，2天以上需要支付更多的保证金，入住前管家会计算并告知客户。
4：不能在别墅内做任何违法的事情，不可吸毒赌博，出现任何问题由入住人负责。
5：不能在室内抽烟，违反规定罚款1万泰铢。户外空间可以抽烟。
6：正常的入住时间是 下午15.00 ，退房时间是上午11.00 （如果有特殊情况可以和经理沟通）

Key points to note in the house rules:
 1: Guests staying in the villa need to provide valid passport information
 2: The price of the house does not include the electricity fee. The electricity fee is calculated separately, 8 baht per unit, and is calculated based on actual occurrence.
 3: Guests are required to pay a rent deposit, which is 10,000 baht within 2 days. More deposits are required for more than 2 days. The housekeeper will calculate and inform the customer before check-in.
 4: You are not allowed to do anything illegal in the villa, and you are not allowed to take drugs or gamble. Any problems that arise will be the responsibility of the guest.
 5: Smoking is not allowed indoors. Violation of the regulations will result in a fine of 10,000 baht.  Smoking is allowed in the outdoor space.
 6: The normal check-in time is 15.00 pm and the check-out time is 11.00 am (if there are special circumstances, you can communicate with the manager)

所有

name: 邦涛拉古娜六卧豪华泳池别墅步行到海边厨师服务接送机服务下午茶
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This villa is equipped with 6 spacious bedrooms and bathrooms with bathtub. And you can also enjoy a complete big swimming pool by yourselves here. The kitchen is equipped will all the cooking tools and electrical equipment like plate, forks, microwave, etc, it’s also a good option to have a longer stay here. If you would like to book a longer stay, please consult us, we can provide a better price. ***Free airport pick up service for orders more than 4 nights and less than 12 people.

This villa is located in the center place of Bangtao, it only takes 3 minutes by car to the seaside. It takes less than 10 minutes by walking to the seaside. Bangtao beach is well known for surfing, so it’s a great option for surfing lover. Moreover it takes 8 minutes by car to boat avenue which is a food plaza here. You can have options of Korean food, Japanese food and western food there. Moreover there are many famous beach clubs like Catch. If you are with kids, Fantasea amusement park will be a good option to you. You can enjoy the very Thailand style show there. It’s also a very good chance to have a deeper understanding of Thailand’s culture. And it’s will be very funny to ride and feed the elephant there. If you would like to have the sea trip, royal Phuket marina is very close to us, it’s very fast to Phiphi island from this pier. We are a very good choice to choose in vacation so you can enjoy delicious food, drink, beach, sea and sunshine in a very short distance. 

What we can offer:
Sea trip booking, airport delivery service, car rental service, ticket to all the tourism attractions, etc

Distance:
Bangtao beach:3 mins
Surin beach: 7 mins 
Phuket international airport: 40 mins 
Fantasea:13 mins
Elephant jungle sanctuary phuket:8 mins
Boat Avenue:8 mins
Porto de Phuket: 7mins
Tiger Kingdom: 30mins
Royal Phuket Marina:24 mins (pier to take yacht to Phiphi island)

Please bring your passport when you check in. Looking forward to meet you:)

In order to protect the safety of our guest and provide better living environment, please follow the below rules:
1. No party
2. Can’t do anything which break the law of Thailand 
3. Guests can’t bring people who provide sex service to villa
4. No cannabis 
6. No smoking indoors
7. No pets
8. Keep quiet after 10pm
9. We will provide 100units of electricity for free which is very enough, If it exceeds, 8 baht will be charged per unit.
10. 10000 baht as deposit will be charged when you check in, please let us know when will you check out, then manager will come to return it if everything is alright.

If you would like to have the sea trip, royal Phuket marina is very close to us, it’s very fast to Phiphi island from this pier. We are a very good choice to choose in vacation so you can enjoy delicious food, drink, beach, sea and sunshine in a very short distance. 

What we can offer:
Sea trip booking, airport delivery service, car rental service, ticket to all the tourism attractions, etc

Distance:
Bangtao beach:3 mins
Surin beach: 7 mins 
Phuket international airport: 40 mins 
Fantasea:13 mins
Elephant jungle sanctuary phuket:8 mins
Boat Avenue:8 mins
Porto de Phuket: 7mins
Tiger Kingdom: 30mins
Royal Phuket Marina:24 mins (pier to take yacht to Phiphi island)

Please bring your passport when you check in. Looking forward to meet you:)
sectionedDescription/summary: This villa is equipped with 6 spacious bedrooms and bathrooms with bathtub. And you can also enjoy a complete big swimming pool by yourselves here. The kitchen is equipped will all the cooking tools and electrical equipment like plate, forks, microwave, etc, it’s also a good option to have a longer stay here. If you would like to book a longer stay, please consult us, we can provide a better price. ***Free airport pick up service for orders more than 4 nights and less than 12 people.

name: Oasis Villa - 3 Bed  luxury Pool in villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
Oasis Villa has its own private garden and electric gate to a private driveway access.

Beautiful Villa Oasis is a superb villa, sleeping up to 7 People and with a large swimming pool. If you are looking for a villa within a 5 minute walk to restaurants and bars and a short walk to Nai Harn beach, yet private and in a peaceful setting then look no further!

The Villa is within an easy 5 minute walk of shops, bars and restaurants and a 15 – 20 minute walk ( 5 min drive) from Nai Harn Beach.

This is a quiet residential neighbourhood yet within a n easy 5 minute walk of massage/sauna, restaurants & shops and a 20 min walk to Nai Harn beach

We can offer car & Bike hire at reasonable rates.
There is a local bus service.
We provide reliable taxi service numbers

Please note that we charge 5th per unit for electricity taken on a meter reading on arrival and departure.

Sorry we do not accept All Male parties without prior approval

Smoking is allowed outside only and with care
sectionedDescription/houseRules:

- Electricity meter reading on arrival and departure and charged at 5.6THB per unit to be paid in cash on departure 
- No all Male Parties allowed without approval
please always inform us if towels or bed sheets are soiled. we will do our utmost to clean them
 if stains can not be removed we will inform you and there will be a charge.

name: 180°C日出海景网红别墅，半山轻奢豪宅！
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅隶属M&S旗下国际民宿管理公司，M&S团队立志于打造最受欢迎的海岛别墅。
本套别墅2018年装修完毕，坐落于普吉岛中南部，临近各大景区景点以及普吉各大知名海滩，别墅坐拥180°日出海景，普吉岛久负盛名的皇帝岛、珊瑚岛等自然风景优越的岛屿尽收眼底。别墅拥有无边泳池海景平台，享受山景与海景的完美融合。在夜间一览普吉岛南部的璀璨夜景，别墅平台拥有超宽裕海景视野，也可以成为别墅的海景餐厅。别墅卧室同样拥有海景，休闲度假蜜月之标配！我们还提供24线上小时中文管家服务，及保姆服务，订车，租车，摩托车，跑车，复古车，一日游等，完美的旅行体验感是我们团队服务的核心目标。此外赠送KingPower王权购物免费用车及午餐/晚餐。我们还不定期组织自驾游、无人岛体验等，享受东南亚极致的海岛户外风情，抓龙虾，捕鱼，抓螃蟹，龙虾，海钓一应俱全的户外活动！
 来一次身体与心灵的饕餮盛宴！
 我们欢迎您的下榻与咨询！自助别墅，24小时密码入住！入住请提供基本信息！

完美的入住体感受是我们团队服务的核心目标。绝佳的日出观看点.晚上独享查龙湾夜景.入住期间赠送KingPower王权购物免费用车及午餐/晚餐。（具体请咨询客服）

所有

9:00-24:00

name: Rarity Private Open Views Pool King-Rooms Washrooms Jacuzzi
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Everything Included at this executive rate. Airport Transfer, Personal driver, Chef services, concierge discounts, plus much more. Panoramic ocean views from your private pool, wraparound balcony. This spacious haven with traditional teak floors and lavish jungle outlook. Unfurl your afternoons, by the pool, drink in hand, made and brought to you by staff with a smile, set within a tropical garden, commanding views of the Andaman Sea. There isn't a window, balcony, hot tub, dinning, living rooms that aren't blessed with the beautiful bounty of scenery, if not relaxing, please check your pulse.

On the first floor there is an open living area with panoramic sea view surrounded with a wrap-around balcony, fully equipped kitchen, dining area, pantry-size bar and TV room equipped with a large-screen plasma TV and home theatre system.

There are two large bedrooms each with walk-in closet and bathroom.

The second floor is comprised of 2 large bedrooms each with private balcony and extra-large Jacuzzi from which one can relax and watch the sights over Patong bay.

The Villa boasts a fully equipped, modern kitchen, including refrigerator, microwave, stoves & ovens, electric cooker hood over a centre island design with plenty of equipment cabinets.

You will find all the conveniences and utensils to which you are accustomed.

A panoramic view living room, with folding doors that allow the room to be totally opened, offers great views of Phuket lush tropical rain forest, Patong bay and swimming pool.

The living room is set at one end of the house and surrounded by a large outdoor balcony with garden furniture aplenty.

The perfect setting for entertaining your family and friends.

The villa has 6 spacious bedrooms including a large balcony overlooking great view and landscapes.

The villa includes two master bedrooms equipped with flat screen TVs, home theatre systems and Jacuzzi for two.

All rooms are air-conditioned, come with decorative fan, and feature polished teak wood floor, rich Thai silk & fabrics, and are equipped with en suite facilities.

Cable TVs are in every bedroom.

The 6 bedroom villa has its own private salt water swimming pool powered by the latest filtration system to ensure low maintenance and high reliability.

The pool itself is set within its own tropical garden with commanding views of the Andaman Sea. Pool lounges and beach towels are available for guests.

WiFi Internet throughout all villa.

All access to our villa and surrounding property is available to our guests

Nothing is off limits, you pay for a luxurious, 3 storey, spacious, mansion and you are asked to call this villa your home for the duration of your stay

We will do everything in our power to accommodate you comfortably yet with respect to your privacy so you are relaxed and are in a space where you feel at home

Myself, My partner, and Villa Managers available everyday, chefs, maids, babysitters and transportation and more available on request (Extra)

The spacious estate is perched just 1 minute from Patong Beach and within easy reach of restaurants, bars, and shopping. Kata Beach, Kamala Beach, Karon Beach, Nai Harn Beach, Nai Harn Beach, Chalong Beach, and Phuket Town are all a short drive away.

Private parking available for 2 cars and up to 4 motorcycles and space available near the entrance of the gated community 

We also offer the service of a personal driver on call 24/7

Also the service of airport transfer is available 

Please enquire on reservation

Please don’t hesitate to enquire about anything you wish to know before your stay

We offer a range of services that are aimed at providing you, our guest, with everything you need to have an amazing, luxurious, memorable, relaxing and safe holiday/vacation 

Our on call English speaking villa managers offer a personal and unique service that aim to cater to your every need and are on call 24/7

We are one of the only hosts on Airbnb that offer such service and our villas have been selected to be advertised on an upper tier of Airbnb called Airbnb plus, yet we remain one of the more affordable luxury villa options in Phuket

Respect Thai culture 
Respect Buddha 
Respect The King past or present
Please keep feet off the furniture 
Please treat the villa like your own home as it will be for your stay

name: Kamala Beach 6 卧室岩石海景无边泳池别墅 院内直达海滩 含女佣服务 15 分钟到达芭东
address: ตำบล กมลา, ภูเก็ต, Thailand
city: ตำบล กมลา
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
位于普吉岛卡马拉百万富豪街价值1.2亿，坐落在半山海景180度无敌海景，25米无边泳池，6个全海景卧室。别墅拥有两个大型会客厅，两个开放式厨房。
*别墅面积高达 820 平方米，上下分为 4 层。
*私人别墅一层可以走楼梯到达大海，可以游泳和拍照抓海鲜钓鱼，带上装备直接浮潜。是聚会度假，公司团建招待重要客户的最佳选择
*全景海景，可欣赏新鲜的安达曼海风
*25 米无边泳池，配有宽敞的阳光甲板和餐厅露台区域。
*超高天花板和六米落地窗。
*宽敞的室内室外风格的公共起居区，室内装饰现代、简约。
*宽敞舒适的卧室，拥有美丽的景观和隐私。

住宿（拥有 6 个全海景房间，独立卫生间，最多入住12人）
别墅所有卧室均设有高天花板、玻璃透明大阳台、衣柜空间、平板电视、保险箱和套房卫生间。并配有三个按摩浴缸。

请注意：房客入住需要缴纳 20000泰铢押金，退房时退还。电费 8 元泰铢，用电费用需按照用电量单独结算。此价格不包含电费，水费免费。

周边配套：
711 便利店 2分钟
西餐厅咖啡 1 分钟
卡马拉海滩3分钟
芭东酒吧街10分钟
普吉岛机场45分钟

sectionedDescription/summary:
位于普吉岛卡马拉百万富豪街价值1.2亿，坐落在半山海景180度无敌海景，25米无边泳池，6个全海景卧室。别墅拥有两个大型会客厅，两个开放式厨房。
*别墅面积高达 820 平方米，上下分为 4 层。
*私人别墅一层可以走楼梯到达大海，可以游泳和拍照抓海鲜钓鱼，带上装备直接浮潜。是聚会度假，公司团建招待重要客户的最佳选择
*全景海景，可欣赏新鲜的安达曼海风
*25 米无边泳池，配有宽敞的阳光甲板和餐厅露台区域。
*超高天花板和六米落地窗。
*宽敞的室内室外风格的公共起居区，室内装饰现代、简约。
*宽敞舒适的卧室，拥有美丽的景观和隐私。

住宿（拥有 6 个全海景房间，独立卫生间，最多入住12人）
别墅所有卧室均设有高天花板、玻璃透明大阳台、衣柜空间、平板电视、保险箱和套房卫生间。并配有三个按摩浴缸。

请注意：房客入住需要缴纳 20000泰铢押金，退房时退还。电费 8 元泰铢，用电费用需按照用电量单独结算。此价格不包含电费，水费免费。

name: Luxurious & Exclusive 13-bedroom villa in Patong
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Sense of Exclusive Privacy in Phuket - Thailand!

In the exclusive southern peninsula of Patong Beach, you will stay in a perfectly renovated (2022) extraordinary 2,500 sq.m. villa with your own live-in chef. You will immerse in luxury, enjoying great breakfasts and dinners and remember those spectacular sea views across Patong Bay and the bright lights of the bustling city of Patong.

This relaxing 13-bedroom retreat promises the features of a luxury resort within  a private villa setting.

Reuan Thai Villa is a Thai-style villa with a very modern look and feel. We have finished renovations in May 2022. Our in-house housekeeping and service staff will try their utmost to let you experience an awesome time in Phuket.

During their stay, the guests will have the whole villa to their disposal. Except for the staff rooms which are indicated with clear signs.

Secluded neighborhood with a high sense of privacy. Reuan Thai Villa is built on a hill just outside Patong Beach. From the villa you will have stunning cliff-side vistas of Patong Beach, Patong Bay and the Andaman Sea.

We can easily sleep up to 30+ people. This is selectable in the booking options because Airbnb somehow does not go higher than 16 persons.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1. Pets are not allowed
Although we love pets ourselves, we do not host any group of people that are bringing in their pets, so as a host we allow ourselves the right to cancel your stay at Reuan Thai Villa in case we discover that you have brought pets in our villa.


2. Respect thy neighbor
If you are planning to have a party at the house, please respect the neighbors by limiting the noise outside the property from midnight to 07:00 o’clock in the morning.

3. Smoking inside the Villa
Please do not smoke inside the Villa if this occurs you will be liable for the clean-up operation.

4. Shoes are for outside
Please remove you shoes before entering the Villa.

5. Towels
Please use the Villa bath towels for what they are intended, not the removal of Make up, Sun lotion or Cleaning. if this occurs you will be liable for replacement towels.

6. Toilet paper an unfortunate fact
To mitigate blocking the entire sewage system, please DO NOT throw toilet paper into the toilet bowls.

7. Wildlife
Please remember you are in the tropics you may come across snakes throughout Thailand, such as poisonous cobras. We will endeavor to check the property and maintain in such a way to reduce the likelihood of their habitation near the Villa, however please avoid walking in thick vegetation.

8. No drugs inside the property
Thailand has strict drug laws and will detain those who partake in such activities. Please be aware that even if you do not take the drugs, if you are in vicinity of those using you will also be detained. The penalties are obvious with jail, fines and deportation.

9. BBQ Pool Side
Guest can ask our Villa Manager or designated person to operate the BBQ at the pool side. We have the BBQ available to our guests from 10:00 to 23:00 o’clock. The food and preparation are not included in the rental price, but can be discussed with management or the Villa Manager at the premises.

10. Swimming Pool
We are happy to offer our guests use of the swimming during their stay. We ask the guests to supervise the use of the pool by children below 10 years of age. And the use of the swimming pool is at the guests responsibility and we do not accept any responsibility other than failures to the swimming pool itself.

11. Late check-out
Guest that like to check out late is only possible when we don’t have other guests scheduled for checking in. 

When approved the following charges apply: until 17:00 - 50% of the daily rate, and after 17:00 the full rate will apply.

name: NagaNoi Private Villa
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy our holiday villa on a private island! The 4-bedroom private villa is located on Naga Noi island, 4 km from the northeastern coast of Phuket island. We have a private beach of 1 km long, with some day-trip visitors until sunset. You can enjoy the privacy of the beach in front of the villa, getting into the sea after only a few steps. Our villa design provides a panoramic sea-view with a sea breeze from the private open space living space and balcony.

In 1962 our grandfather traveled to Naga Noi island for a business trip and fell in love with the island. He decided to set up a vacation home there for the rest of the family and the island became our permanent retreat.

The Hiranprueck family villa was built in 1980 and is located on the northeastern side of the island. 28 years later, we renovated the villa and gave it a more modern look, adding more comfort for the guests. Parts of the old structure were kept to preserve the old look of our home. The pearl wall in the open space living area displays real pearls that were gathered from our pearl farm, against a red background.

The 4-bedroom private villa is located on Naga Noi island, 4 km from the northeastern coast of Phuket island. We have a private beach of 1 km long, with some day-trip visitors until sunset. You can enjoy the privacy of the beach in front of the villa, getting into the sea after only a few steps. Our villa design provides a panoramic sea-view with a sea breeze from the private open space living space and balcony.

There're a few activities around the island -- snorkeling(free), kayaking(free), parasailing, scuba, and jetski.

We have personal assistant on the island. 24hr on your call. If you need help or anything.

Guests can rent a boat to go chill at near by islands.

The transportation is included from Ao Po pier.

Food can be provided in advance notification at your own cost.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
You can smoke but only outside the tents and please throw the butt in the ashtray.

If there are other guests, please be respectful and keep the noise level down after 22:30.

Help us keep the villa clean, sometimes it gets pretty windy, make sure the trash stays in the bin

name: Stunning 5 beds Villa with Panoramic Sea View
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience the epitome of coastal living during your stay of our exquisite 5-bedroom sea view villa. Nestled along the serene shoreline, this stunning property offers panoramic vistas of the Andaman sea, creating the perfect backdrop for a restful and luxurious getaway.Equipped with premium amenities, including private outdoor spaces, stilysh bathrooms, the villa provides the ultimate in luxury living.Whether you're hosting gatherings or seeking moments of peaceful relaxation.

Step into a world of elegance and comfort as you explore the spacious interior, featuring five beautifully appointed bedrooms designed to accommodate family and guests in style. The open living spaces seamlessly connect indoor and outdoor living, allowing you to savor the breathtaking sea views from every corner of the villa.

Welcome to our 5 bedrooms Beautiful sea view villa! NAVARE Group delighted to assist in ensuring that your stay exceeds all expectations. Whether you seek local recommendations, require assistance with amenities, or have any queries, please don't hesitate to engage with us.we are here to enhance your experience and provide information on everything from nearby attractions to the intricacies of the villa itself. Feel free to reach out at any time.
Greetings,
NAVARE Group

Ao Por is also renowned for its marina, which serves as a gateway to the stunning Phang Nga Bay. Boasting a tranquil atmosphere and panoramic views of the surrounding islands, the marina offers a haven for yachting enthusiasts and those seeking to explore the region's picturesque waters and limestone cliffs.

Visitors to Ao Por can indulge in a range of marine activities, including island hopping, snorkeling, and diving, allowing them to discover the underwater wonders of the Andaman Sea. The area's rich marine life and vibrant coral reefs make it a paradise for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers alike.

In addition to its natural splendor, Ao Por is home to a collection of upscale resorts, boutique hotels, and luxury villas that cater to discerning travelers seeking a peaceful and exclusive escape. The area's accommodations are designed to harmonize with the surrounding landscape, offering guests a tranquil oasis where they can unwind and rejuvenate in luxurious seclusion.

1. Private Vehicle: Having a private vehicle, such as a rented car or motorcycle, can provide the freedom to explore Ao Por and its adjacent areas at your own pace.

2. Taxis: Taxis are a practical choice for quickly reaching nearby destinations or attractions within and around Ao Por. Visitors can conveniently hail a taxi to travel to restaurants, beaches, or nearby points of interest. It is advisable to agree upon the fare with the driver beforehand or ensure that the meter is used.

3. Tuk-Tuks: These traditional, three-wheeled vehicles are a fun and customary form of transportation in Thailand. In Ao Por, tuk-tuks offer an easy and charming means of traveling shorter distances. They are readily available and present a unique way to explore the area's natural beauty and local culture.

4. Private Transfers: Our accommodations in Ao Por offers private transfer services to and from popular locations, including the airport, nearby beaches, and attractions. This option ensures a hassle-free and comfortable transportation experience, especially for those arriving in the area for the first time.

5. Walking and Cycling: Ao Por's tranquil ambiance and pedestrian-friendly paths make walking and cycling enjoyable ways to soak in the coastal serenity and picturesque surroundings. Travelers can revel in the panoramic sea views and gentle coastal breezes as they venture along the beach promenade or explore the area's charming streets and local markets on foot or by bicycle.

Electricity separate to charge by goverment rate: 5thb/unit
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Electricity separate to pay by government rate: 6 thb/unit. Security deposit 10,000thb or any equal currency, refundable by check out.

NAVARE Group

name: 360' Panorama Sky Pool Villa (Duplex) at Discount
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
One of the first luxury establishments in the area, professionally managed by Cape Panwa Hotel. The Absolute Suite (due to its design and  breathtaking view over the Andaman Sea) is a 2 floors penthouse, which boasts 530 sq.m living space  + 90 sq.m pool, including a private spa room.


****
Daily breakfasts at the restaurant already included in total price

A duplex penthouse featuring its own private elevator, 2 ensuite bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a kitchen area and island counter, spacious living room, and separate dining area (overlooking the private infinity pool), large solid wooden sundecks and private spa with steam room.

Special Privileges:

•Free in-room WiFi and LAN Internet connection
•In-suite check in and check out
•Complimentary mini bar (except alcohol), replenished daily (with minimum 7 nights stay)
•Complimentary daily afternoon snack
•Complimentary laundry service (except dry cleaning) 20 pieces per stay
•One complimentary Siamese Touch Massage per person (with minimum 7 nights stay)
•Complimentary 1 day trip to Coral Island once per stay (with minimum 7 nights stay) .

Our guests can enjoy full access to all Cape Panwa Hotel top range facilities, such as: 
- laundry service
- housekeeping
- day and night room service
- concierge service
- 2 public pools
- restaurants and bars on the territory of hotel
- gym
- sauna
- reading room 
- one of Phuket’s only remaining hotel private beaches and provided hotel activities.

Attentive and experienced staff are on hand to help and advise over excursions and sight-seeing trips on land and sea.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via Airbnb Messages. We also have 24 hours receptions for you at your listing.

Within walking distance from convenient stores and local eateries such as restaurants, street-foods stalls and cafes (Cafe Kantary is a local favorite) also accessible to all hotel facilities.

Proximity to city center: 15 mins drive to Phuket Town - heritage town with historic, charming architecture and a vibrant food & drinks scene, dotted with cosmopolitan venues as well as old school restaurants and stylish speakeasies. Message  for recommendations.

•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa (or vice versa) by Van – One Way 1,200 Baht per Trip  (6 ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa by Van – Return Trip 2,400 Baht per Trip  (6 ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa (or vice versa) by Mercedes – One Way Trip 2,500 Baht per Trip (2ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa by Mercedes – Return Trip 5,000 Baht per Trip (2 ppl. max)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
• Smoking is allowed at your balcony
 • Pets are not allowed

name: Luxury 2BR Pool Villa, Seaview
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This 2-bedroom private pool villa is part of a small resort overlooking Patong's vibrant center. Nestled in the tropical rain forest, it offers stunning 180° views of the Andaman's turquoise waters. The tub in front of the full-height front window is the perfect place to unwind!
This is one of our guests' favourite rentals, it is often booked long in advance. We have several units here though. Do not hesitate to contact me to check on availability.

This 220m² villa is perfectly integrated in its natural environment, on a gentle slope. You enjoy full privacy and unblocked views while all the facilities of a five-star resort are at your fingertip. 
The full height glass windows maximise the views of the Andaman Sea while the central air conditioning keeps the atmosphere fresh.
 From the wooden deck, you can jump in your private pool or relax on the bean bags. The sun setting on the liquid horizon offers an unforgettable show before you head for one of the resort's restaurants. 
There is a large bathtub right in front of the window to admire the night lights of Patong's buzzing heart or the ever-changing shimmers of the Indian Ocean. 
The villa has two ensuite bedrooms with king size beds, a lounge area with state-of-the-art TV and a kitchen and dining area. Private meals can also be ordered from the resort's kitchens.

You have access to all the resort facilities starting with a very large feature pool that enjoys expansive views of the town and Patong Bay. Lounge chairs are available on the large wooden deck. But of course, you will probably prefer to enjoy the pleasure of your own private pool.
Several cafés, restaurants and bar-lounger offer a large variety of food and beverage options. A very well-equipped gym occupies a small pavilion with nature and sea views for the perfect work-out. There is also a spa with high end services. And a kid's club.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

The resort is ideally located on Patong's hills, giving easy access to the main beach as well as several secret creeks that are nestled in nature and never crowded: Paradise, Merlin, Tri Trang and Freedom Beaches.
Patong's centre, known for its nightlife, quality restaurants and shopping spots, could not be closer.

We offer free shuttle service to Patong center.
A vehicle is therefore not necessary but can be nice to venture further and discover the rest of Phuket
We can help with these arrangements and your vehicle will be directly delivered to the resort. If you prefer not to drive, we can help you get a taxi at any time, it is not expensive at all. The apps GRAB and BOLT are also available in Phuket.

There is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price.
Children and infants are welcome, and we can provide a baby cot and a baby chair upon request. There is no extra charge for children, under 4 years old, sharing an existing bed.
A security deposit is required upon check-in. The deposit will be fully refunded upon check-out, subject to a property inspection.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favourite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9am to 6pm for any question you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling and helpful.
Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Our goal is to provide you with high standard accommodation, together with quality hotel services and a personal touch, to ensure you have the best possible conditions for an enjoyable holiday.
A security deposit is required upon check-in. The deposit will be fully refunded upon check-out, subject to a property inspection.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
sectionedDescription/space:
This 220m² villa is perfectly integrated in its natural environment, on a gentle slope. You enjoy full privacy and unblocked views while all the facilities of a five-star resort are at your fingertip. 
The full height glass windows maximise the views of the Andaman Sea while the central air conditioning keeps the atmosphere fresh.
 From the wooden deck, you can jump in your private pool or relax on the bean bags. The sun setting on the liquid horizon offers an unforgettable show before you head for one of the resort's restaurants. 
There is a large bathtub right in front of the window to admire the night lights of Patong's buzzing heart or the ever-changing shimmers of the Indian Ocean. 
The villa has two ensuite bedrooms with king size beds, a lounge area with state-of-the-art TV and a kitchen and dining area. Private meals can also be ordered from the resort's kitchens.
sectionedDescription/summary:
This 2-bedroom private pool villa is part of a small resort overlooking Patong's vibrant center. Nestled in the tropical rain forest, it offers stunning 180° views of the Andaman's turquoise waters. The tub in front of the full-height front window is the perfect place to unwind!
This is one of our guests' favourite rentals, it is often booked long in advance. We have several units here though. Do not hesitate to contact me to check on availability.

We offer free shuttle service to Patong center.
A vehicle is therefore not necessary but can be nice to venture further and discover the rest of Phuket

name: Tropical Pool Villa Near Bangtao Beach
address: Si Sunthon, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Discover your perfect getaway at this expansive villa nestled in the heart of Phuket's tropical charm.  Experience peace of mind with round-the-clock security and relish the serene beauty of garden vistas that surround a private outdoor pool. Complete your evenings with an alfresco dining experience by the poolside BBQ. Only a 5-minute drive to the vibrant Blue Tree and Robinson Shopping Mall. The pristine sands of Bangtao Beach and Laguna Golf Course are both a 10-minute drive away.

Embark on a tropical getaway at our single-story Phuket pool villa, offering three king-sized bedrooms, each with an ensuite bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort for up to six guests. The villa features a vast 15x8 meter swimming pool and a beautiful covered BBQ area for the ultimate outdoor experience.

The living space includes a 65-inch Smart TV and plush seating for eight, perfect for entertaining or unwinding. A dining area caters to eight people.

Culinary enthusiasts will delight in the European-style kitchen equipped with an oven, electric stove, fridge, microwave, kettle, and everything you need to entertain.  Additionally, there's a convenient guest bathroom.

Located in a serene spot close to Phuket's famous dining and nightlife, our villa is ideal for family and friends or couples looking to explore the island's beauty by day and return to a comfortable and luxurious base by night. Enjoy the spacious, modern comforts of our tropical haven.
10 minutes drive to famous Bangtao beach .
5 minutes drive to famous water park blutree. 
25 minutes drive to phuket airport. 





.

The villa is private for guests' stay.

We are available and happy to assist guests at any time they may need us.

This villa located on private village easy to get around had local restaurants, local market  walking distance. 7-11 shop.
5 minutes drive to Shop Robinson shopping  mall .
5 minutes drive to Blue Tree.
10 minutes drive to Bang Tao Beach 
25 minutes drive to airport.

The villa is situated in a private community with convenient access to local dining, markets, and 7-11 shop within walking distance. Robinson Shopping Mall and Blue Tree are just a 5-minute drive away, while Bang Tao Beach can be reached in 10 minutes. The airport is a 25-minute drive from the villa. Guests can easily hail a taxi using the Grab or Bolt applications for transportation.

We offer convenient airport pickup services to the villa. A minibus accommodating up to 9 passengers is available for 1300 THB each way, while a taxi suitable for up to 3 passengers costs 1000 THB each way. On-request cleaning services are provided for 1500 THB per session. For those wishing to indulge in local cuisine within the comfort of the villa, a chef can be arranged for 2000 THB per service. Additionally, we can organize tours and sightseeing excursions for you.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please treat the house like your own place .
and do not trow the tissue in to the toilet bowl. 
Please do not smoking in the inside house outside by pool area no problem.

name: Kinnaree Grand Villa - pool, panoramic views, maid
address: Tambon Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Kinnaree Grand Villa, your perfect holiday retreat in Phuket!
Nestled amidst the lush surroundings of Kamala hills, our 4-bedroom luxury villa offers breathtaking mountain views that will leave you captivated. With a large private infinity pool and expansive outdoor areas set in 1500sqm of land, you'll be immersed in a tropical paradise and have privacy. Daily maid service and preparing breakfast are also included in the rate.

Accommodation for ten, a spacious atmosphere, and its central location make the Kinnaree Grand Villa the perfect place for a family vacation, golf trip, retreat, or special event. And it’s just a few minutes from the beach.
Designed with your utmost comfort in mind, our villa spans an impressive 500 sqm, ensuring ample space for you and your loved ones to relax and rejuvenate. The elegant and modern interior is tastefully furnished, reflecting a perfect blend of Thai charm and contemporary sophistication.
Each bedroom is elegantly furnished and comes with en-suite bathrooms, offering comfortable bedding and air conditioning. One of the bedrooms has 2 bunk beds, perfect for large families with kids.
A fully equipped Western kitchen is available to cater to all your culinary needs, while the indoor dining room and outdoor dining/lounge area offer plenty of space for socializing.
Leave the kids in the movie room on the second floor, while you relax upstairs.
The infinity pool is the highlight of the villa. You’ll love spending blissful hours on the terrace, soaking up the sun, admiring jungle-catted mountains, getting lost in your book, and taking refreshing dips in the pool. A large Sala with comfy seating and a bar sits next to the pool, where you can hide from the scorching sun and continue to enjoy the tropical landscapes.
In your private gym room, you will find a variety of machines and equipment to help you keep fit.

If you're seeking tranquility and seclusion, this very private villa offers a serene and peaceful atmosphere, away from the hustle and bustle. We can help you arrange transfers, private tours, recommend the best dining options or book a private Chef for a special meal, all to create a truly personalized and memorable stay.

The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.

Conveniently located, the villa is a short 3-5 minute drive away from Kamala Beach, restaurants and bars, local shops, Kamala Market, SPAs and Phuket FantaSea. Explore the area, indulge in delectable Thai cuisine, or embark on thrilling water sports adventures – the possibilities are endless! We recommend renting scooters or cars to fully enjoy the neighborhood and the island.

Electric usage is not included in the price, it will be charged at 5 baht/kw. Turn off the ACs and all the lights when you leave the house. 

The maid will clean daily and make amazing breakfast for you. The cost of the groceries for breakfast and any other shopping requested is not included in the rate and will be charged with a shopping-delivery surcharge of 15%.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
This Villa is a private home, we expect our guests to respect our place and follow the House rules. 
Garbage must be taken to the garbage area to avoid insects and bad odors. 
Kitchen utensils and dishes must be washed daily and before check out for sanitary reasons. 
Strictly non smoking policy. If smoking inside the house, we will charge a minimum of 5000 baht/bedroom fee. 
No parties or events, quiet hours 10pm-8am. No pets. No shoes inside.
Children must be supervised, especially around pool areas. Running and diving are not allowed as any other dangerous or unsafe activities. Fireworks and lanterns are not allowed as they are a fire hazard.
Total number of occupants should not exceed the quoted number unless agreed.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.

name: Luxury Modern 5brm Villa near Laguna & Layan Beach
address: Amphoe Thalang, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
5 mins drive to Phuket's best beach with azure waters to swim in - yet this luxury villa is the definition of relaxation. Just step inside and you can feel the waves of relaxation lapping over you

Sleeping 12 & nestled in a small luxury estate, this contemporary pool villa offers the ideal tropical retreat.

With daily maid service and breakfast included, we can also arrange a personal chef, baby-sitting services, transport - whatever you need to make your holiday in paradise even more perfect!

WARNING CURRENTLY THERE IS A FRAUDULENT LISTING OF OUR VILLA ON BOOKING DOT COM - THIS IS NOT OUR LISTING - PLS DONT FALL FOR THIS SCAM !!!

Positioned 20 mins from Phuket International airport & 5 minutes from award-winning Bangtao and Layan  Beaches, home to exclusive 5 star hotels such as Banyan Tree and Angsana Hotel. 

This 5-bedroom luxury villa, nestled in the exclusive Layan hills,  is a mere 5 minutes’ drive to the beach and 10 mins to the sophisticated Laguna area where you will find upmarket coffee shops, international restaurants as well as local delights of top-notch massages and yummy thai food!

This is a true tropical retreat…..the moment you step inside you are met with a sense of serenity and relaxation such that you do not want to leave…..

The contemporary style pool villa offers the ideal tropical retreat perfectly suited to families or groups of friends.  

Located in a secure and exclusive community, the villa is just a stones throw to the beautiful Bangtao/Layan Beach on the northwest coast of Phuket; a golden, sandy crescent highly regarded as one of the most beautiful beaches on the island. Here you will find crystal clear waters to swim in, picture postcard sunsets and numerous local charms on offer - from local beach hut restaurants and beach side massages to high end beach clubs – all on your doorstep!

In a nutshell:  
•	5 bedrooms 
•	sleeps 12 people 
•	4 ensuite king bedrooms 
•	1  x 4-bed bunk-bed room, ensuite 
•	infinity pool 
•	private parking 
•	full time house-keeper/cook 
•	home entertainment and sound systems 
•	loads to keep kids happy 


BEDROOMS

Bedroom 1 (Inside Master)
King size bed, en-suite bathroom with over-size jungle-view rain shower,  double basins, air conditioning, ceiling fan, safe, desk, sofa, garden view, patio doors opening out onto terrace.

Bedroom 2 (Outside Master)
Separate room, king size bed, en-suite bathroom with patio doors opening out to the pool terrace with rain shower and double basins, air conditioning, ceiling fan, safe, pool and garden view, patio doors opening out onto pool terrace.

Bedroom 3 (Lower Level)
King size bed, en-suite bathroom with rain shower, air conditioning, safe, walk in closet area, terrace area , garden view, patio doors opening out onto terrace.

Bedroom 4 (Lower Level)
King size bed, en-suite bathroom with rain shower, air conditioning, ceiling fan, safe.

Bedroom 5 (Lower Level)
Two sets of bunk beds, sleeps 4, en-suite bathroom with rain shower, air conditioning. *Beds can sleep children and adults.

Additional Beds
- Maids/Nanny room with bunk beds, wet room with shower, access via utility room next to bedroom 5

FEATURES & AMENITIES
Welcome pack on arrival
Bathroom toiletries on arrival
Fully equipped western style kitchen with Caesar stone breakfast bar
Wine fridge
Dishwasher
Formal dining area with seating for 12
Formal lounge area upstairs
Informal lounge downstairs
TV – Smart Streaming
Wi-Fi
Air Conditioning
Ceiling fans throughout
Safes in bedrooms
TV Entertainment areas on upper and lower level
Sonos Sound System
Full size Table Tennis
Wii Games
Hairdryers

OUTDOOR FEATURES
Infinity swimming pool
Upper and lower level terraces
Sun Beds
Sun Umbrella
Outdoor covered poolside sala with alfresco dining for 8 people and large sofa
Further alfresco dining table on poolside terrace seats 6 people
Outside Shower
Double Hammock
Large grassed area suitable for kids play
Undercover car parking for 2 cars plus supplementary car-parking area
Secure Gated community

STAFF & SERVICES
House-keeper / Cook
Daily maid service
24 hour estate security
Twice weekly laundering of linens and towels (one set per person)
Concierge Service
Car hire assistance


ADDITIONAL COST
Cook service & ingredients
Cost of food and beverages
Car/Bike hire

OPTIONAL SERVICES
In house massage
Driving/Rental Service
Villa pre stocking assistance
Assistance with activities and excursions

Our lovely housekeeper, Aom, is available to assist you with any queries and can cook a dinner party for you, organise baby-sitting, transport etc.

Villa Firefly is situated 20 mins from Phuket's international airport & 5 mins drive to the nearest beach where you can enjoy golden sandy beaches, crystal clear azure waters to swim in, local delights such as beach restaurants, beach massage and the most stunning sunsets. 

The local village is packed with upmarket coffee shops, international restaurants, boutiques and delicious local thai restaurants.

Villa Firefly is in a private security gated estate along with 6 other luxury villas.

Our wonderful housekeeper can help arrange transport. 
Car-hire provides the greatest freedom and the villa is 20 minutes from the international airport. 
Grab taxis are easy to order and are economical.

Please note there is currently building work in front of the villa. Compensation has been factored into the current pricing as this is around 50% of normal villa rates. 
At the time of writing the disturbance is low to non-existent, however inconvenience factor has been built into the price.

name: 邦涛拉古娜六卧豪华泳池别墅步行到海边厨师服务接送机服务
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This villa is equipped with 3 spacious bedrooms and bathrooms with bathtub. And you can also enjoy a complete big swimming pool by yourselves here. The kitchen is equipped will all the cooking tools and electrical equipment like plate, forks, microwave, etc, it’s also a good option to have a longer stay here. If you would like to book a longer stay, please consult us, we can provide a better price. 
***Free airport pick up service for orders more than 4 nights.

This villa is located in the center place of Bangtao, it only takes 3 minutes by car to the seaside. It takes less than 10 minutes by walking to the seaside. Bangtao beach is well known for surfing, so it’s a great option for surfing lover. Moreover it takes 8 minutes by car to boat avenue which is a food plaza here. You can have options of Korean food, Japanese food and western food there. Moreover there are many famous beach clubs like Catch. If you are with kids, Fantasea amusement park will be a good option to you. You can enjoy the very Thailand style show there. It’s also a very good chance to have a deeper understanding of Thailand’s culture. And it’s will be very funny to ride and feed the elephant there. If you would like to have the sea trip, royal Phuket marina is very close to us, it’s very fast to Phiphi island from this pier. We are a very good choice to choose in vacation so you can enjoy delicious food, drink, beach, sea and sunshine in a very short distance. 

What we can offer:
Sea trip booking, airport delivery service, car rental service, ticket to all the tourism attractions, etc

Distance:
Bangtao beach:3 mins
Surin beach: 7 mins 
Phuket international airport: 40 mins 
Fantasea:13 mins
Elephant jungle sanctuary phuket:8 mins
Boat Avenue:8 mins
Porto de Phuket: 7mins
Tiger Kingdom: 30mins
Royal Phuket Marina:24 mins (pier to take yacht to Phiphi island)

In order to protect the safety of our guest and provide better living environment, please follow the below rules:
1. No party
2. Can’t do anything which break the law of Thailand 
3. Guests can’t bring people who provide sex service to villa
4. No cannabis 
6. No smoking indoors
7. No pets
8. Keep quiet after 10pm
9. We will provide 100units of electricity for free which is very enough, If it exceeds, 8 baht will be charged per unit.
10. 10000 baht as deposit will be charged when you check in, please let us know when will you check out, then manager will come to return it if everything is alright.

name: Villa 2-Bedroom Beachfront Private Pool-SHA extra+
address: Tambon Mai Khao, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
460 sqm of total space
2 bedrooms each with ensuite bathrooms 
1 private pool in your own garden (size 7mx 3.7m) and one jet pool (3mx2m)
Private Sala for outdoor dining or just to relax
Large  living room and dining area
Fully Equipped kitchen with microwave oven, family sized fridge and stove
2 bathrooms + 1 guest's washroom
1 min walk to beach
Seaview from master bedroom and private pool area

Pool villa, mere steps away from the beach, features Thai and Continental furniture with hand-painted décor and fine Thai silks gracing the refined interiors. The spacious pool villa – 460 sqm (5,000 sqft) – come with a well-appointed kitchen incorporating state-of-the-art appliances, a wine cabinet, family-size refrigerator, and coffee and tea facilities. 

The living room, with its refined décor, creates a cozy atmosphere, and is perfect for relaxing evenings in front of a huge 46-inch LED TV. The villa's outdoor Sala is ideal for private BBQ dinners by the pool. 
The bedrooms are very large with 46-inch LED TV, each with it's own ensuite bathroom with shower and bathtub and its has own access to the pool and sala area.

Guest has access to the residential facilities which includes Gym, Spa, restaurant, common large pool, kids club. Spa offers a completely personalized wellness program, a private itinerary based on your needs through the consultation with on-site wellness doctor. We can provide a villa butlet (additional cost) for your convenience. Our concierge can also tailormake an unforgettable holiday including private yoga sessions or maybe a cruise on  the yacht.
Dining options are plentiful. Choose between private BBQ, romantic beach dinners, Thai cooking classes or a cocktails at the pool bar. If you feel like cooking yourself the villas are fully equipped and  you can by all fresh ingredients in nearest market or can be delivered direct to the villa at a small cost.

We have 24 hour reception who can assist you.

Mai Khao is one of the most extensive beaches in Phuket. It is a national landmark and the pride of Thailand, as well as the sweetest slices of the island. The beach stretches for 17 kilometers, it is located in the north part of the island, in the middle of a beautiful nowhere. Mai Khao beach is part of "Sirinat" National Park.

We are 15 minutes drive from the airport, 10 minutes walk to the nearest minimart and local restaurants, 20 minutes drive to Tesco Lotus.  Taxi, Car rental and motorbike rental services can be arranged by our concierge.

Our villa is set up for 4 persons, but if you have additional guests please let us know, we can accommodate up to 6 persons and charges might apply for the 5th person onwards.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Daily housekeeping is not included. Additional housekeeping fee is THB 2,000 per time. For guests staying more than 7 consecutive nights, complimentary housekeeping including change of linen will be provided every 3 days.
sectionedDescription/interaction: We have 24 hour reception who can assist you.

name: Villa Chanjar Top Chef near Kamala beach
address: Tambon Kammala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa 3A at Andara Resort & Villas is situated at hillside overlooking Kamala Bay and only 5 mins to Kamala Beach by shuttle service. It offers the amenities of a five-star resort in a secluded setting. And our guests  have exclusivity to access all resort facilities, gym, tennis court, kid's club and beach services.  All the Exquisite design and personalised service make these private villa perfect for families, friends, and couples hoping to enjoy the very best of what Phuket has to offer.

Ideal for celebrations, weddings anniversary, birthday or family holidays, this elegantly outfitted luxury villa offers all manner of entertaining facilities. Savour gourmet cuisine prepared by your personal chef in the stylish sala by your very own 18-metre infinity pool. Host an evening of cocktails and billiards at your in-villa bar. Enjoy a film screening in your private theatre or a soothing massage in your spa treatment room. From the moment you arrive, when you are greeted with orchids and cool refreshments, to your departure, our staff are available 24 hours a day to tend to your every wish.
 
Aesthetic nods to classic Lanna style are sprinkled throughout the villa, from the beautifully polished teak wood floors to the carved stone Buddha statue. Tropical foliage shields the villa and offers a sense of peace and privacy. The spacious master bedroom features a bathtub overlooking the garden and the turquoise waves of the bay. Each of the bedrooms comes equipped with state-of-the-art amenities including satellite television, Wi-Fi, and a personal sound system.
 
Although it would be easy to spend all of your days basking in the equatorial sunshine by your infinity pool, all of the five-star facilities of Andara Resort & Villas, as well as the prime powder-sand beaches of Kamala and Surin, are just a complimentary buggy or shuttle ride away. If there is anything we can do to make your stay more memorable, please do let us know.

List of facilities:
- 6 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms
- 18-metre private infinity pool
- Decorative fountain
- Fully equipped Western-style kitchen
- Dining room
- Dining table for 12 situated outdoors by the pool
- Living room
- Office and family room
- Three reception rooms
- Bar for private cocktail parties and entertaining
- In-villa spa treatment room
- Icemaker
- Coffee machine
- Satellite television
- High-speed Wi-Fi
- Private elevator to all floor levels
- Private theatre screening room with DVDs
- Air-conditioning and ceiling fans
- Board games

Entire villa and resort’s facilities.
- Fitness 
- Kid's club
- Tennis court

Our villa manager will be there to assist you during your stay

The villa is in a residential area of Andara Resort & Villa

To go to the beach please tell our staff to arrange shuttle service for you. To go around our staff can call local taxi service.

Rate Inclusions
+ Government tax and service charges
+ Housekeeping services & Nightly turn-down service
+ Concierge service
+ Full-time private chef for breakfast & in-villa dining
   (Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee)
+ Andara's gym
+ Andara's kid club
+ Buggy transportation services around Andara Resort & Villas
+ Shuttle bus to Kamala Beach
+ Andara beach service at Kamala beach
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
CHECK IN 
Security deposit 1,000 US Dollars may be held in cash upon arrival. 

IN VILLA DINNING  
Our full-time Thai Chef is skilled in the art of local cuisine and International cuisines. Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee. 

SMOKING
Being a family home, we have a NO SMOKING POLICY inside our villa. Guests are welcome to smoke outdoors. Our staff will supply ashtrays at any time for outdoor use. 10,000 Baht/room will be charged for Ozone Treatment in case guest smoke inside the villa.  

SHOES
As is Thai custom and to ensure we keep the floorboards squeaky clean for our guests’ enjoyment, we have a no shoes policy inside all rooms of our home. We provide soft house slippers for your comfort. 

AIR CONDITIONING
A comfortable setting of 24-25°C and is suggested for Phukets' tropical location. To ensure proper climate control, doors and windows are to be kept closed. 

LAUNDRY AND DRY CLEANING
All laundry and dry cleaning needs are sent out to a professional service. Just complete the laundry form located in your suite and our staff will assist with your requests. 

VILLA DAMAGES
We understand that accidents happen. But we do kindly ask that you please let us know when you do, in such cases repair costs may/will be applied against your security deposit.  

STAFF HOURS
Staff hours are daily from 7:00 am -10:00pm. After staff hours may apply at 300 Baht per hour per staff.  

TIPPING STAFF 
Tipping is an expression of your personal satisfaction towards our staff, and will be much appreciated.

- Dining room
- Dining table for 12 situated outdoors by the pool
- Living room
- Office and family room
- Three reception rooms
- Bar for private cocktail parties and entertaining
- In-villa spa treatment room
- Icemaker
- Coffee machine
- Satellite television
- High-speed Wi-Fi
- Private elevator to all floor levels
- Private theatre screening room with DVDs
- Air-conditioning and ceiling fans
- Board games
sectionedDescription/summary: Villa 3A at Andara Resort & Villas is situated at hillside overlooking Kamala Bay and only 5 mins to Kamala Beach by shuttle service. It offers the amenities of a five-star resort in a secluded setting. And our guests  have exclusivity to access all resort facilities, gym, tennis court, kid's club and beach services.  All the Exquisite design and personalised service make these private villa perfect for families, friends, and couples hoping to enjoy the very best of what Phuket has to offer.
sectionedDescription/transit: To go to the beach please tell our staff to arrange shuttle service for you. To go around our staff can call local taxi service.
