name: 7 Bedroom Ivory Villa: Pool, Near Beach Sleeps 21
address: Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Ivory Villa is spacious and strikingly furnished, accommodating up to 18 guests in 7 bedrooms, with a large living room, private swimming pool, outside sun deck and dining areas, gas BBQ, large games room with pool table and maid, just a 3-minute drive to Nai Harn beach.

This expansive villa, situated within a prestigious development of similar luxury residences. Having been strikingly decorated in colourful Thai fabrics and local artwork, the colourful interior vibrantly compliments the solid wooden furniture and minimalist villa design. The cheerful internal colours and decoration reflect the Asian feel while offering plenty of space throughout to take advantage of all areas, making the most of the internal size to accommodate many people in comfort. Designed with several areas inside and outside for guests to gather, this villa is the perfect residence for larger groups of people to enjoy a holiday all under one roof.

The internal size and unique design of this villa, can be seen throughout the 7 large bedrooms offering comfortable accommodation for up to 18 guests. With a large upstairs living room and spacious balcony, plus outside sala, meals can be enjoyed undercover, and both perfect for al fresco dining.  The extensive sun deck surrounding the large infinity edge 10 x 5 metre swimming pool with feature Jacuzzi and seating area, entice all guests to relax and unwind.
 
The various living areas and outside space are complimented by a large games room / living room, complete with large sofa, TV/DVD player, pool table, dart board and gym equipment offering even more variety to the areas guests can gather for entertainment.
 
Finally a fully fitted western kitchen offers the opportunity for guests, or the villa’s cook (upon request), to prepare all desired meals as everything required is at your disposal and breakfast, BBQ favourites or a selection of delicious Thai dishes can be chosen from the villa's in-house menu for your party to enjoy.

Accommodation comprises of 7 bedrooms (with the 7th bedroom being also suitable for maids or nannies).  All 7 bedroom have en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans and remote control air conditioning units. Bedrooms are split over two levels, offering 4 king sized beds and the other three bedrooms having a mixture of single beds and bunk beds, to allow optimum use of space for families and children. The 7 rooms combine to comfortably accommodating 18 people. 

Upstairs, on the level you enter the villa, is the master bedroom suite has a king sized bed, walk-in wardrobe and large en-suite bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower and large oval bath.  A second bedroom is also located upstairs, offering two single beds, with private bathroom, so could be ideal for younger children who need to be closer to their parents at night.

The remaining 5 bedrooms are all on the lower level. Bedroom 3, 4 and 5 all have king size beds, large en-suite bathrooms with spacious walk-in showers and built in wardrobes.  Bedroom 5 has an extra single bed with the king size bed, so again ideal for younger children sharing a room with parents, or children who all want to share the same room.  Sliding double doors take you from all bedrooms directly onto the sun terrace with access to the private swimming pool.  Bedroom 6 is spacious with two sets of bunk beds, and again a private bathroom ideally designed for children, or for a family wishing to all sleep closer to each other.  Bedroom 7 has a single bed and one set of bunk beds, so can be used for children or up to three staff.  Although designed as a room for staff, it can comfortably accommodate adult guest if they do not wish to share with others.

The ground floor also boasts the unique further expansive space of a second living room / games room. This huge room is furnished with a large comfortable sofa complete with 50" flat screen TV, DVD player, surround sound and cable TV; plus a pool table, bar stools and tables, dart board and gym equipment, so endless space for everyone to relax and be entertained.

Returning to upstairs, you will find the large main living room, with 50" flat screen TV/DVD player (with selection of movies) and cable TV with over 30 channels, plus blue tooth speakers. Moving outside, you can sit and relax or dine at the 14-seater dining table on the under-cover balcony, taking in the open tropical views. 

The fully fitted luxury western style kitchen is fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax in while meals are being prepared.

Ivory Villa also offers wireless internet access throughout the villa, and a landline telephone for local calls.

Guests have access to the entirety of this private villa, entered through a double front door, off a quiet road in a private estate.  The two level villa has a private swimming pool with surrounding patio/sun deck and secluded garden away from main roads and noises, making it safe for children and relaxing for adults. 

The villa is very close to Nai Harn beach, recently voted the best beach in Thailand by Trip Adviser, as well as Rawai beach, which offers restaurants, bars, nightlife, and a selection of boats for day trips to outlaying Islands. There are a number of delicious up-scale and relaxed restaurants within walking distance or short drive of the villa. 

The team can arrange motorbike or car rentals.

The villa's team and owner all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from a Villa Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

The villa is located within a 3-minute drive, or easy 15-20 minute walk, of Nai Harn beach (voted the BEST beach in Phuket for the last three years), located in the South of Phuket. Nai Harn beach is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island.  It not only offers golden sands and azure water, but a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops.  Nai Harn beach is a spectacular pristine beach and is a perfect place to unwind, whether it be having a massage or sipping a refreshing beverage in one of the many restaurants that overlook it. It is an ideal spot for surfing at the end of the dry season and offers a perfect secluded bay for mooring yachts.  There is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants locally along with many beach and viewpoint bars. People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa.  Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.

At nearby villages, Rawai and Chalong, (which are a 5- and 10-minute drive away) you will find long tail and speedboats available, so you can visit any of the beautiful islands a short distance from Phuket. Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, there are several amazing activities at a slightly further distance from the villa, such as seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

Taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans can be arranged, so getting around is easy.  

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage.  The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day.  One can be arranged for you with 24-hours notice.

Airport transfers – these will be arranged at a discounted rate of just US$30 each way for a 12 seater van and the driver will stop at shops on the way to the villa if requested. If your booking is over US$2,000 1 free transfer each way will be provided. For bookings over US$3,000 2 free transfers each way will be provided.

Van hire - a 12 seater van with driver is very popular with our guests and costs 3,000b (about US$85) per 14 hr day (including petrol). If you use the van for more than 14 hrs then an extra 100b ($3) is payable per hour. Ask you maid when you need a van. A trip to Patong for the evening will usually cost 1,600 ($45) per van.

Scooters - these are also very popular and can be hired for about 200b ($6) per day. Ask your maid if you need scooters.

Meals - your maid will cook breakfast at about 9am, and for an extra 1,000b will cook dinner. The cost of the food is paid for by the guests. All meals are sorted out directly between yourself and your maid. If you need an early breakfast for some reason you need to pay your maid 400b to come in early. There is a menu in the villa.

Extra maid - if you have a large group you may want to hire a second maid for 500b a day. Again you can arrange this directly with your maid and she will try and find someone to help, but this is not always possible.

Beach – the Villa is one of the closest villas to Nai Harn beach and is only 1.2km walk - half of the walk is beside Nai Harn lake.

Restaurants – There are Thai, French and Mexican restaurants within 600m. There are numerous restaurants at Nai Harn beach.

7Eleven – the nearest 7Eleven is 1.2km away.

Ivory Villa is situated in a quiet secluded valley, but easily accessible, just 1.2km from Nai Harn Beach.  The villa offers privacy (not overlooked by anyone), no road noise at all, safe and secure for adults and child friendly.  Estate CCTV cameras and Security Guard ensure safety, although it is considered a very safe area.

The villas has been designed and furnished as a western family home (in Phuket) to give you all your home comforts while experiencing the unique hospitality of Thailand.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Treat our home as you would your own please!  We take a small security  deposit of 10,000 THB (or you can pay cash in your home currency, such as: 300 USD / 250 EUR / 200 GBP / 2,000 HKDs etc) which will be returned to you prior to departure as long as there is no damage to the property or contents, and extra bills are settled and additional guests over and above the booking or the number of guests the house accommodates have not stayed.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa's team and owner all live locally and provide 24-hour assistance if required.  The villa has it's own dedicated housekeeper to take care of all guests, cook and clean, to ensure your stay with us is as comfortable as possible. The exclusive development offers full support from a Villa Manager and maintenance team, should you require any assistance, or the villa any servicing.  All staff members can be contacted at any time, or you can relax and enjoy an undisturbed holiday with total privacy if desired.

name: Villa Daran - Luxury Oasis Overlooking Andaman
address: Tambon Kammala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Luxury holiday villa, stunning sea-view with 6 bedrooms/ 7 bathrooms and 2 living rooms, entertainment room with pool table, kitchen and dining sala and private infinity pool. Top Class service by well-trained staff; private chef housekeepers and concierge service.  The villa is located at Andara Resort, one of Phuket's best boutique hotels. Only 5 mins to the beach by resort shuttle service.  Experience 5-star Thai hospitality today.

This exclusive haven is located on one of the most coveted parts of Phuket. Guests wake up each morning to a stunning view of the cerulean waters of the Andaman Sea from their private, 20-metre-long infinity pool. A five-minute shuttle ride can whisk guests to the white sands of Kamala Beach, and Sirun Beach only 15 mins away.

For guests wishing to experience Phuket’s cosmopolitan culinary and nightlife scenes, the vibrant town of Patong is 20 minutes away by car. 
World-class restaurants by Michelin-starred chefs, authentic local eateries, and stylish cocktail bars can all be found in these streets. If you would rather not venture so far from the villa, Silk restaurant at the resort offers a wide array of Thai and international dishes. Finally, should you prefer to dine in the comfort of your own home-away-from-home, a top chef can can serve a customised menu in either your villa’s dining room or at your private poolside sala.

With its peerless panorama of the Andaman Sea, this private luxury villa offers the height of sophistication and opulence. Hidden from the bustle of downtown Patong, Town, Andara Villa 23 is your private sanctuary set on a prime piece of Phuket. Lounge by the side of your 20-metre infinity pool, strike up a game of billiards, or sample fine Thai and Western cuisine in your dining room or private poolside sala.
 
From the moment you arrive, you are treated to Thailand’s legendary culture of hospitality. Our warm, personable staff welcome you at the door with orchids and cool refreshments before ushering you into the luxe interior decked out with teak wood and bespoke furnishings. Four of the bedrooms and bathrooms come with floor-to-ceiling windows and ocean views. Each of the bedrooms comes equipped with state-of-the-art amenities including satellite television, Wi-Fi and a personal sound system.
 
With private catering services and a sublime setting, many of our guests choose to spend all of their time at the villa. However, should you find yourself seeking something else, the five-star facilities of Andara Resort & Villas are a quick buggy ride away.

Entire house and resort facilities 
- On-site restaurant and bar
- Fitness centre
- Spa
- Private yacht (additional charges apply)
- Kids’ club
- Tennis courts
- Swimming pool

Our villa manager will be there to assist you during your stay

The house is located within 5 Star boutique resort in Phuket

- Phuket International Airport require easily be arranged and require roughly 40 minutes.
- Surin beach by car is 15 mins
- Patong by car is 20 mins

Rate Inclusion:
+ Government tax and service charges
+ Housekeeping services
+ Nightly turn-down service
+ Full-time private chef for breakfast & in-villa dining
   (Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee)
+ Andara's gym
+ Andara's kid club
+ Buggy transportation services around Andara Resort & Villas
+ Shuttle bus to Kamala Beach
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
CHECK IN 
Security deposit 1,000 US Dollars may be held in cash upon arrival. 

IN VILLA DINNING  
Our full-time Thai Chef is skilled in the art of local cuisine and International cuisines. Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee. 

SMOKING
Being a family home, we have a NO SMOKING POLICY inside our villa. Guests are welcome to smoke outdoors. Our staff will supply ashtrays at any time for outdoor use. 10,000 Baht/room will be charged for Ozone Treatment in case guest smoke inside the villa.  

SHOES
As is Thai custom and to ensure we keep the floorboards squeaky clean for our guests’ enjoyment, we have a no shoes policy inside all rooms of our home. We provide soft house slippers for your comfort. 

AIR CONDITIONING
A comfortable setting of 24-25°C and is suggested for Phukets' tropical location. To ensure proper climate control, doors and windows are to be kept closed. 

LAUNDRY AND DRY CLEANING
All laundry and dry cleaning needs are sent out to a professional service. Just complete the laundry form located in your suite and our staff will assist with your requests. 

VILLA DAMAGES
We understand that accidents happen. But we do kindly ask that you please let us know when you do, in such cases repair costs may/will be applied against your security deposit.  

STAFF HOURS
Staff hours are daily from 7:00 am -10:00pm. After staff hours may apply at 300 Baht per hour per staff.  

TIPPING STAFF 
Tipping is an expression of your personal satisfaction towards our staff, and will be much appreciated.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our villa manager will be there to assist you during your stay

A five-minute shuttle ride can whisk guests to the white sands of Kamala Beach, and Sirun Beach only 15 mins away.

For guests wishing to experience Phuket’s cosmopolitan culinary and nightlife scenes, the vibrant town of Patong is 20 minutes away by car. 
World-class restaurants by Michelin-starred chefs, authentic local eateries, and stylish cocktail bars can all be found in these streets. If you would rather not venture so far from the villa, Silk restaurant at the resort offers a wide array of Thai and international dishes. Finally, should you prefer to dine in the comfort of your own home-away-from-home, a top chef can can serve a customised menu in either your villa’s dining room or at your private poolside sala.

With its peerless panorama of the Andaman Sea, this private luxury villa offers the height of sophistication and opulence. Hidden from the bustle of downtown Patong, Town, Andara Villa 23 is your private sanctuary set on a prime piece of Phuket. Lounge by the side of your 20-metre infinity pool, strike up a game of billiards, or sample fine Thai and Western cuisine in your dining room or private poolside sala.
 
From the moment you arrive, you are treated to Thailand’s legendary culture of hospitality. Our warm, personable staff welcome you at the door with orchids and cool refreshments before ushering you into the luxe interior decked out with teak wood and bespoke furnishings. Four of the bedrooms and bathrooms come with floor-to-ceiling windows and ocean views. Each of the bedrooms comes equipped with state-of-the-art amenities including satellite television, Wi-Fi and a personal sound system.
 
With private catering services and a sublime setting, many of our guests choose to spend all of their time at the villa. However, should you find yourself seeking something else, the five-star facilities of Andara Resort & Villas are a quick buggy ride away.
sectionedDescription/summary: Luxury holiday villa, stunning sea-view with 6 bedrooms/ 7 bathrooms and 2 living rooms, entertainment room with pool table, kitchen and dining sala and private infinity pool. Top Class service by well-trained staff; private chef housekeepers and concierge service.  The villa is located at Andara Resort, one of Phuket's best boutique hotels. Only 5 mins to the beach by resort shuttle service.  Experience 5-star Thai hospitality today.
sectionedDescription/transit:
- Phuket International Airport require easily be arranged and require roughly 40 minutes.
- Surin beach by car is 15 mins
- Patong by car is 20 mins

name: Light&Hope拉古娜悦榕庄五星私人别墅（出海海钓 租车 预定娱乐项目接送机服务）
address: ตำบลเชิงทะเล, ภูเก็ต, Thailand
city: ตำบลเชิงทะเล
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
概要
Luguna park是悦榕庄集团旗下重点打造普吉岛为数不多的适合国人度假的私人别墅区，被称作百万富豪区，别墅建设与2018年末，与2019年初正式对外营业。
别墅的配置与规格我们按5星别墅的要求来呈现到您的眼前。别墅距离海滩900米。 
特色：为提供更优质的服务每天小区有免费的班车送往海滩，车程约3分钟，如步行前往15分钟到达。海滩的特点：海岸线长，人少安静，海水清澈，海沙细腻，海上娱乐项目配套齐全。此外小区的免费班车每天往返于商业中心，商业中心配套齐全，中餐，泰餐，西餐，酒吧，SPA，大型超市等。

完美的入住体验是我们团队服务的核心要求。

一楼设有宽敞的起居室，带沙发的休息区，带互联网电视频道，高速互联网光线路，WI FI。 用餐区 - 大餐桌..还在一楼有一个设备齐全的厨房:冰箱，洗衣机，熨衣板和熨斗，烤箱， 炉灶，水壶所有必要的设备和用具(平底锅，砂锅，盘子，杯子和碟子，叉子，勺子，刀 子)。
一楼(1 号卧室)有一间卧室双人床和带淋浴和卫生间的浴室。所有房间都装有空调。 小客厅的二楼设有沙发 ，阳台和 3 间带私人浴室的卧室。
二楼(2 号卧室)主卧室设有双人床，独立更衣室，宽敞带浴缸的浴室 
二楼(3 号卧室) - 双人床和带淋浴和卫生间浴室。
二楼(4 号卧室)有两张单人床和浴室
三楼(5 号卧室)有两张双人床，和浴室 设有户外休闲区。俯瞰群山的游泳池。 所有客房均配有空调和吊扇。所有客房均配有衣柜。

房内的任何物品均可免费使用，除了有私人游泳池小区还有大型公共游池，都可免费使用。

请注意爱惜房间内的设施！

在您入住前，我们会一直保持跟您的沟通，确保您的顺利入住，贴心管家服务。

Laguna park 位于普吉岛，bangtao海滩，该区域大多为别墅区域，泰国人称之为Laguna，属于普吉岛的富人区域，该区域欧美游客较多，我们的Laguna5卧室别墅位于中心地并且带有高尔夫球场以及别墅的私人泳池和很大的公共泳池我们还会给客人提供烧烤炉子晚上可以来一个啤酒烧烤party。
出门步行约10分钟到达bangtao海滩，bangtao海滩游客为欧美游客聚集地，海岸线极长，海水清澈，风浪小，并且有滑翔伞 摩托艇 等水上项目，价格比巴东，卡伦，卡塔的价格优惠很多。去巴东区域车程约25分钟.小区有免费短驳车，可以到邦涛海滩和laguna旗下酒店（悦榕庄、都喜、卡西亚等），24小时随叫随到，免费短驳船20分钟/班也可到达laguna旗下酒店 。

4、请不要在室内吃榴莲和山竹有异味或染色等食物。

sectionedDescription/description:
The location of the villa is unique beachfront one of the best stunning " Beach  Ao Yon" at the island of Phuket 
Four-Bedrooms  is a dream holiday home for extended for families whether they're in search of a relaxing tropical refuge 
The Villa's bright open-plan living and dining room ,kitchen room open completely to the superb sea view that invite the ocean breezes to flow though
Villa offering gorgeous infinity pool stretches toward the horizon, wealth of facilities,BBQ area

Ultimate Beachfront Villa  Have private Access to the beach just 5 minute by foot 
The  villa is absolutely  wonderful panoramic sea view 360 c of Ao Yon Beach  , is unique beach  of the island is peaceful and tranquil , The beach is friendly with the children , families , group of friend have a nice holidays.

Guests can use whole villa include private Horizontal  infinity swimming pool, balcony, kitchen, dinning 360 c  seaview , with each ensuite baht room   And also all equipments like kitchenware, BBQ machine. And will be look after by Villa manager  Housekeeper daily cleaning , This gated community has 24 hours . We offer the best service to make sure you have a great holiday.

1. We know Phuket very well and can help you plan your holiday in the most interesting way. We love food and can give you best advice on local restaurants. For day trips to Phiphi, Racha, Coral Island and other activities like Scuba diving, we have selected best operators that provide high quality service with the best price. And can help to book Catamaran or yacht at cost.

2. Our staff will assist with any local information and will be able to arrange  driver or a private masseuse to come to the Villa.

- Markets:   Central Shopping Center ,   Big C  ,Tesco Lotus, Villa Market, Makro Food, local markets (5-10 min)  by drive 
- Beaches:  Ao Yon Beach  just front of your villa  most of woderful beach of Island  ,   Cape Panwa ,  Aqariuam Cape Panwa,  Naiharn Beach (10 min)   Leam  Phomthep  and Kata beach (15-20 min)  by drive , 
- High concentration of local shops in Phuket town , walking around  Talang rd, Krabi road   local restaurant near by  :  
- Local  Seafood Market,    souvenirs   Shop night market  Phuket Town (5-10 min)

- Big Buddha, Chalong Temple (5-15 min), 
- They are many local and international restaurants very close to the Villa , Sri Panwa Ba Ba Nest , Cloud 19 , La Brasserie , Chai yo sea food ,

.

VILLA'S DESCRIPTION: 

With a fusion of traditional and contemporary Thai-inspired architecture and design, the villa makes for the perfect tropical hideaway.

Ideal for holidaying families and friends, this elegant villa features a landscaped garden, a free-form pool with sun deck, a spacious furnished patio, a large living room, indoor/outdoor dining areas and a modern kitchen.

Amenities include satellite TV in all rooms, DVD/Blu Ray players, surround sound system, safety box and WiFi Internet.

Should you need further assistance please do not hesitate to contact us at 0805656257 or +66805656257

- Check out time: before 12PM (noon)

- Smoking is permitted, but only outside villa.
- Please don't open the doors and the air conditioning at the same time. 
- Please no pets. 
- If you break something please tell us so it can be replaced for the next guests.

name: Villa Amanzi Kamala, 6BR, Kamala w/ chef
address: Tambon Karon, A. Muang Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Set on the hillside near Kamala Beach, the six-bedroom Villa Amanzi Kamala is a designer holiday haven with sea views, 15m pool and private chef. A designer villa set over three levels with spectacular sea and sunset views, the six-bedroom Amanzi Kamala is an awe-inspiring holiday retreat. Found near Kamala Beach in an exclusive private estate, the villa blends intriguing modern design with its gorgeous tropical hillside setting to stunning effect. The 15-metre pool forms the heart of the villa, while expansive indoor and outdoor living spaces offer the perfect party pad, or simply a haven for some blissful relaxation with family and friends. A family/games room, guest kitchen and jacuzzi offer added flourishes of luxury, while the dedicated team of staff, including a chef, provide five-star service. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

12 guests (6 bedrooms: 3 with king-size beds and 3 with twin beds convertible to kings). 1 extra bed may be set up at a small cost.



LIVING AREAS

Open-plan living and dining (seats 12) opening to pool terrace and garden; poolside sundeck; outdoor dining and barbecue area; guest kitchen with dining for eight; family room with TV/DVD player, pool table and games.



POOL

15 metres.



ENTERTAINMENT

2 Bluetooth speakers; satellite-channel TVs, DVD players; Apple TV; board games and toys, books, pool table, table tennis.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Barbecue; jacuzzi; safety deposit boxes.



PROPERTY AREA

658 sqm (villa); 2,644 sqm (land).



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; full-time villa attendants; private chef; handyman; estate security staff. Additional staff (babysitter, massage therapist) available at extra cost.



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand. Found in the exclusive Cape Amarin estate, Amanzi Kamala is one of the most spectacular villas on the ?Millionaires' Mile? headland between Kamala and Patong beaches with superb sea and sunset views. A 10-minute drive north leads to Kamala Beach, a stretch of soft golden sand popular with families, with a growing beach club scene since the arrival of the chic HQ and cafe Del Mar hotspots at its northern end. Aside from casual beachside dining at one of the restaurants that line the sand, Kamala is the perfect spot for some surfing, body boarding, or simply relaxing on the sand. About seven kilometres to the south is Patong Beach, Phuket's busiest resort town with plenty of water sports, shopping, dining and nightlife choices.

Airport transfers, car hire and taxi pick-ups can easily be arranged with your villa manager at small cost.

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.

name: Kamala Seaview Villa Moon Shadow 6 bedroom,w/chef
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious resort is located in the luxurious Kamala Cape Amarin Manor, and Villa Moon Shadow (Moon Shadow Villa) is located in the manor. It is one of the most spectacular villas, which can enjoy the beautiful seascape and sunset on the west coast of Andaman Sea, an amazing dream private resort.

Villa Moon Shadow, a famous villa with 3 floors and 6 bedrooms, offers magnificent sea views and sunset, making it an amazing vacation destination. This villa is located in a separate private estate near Kamala Beach, blending unique modern design with lush tropical slopes for stunning results. There is a 15 meter long swimming pool in the center of the villa, and the spacious indoor and outdoor living space is the perfect place for parties or simply a haven to relax with family and friends. The home/gaming room, tenant kitchen, and jacuzzi add a touch of luxury, and full-time staff including chefs will provide you with five-star service.

This villa has all the luxuries imaginable -- daily breakfast, wireless network access, welcome fruit plate, personalized services provided by the villa staff, including full-time villa manager, housekeeper, chef, security personnel and waiters, and exclusive access to the whole villa and the facilities inside.

Accommodation capacity
12 people (6 bedrooms: 6 rooms are equipped with extra double beds, and additional beds can be paid for).

living room
Open living room and dining room (can accommodate 12 people), leading to the pool terrace and garden; Sunbathing area by the swimming pool; Outdoor dining and barbecue areas; Tenant kitchen with a restaurant that can accommodate 30 people; Family room with TV, billiards table, and games.

swimming pool
15 meters.

entertainment
IPad controlled AVC audio system; Satellite channel TV, private cinema, Sonos speaker system, Netflix mobile phone with screen projection capability; Chess games and toys, fully automatic mahjong machines, books, billiards tables.

Additional facilities
Barbecue; Sea view bathtub; Safe deposit box.

Housing area
2000m in total ² (Indoor 1100 m ²， Outdoor 900m ²)。

Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes: Villa manager; full-time villa attendants; private chef; handyman; estate security staff. Additional staff (babysitter, massage therapist) available at extra cost. 

Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

The luxurious Cape Amarin estate is located on the promontory of the "Millionaire Residential Area" between Camara Beach and Padang Beach, while the Villa Moon Shadow is located within the estate and is one of the most spectacular villas, offering stunning sea views and sunset views. Drive north for 10 minutes to reach Camara Beach, a soft and golden beach that is loved by many families. Since the fashionable HQ and Delma Cafe opened at the northern end of the beach, there have been more and more seaside bars here. In addition to leisurely dining in restaurants by the beach, Camara is also the perfect place for surfing, board surfing, or simply relaxing and resting on the beach. Badong Beach is the most prosperous Resort town in Phuket Island, 7 kilometers south of the villa. There are many water sports, shopping, catering and nightlife for you to choose from.

You can ask the villa manager to arrange airport transfers, car rental services, and taxi transfers, at a lower cost, to enjoy convenience and ease.

By booking this property, all tenants agree that they have read the check-in instructions and all relevant information regarding the property.

name: LILY Luxury 6 Bed Pool Villa Rawai
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
A large private 6 bedroom luxury villa with swimming pool and sauna located in a quiet area of Rawai close to restaurants, bars, local markets and the beaches.

Fully equipped for holiday rentals with a daily maid included.

Accommodation comprises of 6 en suite bedrooms, large open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area, office and utility room.

Entrance is into the large open plan living area with a large leather sofa, 60" flat screen TV and DVD player, satellite and Sky TV is available.  The dining table seats 8 people and there is extra seating at the breakfast bar.  The modern European kitchen is fully equipped with oven, hob, dishwasher and American fridge freezer.  

There are four large en suite bedrooms with access to the pool area and the master bedroom has a large bathroom with jacuzzi bath and steam room seating 8 people.

The fifth bedroom is at the back of the villa and has twin beds, wardrobes and en suite shower room.

The sixth bedroom is at the entrance to the villa and has a king size bed, fitted wardrobes, flat screen TV and an ensuite shower room.

All bedrooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans.

There is also a separate office with desks.

Outside is a large 12 x 5 swimming pool surrounded by terraces and there is also a fully equipped bar and Sala with seating.   A BBQ is provided.

The villa is private with access through an electric gate and there is the extra security of an alarm system.

Guests have the use of the whole villa.

Our Villa Manager is available to help with any queries and can assist with tours and excursions, private chef services, in villa massages, car and bike rental.

Rawai has lots of restaurants, bars, shops and local markets to visit and is also convenient for Naiharn.   There is a small pretty beach within a two minute drive of the villa and Rawai seafront with its seafood restaurants and fish market are close by.

We can arrange car or bike rental and you also have the opportunity to rent a brand new Toyota Fortuner seating 7 adults at a reasonable cost.   We can also arrange for a minivan and driver to be available at a cost of 3000 THB per day including unlimited mileage and gasoline.

Smoking is allowed in the outside areas.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We require a Security Deposit of 1500 USD depending on length of stay.  This can be paid in cash on arrival in your own currency and will be returned to you before departure once the villa has been checked for damage and breakages. 

The rate includes all taxes, daily maid service, linen and towel change every three days, toiletries, utilities (electric and water usage up to 200 THB per day), internet, satellite TV and  welcome pack
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our Villa Manager is available to help with any queries and can assist with tours and excursions, private chef services, in villa massages, car and bike rental.

name: 巴东海景 壮丽震撼海景 豪华五卧室别墅 步行抵达海滩 villa Mina
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Mina  is a 5 bedroom villa with Patong  panoramic sunset views over the west coast of the island and verdant tropical gardens making it a truly unique escape. With five spacious bedrooms and four luxuriously appointed bathrooms, it's the perfect option for a small group.

With a private pool table and your own private pool, you'll never want to leave. Just  Gym and sauna right outside the door。

Minutes away, you'll find popular Patong beach and it's famous restaurants and nightlife.

5 bedrooms 6 bathrooms
Bedroom 1: 2.2*2m bed, cloakroom, work desk, separate bathroom, balcony with sea view
Bedroom 2: 2.2*2m bed, wardrobe, desk, independent bathroom with sea view
Bedroom 3: 2.2*2m bed, wardrobe, desk, separate bathroom
Bedroom 4: 1.8*2m bed, wardrobe, desk, private bathroom
Bedroom 5: 1.8*2m bed, wardrobe, desk, private bathroom

70 square meters super large double kitchen, open kitchen 4-burner induction cooker, oven, microwave oven, coffee machine, toaster. Chinese style kitchen double burner gas stove.

Billiard table, mahjong table, table tennis table, foosball table, large-screen TV, massage chair, children's toy space, to meet the needs of different ages.

There is an independent private swimming pool, as well as a BBQ grill and barbecue area, and a chef can be booked to cook delicious food for you.

The terrace can enjoy the super shocking and beautiful Patong sea view. The free shuttle bus can reach the beach in 3 minutes. Delicious restaurants, massage shops, and the famous Bangla Road Bar Street are all within 3-5 minutes by car. The dream villa must be yours resort. Welcome, dear customer.

Utility bills are charged based on actual usage.
The electricity fee is 8 baht per unit and the water fee is 45 baht per cubic meter.
Check-in deposit 10,000 baht.

1号卧室 ： 2.2*2 米床  ，衣帽间，办公桌，独立浴室 海景阳台
2号卧室 ： 2.2*2 米床，衣柜，办公桌 ，独立海景浴室
3号卧室： 2.2*2 米床，衣柜，办公桌  ，独立浴室
4号卧室： 1.8*2米床，衣柜 ，办公桌  ，独立浴室
5号卧室：1.8*2米床，衣柜 ，办公桌  ，独立浴室

台球桌，麻将卓，兵乓球桌，桌上足球，超大屏电视机，按摩椅， 儿童玩具空间，满足不同年龄需求。

有独立私人泳池，以及BBQ 烧烤架及烧烤区域，可预订厨师为您烹饪美味。

露台可以欣赏超级震撼美丽的芭东海景，免费接驳车3分钟可抵达海滩，美味的餐厅，按摩店，著名的邦古拉酒吧街都在3-5分钟车程范围内，梦想别墅一定是您的度假胜地。欢迎你，亲爱的顾客。

电费每度 8泰铢，水费每立方45泰铢。
入住押金10000 泰铢。

With a private pool table and your own private pool, you'll never want to leave. Just  Gym and sauna right outside the door。

Minutes away, you'll find popular Patong beach and it's famous restaurants and nightlife.

name: Sunrise Seaview Luxury Pool Villa
address: Chalong, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 12PM (noon) and check out by 1PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Indulge in a Panoramic Seaview villa, a luxury designed haven, with high ceilings, Feng-Shui principles and tropical allure. A 12-meter infinity pool and modern chef's kitchen, surrounded by high-end antique furniture.

Three spacious rooms with King-sized beds while the Fourth room with versatility, featuring an oversized sofa bed and a 75-inch smart TV. Daybeds and lounge areas. Entertain using the pool table and sound system.

The Villa offers an unparalleled retreat on the island of Phuket.

The garden has tropical plants and orchids cared for by gardener, and the maid will keep the house clean 3 days a week during your stay. She can Cook Thai cuisine upon request (food costs paid directly by customer)

For Use: Espresso maker with milk frothier, Fully equipped kitchen, Smeg Oven, Rice Maker, Blender, Juicer, Toaster. Laundry Room with Washer and Dryer.

Motorbike/Car rentals can be accommodated upon request for an additional price.

Yoga mat and weights.

Privacy is key and our guests will not be disturbed during their stay other than the maid's daily cleaning. However we can be contacted if there are any questions or in case of emergencies.

Our phuket Sunrise Villa is located on top of a hill, very close to much-visited Chalong Temple and Big Buddha. Our house stands on 1600 sqm of private land, with amazing views over the Andaman Sea, Chalong Bay and the neighboring islands. We are 5 minutes drive from the Chalong pier, where the tour boats depart for the daily excursions to smaller islands, diving and snorkeling. Some of Phuket's best seafood restaurants, shopping malls, super markets and other necessities within 10 mins drive. Gorgeous Kata Beach is less than 15 minutes drive, and same for the more tranquil Nai Harn Beach to the south.
Our location is ideal to enjoy the best of Phuket during daytime, and come home to savor the piece and quiet of the green hills while admiring the amazing sea views from our infinity pool. Truly one of the most spectacular private properties on Phuket. 

Biking, Boating, Diving, Fishing, Galleries/Museums, Golf, Health Club, Hiking, Restaurants, Shopping, Surfing are available within driving distance on the island.

Recommended: 
Transportation by Taxis
Rentals of Cars/Motorbikes

Note: Walking to the main road can be a challenge as we are on top of a mountain.

We would like to encourage our guests to switch off the aircons when they are going out of the property. Please keep bedroom doors closed while aircon is in use. 

Electricity and water consumption are included for stays up to 10 days.

Long Term rentals:

Long term rates do not include electricity.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Smoking outside only
- Neighborhood cats live outside the garage but are very friendly
- Security Deposit of $500 USD or equivalent in your currency has to be paid on arrival and will be returned on check-out in full or less any damage during your stay.
- Early check-in and check-out depends on availability and will be an extra charge. Please inform us when booking of needs. 
- Cleaning fee is $50 USD
- Quiet hours by 10:00 pm
- All Aircons shut off if guests leave the villa.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Privacy is key and our guests will not be disturbed during their stay other than the maid's daily cleaning. However we can be contacted if there are any questions or in case of emergencies.

name: House no. 148 Patong pool villa
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This pool villa is in the prime area of Patong and ideal for families and group of friends up to 8 members. You can easily travel to Patong best attractions in no time. Located on the main road close to shopping malls, Bangla street and Patong beach. You will get pool access with jacuzzi and mini-bar for all day party with your friends and families. House no.148 provides you with 3 king-size beds, 2 twin beds and 3 bathrooms. Spacious living area, dining area and full functional kitchen.

The space and rooms are decorated with modern vibe. Minimal decorations and spacious living and dining areas. Do not worry about privacy, we covered our house with reflective films so others cannot see what’s inside.

Guests can access any part of our property except for service room which located out side the house.

Guests can chat, call and message for help and near-by staffs will come and assist within minutes.

House no.148 located in cozy and quiet neighborhood in the heart of Patong.

Guests can park their cars in front of the house or parking area around laundromat which locate on the opposite side of the house.

name: 6 Bedroom Pool Villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 9PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Private 6 bedroom pool villa in complex Rawai VIP Villas, Kids Park & Spa.
Corner villa with hills view is ideal for a large family or a group of 12 adults. Maximum capacity: 12 adults and 6 children (under 12 y. o.).
Villa size: 450 sq. m.
Land size: 550 sq. m.

A furnished large living room with a sofa and media center, a fully equipped kitchen and a dining table. All 6 bedrooms have a King-size bed, en-suite bathroom, dresser, TV, and private access to the pool (no connected bedrooms). There is a courtyard with a terrace, a 5x8m pool, thai sala and covered parking with an automatic gate.

For all villa guests free access to Rawai Park - kids park with kids swimming pool and inside air-conditioning playground (**special events and kids go-kart are subject to extra charge)

Our reception is always ready to assist in all questions within operation time.

Rawai Beach and Rawai promenade are only 300 m from villas.  Kids park is on the site. Mixxmall Rawayana shopping mall with Tops supermarket, Starbucks and signature Roof pudding and cafe is in walking distance from the villas as well as multiple coffee shops, restaurants with Thai and European cuisine, convenience stores, tour booths, boat taxi to the nearest islands, popular seafood market, bars, Muay Thai and CrossFit. Nai Harn Beach in 4 km, Yanui Beach in 2 km, Promtep Cape in 2 km.

On check-in security deposit is required. The amount depends on the rental term:
1-10 nights - 5,000 THB
11-20 nights - 10,000 THB
21-30 nights - 20,000 THB
Security deposit can be left in any currency and is subject to refund on check-out date after villa inspection.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1. The hotel has 5,000 THB per week security deposit payable on check-in by cash or card in any currency. The deposit will be refunded in case no damages are in the villa.
2. Quiet hours in the hotel: 22:00 PM - 08:00 AM.
3. No pets are allowed.
4. The guests may smoke near the villa pool but not inside the rooms. The smoking fee inside the rooms is 10,000 THB.

sectionedDescription/description:
Take advantage of this magnificent beach front location. My apartment is located in a beachfront brand new luxurious resort with 2 outdoor swimming pools. Breathtaking views of the ocean. Free buffet international breakfast for 2 persons included in the price. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, and the coziness. Special and really unique. Very peaceful and secure area. Beach bar and restaurant, gym and office lounge. Free daily housekeeping. Free shuttle bus every hour

Are you ready for spectacular sunsets and plenty of fun in the water? This is a 75 square meters modern apartment with high quality finishing, design, fixtures and fittings throughout, including quality king size bed, modern bathroom with shower, balcony with table and chairs, fridge, Tea/Coffee maker, sofa, 2 large screen TV, dining table and chairs.
The whole estate is new and well designed.
The condominium is located right on the beach and very close to the famous Cafe del Mar beach club. Multiple bar and dining locations at walking distance but also very nice and quiet.
Free daily housekeeping.

Guests can use all facilities including 2 Swimming Pools, Beach Restaurant Café and Bar, Gym, Spa, Library and Lounge, Outdoor event spaces

name: Laguna Golf Course Thai-Style Pool Villa
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Set in Phuket's Europeans' popular area- Laguna Bangtao residence. You get private access to Laguna Golf-Course from your own swim pool and balcony roughly 300sq.m as your private garden yard. The villa is 2-story duplex with 6m height ceiling in the centre of living room area. The interior is bright, warm holiday style . Just 5 min drive to Bang Tao Beach、Boat Avenue、Porto de Phuket；30 min to the airport. A perfect holiday getaway for your friends and family.

Overall: 
Land size: 1100sq.m
Built-up: 480sq.m
The 2-story villa comprises 4 bedrooms 3 bathrooms、private pool、living room and kitchen.

Common area:
- Private turquoise blue pool ( maintenance 3 times/week).
- Thai Sala Bar. 
- Open landscape terrace garden ( maintenance 3 times/week incl. pest control).
- Outdoor sunbathing lounge.

Kitchen/Dining:
- Vaulted ceiling. 
- Western-style kitchen. 
- Gas stove.
- Oven、microwave、juicer、coffee maker、cooking utensils...etc. 
- Hard wood round dining table.

Bedrooms:
(1st Floor)
- Guest Bedroom features king size bed、built-in closet、shared bathroom with separate toilet and shower.

(2nd Floor)
- Master Bedroom features king size bed、built-in closet、ensuite bathroom with separate toilet and shower、built-in bathtub.

- 2 Guest Bedrooms feature 2 king size beds、built-in closet、shared bathroom with separate toilet and shower.


Storage:
- Wash and dryer

Parking:
- Private at villa's entrance for 2~4 cars

Laguna is a residential estate with security service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Guests will have access to the entire villa during their stay. The villa is surrounded by a private fence of greenery,  which guarantee total privacy. It is not shared with other guests. The villa has private parking space.

To make moving around the island more comfortable, we suggest renting a car or scooter. Our staff can advise a good rental company. You could also order a taxi with Grab or Bolt mobile phone applications, which work well on Phuket.

Laguna Golf Course

Boat Avenue : 5 min - 2km 
Porto De Phuket: 5 min - 2km 
Catch Beach Club: 14 min - 4.5km 
Choeng Thale Police Station: 10 min - 2.7km 
Laguna Resort: 12 min - 3.7km 
Laguna Golf Club: 4 min - 1km 
Lotus Tesco Cherngtalay (gas station): 10 min - 2.9km 
BangTao Beach: 4 min - 1km 
Phuket International Airport (HKT): 33 min - 18km 
Phuket Town Sunday Night Market: 45 min - 22km   


Driving in Phuket is left-hand side. Please ensure you're comfortable with it before renting a car；Or our staff will always be happy to help to arrange taxi upon request. You could also order a taxi with Grab or Bolt mobile phone applications, which work well on Phuket.

Room rates NOT include electricity and water usage. Please use the electricty wisely. 

*Refundable deposit (in cash, Thai Baht or USD) will be required upon arrival.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
SMOKING
Strictly no smoking inside the villa. A fine of THB5,000 will be applied. Smoking is only allowed in designated smoking areas outside of the villa.

LOSS OR DAMAGE
Please report any loss or damages of items to the host immediately. Damage charges will be applied.

NUMBER OF GUEST
Maximum 6 adults + 1 small children. We do not provide extra beds. Guests have to share beds.

SWIMMING POOL
There is no pool fence. Children must be supervised by adults when using the pool at all times.

RUBBISH
All rubbish should be placed in the bins provided under the sink in the kitchen or in the bathrooms. Excessive rubbish can be placed in the large rubbish bin outside of the villa by the entrance.

PARTY AND EVENTS
Villas are placed in a quiet rural area where the peace is essential. So out of respect for the peaceful neighborhood (families) and nature, the guests are kindly requested not to make parties or any kind of too loud or disturbing behavior.

BARBECUE AND FIREPLACE
Keep the fire under constant control, everything around is very dry during the summer and easy flammable. Use a small amount of water to safely turn off the fire in the outdoor barbecue. Fireworks are not allowed to set up in the project area or anywhere by without permission from the Phuket Provincial because it’s against the Thai law.

MAINTENANCE
For repair or maintenance of any faulty items in the villa, please contact us at anytime. We will notify engineering.

*Within the complex all drivers must be cautious and mindful of the speed limit when entering and exiting the complex.

city: ตำบลป่าตอง
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for infants (under 2 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
公寓坐落于芭东的高档住宅区内，大堂极富现代感，拥有24小时监控设备和保安确保您的安全，提供免费的停车场、健身房和顶楼无边泳池。您可以在楼顶的无边泳池内体验一丝清凉，亦可在躺椅上享受日光浴，观赏令人陶醉的日落。相信您可以在此度过轻松愉悦的假期。
温馨提示：因为现在已临近五一假期，房源特别紧张，我们努力做好房态的维护工作，请订房前先咨询是否有房，各位朋友在确定好您的行程后尽快下单，以免影响度假。

豪华时尚公寓所在地为芭东海滩的黄金地带﻿ - 距离巴东海滩500米,步行5分钟即可到达 ﻿- 步行15分钟可到达江西冷购物中心﻿ - 步行15分钟可到达芭东酒吧一条街

电话，信息，airbnb，邮件都可以找到我。

房屋守则
入住需要实名登记！
不可留宿非登记人员！
入住收取10000泰铢押金！
公寓禁止吸烟
禁止吸毒
禁止进行任何违法活动
不允许携带宠物
不允许举办派对和活动

name: Near Beach 10 BR Pool Villa☆Little Zoo☆
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Private Pool
Free use of kitchen
Free daily cleaning
Free Wi-Fi
Free bikes 

Villa Terrazza: 10-Bedroom Pool Villa in the Garden
✦ Max capacity: 20 adults + 3 kids (< 6 y.o.) without extra beds
✦ Villa size: 396 sq. m. | Land size: 1,600 sq. m.
✦ Private pool: W 4 x L 18 x D 1.5 meters
✦ 4 king-size beds and 6 queen-size beds
✦ Fully equipped kitchen 
✦ Access to private park (80,000 sq. m.)
    ▹Little zoo: Feed deer with fruits & veggies. Meet swans, horses, buffaloes, & more.
    ▹Playground

▹ Located on Rawai’s main road
▹ About 200 meters from the beach
▹ 15-minutes’ drive to Nai Harn Beach (closest swimming beach)
▹ Fully air-conditioned
▹ 24-hour security guard on site
▹ Close to restaurants, supermarkets, and shops 
▹ CCTVs

Guests have the exclusive use of the entire villa and a choice of bedrooms (6 – 10 bedrooms) as follows.

▹ 10 bedrooms (max 20 guests)
▹ 9 bedrooms (max 18 guests)
▹ 8 bedrooms (max 16 guests)
▹ 7 bedrooms (max 14 guests)
▹ 6 bedrooms (max 12 guests)


Please contact us for the discounts if you prefer to use less than 10 bedrooms.

Our beach is not a swimming beach since we are located on the east coast of Phuket. However, our seashore is calm, relaxing, and offers the panoramic view of Chalong Pier and nearby islands. The beach is exposed by low tides and submerged by high tides. We clean the beach every morning.

Things to do at our beach 
05:30 – 06:30 am – Soak up the stunning ocean sunrise / Go for beach running 
07:30 am – Take a beach walk to a local fishermen pier, located on the right if you are facing the sea. This place is not a fish market, but you could get a chance to buy the freshest seafood that are unloaded just minutes ago from the fishing boats lined across the shore before they are delivered to restaurants and shops. 
Tips: Just ask the fishermen if you would like to buy some fishes. 
They are there around 08:00 am, if the weather permits. 

Later during the day, you might spot a few local fishermen fishing. At low tide, wander along the beach and watch local people digging for clams. 

Please contact us for more details about other villas with 1 - 10 bedrooms in Fisherman Way Beach Villa.

VILLA SIZE
No. of floors: 2 
Pool size: 18 x 4 m with a consistent depth of 1.5 m (salt-water)
No. of bathrooms: 10 en-suite bathrooms and 1 toilet room in the living room

BEDROOMS DETAILS
Bedroom size: Approx. 20.5 sqm for king rooms and approx. 15 sqm for queen rooms
Location: 3 rooms on ground floor and 7 rooms on the upper floor

Enjoy private access to the entire villa, facilities and amenities including: 
▹ Free outdoor parking near your villa (5-6 cars)
▹ Complimentary welcome fruits platter, coffee, tea and sugar
▹ Complimentary 2 bottles of water per room daily
▹ Free Wi-Fi
▹ Western kitchen: full size refrigerator, gas stove, oven, microwave, electric kettle, toaster, and cooking utensils. BBQ grill available on request.
▹ Spacious living room & outdoor terrace with dining settings 
▹ Large backyard
▹ Daily fresh bath towels and pool towels
▹ Clothes rack/ a hair dryer/ umbrellas/ sandals
▹ Baby cot for infants aged up to 2 years old (on request)
▹ Baby chair (on request)
▹ Safe deposit box: available at the reception

▹ Reception hours: 09:00 – 17:00
▹ For any requests, please contact our reception during reception hours only. 
▹ For urgent requests after reception hours, please contact our 24-hour security guard at the barrier gate.

Fisherman Way Beach Villa is nestled along a 220-metre seafront of the tranquil Chalong Bay. We offer a secluded beach area and 37 villas situated in a private estate surrounded by preserved green space and lakes that are also home to hundreds of animals, including swans, reindeer, horses, geese, turkeys, and many more - a true nature’s hideaway! The beachfront pool villas offer a panoramic view of the Andaman Sea, while the garden villas are surrounded by verdant gardens and lakes where farm animals are free to go about, perhaps visiting the guests at their doorfront by surprise. Fisherman Way is a holiday haven so unique and extraordinary unlike any other. 

Fisherman Way Beach Villa is located on a beautiful area along Wiset Road which connects Chalong bay and Rawai beach. Phuket City is just 10 km by car; whilst Patong’s bustling street can be reached within a mere 40 minutes’ drive. The sea is also just a stone's throw away from guests’ villas.

A selection of restaurants, shops, and conveniences are available within an easy stroll just next door at Fisherman Way Business Garden.

Closest Landmarks
Phuket Shooting Range 			2.2 km.
Chalong Pier 				2.6 km.
↳ Coral Island ☆: nearby snorkeling spot, take a day trip to this island from Chalong pier.
Phuket Seashell Museum 		3.8 km.
Chalong Temple 			4.2 km.
Rawai Beach 				4.8 km.
Rawai Seafood Market / Gypsy Village 	4.9 km.
Karon View Point 			6.5 km.
Nai Harn Beach 				7.1 km.
Promthep Cape (Sunset Spot)		7.9 km.
Big Buddha 				8.2 km.

☆ Supermarkets & stores
Makro Food Service (wholesale)		100 m.
Tesco Lotus (+ Pizza + Banks + Gelato)	200 m.
7-11 (24-hour convenience store) 	400 m.
Villa Market (imported groceries)	1.2 km. 
↳ Chalong Night Market: recommended for local street food at Villa Market every Tuesday.

☆ Fresh market
- Evening market (opposite to 7-11)	400 m.
Tue & Sat 15:00 - 20:00 hrs. 
- Ha Yaek Weekend Market (near the circle) 750 m.
Sunday 05:00 – 10:00 hrs.

☆ Shopping Mall
Central Phuket (Phuket Town) 		11.8 km.
Jungceylon (Patong) 			15.8 km.

☆ Fisherman Way Business Garden (In front of the property)
Italian restaurant: Rossovivo
French restaurant: Le Panier Gourmand
Thai Restaurant & Wine Shop: Wine Lovers
Indian restaurant: Tandoori Night
Beauty Salon: Le Salon by Pat | Angie’s Hair & Beauty
Fresh Handmade Spa Products: Lemongrass House

Taxi Service
You can book a taxi with us during reception hours between 09:00-17:00. After 17:00, we advise you to book a taxi using Grab application. Please inform your villa number to the Grab taxi driver, so our security guard can help the taxi driver to find you when the taxi driver arrives at Fisherman Way.

Motorbike & Car Rental
Renting a car is great for families and groups of friends while renting a motorbike is one of the easiest and most convenient way to get around Phuket. Free parking is available at our villas. Please contact our reception for motorbike and car rental.

Public Transportation 
1. Phuket Smart Bus (Airport to Rawai): Closest bus stop is at Rawai Pier
2. Local bus (Phuket town to Nai Harn Beach): Closest bus stop is at Tesco Lotus next to our property

INSECTS
As our villas are surrounded by large meadows and natural gardens, it is sometimes unavoidable that you might experience disturbance from mosquitoes, ants, and house lizards etc. However, we will always try in our best effort to keep all insects out and away from entering your villa. Nonetheless, it is very difficult to get rid of them completely. Should you experience any disturbance by the insects, please inform us and we will do what we can to eliminate them.

WHAT IS INCLUDED?
- Daily cleaning (linens are changed every 3 days)
- Daily bottled water
- Bicycles rental (subject to availability)
- Parking space
- BBQ grill (on request)
- Baby cot for infants aged up to 2 years old (on request)
- Baby chair (on request)
- Utilities (water, electricity and gas)

WHAT IS NOT INCLUDED?
- Airport shuttle
- Taxi service
- Car & motorbike rental
- Parties & events fee
- Laundry service
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Fisherman Way Beach Villa (hereinafter referred to as “FBV”)

▹ Security deposit (cash only): THB 5,000 or equivalent in your currency is required upon check-in for charges or damages during the stay and will be refunded upon departure.
▹ Extra person charge: THB 1,000 per night for an extra bed (rollaway)
▹ No smoking inside the villa: THB 5,000 fine per room per time. 
▹ All overnight guests are required to register at the reception upon arrivals. FBV does not allow anybody else other than registered guests from staying overnight at the property.
▹Quiet hours: 00:00 (midnight) - 10:00

🥂 Party and event policy
▹ Guests must inform FBV regarding the party or event involving outside catering or specialists prior to confirming the booking. 
▹ Number of visitors and overnight guests must be confirmed with FBV at the time of booking.
▹ The event and party are not allowed.
▹ Event settings on the beach are prohibited by law. Please note that our beach is exposed by low tides and submerged by high tides.
▹ No fireworks.
▹ Additional charge is applied when guest wishes to hold a party or an event at the villa.

⛔ Failure to follow the above terms and conditions will be considered a breach of FBV policy, which may result in guests being asked to vacate the property without compensation or refunds.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
▹ Reception hours: 09:00 – 17:00
▹ For any requests, please contact our reception during reception hours only. 
▹ For urgent requests after reception hours, please contact our 24-hour security guard at the barrier gate.

name: Bluesiam Villa—11 Bedrooms over 5 Stories near Surin Beach
address: Surin, Cherngtalay, Talang,, ภูเก็ต, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Take in ocean views from any and all of the 11 bedrooms in this well-designed villa. Big groups will appreciate the size of the cinema room, while all can enjoy the spa room, gym, pool table, and in-villa sound system, as well as a BBQ by the pool.

Bluesiam Villa is a rare find, an 11 bedrooms, 5 storeys villa with full facilities includes:
Free high-speed wifi, parking space, swimming pool with jacuzzi, pool table, fully equipped kitchen, cinema room, spa room, sauna, BBQ, fitness and in-villa sound system.

Guest have full access to the villa facility no matter how many bedrooms booked.
To go to the beach, the guest can simply walk to the security box to the beach.
It is also walking distance to convenient stores (7-Eleven & Family Mart) & restaurants.

Our staff are at the villa from 9am-9pm every day, they will be at the staff area on the main floor standing by if there's any service the guest may need, in the same time keeping an optimum distance from the guest for privacy.
For any emergency, the Villa manager can be contacted 24hours and he/she will be at the villa within 15 mins.

Surin Beach is considered one of the nicest in Phuket, and the area is one of its most high-end neighborhoods. Within a short drive of the villa are many restaurants and shops, while the beach and several restaurants are just a short stroll away.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 10 cars.

Maybe some construction noises nearby until the end of May 2019.

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

name: 9BR Seaview Villa, 2 mins walk to Ao Sane, Naiharn
address: ตำบล ราไวย์, ภูเก็ต, Thailand
city: ตำบล ราไวย์
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Luxury 9 Bedroom Seaview Villa 'Thousand Hills' was completed in 2017; this brand new modern villa offers all amenities to be the perfect getaway for your Villa holiday. The flowing living spaces all face the sea, The modern architecture and the mix of wood and modern furnishings give a modern chic feeling, and always comfortable. With spectacular dining, sitting and games areas, plus 3 swimming pools, 2 saunas and a fitness room this villa really is its own private pool villa complex to enjoy.

Villa Layout

Villa Thousand Hills has total 3 building connected, one main villa and two annex villas sit together on this hill just above Ao Sane beach. The main villa has four bedrooms on the floor above the living heart of the villa, consisting of the living room, dining room, broad terrace and 2 swimming pools, one with 15*4 metre infinity-edge swimming pool and fountain swimming pool. The Family Day areas enjoy breath taking 180 views of the Andaman sea. Four bedrooms sit below this spacious living floor. Two further bedrooms in the Guest villa just steps away across the lawn claim equally stunning seaview, where sit above entertainment room with pool table and full equipped bar. The last building has its own swimming pool with 2 honeymoon suites room and one bedroom with sofa bed size and ensuite bathroom.

Each Bedroom can accommodate 2 people, so the price will be added extra after 8 guests. 

The price will be as following 

1-4 Bedroom Price  - can accommodate up to 8 people, which will be showing on this listing.

5-6 Bedroom Price - can accommodate up to 12 people, you can book us through the other listing, which will show the exactly charge applied for 6 bedroom rate (1st+2nd building)

7-9 Bedroom Price - can accommodate up to 18 people you can book us through the other listing, which will show the exactly charge applied for 9 bedroom rate.

Please note: Rate is quoted based on 2 guests per bedroom.

Rate Inclusions:

- Welcome Mimosa , Fresh Coconut and Ice Cream on arrival

- Complimentary one round trip Airport transfer

- Free snorkeling gear at Ao Sane Beach

- 1 mini-van daily service– 9 passenger + 1 driver

- Full service staff of 7 (Villa Manager, Chef, Maids, Concierge)

- Rate is all inclusive with in-villa mini-bar, soft drink, tea, and coffee and snacks replenished daily

name: Seaview haven Villa Saan, 7BR, Kamala w/ chef
address:
Kamala, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Stunning architecture and superb ocean views define eight-bedroom Villa Saan. Facilities at this fully staffed villa include a 19m pool, cinema, spa room and gym.This villa offers a reduced 7-bedroom option for smaller groups. High above the ocean on Phuket`s west coast, every room at the stunning eight-bedroomed Villa Saan commands breathtaking views. The villa`s spectacular entrance, cool 19-metre infinity-edge pool, state-of-the-art home cinema and bar with pool table, well-equipped gym with spa bed will take your breath away too. All eight of the spacious bedrooms have ocean views from glass-fronted private furnished balconies, and the master suite boasts a sparkling jacuzzi. This villa is very suitable for corporate retreats, special celebrations and groups of friends joining together, with easy access to the neighbouring villa Samira. A team of staff is on hand to pamper guests with fine cuisine, keep the villa pristine and offer a concierge service for guests wishing to explore the many delights that Phuket has to offer.

The 8-bedroom Villa Saan offers a reduced 7-bedroom option for smaller families or groups. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of 7 bedrooms and listed facilities
.


FULL VILLA CAPACITY

16 people (8 bedrooms: 5 king-bedded suites; 1 queen-bedded rooms and 2 twin rooms convertible to king). Two extra beds are available at extra cost.

The 7 bedroom option sleeps 14 guests. 1 rooms will be locked and will not be used.

LIVING AREAS

Living room; indoor dining for 12; cinema; games room; furnished pool terrace, lounge and barbecue area; gym with spa facilities.



POOL

Main pool 17m x 4m



ENTERTAINMENT

Cinema with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TVs in media room, games room and gym; novels, magazines and coffee-table books.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and master bedroom; barbecue; safety deposit boxes.



PROPERTY AREA

1800sqm (villa); 2200sqm (land)



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security. Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Saan sits within the exclusive Cape Amarin estate on the ?Millionaires' Mile' headland separating Kamala and Patong beaches.  With panoramic sea and sunset views, the villa overlooks a small bay, where the roofs of some of Phuket's finest resorts and villas peep through the tropical treetops that border the ocean.  Just six kilometres to the north sits Kamala Beach, a pretty stretch of soft golden sand popular with families.  Try surfing, body boarding, simply relaxing on the sand, or indulge in some Thai seafood (or pizza!) at one of the casual open-air restaurants lining the beach.  A bit further away to the south is the hectic Patong Beach, with a good range of water sports, shopping, dining and nightlife choices.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
Please note that the rates shown here is for the 7-bedroom option. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.

name: 6 bedroom Villa Ocean Views
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The villa is located at the highest point of the villa complex and features 6 bedrooms in total. The villa features a large living area and 4 bedrooms by the pool on the main floor. The two bedrooms remaining are conveniently self-contained one bedroom apartments with their own pantries and convertible sofa beds and a garden view. 

Daily cleaning and welcome fruits are included in the rates!

This villa is perfect for groups of friends and families!

This villa boasts 500 square meters of internal space and a 12 meter long private infinity pool with ocean views. If you are looking for a quiet and beautiful retreat you found the right place.

You and your guests will enjoy complete access to the entire villa and all of its facilities and amenities:
-  Utilities, Wifi (Dedicated Fiber Optic 50Mbps/20Mbps) and Satellite TV
- Fully equipped kitchen incl. dish washer, washing machine and outdoor BBQ
- Air Conditioners in all rooms
- Full back up power generator
- 55" Samsung LCD + J.B.L Home theatre
- Sundeck pool lounges, pool towels

Should you need any extra services before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out!

Due to the perfect location of this villa, the following points of interest can easily be reached:
- Markets: Tesco Lotus Chalong, Villa Market, Makro Food, local markets (5-10 min) with complimentary Van service.
- Beaches: Naiharn Beach (10 min) and Kata beach (15-20 min) with complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- High concentration of local shops in Rawai, Chalong and Naiharn : Massage, gyms, muay-thai, Seafood Market, souvenirs (5-10 min), with complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- Sightseeing: Chalong Peer (boats for Islands), Phromthep Cape, Windmill viewpoint, complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- Big Buddha, Chalong Temple (5-15 min), complimentary van drop off service.

We provide complimentary limousine van drop off service daily and upon request to the nearby Beaches: Naiharn Beach (10 min) and Kata beach (15-20 min)

The rates are inclusive of the following services:
- Daily cleaning.
- Welcome fruits and cold towels on arrival
- Personal welcome by our staff
- Concierge service from our on site team
- Complimentary limousine service for short trips
- 24 hours on site security

We are happy to arrange the following services upon request and additional charges:
- Airport transfer (1400 THB per Van transfer with a maximum of 10 pax per Van).
- Breakfast is available (300 THB per person)
- In house dining with private Chef available for lunch and dinner (990 THB per person)
- Private in house massage (from 800 THB per hour).
- Grocery shopping, Tour arrangements, Car and Motorbike rental, Taxi service can be arranged for your convenience.

sectionedDescription/description:
Perfect for families, friends and events, the luxurious, fully staffed, four-bedroom Naam Sawan in Cape Yamu boasts stunning views, a 30-metre pool and lavish living space.

Contact us for reduced occupancy rates for smaller group size. Naam Sawan lies within the exclusive Cape Yamu Estate on the northeast side of Phuket Island. This idyllic seaside escape with private beach access is well suited for families, friends and boasts stunning views of Phang Nga Bay and its dramatic limestone karst islands. It includes four spacious ensuite bedrooms with panoramic sea views, opulent living spaces, a tastefully designed 30-metre infinity pool with swim-up bar and vast gardens. The welcoming team of staff comprises a professionally trained chef, service staff, housekeeping and 24-hour estate security. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

8 people (4 ensuite bedrooms: 4 with king-size beds, 2 of which are convertible into twins). 4 trundle beds are available for extra kids (extra charge applies).



LIVING AREAS

Living/dining room with bar that seats 8; home cinema; indoor dining for 10; a breakfast bar for 4; outdoor dining for 10; furnished veranda.



POOL

30m x 5m x 1.5m lap lane, swim up pool cocktail bar with in-water stools; shallow platforms for kids.



ENTERTAINMENT

Pulse TV, Apple TV & internet TV channels in all rooms as well as in-home cinema room with surround sound system; Sonos wifi enabled music for open living and pool areas; bedside boom boxes in all bedrooms; plus large powerful Marshall portable sound systems in 2 main suites downstairs.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Two 2-seater kayaks; 2 stand-up paddleboards; table tennis tables; gym & workout equipment, plus an elliptical machine.



PROPERTY AREA

4,970sqm (land). 1,864sqm (villa).



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; private chef; housekeeping/service staff. Additional staff (babysitters, masseuses) available on request (extra charge applies).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Within the exclusive award-winning Cape Yamu Estate, the stunningly designed Naam Sawan occupies a prime slice of absolute waterfront land on the north-east coast of Phuket on what is considered one of the islands most unspoilt peninsulas.

It enjoys unparalleled views of Phang Nga Bay, a naturally preserved region with its rolling emerald hills blanketed by lush tropical landscape, tall coconut groves and fast access from nearby marinas to the spectacular islands of Phang Nga Bay, including Koh Naka Yai and Rang Rai with their pristine white sand beaches and dramatic limestone cliffs.

Naam Sawan is just 20 minutes from Phuket International Airport, and near to four full- service marinas and two boating piers. A favourite with corporate groups, it is nestled in an exclusive gated community and guests enjoy access to the nearby award-winning five-star COMO Point Yamu Resort, with its state-of-the-art sports and wellness facilities and superb dining options. For nature lovers, the Khao Phra Thaeo National Park with Gibbon Rehabilitation Centre and eye-catching Bang Pae waterfall are within close reach, while the beautiful beaches of BangTao and the bustling streets of Patong and Phuket Town are a mere 30-minute drive away.

Airport transfers and vehicle rentals with or without a driver can be arranged (extra charges apply). Parking space available for 4 cars.

name: 卡马拉海滩 3卧室一线海景独栋别墅 包含女佣服务/每日清洁
