guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅位于卡马拉海滩富人区，距离芭东酒吧街 15 分钟车程，幻多奇乐园 8 分钟。周边众多别墅常年有明星打卡，拥有很棒的海滩和海景.别墅房间和客厅直接和沙滩连接.可以随时下海玩水，拥有最棒的海景餐厅和泳池•你所想象的一切美景在这里都可以实现！别墅电费按照8泰铢/kwh，退房时管家会给您账单。提供翻译，房产，租车，出海，环岛旅游等服务.
卡马拉岩石是一个3卧室的绝对海洋前角西耶纳别墅位于著名的百万富翁英里在卡马拉栖息在一个露头俯瞰
卡马拉海湾，提供绝对的私密性人别墅的所有地区。卡马拉岩石共有3间宽敞的卧室，包括1间卧室的海滨平房、客厅、内外用餐区、完整的西式厨房和一个19米长的巨大游泳池。

当您到达并走进卡马拉岩石别墅时，您将被整个别墅
内令人叹为观止的安达曼海海景以及别墅下方海浪撞
击岩石的令人惊叹的景色所包围。
主别墅由3间套间卧室组成。客厅、厨房、餐厅、浴室、室外就餐区日光浴床和游泳池。
主卧室有按摩浴缸、淋浴、双人洗手池。衣柜区域和沙发之间用桌子隔开。它可以作为一张额外的床。这间卧室在起居室楼层，可以直接进入游泳池。
第二间卧室有带淋浴的浴室、卫生间、带按摩浴缸的双人洗手池。
第三间卧室配有超大空间视角海景观阳台。淋浴。


请注意：房客入住需要缴纳 15000 泰铢押金，退房时退还。电费8元泰铢，用电费用需按照用电量单独结算。此价格不包含电费，水费免费。

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1.最早入住时间为下午三点。
2.房间内严禁抽烟，一但发现将扣除 5000 泰铢清洁费。
3.钥匙丢失将赔偿 3500 泰铢。
4.房间内严禁吃榴莲。一经发现扣除 2000 泰铢清洁费。
5.房间内严禁赌博，吸毒等违法行为，如发现将报警。
6.电费8泰铢/度，水费免费。
7.入住需要缴纳 20000泰铢保证金，退房时退还。
8.入住需要实名登记所有人护照信息。
9.别墅配备所有硬件软件设置损坏将按原始购买价赔偿。
10.入住人数与登记不符需要加收清洁费（每个房间 3000 泰铢）

sectionedDescription/summary:
别墅位于卡马拉海滩富人区，距离芭东酒吧街 15 分钟车程，幻多奇乐园 8 分钟。周边众多别墅常年有明星打卡，拥有很棒的海滩和海景.别墅房间和客厅直接和沙滩连接.可以随时下海玩水，拥有最棒的海景餐厅和泳池•你所想象的一切美景在这里都可以实现！别墅电费按照8泰铢/kwh，退房时管家会给您账单。提供翻译，房产，租车，出海，环岛旅游等服务.
卡马拉岩石是一个3卧室的绝对海洋前角西耶纳别墅位于著名的百万富翁英里在卡马拉栖息在一个露头俯瞰
卡马拉海湾，提供绝对的私密性人别墅的所有地区。卡马拉岩石共有3间宽敞的卧室，包括1间卧室的海滨平房、客厅、内外用餐区、完整的西式厨房和一个19米长的巨大游泳池。

name: Villa Princess Stephanie
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience luxury living in this 4-br villa boasting panoramic sea views at Kata Noi, impeccably designed by the renowned Naga

20m infinity pool, lush garden, 2 fully equipped kitchens, 2 spacious living rooms with a bar, cinema and a pool table area.

Situated just 150 meters from Kata Noi beach and 600 meters from Kata beach within a luxury estate with amenities such as a tennis court and gym.
Your stay is complemented by the convenience of an in-house living maid providing 24/7 service.

Its elevated position affords the villa fabulous views as well as encouraging sea breezes to percolate through the house, creating the ideal environment for living in this tropical climate.

Start every day at Princess Stephanie with coffee or tea at the Bali-style dining pavilion with stunning sea view. Move to the lounge area on the deck to read or nap, take a swim in the infinity pool, spend the afternoon on a chaise longue on the lawn or on the beach just beyond and try out local seafood on the barbecue before watching the sunset from the deck or one of the balconies. Services of a chef or butler are available on your request.

Villa Princess Stephanie has been designed by world famous Naga Concept architects, who aimed to make indoor and outdoor living as enjoyable as possible and there are plenty of spaces to sit and chat, read or just appreciate magnificent surroundings. Adjustable mood lighting and an integrated sound system make every room party-ready. Kids will love all the digital entertainment on offer and adults will appreciate indoor and outdoor bar and games room with pool table.

Enjoy the fully equipped kitchen featuring blender, microwave, food processor, juicer, coffee maker. Local cuisines, traditional entertainment and eclectic choices are what help make your stay memorable, relaxing and replenishing.

BEDROOM & BATHROOM

Bedroom 1 – Master bedroom
King size bed, En-suite bathroom with hydro tub and separate indoor and outdoor showers, Air conditioning, Safe, Flat screen TV, Large closet and dressing area, Outdoor patio, Panoramic ocean view

Bedroom 2 
King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & jetted bathtub, Dual Vanity, Large closet, Air conditioning, Living area, Television, Safe, Desk, Ceiling fan, Private entrance, Direct access to terrace, Ocean view 

Bedroom 3 
King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & jetted bathtub, Dual Vanity, Large closet, Air conditioning, Living area, Television, Safe, Desk, Ceiling fan, Private entrance, Direct access to terrace, Ocean view 

Bedroom 4
King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & jetted bathtub, Dual Vanity, Large closet, Air conditioning, Living area, Television, Safe, Desk, Ceiling fan, Private entrance, Direct access to terrace, Ocean view 

Bedroom 5 – available upon request.
2 sofas, Air conditioning.

Вилла принцесса Стефани была спроектирована архитектурным бюро с мировым именем - Naga Concept. Пребывание на вилле доставит по истине эстетическое удовольствие для проживающих на вилле.

Вилла состоит из:

Мастер-спальня, которая занимает половину верхнего уровня, со своей джакузи, 2 душами, уличным и крытым

3 больших спальни на нижнем уровне, в каждой из которых есть свои ванна и душ, а так же приватная терраса с лежаками.

Гостиная на верхнем уровне, которая отлично подойдет для приемов гостей и больших компаний. 

Столовая на 8 персон и вспомогательная кухня со всем необходимым.

Основная кухня, полностью оснащенная, включая кофе-машину, микроволновку, блендер, тостер и т.п.

Развлекательная зона - включает в себя открытую террасу со столом на 8 человек, американский бильярд, кино-зону с 60 дюймовым телевизором, а так же барную зону.

Зона для персонала и прачечная, стиральная машина и сушилка

Дополнительная спальня для няни или сопровождающего персонала.

Несмотря на расположение в спокойном и закрытом поселке, в 5 минутной пешей доступности от вилла расположено множество ресторанов среди которых, такие известные рестораны, как Mom Tri Kitchen, Leonardo Da Vinci и Boathouse, а так же множество других ресторанов различных кухонь мира.

Take a two minute walk you’ll find tennis court and gym, and big estate swimming pool, all within the resort’s gated property.
Services of a chef, butler, driver, yachts rentals and etc. are available on your request.

В посёлке есть теннисный корт, тренажерный зал, а так же большой бассейн, доступные всем гостям. Для того что бы воспользоваться теннисным кортом, надо заранее его забронировать в офисе управляющей компании.
По желанию гостей могут предоставлять услуги консьержа, повара, водителя с автомобилем, аренда яхт для прогулок и рыбалки, организовываться экскурсии и прочее.

Ката — один из самых известных районов Пхукета с одноименным пляжем, расположенный в юго-западной части острова. Живописное побережье с желтоватым песком протянулось с юга на север на один километр.

Guests of villa Princess Stephanie get complimentary r/t airport transfer.

Гостям виллы Принцесса Стефани предоставляется бесплатный трансфер в/из аэропорта.

name: Sea View Luxury 2 bedroom apt
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
My sea view apartment is located inside a beach resort. Breakfast buffet for 4 persons included in the price. 3 pools, well-equipped gym, spa, restaurants and beach bar. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, and the coziness. Special and really unique. Very peaceful and secure area. Pools and Bar with Sunset Sea view. Away from the crowded places but close to everything and easy to walk everywhere. Parking. Daily housekeeping. Free shuttle bus to Bangla Road.

This is a 80 square meters modern 2 bedrooms apartment with sea view and with high quality finishing, design, fixtures and fittings throughout, including quality king size bed in main bedroom and 2 single beds in the second bedroom, 2 modern bathrooms with shower, Kitchen, fridge, Coffee machine, Electric kettle, Kitchenware, Stovetop, Toaster, Microwave, Dining table, Sofa, 3 flat screen TV, dining table and chairs.
The whole estate is modern and well designed.
The place is beach front and very close to restaurants and shops but also very nice and quiet.
Free housekeeping services are provided every day.
Laundry service is available in the building for a fee.
- Clothes iron on request

Guests can use all facilities including gym, swimming pools, bar, restaurants.
Free parking.

- Free housekeeping services are provided every day.
- 24 hours front desk
- Safety box
- Private beach area
- Free shuttle bus to downtown Patong (Bangla Road)
- Homey apartment with kitchen.
- Infinity-edge swimming pools with sea view
- Fitness centre
- Free WIFI.
- Free Buggy Car Service within the property area.
- We can keep your luggage to meet your schedule when checking in and out
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Deposit 3000 baht for 3 - 10 nights.
Deposit 5000 baht for 11 - 20 nights.
Deposit 8000 baht for 21 - 200 nights

name: COMO Point Yamu 3-Bedroom Andaman Pool Villa
address: Cape Yamu, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Toast to your arrival on Phuket’s secluded COMO Point Yamu with a complimentary bottle of crisp, chilled champagne. Nestled into a lush, tropical hillside, this contemporary villa looks out onto the cerulean-hued Phang Nga Bay and its awe-inspiring limestone formations. Scuba divers and snorkelling aficionados will delight in the underwater adventures that await in the pristine Khai Islands.

Generously spread out over 4,500 square feet, the spacious abode is perfect for a getaway with friends or a fun-filled family vacation. Soaring glass walls and sliding doors ensure an effortless transition between the indoor and outdoor living spaces. A basket of piquant pastries, ripened fruits, and fresh juice is delivered each morning—is there any better way to start the day than with breakfast on the terrace? The refreshing, turquoise-tiled infinity pool—seemingly melting into the glittering Andaman Sea—invites you in for a dip to escape the balmy midday heat. Lounge on the deck, cosily settled onto one of the plump sunbeds, with a juicy novel. Afternoon treats, delivered daily, can be nibbled poolside, along with a bottle of locally-brewed beer grabbed from the mini bar.

Explore the surrounding inlets and coves by boat, learning about the wildlife, forests, and mineral deposits that thrive in the gorgeous bay. Why not try a cultural experience and take a Thai cooking class? Slip into a fluffy bathrobe and slippers after rinsing off the day’s excursions in the cascading rainforest shower. Butler service is included in your stay to make your vacation worry and stress-free. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Walk-in closet, Television, Safe, Juliet balcony, View of Andaman Sea
• Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Walk-in closet, Television, Safe, Juliet balcony, View of Andaman Sea
• Bedroom 3: 2 Twin size beds, Shared access to hallway bathroom, Stand-alone shower, Walk-in closet, Television, Safe, Direct access to pool terrace, View of Andaman Sea


FEATURES & AMENITIES

STAFF & SERVICES
• More under “What this place offers” below

Included:

• Daily afternoon treats
• Soft drinks and local beer from the mini bar
• More under “What this place offers” below

Extra Cost (advance notice may be required):

• More under “Add-on services” below


SHARED ACCESS TO AMENITIES AT COMO POINT YAMU

Included:

name: ⭐Patong Luxury 13BR Villas w/ Pool Near Beach
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 1PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This 13-bedroom accommodation consists of two separate villas next to one another. One 8 Bedroom Villa and one 5 Bedroom Villa both with private pools and fantastic views, perfect for large groups or families. Situated in the outskirts of Patong we offer both privacy and close proximity to all of Patong’s attractions. We offer a luxury holiday rental experience and strive for high guest satisfaction. There are many included villa amenities such as on-site concierge, private cook and maid service

The living and dining rooms along with the bedrooms are all carefully appointed with every detail bringing the room to a new level of sophistication. Bedrooms have air-conditioning and their own television with access to platinum package television channels. Bedrooms have ensuite bathroom access all equipped with a shower, wash basin, toilet and few of the bathrooms benefit with a bathtub. 

The kitchen has all the appliances and equipment needed to cook up a five-star dish. Garden maintenance as well as maid service is provided to ensure your holiday home remains in the finest condition for the entirety of your stay. After spending one day at Patong 13 Villa it's likely that you won't ever want to leave.

The staff will offer concierge services, light babysitting upon request such as watching the kids while parents quietly dine or at additional small cost staff will babysit until the late hours while parents go out. Nothing is too much for our guests, we do our best to understand the needs of each individual group and adapt as quickly as possible to their needs.

The guests have fully access to the entire property.

We have a team on site who can help and assist you during your stay with us.

Patong is considered one of the most desirable area in Phuket. The villa sits on the secluded hillside of Patong, giving guests privacy and panoramic views of the sea and mountains. Everything you require is within walking distance.  Patong Beach, Bangla Road, nightlife with international restaurants and shops are within just 10-minute drive.

Local minibus, public van and taxi or grab taxi are available for local travel. Car rental are also available for booking. We look forward to welcoming you soon!

- 30,000 THB refundable security deposit to be paid on arrival
- Electric allowance: 200 Kw/day, additional usage charged at 7 THB a unit
- Extras on request: airport transfer, car rental, private chef, extra bed
- Water allowance: free
- No smoking indoors
- No pets allowed
- Daily maid service
- Towels changed after 2 days of use
- Sheets changed after 4 days of use

We pride ourselves in bringing the best hospitality to our guest's stay. We can provide additional services to enhance your stay, so please don’t hesitate to ask. We can arrange airport transfers, breakfast, private chef, tours, activities, barbecues, events and many more.

sectionedDescription/summary: This 13-bedroom accommodation consists of two separate villas next to one another. One 8 Bedroom Villa and one 5 Bedroom Villa both with private pools and fantastic views, perfect for large groups or families. Situated in the outskirts of Patong we offer both privacy and close proximity to all of Patong’s attractions. We offer a luxury holiday rental experience and strive for high guest satisfaction. There are many included villa amenities such as on-site concierge, private cook and maid service

name: Super beautiful 5 bedroom sea view villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Tianya is located at the core of Eva Beach in Rawai, offering a 270 degree boundless sea view, as well as distant small islands, boats, and tranquil docks. In the morning, you can watch beautiful sunrise on a private beach and rooftop landscape platform, and in the evening, you can enjoy a great sunset. It can accommodate up to 10 guests and has 5 bedrooms: 1 king bed room, sea view room, and sea view bathtub; 4 large bed rooms with separate bathrooms.

Space and Facilities
• Indoor building area of 700 square meters
• Roof dining area, BBQ area, lounge chair rest area
• Sea view living room • Sea view master bedroom with sea view bathtub
•  First line sea view swimming pool

Service Introduction
Free of charge:
★ 24-hour butler of Chinese, English, and Thai villas
★ A dedicated service personnel
★ A nutritious breakfast
★ Free water fee (enjoy the sea view swimming pool to the fullest)
★ Free daily room cleaning
★ Free villa pre arrival shopping service
★ Steam Bathroom
★ Free early check-in and delayed check-out
★ Lunch and dinner can be customized according to customer needs (20% of the food cost)
If we do not have other guests arriving or leaving on the same day, you can check in up to 3 hours early or check out up to 3 hours late. Just check if the villa is available a few days before arrival, and if so, the villa will be provided to you for free. Booking a villa or traveling with children can save 1 day of villa rent and bring great convenience.

Tianya Villa also provides thoughtful preparations for family vacations;
★ Baby cribs, children's carriages, children's dining chairs, children's toys
★ Provide a comfortable environment and thoughtful service for your child.

Overall rental: All areas belong to the tenant during the stay period.

----Supporting services----
【24hr Multi language at your service】
【Airport pick up】
【Boat&Road Trip Service】
【BBQ&Dining Service】

The villa is located in Eva Beach, which is private and safe. The surrounding commercial, tourism, and catering development is mature, making vacation life very convenient.
Surrounding beaches:
Rawai Beach: Up to dozens of restaurants and bars are located here. In recent years, Nai Han Beach has become one of the most popular beaches for tourists to Phuket: it boasts the most luxurious hotels and stunning sunsets in Phuket, with a variety of entertainment and amusement facilities. Yanui Beach: The most beautiful water quality beach, with natural and original ecology.
Surrounding play information:
Rawai Seafood Market is the most comprehensive and delicious seafood market in Phuket, integrating seafood sales and processing restaurants.
The largest pier on Phuket Island, where you can take yachts, sailboats, speedboats, etc. to many islands and experience a sea trip.
The Shenxian Peninsula is the best place to watch the sunset, with unique and spacious scenery, making it a must-have place for a trip to Phuket.
The Gold Shooter Club is the club with the most complete shooting equipment in Phuket and also my favorite shooting club.
Chalong Temple is the largest Buddhist temple on Phuket Island. Chalong Temple is the most magnificent and the largest Buddhist temple among the 29 abbey in Phuket Island. The Buddhist hall where 108 golden Buddhas are enshrined gives a deep impression.
【 Phuket Buddha 】 Phuket Buddha is not far from Chalong Temple and is located on the mountaintop near Chalong Bay. It faces the eastern side of Panya Bay and faces the Andaman Sea on its back. Due to the fact that the Buddha is located at a high point on Phuket Island - the southwest mountaintop, it can be seen from many parts of Phuket Island. Tourists can climb to the top of the mountain to overlook the beautiful scenery of the island. The observation deck at the top of the mountain can be considered a better scenic spot on Phuket, providing a better view of the island's scenery.
[Naka Night Market] Open every Saturday and Sunday, with food, drink, play, small goods, bars, and street artist performing; Exciting not to be missed!
[Puji Town Old Street Night Market] Open on Saturdays and Sundays, with food, drinks, small goods, bars, and street artist performing; Exciting not to be missed!

convenient transportation:
EVA Beach: Walk to 2 minutes
Shenxian Peninsula: 3km 5 minutes
Ravi Beach: 1.5km 3 minutes
Naihan Beach: 4km 6 minutes
Ravi Seafood Market: 1.5km 3 minutes
Kata Beach: 6km 10 minutes
Karen Beach: 9km 15 minutes
Patong Beach: 20km 35 minutes
Shangtai Shopping Mall: 20km, 35 minutes
Phuket international airport: 40km 70 minutes

The facilities of the villa are very new and fully equipped. But the difference from hotels or youth tours on busy streets is that the location of vacation villas is very private and quiet, with no bars or other entertainment within walking distance. If you are concerned about the location and want to easily reach the bustling and crowded tourist area, it is recommended that you rent a car or motorcycle for self driving~Villa parking is very convenient, and choosing Grab for a taxi is also very convenient.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: The electricity fee is 7 yuan/kWh. Please take off your shoes indoors.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
----Supporting services----
【24hr Multi language at your service】
【Airport pick up】
【Boat&Road Trip Service】
【BBQ&Dining Service】

name: Luxury Beachfront Villa – Heritage Home with Pool
address: Phuket, Wichit, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Panwa Lodge is a stunning heritage home that was originally built as a guesthouse for the aristocratic owners of Panwa Bay – one of the first luxury establishments in the area. The Lodge is professionally managed by Cape Panwa Hotel, offering full hotel services and facilities. Our Villa is unique because of its stylish blend between colonial architecture (influenced by Sino-Portuguese design) and luxury modern amenities.

****
Daily breakfasts at the restaurant already included in total price

Size: 154 sq.m.
 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, kitchen area, living room, outside patio, private pool.
Panwa Lodge boasts a stunning original Sino Portuguese façade and furniture, with Azulejo mosaics, wooden teak four poster beds, complemented with the latest TVs, kitchen equipment and sound system. 

Room facilities and services:

 - Private swimming pool
 - Wide screen TVs with cable
 - iPod dock
 - DVD player
 - Individual temperature controls
 - IDD telephone
 - Mini-bar
 - Tea and coffee making facilities
 - Bathrooms with walk-in shower and bathtub
 - Bathrobes and slippers
 - Hair-dryer
 - Electronic safe
 - International standard fire alarm system
 - Free in-room WiFi and LAN internet connection
 - Individual temperature control
 - Bathroom amenity set
 - Full range of linen and towels
 - Electronic keycard system

Panwa Lodge Special Privileges :

 - Free in-room WiFi and LAN internet connection
 - Complimentary mini bar (except liquor), replenished daily
 - Complimentary laundry service (except dry cleaning)
 - Daily breakfast
 - Welcome drink upon arrival
 - Direct access to Cape Panwa's private beach

Our guests can enjoy full access to all Cape Panwa Hotel top range facilities, such as: laundry service, housekeeping, day and night room service, concierge service, 2 public pools, restaurants and bars on the territory of hotel, gym, sauna, reading room and one of Phuket’s only remaining hotel private beaches and provided hotel activities.

Attentive and experienced staff are on hand to help and advise over excursions and sight-seeing trips on land and sea.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via Airbnb Messages. We also have 24 hours receptions for you at your listing.

Within walking distance from convenient stores and local eateries such as restaurants, street-foods stalls and cafes (Cafe Kantary is a local favorite) also accessible to all hotel facilities.

Proximity to city center: 15 mins drive to Phuket Town - heritage town with historic, charming architecture and a vibrant food & drinks scene, dotted with cosmopolitan venues as well as old school restaurants and stylish speakeasies. Message  for recommendations.

To make the most of your time in Phuket, we recommend that you hire a car (our 3-6 seat is available for rent together with driver)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa (or vice versa) by Van – One Way 1,200 Baht per Trip  (6 ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa by Van – Return Trip 2,400 Baht per Trip  (6 ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa (or vice versa) by Mercedes – One Way Trip 2,500 Baht per Trip (2ppl. max)
•Phuket International Airport Transfer to Cape Panwa by Mercedes – Return Trip 5,000 Baht per Trip (2 ppl. max)

No pets allowed.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
• Smoking is allowed at your balcony
 • Pets are not allowed

name: KT villa3:海景五卧别墅+近卡伦卡塔+中文管家+冲浪
address: Karon, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 3PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅位于卡塔海滩，距离卡伦海滩也不远，坐落在普吉岛西南方，附近既有冲浪胜地“卡塔海滩”又有适合自由潜水的“奈阳”海滩，背山面海，奢华装修，魅力泳池，非常适合家庭旅游度假或者朋友结伴旅行居住。

别墅位于普吉岛三大海滩之一______卡塔海滩，共 3 层建筑，占地面积550平米，可270度观安达曼海全景，拥有碧海蓝天的绝佳风景。
这栋漂亮的海滩别墅可入住10人，共设有5间卧室，每间卧室都配有独立卫生间，是你家庭聚会的首选住所;客厅采用大面积的观海落地窗，最大限度开阔视野；主卧开窗即可观海，躺在床上碧绿的大海和蓝天一览无余;超大的观景露台，把阳光、蓝天、白云盛满，蓝色的无边际泳池面朝大海，躺在太阳椅上，与阳光玩游戏，惬意私享静谧； 公共空间豪华宽敞，拥有超大的多功能客厅，屋顶露台，休憩区，无边泳池、烧烤箱、现代化开放式厨房等.....在这里，泳池趴、私人派对、高端会议无所不能。
别墅交通便利，周边娱乐设施丰富，拥有24小时便利店（711、family），海鲜餐厅、海滩夜市等，步行2分钟即可到达海滩。距离机场仅40分钟，距离芭东海滩20分钟，绝佳的观景视野，私密的奢华享受，让你吹着普吉岛的海风看着日出开启你的度假之旅！

您预定的是整个别墅，里面的所有区域都是您可以使用的地方，包括：车库 花园 客厅 厨房 泳池 天台和5个卧室和6个功能齐全的卫生间。

从您下单预定我们的别墅到您退房离开，全程有管家和您对接，有任何需求都可以联系我们。

距离卡塔冲浪海滩2分钟车程
距离卡伦观景平台5分钟车程
距离拉微海鲜市场10分钟车程
距离芭东海滩15分钟车程
距离普吉机场40分钟车程

普吉岛打车很方便，用Grab或者inDrive打车软件24小时都可以约到车。

提倡节约用电，杜绝不必要的消耗，外出不在家里的时候记得关闭空调！使用空调的时候记得关闭门窗哦！我们将根据您入住和退房时的电表数值得出您所使用的电量，收取8泰铢/度的电费！另外入住的时候会收10000泰铢的住房押金，退房时管家查房，没有问题就如数退回！
sectionedDescription/interaction: 从您下单预定我们的别墅到您退房离开，全程有管家和您对接，有任何需求都可以联系我们。

sectionedDescription/summary: 别墅位于卡塔海滩，距离卡伦海滩也不远，坐落在普吉岛西南方，附近既有冲浪胜地“卡塔海滩”又有适合自由潜水的“奈阳”海滩，背山面海，奢华装修，魅力泳池，非常适合家庭旅游度假或者朋友结伴旅行居住。
sectionedDescription/transit: 普吉岛打车很方便，用Grab或者inDrive打车软件24小时都可以约到车。

name: 4bedroom Villa Siray Beach Front
address: Tambon Ratsada, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy a harmonious blend of nature and modern design, with breathtaking views of the sea from every angle. Wake up to sunrises over the sea, and soak in the beauty of moon rises during full moons. This villa provides the perfect escape for nature lovers and adventure seekers looking for a secluded getaway.
The space

name: Cassia Residences - 1BDR - Sea view
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy your vacation on the territory of one of the most prestigious resort complexes of the island!
One-room premium apartment with sea view in CASSIA RESIDENCE. Make your vacation unforgettable!

The residential complex Cassia (Laguna Cassia Residences) is located on Bangtao Beach in the Laguna area, where there are five-star hotels, restaurants and a world-class golf club.
The apartments are equipped with absolutely everything you may need during your stay.

The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay: 1 bedroom with comfortable bed, a kitchen area with a dining table and the necessary utensils for cooking, as well as a washing machine, which provides additional comfort for a long-term stay.

The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay, including a work area and a kitchen area with a dining table and the necessary utensils for cooking. Guests can use all rooms in the apartment, including bedrooms and bathrooms, as well as a washing machine.

Of course, we are always ready to help our guests during their trip. To contact us, you can use the phone number specified in the booking, as well as write to us in the chat.

Cassia Residences apartments with sea view are located on Bangtao Beach. The apartments have an outdoor pool, a sun terrace and a bar. We also offer free Wi-Fi in all areas and free private parking.
The apartments are about 1 km from the Villa Market Supermarket and the central Boat Avenue with various restaurants and grocery stores. Phuket International Airport is 21 km away.

To get to our complex, you can order a transfer from the airport or take a taxi. We also can help you to rent a car. Parking is available for our guests free of charge.

THE PRICE INCLUDES WEEKLY CLEANING WITH A CHANGE OF BED LINEN AND TOWELS, ALL UTILITIES.
- Smoking is prohibited in the apartment.
- Pets are not allowed in the apartment.
- Bed linen and towels are provided.
- Entrance and exit to the apartment is carried out using an electronic key.
- Before check-in, guests are required to make a deposit of 15,000 baht.
- Check-in is from 14:00, check-out is until 12:00.

name: 查龙海滩夏天海景度假别墅临近芭东卡塔免费游艇出海
address: Tambon Chalong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa summer  海景度假别墅
                 查龙半山半岛3卧海景别墅
白日，浩渺的安达曼海，葱翠朦胧的远山，树影婆娑的椰林，画卷般美景勾魂摄魄
夜晚，起伏明灭的霓虹灯，色彩斑斓，高低闪烁，远处粼粼的波光月影如痴如醉
🌟半山海景无边泳池，开阔的视野，可以俯瞰到整个普吉小镇及安达曼海
🌟最美的日出从海的那边徐徐升起，犹如一位害羞的姑娘，在山峦间隐隐现现
🌟泳池边设计别致的休憩区及烧烤区，娱乐性满满

Villa summer  海景度假别墅
                 查龙半山半岛3卧海景别墅
白日，浩渺的安达曼海，葱翠朦胧的远山，树影婆娑的椰林，画卷般美景勾魂摄魄，看日出
夜晚，起伏明灭的霓虹灯，色彩斑斓，高低闪烁，远处粼粼的波光月影如痴如醉，看日落
🌟半山海景无边泳池，开阔的视野，可以俯瞰到整个普吉小镇及安达曼海
🌟最美的日出从海的那边徐徐升起，犹如一位害羞的姑娘，在山峦间隐隐现现
🌟泳池边设计别致的休憩区及烧烤区，娱乐性满满
★别墅介绍
地理位置：普吉岛查龙区（Chalong）
容量：3卧室4个卫生
设备：无边半山海景泳池，BBQ烧烤区，拍照出片的美景露台，智能高清电视
★我们的服务
- 中英泰三语管家提供全方位 24 小时在线服务，免费制定普吉岛旅行攻略，提供订车包船等服务
- 两位全职女佣(7;00am-17:00pm)提供每日清洁 
- 入住当天享有超大 VIP 礼包，塞满您的冰箱
- 提供漂浮早餐和漂浮下午茶服务(1000泰铢/份）
【客厅展示】
干净明亮的现代化设计，精美别致的摆件，简单低调中又透着一丝丝的豪华感，透过全景落地玻璃门将远处起伏的山海尽收眼底。


【用餐区】
暖暖的灯光，别具一格的灯具摆件和壁饰，温馨而又简约，美食滋养着味蕾，美景沐浴着眼睑。

【开放式厨房】
双开门冰箱，微波炉，烤箱餐具一应齐全

这是一间山海景房，全景玻璃推拉门直通泳池，套间浴室更是配备了海景浴缸，泡澡的同时又能享受普吉的美景

【卧室】
同样是半山海景房，1.8*2米的舒适大床右侧是小小的办公区，无论是套间浴室还是睡觉办公无时无刻不在享受着美景的滋润。


★地理位置
- 山顶大佛 The Big Buddha 3公里
- ATV ，丛林飞跃，骑大象 均在300米左右
- 查龙寺 1.2公里
- 射击场 3公里
- 菜市场超市 300米
- 普吉镇 5公里
- 巴东酒吧街 9公里
- 机场 25公里
★入住须知
- 下午3点后可入住，中午12点前退房
- 入住时，需支付1万泰铢押金
- 室内不可抽烟，可携带宠物等
- 电费需额外付费，8泰铢/度

别墅整个区域独享。可以免费停车。

下单后可以通过 社交软件沟通联系

入住须知重点注意：
1：入住别墅的客人需要提供有效的护照信息
2：房子的价格不包含电费，电费是单独计算的，每度8泰铢，按实际发生计算。
3：需要客人支付房租保证金，2天内 需要1万泰铢，2天以上需要支付更多的保证金，入住前管家会计算并告知客户。
4：不能在别墅内做任何违法的事情，不可

吸毒赌博，出现任何问题由入住人负责。
5：不能在室内抽烟，违反规定罚款1万泰铢。户外空间可以抽烟。
6：正常的入住时间是 下午15.00 ，退房时间是上午11.00 （如果有特殊情况可以和经理沟通）

Key points to note in the house rules:
 1: Guests staying in the villa need to provide valid passport information
 2: The price of the house does not include the electricity fee. The electricity fee is calculated separately, 8 baht per unit, and is calculated based on actual occurrence.
 3: Guests are required to pay a rent deposit, which is 10,000 baht within 2 days. More deposits are required for more than 2 days. The housekeeper will calculate and inform the customer before check-in.
 4: You are not allowed to do anything illegal in the villa, and you are not allowed to take drugs or gamble. Any problems that arise will be the responsibility of the guest.
 5: Smoking is not allowed indoors. Violation of the regulations will result in a fine of 10,000 baht.  Smoking is allowed in the outdoor space.
 6: The normal check-in time is 15.00 pm and the check-out time is 11.00 am (if there are special circumstances, you can communicate with the manager)
sectionedDescription/interaction: 下单后可以通过 社交软件沟通联系

name: 6 bedroom Luxury Villa Ocean View
address: Thalang, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This oceanfront villa features six en-suite bedrooms which are housed in separate pavilions. Lavishly furnished, all rooms are equipped with a minibar, safes and custom-built furniture. Each bedroom boasts high quality mattresses and duck feather duvets. Three of the bedrooms have a seaside balcony ideal for relaxing.

This villa is perfect for groups of friends and families!

En-suite bathrooms are clad in white and stainless steel with Italian style showers which look out over the bay. 

Bedroom 1 – Master Bedroom:
King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Large closet and dressing area with minibar, Outdoor terrace, Panoramic Ocean view

Bedroom 2 – Kids’ Bedroom:
Twin beds, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Panoramic Ocean view

Bedroom 3 – Family Room:
King size bed, Sofa bed (for 2 kids or 1 adult), TV, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Large closet and dressing area with minibar

Bedroom 4 - Guests Bedroom 1:
King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Large closet and dressing area with minibar, Outdoor terrace, Panoramic Ocean view

Bedroom 5 - Guests Bedroom 2:
King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Large closet and dressing area with minibar, Panoramic Ocean view

Bedroom 6 - Guests Bedroom 3:
King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, Large closet and dressing area with minibar, Outdoor terrace, Panoramic Ocean view

The cook has developed a simple in-house menu of local cuisine. The cooking team is happy to accommodate any special requests or dietary needs. Dinner parties and events can be catered to.

The comes complete will full housekeeping service. The housekeepers are in charge of maintaining the 5-star standard of cleanliness and tidiness at the villa. The team also assists the F&B team in servings all form of meals or events.

The villa food is home-style Thai food with a small selection of basic western food. The cook would be happy to make recommendations and help you navigate the Thai dishes available in the villa menu.

Guests enjoy access to the complete villa and all of its facilities and amenities.

Should you have any additional questions or requests before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to me!

The villa lies at the end of a private road in peaceful and quiet surroundings. Overlooking Kamala Bay, one of the most desirable stretches of Phuket's West coast, and enjoys direct access to Kamala Beach by a stepped pathway along the sea.

Is just minutes away from some of the island's finest restaurants, golf clubs and shopping areas, a mere 5 minute drive from trendy Surin Beach and 15 minutes away from the vibrant nightlife in Patong.

Due to its perfect location, the following points of interest are within easy reach:
- Kamala Beach: 5 minutes
- Surin Beach: 5 minutes
- Phuket Fantasea: 10 minutes
-  Patong: 20 minutes
- Jungceylon Shopping Center: 20 minutes
- Phuket Town: 40 minutes
- Central Festival Shopping Centre: 40 minutes
-  Phuket International Airport: 50 minutes

The villa food is home-style Thai food with a small selection of basic western food. The cook would be happy to make recommendations and help you navigate the Thai dishes available in the villa menu.
sectionedDescription/summary:
This oceanfront villa features six en-suite bedrooms which are housed in separate pavilions. Lavishly furnished, all rooms are equipped with a minibar, safes and custom-built furniture. Each bedroom boasts high quality mattresses and duck feather duvets. Three of the bedrooms have a seaside balcony ideal for relaxing.

This villa is perfect for groups of friends and families!

sectionedDescription/description:
Luxurious 5 bedroom villa is located in a beautiful complex in Bang Tao near 5* resort Laguna and just 1 km from Bangtao Beach. The villa is fully equipped with everything necessary for a comfortable stay.
There is green garden, a terrace with a swimming pool and a cozy gazebo, a pool bar and a large gas barbecue in the territory of the villa.

Modern kitchen is fully equipped according to European standards:  
   Oven
   Electric stove
   Dishwasher
   Blender
   Toaster
   Kettle
   Microwave
   Fridge
   Set of frying pans
   Pot set
   Dinnerware set

All 5 bedrooms are bright, spacious and cozy with access to the pool. Three of which are with double beds, one with a queen size bed and one with two single beds.

The amazing master bedroom is equipped with a king size bed, a large walk-in closet, a bathroom with a bathtub and is connected to an additional room that has a work desk and a queen size bed. This room can be used as an office or as an extra bedroom.

The second bedroom with a king size bed has an open-air bathtub in the bathroom.

The third bedroom with a king size bed is located in a separate guest house, also equipped with a cozy sofa with a coffee table and a modern bathroom.

One bedroom in the villa is equipped with two single beds and can be used as a children's room.

The villa is located a 3-minute walk from Boat Avenue with developed infrastructure - restaurants, cafes, shops, a European-style supermarket, massage salons, bars and just in a kilometer from Bangtao Beach.

Upon check-in you should pay security deposit. The security deposit will be a guarantee for the safety of property. The security deposit shall be refunded in check-out time. 

Water and electricity isn't included in price, It should be paid additionally by meters. 
Water - 25 thb per cubic meter
Electricity - 5 thb per kWt

name: Luxury Hillside Stunning View
address: Tambon Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Escape to this stunning 4-bedrooms villa in Kathu's premier residential community. Enjoy complete privacy and tranquility with sweeping views of the mountains and Kathu Valley. The villa features a massive 17-meter pool and large outdoor Jacuzzi nestled into the hillside gardens.

Inside, you'll find luxurious amenities including a fully-equipped modern kitchen, large living and dining spaces, and elegant furnishings throughout. Floor-to-ceiling windows perfectly frame the views and fill the villa with natural light. All 4 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and premium bedding for maximum comfort. 

The villa is located just minutes from Phuket's top golf courses and other local attractions. We only offer short-term rentals of this exclusive property, with nightly rates starting at 20,000 THB per night. Treat yourself to the ultimate luxury getaway in the hills of Kathu! 

Don't miss this opportunity to book your dream vacation. Contact us today to check availability and reserve your dates at this stunning hillside villa!

RATE INCLUDES:
-Cleaning twice per week
-Maintenance of Swimming Pool and Garden
-Drinking water and water fees included
-Towels and linens provided
-Internet wifi, cable tv, and safe
RATE EXCLUDES:
The electricity fee is 6 THB per unit
SERVICES :
- Arranging car and motorbike rental, the price depends on the car/motorbike model and its condition
- Providing airport transfer
- Tours and Activities
-Arranging massage at the villa
-Other special requests like surprise decorations with balloons/flowers can be arranged with extra charge
HOUSE RULES :
-Security Deposit:
A deposit of 12,000 THB (or equivalent to your currency) is required to pay on arrival and it will be returned at check-out.
-Smoking is permitted in the OUTSIDE areas only, Strictly no smoking inside the villa
CHECK-IN/CHECK-OUT:
-Check- in time is 3pm , Check-out time is 11am
-Check-in after 6pm has an extra fee of 1,000 baht
-Check-out before 8am has an extra fee of 1,000 baht
-Late Check-Out has a surcharge and depends on the availability on the check-out day. This will be arranged with the attendant.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Security Deposit 300 euros or 12,000 THB or any equivalent foreign currency, It will be returned after paid electricity fee and no damage in the villa. 
Please note Electricity consumed during your stay will be charged at a cost of 6 thb per unit.

Check-in and check-out: Check- in is done after 3pm , Check-out is done before 11am

Late Check-in or Early Check-out: 
Check-in after 6pm needs an extra fee of 1,000 baths
Check-out before 8am needs an extra fee of 1,000 baths

Do not smoke inside the villa however, smoking is permitted in the outside areas.

name: The Penthouse, Rawai Beach Residence
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This exceptional 4-bedroom luxury apartment has been designed to offer you an unrivalled Thailand holiday experience.

The roof top terrace is completely unique with its beachfront and 360-degree uninterrupted views from its Rawai Beach location. An outdoor kitchen and steam room are all located on the rooftop as well as a large family dining area and luxury outdoor furniture. 

The apartment has use of a beautiful 10 metre shared swimming pool.

Accessed by a private lift, open plan living is optimised by this spacious and luxury fully air conditioned apartment. The large fully equipped kitchen provides everything you would expect combined with amazing sea views. A large 65” Smart TV is in the living room all linked with high-speed internet and a celling recessed Bose speaker sound system. 

Marble floors and high-quality finishes surround you in this exclusive apartment, during the evenings you can indulge in the sea views whilst surrounded by the mood lighting. 

4 large double ensuite bedrooms will provide you with absolute comfort. Each one has their own Smart TV, remote controlled luxury curtains, Air conditioning and mood lighting. Two of the en-suites even include large floor standing luxury baths. 

The apartment has use of a beautiful 10 metre shared swimming pool located within a safe and private courtyard exclusive to the apartment building.  Secure private parking is provided. 

The location is ideal as it is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Rawai beach where you will find restaurants, Spas and supermarkets.

Other things to note
Included in the stay:

Bed linen and towels
Cleaning service every 4 days with change of towels
Sheets are changed once a week
High speed Wi-Fi

Not Included :
Additional services such as tours and day trips can be arranged. 
Car/Motorbike rental or taxi and transfers on request with extra charge.
Additional laundry service can be arranged with collection and drop-off included. 


We have just started charging for electricity, as this is the best way to reduce unnecessary use of air cons, keep costs down and to contribute to save the planet. A picture of the meter reading will be taken on arrival and departure and a charge of 8 THB/unit (kwh) will be made upon departure.

Full access to the apartment.

Additional services such as tours and day trips can be arranged. 
Car/Motorbike rental or taxi and transfers on request with extra charge.

name: Seaview Malaiwana - Duplex (C3), 4BR, Naithon Beach w/ chef
address:
Naithon Beach, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Fully staffed, four-bedroomed luxury duplex apartments in a hillside estate with panoramic views over Naithon Beach, a personal chef, 15m pool and sumptuous bedroom suites. The Duplexes at Malaiwana are vibrant four-bedroomed, 2 storey residences just metres from Naithon Beach on Phuket's idyllic northwest coast. With panoramic sea views from their hillside setting, the Duplexes will appeal to families or groups of friends seeking complete serenity and five-star hospitality. Chill out in the 15-metre pool, entertain in the chic open-plan dining and living areas, or relax in one of the lavish ensuite bedrooms. A team of attentive staff - including a chef - provide first-class service, leaving you free to stroll to the beach, enjoy an evening cocktail and admire the sunset over the Andaman Sea. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury – Daily Continental or Asian breakfast, WiFi internet access, Welcome fruit bowl, Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants, Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities,

**At Elite Havens, we understand that flexibility is required for travel planning in the current COVID-19 scenario, so should your flights be cancelled or a government travel advisory require you to be quarantined, we will convert your booking to a credit note valid for 12 months (same villa, subject to availability). Terms and conditions apply.
. CAPACITY 8 people (2 master suites with king-size beds; 2 ensuite guest rooms with twin beds one of which is convertible to king). LIVING AREAS Open-plan dining and living room with sliding doors to terrace; adjoining kitchen and bar; pool terrace with barbecue, outdoor dining table, lounge seating and sunbeds. POOL 15 x 4m infinity-edged marble pool. ENTERTAINMENT Flat-screen TV. ADDITIONAL FACILITIES Barbecue; safety deposit box. PROPERTY AREA 600 sqm. Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Manager; chef; housekeeping; service staff; pool maintenance. Babysitters and massage/beauty therapists available on request (additional charge).

Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand. The crystal-clear waters of the Andaman Sea and the powder-soft sands of Naithon Beach are in full view from every villa and residence at Malaiwana. Just a short walk or downhill drive away from the estate, this pristine one-kilometre-long beach on Phuket's peaceful northwest coast is perfect for sunning, swimming, snorkelling, stand-up paddling and sandcastle building. A tranquil village atmosphere prevails in this unspoiled corner of the island and the beach road is lined with low-key shops and cafes. Along the coast, numerous hidden coves and beaches are waiting to be discovered.Just up the road, the Trisara Resort offers fabulous dining, and plenty of trendy beachfront restaurants at Bang Tao, eight kilometres to the south. Malaiwana is an easy 20-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.
Airport transfer, car hire and taxi pick-ups are easily arranged with your manager; complimentary buggy shuttle service between the estate entrance and Duplex.
By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules and complete listing content. Our complete booking terms and conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules and complete listing content. 

All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us for any pricing or special requests prior to sending an instant booking request. This includes but is not limited to: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs.  Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience. 

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies. 

All requests are not guaranteed; they are subject for approval and may incur additional charge.  Visit our website for complete terms and conditions.

Villa Dream  in Patong is a 5 bedroom villa with panoramic sunset views over the west coast of the island and verdant tropical gardens making it a truly unique escape. With five spacious bedrooms and four luxuriously appointed bathrooms, it's the perfect option for a small group.
With a private pool table and your own private pool, you'll never want to leave. Just  Gym and sauna right outside the door。

Bedroom 5: 1.8*2m bed, wardrobe, desk, private bathroom

70 square meters super large double kitchen, open kitchen 4-burner induction cooker, oven, microwave oven, coffee machine, toaster. Chinese style kitchen double burner gas stove.

There is an independent private swimming pool, as well as a BBQ grill and barbecue area, and a chef can be booked to cook delicious food for you.

Billiard table, mahjong table, table tennis table, foosball table, large-screen TV, massage chair, children's toy space, to meet the needs of different ages.

Private Massage;
Our property manager will be happy to arrange you In villa massage to make you enjoy the most privacy and relaxation at our resort, the advance arrangement is required.

Tours and activities;
The information will be provided upon requested, we have plenty of Phuket Activities available such as Island Tours, Eco-Tours, Safari, sightseeing, shows and etc.

We have 24 hrs.  front desk.

name: Villa Camellia - Luxury 8 Beds Pool Villa nr beach
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Camellia is a luxury private pool villa sleeping up to 19 guests in 8 bedrooms located within a private estate close to Nai Harn beach.  Daily maid service ensures a relaxing vacation for large groups and families.

A luxury family villa comfortably accommodating large groups or 2 to 3 families looking for ideal indoor and outdoor living. It is the perfect escape to keep all ages relaxed and entertained.

You have a large sun terrace and landscaped gardens, complete with sun beds to soak up the sun, leading to a large infinity edged pool and integral Jacuzzi.  Next to the pool is the sala, containing another dining table for 12, plus ample additional seating, gas BBQ and fridge. This makes an ideal outside setting for evening BBQs and entertaining.

For entertainment there is a games room with a large pool table, dart board and gym equipment and cloak room fitted with a toilet and wash basin.

Accommodation comprises 8 bedrooms, all en-suite with ceiling fans and remote control air conditioning units. Bedrooms are split over two levels, offering 5 king-sized beds, 3 single beds (3.5'), 1 room with queen/single bunk bed, 1 queen size bed and 1 sofa bed therefore comfortably accommodating 19 people.

Upstairs, the master bedroom suite has a king-sized bed, walk-in wardrobes, and large en-suite bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower and large oval bath. Bedroom 2, also upstairs, contains two full single beds and is ideal for young children who need to be closer to their parents at night.

The remaining 6 bedrooms are all on the lower level. Bedrooms 3, 4, 5 and 7 have king-sized beds, with bedroom 3 including an extra single bed (3.5'), large en-suite bathrooms with spacious walk-in showers and built-in wardrobes. Sliding double doors take you directly onto the sun terrace and access to the private swimming pool. Bedroom 6 has a queen/single bunk bed (with a queen bed below and a single bed above, ideal for 3 guests) and an en-suite bathroom that is shared with bedroom 5. Bedroom 8 has a queen sized bed and en-suite bathroom with a shower.

The entertaining games room is also located on the lower level of the villa.

The main living room is upstairs and comes with ample seating to relax and watch the 50" flat screen television with DVD player (including a selection of movies) and satellite TV, as well as a bluetooth speaker system. Additionally, a private TV room with sofa bed is also located on the upper level. Outside you can relax, or dine at the 18-seater dining table, on the under-cover balcony while taking in the valley views.

The fully-fitted luxury Western-style kitchen is fully equipped to meet all your needs, with its own comfortable Thai sitting area to relax in while meals are being prepared.

The Villa also offers wireless internet access landline telephone for local calls, in order to keep in touch with the rest of the world.

Guests have access to the whole villa.

The villa comes with a dedicated housekeeper and our Villa Manager is available to help at any time.

The villa is located within a 3-minute drive, or easy 15-20 minute walk, of Nai Harn beach (voted the BEST beach in Phuket for the last three years), located in the South of Phuket. Nai Harn beach is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island. It not only offers golden sands and azure water, but a selection of restaurants, bars and local shops. Nai Harn beach is a spectacular pristine beach and is a perfect place to unwind, whether it be having a massage or sipping a refreshing beverage in one of the many restaurants that overlook it. It is an ideal spot for surfing at the end of the dry season and offers a perfect secluded bay for mooring yachts. There is an extensive range of both Thai and international restaurants locally along with many beach and viewpoint bars. People flock from all over Phuket to enjoy sundowners at Promthep Cape, the southern most tip of the island, which you can reach in a 5-minute drive from the villa. Many sporting enthusiasts come from all over the world to train at the local Muay Thai camp. Lessons can be taken on a half-day basis.
At nearby villages, Rawai and Chalong, (which are a 5- and 10-minute drive away) you will find long tail and speedboats available, so you can visit any of the beautiful islands a short distance from Phuket. Phuket Island has a wide range of activities to keep guests of all ages entertained. Suggested activities locally include quad biking, golf, fishing trips, spa days, boat hire and horse riding. Additionally, activities such as seeing the elephants in their natural habitat at Phuket's Elephant Sanctuary and further distant boat and adventure trips can be arranged by our Tour Manager. Phuket is a beautiful destination to explore marine life and has many world-class dive sites. Diving excursions can be arranged through reputable dive companies, mainly located in Chalong. At nearby beaches situated across the Island, it is also possible to hire kayaks, take sailing lessons or go kite-surfing and parasailing. Excellent nightlife is not far away in the lively spots of Karon, Kata and Patong, which can all be reached in between 15 to 30 minutes. There are two major shopping malls in Phuket: Central festival is located in the centre of the island and Jungceylon in Patong. Both are large international shopping and entertainment centres with cinemas, restaurants, international and local shops.

We can arrange taxis, motorbikes, scooters, bicycles and minivans, so getting around is easy.

If you wish to make the most of seeing all of Phuket, the most comfortable way is in a private minivan that comes complete with a driver. The price is inclusive of gasoline with unlimited mileage. The minivan can be used for 14 hours a day (from 9am until 11pm) and the cost is 3,000THB (approximately 90 USD) per day. We can arrange one for you with 24-hours notice.

The villa is located in a quiet, secluded valley, but is easily accessible, just over 1 km from Nai Harn Beach. The villa offers privacy and is not over looked by anyone. Far enough away from the main roads, there are no road noises, and it is safe and secure for children. The villa is designed and furnished as a western family home (in Phuket) to give you all your home comforts while experiencing Thailand. The villa has a daily maid and Thai meals can be prepared and served upon request, at a charge.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: - Treat our home as you would your own please! We take a small security deposit in cash on arrival and this will be returned to you in full as long as you do not damage anything.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa comes with a dedicated housekeeper and our Villa Manager is available to help at any time.

name: Villa Padma
address: Paklok A. Thalang, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Every perspective of Villa Padma immerses you in the native beauty of Phuket, Thailand. This magazine-worthy stunner is surrounded the lapping waves of picturesque Cape Yamu and panoramic vistas of the forested Phuket foothills. Hand-carved traditional Thai friezes and sculptures, as well as contemporary artwork, accent the chic design of this luxury Thailand rental. At Villa Padma, every room flows effortlessly into the next, to maximize a sense of togetherness for family and friends.

Villa Padma has four expansive bedrooms, a distinctive sunken sala for lounging, a breathtaking 25-metre pool, and Terrazzo soaking tubs. Lie back on the submersed beds or sunbathe on the spacious pool deck on super-sized luxury couches or daybeds. Plan a soirée under the large covered BBQ pavilion, equipped with a wet bar, fridge and washroom. Play a game of pool or foosball in the games room, or catch the latest release on the 120” projector screen in the screening room, featuring surround sound.

Enjoy delicious Thai cuisine prepared by your private chef in the sleek, open-concept kitchen. The adjacent dining area accommodates eight for a casual lunch or breakfast, or dine more formally in the vaulted great room under a dramatic ox-bone chandelier and drink in the stunning sea-view water terrace. Children’s menus are available for any kids in your group.

The bedrooms have sleek platform beds, with slat patio doors, so you can hear the gentle pulse of the waves as you drift off. And every bedroom has a desk equipped with international sockets as well as Wi-Fi, so you can stay in touch with the outside world while you vacation in paradise. In the bathrooms, a leisurely shower or soak is enhanced by vast rain showerheads or indulgent standalone soaking tubs.

Take in the legendary magic of Thailand's shore at the nearby Surin, Bang Tao and Layan beaches, located only 25 minutes away. For a night out, stop by the nearby Breeze at Cape Yamu restaurant for a selection of Thai and European dishes. In-house massages can be arranged upon request.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM

Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with Terrazzo bath and shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Cable television, Safe, Desk, Dressing area, Ocean view

Bedroom 2: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Cable television, Safe, Ocean view

Bedroom 3: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with Terrazzo bath and shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Cable television, Safe, Garden view

Bedroom 4: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Cable television, Safe, Private deck, Ocean view

Additional Bedding: Folding beds


FEATURES & AMENITIES
• Home theatre
• Study
• Massage area
• Foosball table
• Mahjong table and set
• First aid kit
• Crib


OUTDOOR FEATURES
• Oceanfront
• Water beds
• Outdoor living area
• Garden play area
• Restaurant on premises
• Pier


STAFF & SERVICES 

At Extra Cost – advance notice may be required:
• Massage treatment
• Laundry service
• Access to Fitness and Spa at Point Yuma by COMO
• Food cost (Kindly reference the "Need to know" section)

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.
Please note that all rates, additional services, provisions & all Guest expenses are subject to a 20% provisioning fee, plus 7% VAT, and may be subject to variation.

If there are no damages to the property, the security deposit  amount will be returned to you at the end of your stay by the Villa Manager. 

Please note that this listing requires an on-site security deposit of $2500 prior to arrival via credit card, which will be held and resolved by the Host.

name: 5 BR Modern Private Pool Villa near BangTao Beach
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Modern villas close to Bangtao Beach are luxurious and cozy and spacious which is perfect for families or groups of friends. 

All bedrooms are en-suite bathrooms while the living areas include a fully equipped kitchen, dining room, and lounge with entertainment. 

Outdoor areas such as private pools, gardens, and terraces provide ideal spaces for relaxation. These villas are located in prime locations, offering easy access to the beach and a range of water sports and activities.

This property is a 360 SqM villa with 5 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms

Features;
- Private Pool
- Private Garden
- Full Western Kitchen
- Bathtub
- Washing Machine
- Microwave
- Oven
- TV
- Free WIFI
- Free Pool Cleaning 1-2 time(every Thursday and Saturday/week and Gardening 1 time
- Free electricity, and water usage

100% your private villa

Nearby Locations:

- **7-Eleven:** Right at the alley entrance.
- **PTT Gas Station:** Also at the alley entrance.
- **Laguna Golf Course:** 4 km (10 mins).
- **Porto de Phuket Shopping Center (Central Group):** 2 km (5 mins).
- **Phuket Airport:** 15 km (20 mins).
- **Bang Tao Beach:** 3 km (5-10 mins).
- **Surin Beach:** 6 km (15 mins).
- **Kamala Beach:** 9 km (20 mins).
- **Patong Beach:** 18 km (30 mins).
- **Rawai Beach:** 38 km (50 mins).
- **Central Phuket:** 23 km (30 mins).
- **Phuket Town:** 26 km (40 mins).
- **Naka Market:** 25 km (30 mins).
(Approximate distances)

House Rules

The cost of utilities and services will be as follows:
1. FREE Electricity
2. FREE Water
3. FREE WIFI internet at speed the landlord provides (Included)
4. FREE Pool Cleaning 1-2 time(every Thursday and Saturday/week and Gardening 1 time
Regulations
1. 10,000 baht when smoking inside the building (smoking is allowed outside the poolside)
2. 3,000 baht if anything is found to be thrown into the toilet bowl or if the pipe is blocked.

name: Private Pool Villa*2BR*SeaView
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This 2-bedroom private pool villa is part of a small resort overlooking Patong's vibrant center. Nestled in the tropical rain forest, it offers stunning 180° views of the Andaman's turquoise waters. The tub in front of the full-height front window is the perfect place to unwind!
This is one of our guests' favourite rentals, it is often booked long in advance. We have several units here though. Do not hesitate to contact me to check on availability.

This 220m² villa is perfectly integrated in its natural environment, on a gentle slope. You enjoy full privacy and unblocked views while all the facilities of a five-star resort are at your fingertip. 
The full height glass windows maximise the views of the Andaman Sea while the central air conditioning keeps the atmosphere fresh.
 From the wooden deck, you can jump in your private pool or relax on the bean bags. The sun setting on the liquid horizon offers an unforgettable show before you head for one of the resort's restaurants. 
There is a large bathtub right in front of the window to admire the night lights of Patong's buzzing heart or the ever-changing shimmers of the Indian Ocean. 
The villa has two ensuite bedrooms with king size beds, a lounge area with state-of-the-art TV and a kitchen and dining area. Private meals can also be ordered from the resort's kitchens.

You have access to all the resort facilities starting with a very large feature pool that enjoys expansive views of the town and Patong Bay. Lounge chairs are available on the large wooden deck. But of course, you will probably prefer to enjoy the pleasure of your own private pool.
Several cafés, restaurants and bar-lounger offer a large variety of food and beverage options. A very well-equipped gym occupies a small pavilion with nature and sea views for the perfect work-out. There is also a spa with high end services. And a kid's club.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

The resort is ideally located on Patong's hills, giving easy access to the main beach as well as several secret creeks that are nestled in nature and never crowded: Paradise, Merlin, Tri Trang and Freedom Beaches.
Patong's centre, known for its nightlife, quality restaurants and shopping spots, could not be closer.

We offer free shuttle service to Patong center.
A vehicle is therefore not necessary but can be nice to venture further and discover the rest of Phuket
We can help with these arrangements and your vehicle will be directly delivered to the resort. If you prefer not to drive, we can help you get a taxi at any time, it is not expensive at all. The apps GRAB and BOLT are also available in Phuket.

There is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price.
Children and infants are welcome, and we can provide a baby cot and a baby chair upon request. There is no extra charge for children, under 4 years old, sharing an existing bed.
A security deposit is required upon check-in. The deposit will be fully refunded upon check-out, subject to a property inspection.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favourite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9am to 6pm for any question you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling and helpful.
Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Our goal is to provide you with high standard accommodation, together with quality hotel services and a personal touch, to ensure you have the best possible conditions for an enjoyable holiday.
A security deposit is required upon check-in. The deposit will be fully refunded upon check-out, subject to a property inspection.

sectionedDescription/description:
Few things say "tropical paradise" quite like white-sand beaches, azure seas and an intimate luxury resort. Welcome
to the multi-award-winning The Pavilions Phuket, located 20min from Phuket International Airport and your indulgent escape on one of Thailand's most beautiful islands.
Perched dramatically atop one of Phuket's highest points,
our private villas and suites is a haven of tranquility.

Hotel facilities

Private butler service

The villa is located in the renowned 5 star "Pavilions Resort" which provides housekeeping, pool service, gardening etc. This residence has the best view of all the villas in Pavilions. It is a 3 bed room with Office area pool villa, total internal area 314 sqm, total built-up area 595 sqm, total land area 666 sqm.

Including airport pick up service.

Utilities need to be paid by tenants.

The cost of Electricity THB 7 per one cubic meter.
The cost of Water supply THB 50 per one cubic meter

address: Phuket, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
Take advantage of this magnificent beach front location. My apartment is located in a beachfront brand new luxurious resort with 2 outdoor swimming pools. Breathtaking views of the ocean. Free buffet international breakfast for 2 persons included in the price. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, and the coziness. Special and really unique. Very peaceful and secure area. Beach bar and restaurant, gym and office lounge. Free daily housekeeping. Free shuttle bus every hour

Are you ready for spectacular sunsets and plenty of fun in the water? This is a 75 square meters modern apartment with high quality finishing, design, fixtures and fittings throughout, including quality king size bed, modern bathroom with shower, balcony with table and chairs, fridge, Tea/Coffee maker, sofa, 2 large screen TV, dining table and chairs.
The whole estate is new and well designed.
The place is located right on the beach and very close to the famous Cafe del Mar beach club. Multiple bar and dining locations at walking distance but also very nice and quiet.
Free daily housekeeping.
Laundry service is available in the building for a fee.

Guests can use all facilities including Beach Restaurant Café and Bar, Gym/ Yoga Studio, Spa Pavilions, Library and Lounge, Outdoor event spaces
Free parking.
Breakfast is included in the price.

Available anytime guests need my support.

This is the best condominium in Phuket, situated right on the beach in walking distance to restaurants and a famous beach club.
Extra bed available for a 3rd person, for a fee, including breakfast.

sectionedDescription/description:
Ocean views stun from this seaside villa. An outdoor bar, pool table, and sound system are the perfect combo for a lively party. The capacious infinity pool features a glass bottom that filters light below. Spend the day sightseeing, perusing Phuket’s markets, or letting your taste buds explore local cuisine. Effortlessly enjoy your stay with a live-in chef and butler attending to your every need.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Walk-in closet, Terrace, Ocean view
• Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Terrace, Ocean view
• Bedroom 3: King size bed, 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Ocean view
• Bedroom 4: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Terrace, Ocean view
• Bedroom 5: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Terrace, Ocean view

• Pool maintenance

address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
Treat yourself to rest and relaxation.

The residence was built in harmony with nature, a combination of Balinese style with the surrounding greenery, birds singing during the day and frogs croaking in the evening.
Come and taste the silence of peace.

A facility with its own swimming pool, water jets, waterfall. The large space gives the unique atmosphere of our Residence, which you will not find in villas.

Local products provided first time welcome in the fridge.
Full support in English.

The residence is located in the Rawai region on a large plot fenced with a high wall, giving complete privacy and security. Built in the Balinese style, thanks to which we are whole soul and heart in Asia.

Everywhere, an additional green space at the entrance to the Residence, playing ball with children, whatever your heart desires.

1. Cleaning the house every day 2. Change of linen and towels once a week.
3. Pool cleaning once a week.

name: Bluesiam Villa–5 Beds,closest to Surin beach (SHA)
address: Phuket, *, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Bluesiam Villa sits on a hill overlooking a prestigious Surin Beach.
One of the only private villas in the area that can give you 100% sea-view with 100% privacy and in walking distance to the beach.
A private villa that accommodates up to 22+ people with all 11 bedrooms facing the ocean and various in-house facilities you could enjoy.
With our Villa Manager and his team at your service to ensure your well-being and provide the best comfort like no others.

Rental prices upon bedrooms use.

Bluesiam Villa is a rare find, an 11 bedrooms, 5 storeys villa with full facilities includes:
Free high-speed Wi-Fi, parking space, swimming pool with Jacuzzi, pool table, fully equipped kitchen, cinema room, spa room, sauna, BBQ, fitness and in-villa sound system.

Guest have full access to the villa facility no matter how many bedrooms booked.
To go to the beach, the guest can simply walk to the security box to the beach.
It is also walking distance to convenient stores (7-Eleven & Family Mart) & restaurants.

Our staff are at the villa from 9am-9pm every day, they will be at the staff area on the main floor standing by if there's any service the guest may need, in the same time keeping an optimum distance from the guest for privacy.
For any emergency, the Villa manager can be contacted 24hours and he/she will be at the villa within 15 mins.

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 10 cars.

Maybe some construction noises nearby until the end of May 2019.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Our staff are at the villa from 9am-9pm every day, they will be at the staff area on the main floor standing by if there's any service the guest may need, in the same time keeping an optimum distance from the guest for privacy.
For any emergency, the Villa manager can be contacted 24hours and he/she will be at the villa within 15 mins.
