Bluesiam Villa is a rare find, an 11 bedrooms, 5 storeys villa with full facilities includes:
Free high-speed Wi-Fi, parking space, swimming pool with Jacuzzi, pool table, fully equipped kitchen, cinema room, spa room, sauna, BBQ, fitness and in-villa sound system.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Bluesiam Villa sits on a hill overlooking a prestigious Surin Beach.
One of the only private villas in the area that can give you 100% sea-view with 100% privacy and in walking distance to the beach.
A private villa that accommodates up to 22+ people with all 11 bedrooms facing the ocean and various in-house facilities you could enjoy.
With our Villa Manager and his team at your service to ensure your well-being and provide the best comfort like no others.

Rental prices upon bedrooms use.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 10 cars.

name: Katamanda - Villa Amanzi, 6BR, Kata w/ chef
address: Tambon Karon, A. Muang Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Sumptuous, sea view pool villa in Kata, Phuket, with impressive living spaces, seven bedrooms, an elevator, a spa and a barbeque sala.This villa offers a reduced 6-bedroom option for smaller groups. Villa Amanzi is a sumptuous hillside haven within the secure Katamanda Estate with magnificent views over Kata Noi Beach on the beautiful island of Phuket. From its impressive reception and huge indoor-outdoor living areas to the chic bar, modern kitchen and seven guest suites, every inch of this luxurious villa is designed to impress. An indulgent holiday getaway for large family groups and friends, it offers an elevator, flexible bed configurations, kids' equipment, and professional in-villa staff including a chef. Sunset views from the impressive 13-metre infinity pool are just one of the reasons you will never want to leave.

The 7-bedroom Katamanda - Villa Amanzi offers a reduced 6-bedroom option for smaller families or groups. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily Continental or Asian breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of 6 bedrooms and listed facilities
.


FULL VILLA CAPACITY

14 people (7 ensuite bedrooms: six kings and one with twin beds). Extra beds are available for an additional charge.

The 6 bedroom option sleeps 12 guests. 1 rooms will be locked and will not be used.

LIVING AREAS

Lounge with bar and study corner; formal dining for 10 overlooking the pool; outdoor dining and barbecue sala with bar and pool table; shaded pool terrace with sofa suites; all with superb sea views.



ENTERTAINMENT

Large flat-screen satellite channel TV in living room; flat-screen TVs in the master suites and two guest bedrooms; Bang & Olufsen entertainment system; Bose speakers.  Pool table and table tennis.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Barbecue; safety deposit box; access to the estate clubhouse with fitness centre, tennis court, caf? and swimming pool.



PROPERTY AREA

1200sqm (villa); 1700sqm (land).



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa Manager (on-call); chef and assistant chef; housekeeping; service staff; gardener and pool maintenance.  Babysitters and massage/beauty therapists available on request (additional charge).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Peace and privacy are assured at Villa Amanzi, set within the secure and luxuriantly landscaped Katamanda Estate with unfettered views over Kata Noi Bay. The golden sands of Kata Noi Beach, one of Phuket's finest, are just 800m away, while the larger Kata Beach lies just a little further to the north. Both Kata Noi and Kata beaches are known for their lovely sunsets and excellent surfing conditions during the south-west monsoon months from May until October. Making the most of those spectacular views, some of the island's best restaurants have sprung up on the beachfront and headland around Kata Noi, while the resort town of Kata offers several more dining, shopping and entertainment choices.

Airport transfers, car hire and taxi pick-ups can easily be arranged with your villa manager at small cost.

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter, BBQ.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
Please note that the rates shown here is for the 6-bedroom option. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa Manager (on-call); chef and assistant chef; housekeeping; service staff; gardener and pool maintenance.  Babysitters and massage/beauty therapists available on request (additional charge).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand

roomType: Private room in bed and breakfast
sectionedDescription/description:
You’ll love the stylish decor of this charming place. My studio is in a brand new beachfront resort located in the best-rated area, on the beach road Patong Beach. Continental, Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Asian, American, Buffet included in the price, eat as much as you can. Sea view infinity pool. Special and really unique. Easy to walk to the centre of nightlife. Very quiet, peaceful and secure area. Restaurant, Bar, Pool Bar, Gym, Parking. Daily housekeeping.

This is a 30 square meters modern studio with high quality finishing, design, fixtures and fittings throughout, including quality king size bed, modern bathroom with shower. Minibar, Tea/Coffee maker, sofa, large screen TV, small dining table and chairs.
Inner courtyard view
The whole estate is new and well designed.
The place is close to the main Bangla street in Patong and nearby beach but also very nice and quiet.
Free daily cleaning and towel change.
Laundry service is available in the building for a fee.
- Clothes iron on request

Guests can use all facilities including gym, restaurants, bars, swimming pools.
Free parking.
Breakfast is included in the price.

sectionedDescription/description:
Take advantage of this magnificent beach front location. My apartment is located in a beachfront brand new luxurious resort with 2 outdoor swimming pools. Breathtaking views of the ocean. Free buffet international breakfast for 2 persons included in the price. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, and the coziness. Special and really unique. Very peaceful and secure area. Beach bar and restaurant, gym and office lounge. Free daily housekeeping. Free shuttle bus every hour

Are you ready for spectacular sunsets and plenty of fun in the water? This is a 75 square meters modern apartment with high quality finishing, design, fixtures and fittings throughout, including quality king size bed, modern bathroom with shower, balcony with table and chairs, fridge, Tea/Coffee maker, sofa, 2 large screen TV, dining table and chairs.
The whole estate is new and well designed.
The place is located right on the beach and very close to the famous Cafe del Mar beach club. Multiple bar and dining locations at walking distance but also very nice and quiet.
Free daily housekeeping.

Guests can use all facilities including Beach Restaurant Café and Bar, Gym/ Yoga Studio, Spa Pavilions, Library and Lounge, Outdoor event spaces
Free parking.
Breakfast is included in the price.

Available anytime guests need my support.

This is the best condominium in Phuket, situated right on the beach in walking distance to restaurants and a famous beach club.
Extra bed available for a 3rd person, for a fee, including breakfast.

name: KT Villa1: 三卧海景别墅/精美装修、中文房东、高性价比
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅位于卡塔海滩，坐落在普吉岛西南方，近沙滩，附近既有冲浪胜地“卡塔海滩”又有适合自由潜水的“奈阳”海滩，背山面海，奢华装修，魅力泳池，和家人朋友休闲度假入住真是非常惬意。别墅由著名设计师精心设计打造，采用高档材料建造。

别墅位于普吉岛三大海滩之一______卡塔海滩，共 3 层建筑，占地面积550平米，可270度观安达曼海全景，拥有碧海蓝天的绝佳风景。
这栋漂亮的海滩别墅可入住6人，共设有3间卧室，每间卧室都配有独立卫生间，是你家庭聚会的首选住所;客厅采用大面积的观海落地窗，最大限度开阔视野；主卧开窗即可观海，躺在床上碧绿的大海和蓝天一览无余;超大的观景露台，把阳光、蓝天、白云盛满，蓝色的无边际泳池面朝大海，躺在太阳椅上，与阳光玩游戏，惬意私享静谧； 公共空间豪华宽敞，拥有超大的多功能客厅，屋顶露台，休憩区，无边泳池、烧烤箱、现代化开放式厨房等.....在这里，泳池趴、私人派对、高端会议无所不能。
别墅交通便利，周边娱乐设施丰富，拥有24小时便利店（711、family），海鲜餐厅、海滩夜市等，步行2分钟即可到达海滩。距离机场仅40分钟，距离芭东海滩20分钟，绝佳的观景视野，私密的奢华享受，让你吹着普吉岛的海风看着日出开启你的度假之旅！

房源展现的空间，区域都是您享有，跟在自己家里一样自由支配。

从您预定咨询开始到入住接待直至最后退房，全程有中文管家竭诚为您服务。

距离卡塔冲浪海滩2分钟车程
距离卡伦观景平台5分钟车程
距离拉微海鲜市场10分钟车程
距离芭东海滩15分钟车程
距离普吉机场40分钟车程

周边tutu车或者mini bus众多，出行方便；也可租车自驾出行，当地网络约车也非常方便，本人常用“inDrive”，悄悄告诉你，便宜又快捷。

提倡节约用电，杜绝不必要的消耗，外出不在家里的时候记得关闭空调！使用空调的时候记得关闭门窗哦！我们将根据您入住和退房时的电表数值得出您所使用的电量，收取8泰铢/度的电费！另外入住的时候会收10000泰铢的住房押金，退房时管家查房，没有问题就如数退回！
sectionedDescription/interaction: 从您预定咨询开始到入住接待直至最后退房，全程有中文管家竭诚为您服务。

sectionedDescription/description:
SELECT YOUR APARTMENT TYPEDELUXE PENTHOUSES | BALCONY POOL VIEW | POOL LEVEL GARDEN
BANGTAO BEACH GARDENS - HOLIDAY IN PARADISE.
Bangtao Beach Gardens is located on Bangtao beach, a magnificent, 8 kilometer-long crescent shaped bay with pure white sand, fringed with Casuarina trees. Bang Tao is one of Phuket's longest, least developed and most beautiful beaches.

Bangtao Beach Gardens is a residential estate of modern spacious apartments on three levels; Ground or 1st floor called Garden Terrace; 2nd floor Balcony Pool Views and 3rd floor Penthouse Rooftops. This resort is located less than 200m from Bangtao Beach boasts superb swimming pools, gymnasium facilities and beautiful garden surroundings against a backdrop of tropical mountains. Each serviced apartment has two en-suite bedrooms, European kitchen facilities and large dining / living areas as well as garden terraces or balconies.

Reception open from 9 am to 5 pm

name: Modern Luxury 3 bedroom luxury pool villa
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
This villa (250 sqm) features a comfortable living area and 3 full size bedrooms each with ensuite bathrooms. A variety of covered and semi covered outdoor areas will make you enjoy the gorgeous pool and the lush garden surrounding you.

This villa is perfect for groups of friends and families!

This contemporary and luxurious 3 bedroom pool villa, is located within a small villa complex overlooking Rawai bay, offering accommodation for 6 guests.

Our villa is designed to create a combination of western technology and tropical Asian styling. Generous outdoor living areas with pool and a manicured tropical garden will make you relax in a seamless indoor/outdoor living lifestyle. If you are looking for a quiet and beautiful retreat in luxury, you found the right place.

Guests enjoy complete access to the entire villa and all of its amenities and facilities:
-  Utilities, Wifi (Dedicated Fiber Optic 50Mbps/20Mbps) and Satellite TV
- Fully equipped kitchen incl. dish washer
- Laundry room with washing machine
- Outdoor BBQ
- Air Conditioners in all rooms
- Full back up power generator
- 55" Samsung LCD + J.B.L Home theatre
- 3 bedrooms in total
- 250 sqm of living space
- an 8 meter long pool with water feature
- Sundeck pool lounges, pool towels
- Outdoor BBQ

Should you have any questions or extra needs before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact me!

Due to the perfect location of these villas, the following points of interest can be found close to the villas:
- Markets: Tesco Lotus Chalong, Villa Market, Makro Food, local markets (5-10 min) with complimentary Van service.
- Beaches: Naiharn Beach (10 min) and Kata beach (15-20 min) with complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- High concentration of local shops in Rawai, Chalong and Naiharn : Massage, gyms, muay-thai, Seafood Market, souvenirs (5-10 min), with complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- Sightseeing: Chalong Peer (boats for Islands), Phromthep Cape, Windmill viewpoint, complimentary limousine van drop off service.
- Big Buddha, Chalong Temple (5-15 min), complimentary van drop off service.

We provide a complimentary daily limousine van drop off service upon request to the nearby Beaches: Naiharn Beach (10 min) and Kata beach (15-20 min)

The following services are included in the rates:
- Daily cleaning
- Welcome fruits and cold towels on arrival
- Personal welcome by our staff
- Concierge service from our on site team
- Complimentary limousine service for short trips (non available for monthly 
 rates)
- 24 hours on site security

Our on-site team is happy to arrange any other services for you upon additional charges:
- Airport transfer (1400 THB per Van transfer with a maximum of 10 pax per Van).
- Breakfast is available on request (300 THB per person)
- In house dining with private Chef available for lunch and dinner (990 THB per person)
- Private in house massage (from 800 THB per hour).
- Grocery shopping, Tour arrangements, Car and Motorbike rental, Taxi service can be arranged for your convenience.

Within 5 minute walk, find a charming supermarket and various bars and restaurants. name: Amazing Two Bed Pool Villa in Patong  芭東市中心單臥泳池別墅
address: Pa Tong, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our SHA Extra Plus 220 sqm Two Bed Pool villa features a separate living room, two bathroom with bathtub and walk-in shower, a spacious outdoor deck and garden where friends or family with up to three children will be having plenty of fun. Jump in your own private pool or simply join others for a mojito at our Main Pool Bounce Bar..

Welcome to Paradise… Welcome to our little oasis located steps away from most famous Patong Beach and entertainment areas. Enjoy a relaxing stay and count on our team to assist when needed.

As Villa guests, you will have access to all Resort’s facilities, from main pool to Gym and Kid’s club, our award winning Ryn Spa, our All-day Bubbles restaurant if you need to or simply our 24/7 in-room dining services. Chouchou at the Lobby is one of Phuket’s most famous bakery shop and breakfast options there are really unique.

As a Resort, our team members will be available 24/7 and we do provide concierge services but also In-Room dining experiences throughout the day and night!

Right in the center of bustling Patong, our location gives you easy access to both Patong beach, Entertainment zones & shopping Malls, all within 10 minute walk.
With its unique location, Patong also acts as a hub for the entire island with easy transfers to nearby beaches like Karon and Kata but also other activities like the Fresh Food market called Banzaan or the recently opened Elephant Sanctuary a little up North in Cherngtalay.
We also have plenty of options when it comes to nearby island hopping (Phi-Phi, Coral, Racha, The similan islands)

We are part of a large 5* Resort, yet wanted to keep those unique Pool villas as much afar from the rest as we could! With green gardens and tropical landscapes all around, you will be able to relax and enjoy the privacy of your own Villa while benefiting from the same level of excellence & service other guests have.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Smoking only allowed on the outdoor Terrace
No pets allowed
No party or events
Check-out time 11:00 AM
Outside visitors must be registered

name: Seaview haven Villa Saan, 8BR, Kamala w/ chef
address:
Kamala, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Stunning architecture and superb ocean views define eight-bedroom Villa Saan. Facilities at this fully staffed villa include a 19m pool, cinema, spa room and gym.

Contact us for reduced occupancy rates for smaller group size. High above the ocean on Phuket`s west coast, every room at the stunning eight-bedroomed Villa Saan commands breathtaking views. The villa`s spectacular entrance, cool 19-metre infinity-edge pool, state-of-the-art home cinema and bar with pool table, well-equipped gym with spa bed will take your breath away too. All eight of the spacious bedrooms have ocean views from glass-fronted private furnished balconies, and the master suite boasts a sparkling jacuzzi. This villa is very suitable for corporate retreats, special celebrations and groups of friends joining together, with easy access to the neighbouring villa Samira. A team of staff is on hand to pamper guests with fine cuisine, keep the villa pristine and offer a concierge service for guests wishing to explore the many delights that Phuket has to offer. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

16 people (8 bedrooms: 5 king-bedded suites; 1 queen-bedded rooms and 2 twin rooms convertible to king). Two extra beds are available at extra cost.



LIVING AREAS

Living room; indoor dining for 12; cinema; games room; furnished pool terrace, lounge and barbecue area; gym with spa facilities.



POOL

Main pool 17m x 4m



ENTERTAINMENT

Cinema with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TVs in media room, games room and gym; novels, magazines and coffee-table books.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and master bedroom; barbecue; safety deposit boxes.



PROPERTY AREA

1800sqm (villa); 2200sqm (land)



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security. Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Saan sits within the exclusive Cape Amarin estate on the ?Millionaires' Mile' headland separating Kamala and Patong beaches.  With panoramic sea and sunset views, the villa overlooks a small bay, where the roofs of some of Phuket's finest resorts and villas peep through the tropical treetops that border the ocean.  Just six kilometres to the north sits Kamala Beach, a pretty stretch of soft golden sand popular with families.  Try surfing, body boarding, simply relaxing on the sand, or indulge in some Thai seafood (or pizza!) at one of the casual open-air restaurants lining the beach.  A bit further away to the south is the hectic Patong Beach, with a good range of water sports, shopping, dining and nightlife choices.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security. Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

name: Villa Sawarin -  Luxury Villa with 10 Bedrooms
address: Paklok , Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Located on the tip of the Yamu peninsula on the east coast of Phuket Island in Thailand, Villa Sawarin has a unique interior and exterior perfect as a luxury private holiday destination.

The unique blend of contemporary design and Thai style charm created by  Jean Michel Gathy and Tim Beaumont  causes a visual excitement. With over 3845 square meters of indoor and outdoor space, this unique villa offers awe-inspiring views of the crystal clear waters of the Phang Nga Bay. It features three acres of perfectly manicured tropical gardens, eight large and chic bedrooms and some of the most stunning display of sunrise and sunset.


Upon entering the villa you’ll discover breathtaking living and dining areas and a fully stocked kitchen that comes with a gourmet chef. The villa offers delicious cuisine as well as twenty-four-hour concierge services. It comes complete with the latest enhancements in technology and it’s replete with all the comfort that you can imagine. Transporting you to a beautiful oasis of tranquility, the villa offers its very own golf practice green, botanical garden and private spa room.


Located adjacent to the villa, is the five-star COMO Resort that offers alternative dining experiences in its gourmet restaurants and clubs. Although the villa has its own infinity pool, outdoor dining sala, private spa, and gymnasium, guests at Villa Sawarin can access additional amenities at the COMO Resort.


The strategic location of the villa allows guests to enjoy panoramic views and spectacular blues of the skies and the ocean. Less than twenty minutes away guests can enjoy the best Asian golf courses as well as yacht services from the local yacht ports. The villa is easily accessible due to its proximity to the Phuket International airport. The regular business traveler who wants to get away will be provided with a reaffirmation that he has discovered paradise in Villa Sawarin.


Villa Sawarin where excellence and luxury meet ultimate leisure and relaxation. It’s the perfect retreat for friends and family looking to reconnect in a stunning private setting.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Smoking is NOT permitted inside the villa. Smoking is only allowed outside on the grounds, where an ash tray can be provided by the Villa Manager.

name: Baan Paa Talee
address: Kamala, Kathu, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Contemporary cliffside villa near Kamala Beach

Peer out from a shaded daybed at swirls of white seawater churning below this modernist retreat. Designed by renowned builder Arne Carpenter, the villa rises from the cliffside with peaked roofs, terraced lookouts, and open-air pavilions. Let the chef work a little magic while you lounge by the saltwater infinity pool and the kids climb the treehouse, then take the stairs or bikes to the beach.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM

Main House

Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom, Alfresco Shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Private terrace

Bedroom 2 - Primary: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom, Stand-alone shower, Alfresco Shower, Walk-in Closet, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Private terrace, Attached office,View of Ocean

Bedroom 3: King size bed, Jack & Jill bathroom shared with bedroom 4, Stand-alone shower & bathtub, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan

Bedroom 4: King size bed, Jack & Jill bathroom shared with bedroom 3, Stand-alone shower & bathtub, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan

Bedroom 5: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan

Bedroom 6: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan

Bedroom 7: 2 King size beds, 2 Mosquito Nets, Ensuite bathroom, Stand-alone shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Kitchenette

Guest House

Bedroom 8: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom, Stand-alone shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Shared kitchen and living room area with bedroom 9

Bedroom 9: King size bed, Mosquito Net, Ensuite bathroom, Stand-alone shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Shared kitchen and living room area with bedroom 8

FEATURES & AMENITIES
• Juicer
• Iron & Ironing Board
• Lush Gardens
• Massage table
• More under “What this place offers” below


OUTDOOR FEATURES
• Jetted Spa Bath 
• Terrace
• 2 Level tree sala
• 2 Bicycles


STAFF & SERVICES

At Extra Cost – advance notice may be required:
• Driving service
• Airport transfer
• Babysitting service
• Activities & excursions
• Groceries and beverages - subject to an additional 20%+tax service fee

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).

name: Maya Anda Villa-7 Beds Sea View (SHA Certified)
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Designed by the multi-award winning Gary Fell of GFAB Architects with experiences over South East Asia. Maya Anda Villa offers a full panoramic view of Surin Beach, one of the most prestigious beaches in Phuket. With
high society neighborhood and close proximity to top restaurants and supermarkets. The villa offers top quality finishes and facilities.

Host will be present during the reservation period

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 3 cars.

Unless agreed otherwise by the Lessor, check in time is 14:00 and check out time is 12:00. Early arrival or late departure will depend upon availability of the villa. The early check in from 08:00 and late check out before 18:00 fee is 50% of the daily rate. Before 08:00 and after 18:00, the full daily rate is applicable.

In case of booking less than 11 bedrooms, the rooms will be chosen and prepared by the villa only.

For security reasons, guests are not allow to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ etc. Otherwise, will be charged 1,500 THB per staff per hour.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20%.

Linen and towels are provided at the Villa. The linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Smoking is not permitted at any time inside the villa. Guests are allowed to smoke outdoors only and the villa manager will provide an ashtray. If guests are smoking at any time inside the villa, they will be required to pay 20,000 THB per room as a fine.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage. Any damage to artworks and antiques during the rental period will be the responsibility of the guest.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

name: Villa Arteed
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Flanked by towering palm trees, the glistening pool of this top-tier Phuket villa instantly welcomes new arrivals with captivating blue pool and sweeping garden views. Begin the day with a refreshing dip, before taking breakfast in the shaded poolside dining area. Room after room of luxury comfort awaits, while 2 world class beaches plus a profusion of restaurants and bars are just moments away.

Glorious Phuket sunshine gently wakes newly-arrived guests at Villa Arteed, with comfortable bedrooms outfitted with subtle Thai decor, rich furnishings and and an abundance of space. Passing through the richly decorated living spaces and artfully-outfitted stairwell, guests can make the most of the massive kitchen, before relaxing on the sumptuous love-seats that pepper the open-air sheltered terrace. As the breeze ruffels the palm fronds that surround the villa, guests can choose to hit the in-house gym, have a blast in the games room, unwind in the villa’s mini spa, or simply dive into the entertainment system in the fully-outfitted TV room.

Located on Phuket’s happening western coast, this villa offers fantastic access to some of the very best beaches in Thailand, including Patong Beach and Karon Beach. An impressive range of restaurants, bars and nightclubs are within a few minutes’ drive, while outgoing guests are spoilt for choice with the range of nightlife options that fill the surrounding neighborhoods. Less than 30 minutes drive from the bustling city of Phuket, guests can explore the markets and bustling squares of that island metropolis, as well as the island’s fabled offshore cruises. These include day-trips to the stunning Phi Phi islands, where beautiful beaches are ringed by majestic limestone cliffs. After a day exploring what this lush part of Thailand has to offer, guests can retire to the gently-lit patio for a freshly-made cocktail as the moon shines down on the nearby beaches.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1- master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Walk-in closet, Safe, Desk, Television, Lounge area, Private terrace, Outdoor furniture, Sea view
• Bedroom 2 - master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Safe, Ceiling fan, Desk, Lounge area, Television, Private balcony, Outdoor furniture, Pool view
• Bedroom 3: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Walk-in closet, Safe, Ceiling fan, Television, Garden view, Direct access to pool area
• Bedroom 4: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Safe, Ceiling fan, Desk, Television, Private terrace, Outdoor furniture, Sea view
• Bedroom 5: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Safe, Ceiling fan, Desk, Lounge area, Television, Private terrace, Outdoor furniture, Garden view, Direct access to pool area
• Bedroom 6: 2 Twin over queen size bunk beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Walk-in closet, Safe, Ceiling fan, Desk

Additional bedding
• TV room: 2 Twin size Murphy beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Ceiling fan, Television

name: Seaview haven Villa Saan, 6BR, Kamala w/ chef
address:
Kamala, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Stunning architecture and superb ocean views define eight-bedroom Villa Saan. Facilities at this fully staffed villa include a 19m pool, cinema, spa room and gym.This villa offers a reduced 6-bedroom option for smaller groups. High above the ocean on Phuket`s west coast, every room at the stunning eight-bedroomed Villa Saan commands breathtaking views. The villa`s spectacular entrance, cool 19-metre infinity-edge pool, state-of-the-art home cinema and bar with pool table, well-equipped gym with spa bed will take your breath away too. All eight of the spacious bedrooms have ocean views from glass-fronted private furnished balconies, and the master suite boasts a sparkling jacuzzi. This villa is very suitable for corporate retreats, special celebrations and groups of friends joining together, with easy access to the neighbouring villa Samira. A team of staff is on hand to pamper guests with fine cuisine, keep the villa pristine and offer a concierge service for guests wishing to explore the many delights that Phuket has to offer.

The 8-bedroom Villa Saan offers a reduced 6-bedroom option for smaller families or groups. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of 6 bedrooms and listed facilities
.


FULL VILLA CAPACITY

16 people (8 bedrooms: 5 king-bedded suites; 1 queen-bedded rooms and 2 twin rooms convertible to king). Two extra beds are available at extra cost.

The 6 bedroom option sleeps 12 guests. 2 rooms will be locked and will not be used.

LIVING AREAS

Living room; indoor dining for 12; cinema; games room; furnished pool terrace, lounge and barbecue area; gym with spa facilities.



POOL

Main pool 17m x 4m



ENTERTAINMENT

Cinema with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TVs in media room, games room and gym; novels, magazines and coffee-table books.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and master bedroom; barbecue; safety deposit boxes.



PROPERTY AREA

1800sqm (villa); 2200sqm (land)



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security. Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Saan sits within the exclusive Cape Amarin estate on the ?Millionaires' Mile' headland separating Kamala and Patong beaches.  With panoramic sea and sunset views, the villa overlooks a small bay, where the roofs of some of Phuket's finest resorts and villas peep through the tropical treetops that border the ocean.  Just six kilometres to the north sits Kamala Beach, a pretty stretch of soft golden sand popular with families.  Try surfing, body boarding, simply relaxing on the sand, or indulge in some Thai seafood (or pizza!) at one of the casual open-air restaurants lining the beach.  A bit further away to the south is the hectic Patong Beach, with a good range of water sports, shopping, dining and nightlife choices.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
Please note that the rates shown here is for the 6-bedroom option. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security. Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

name: Villa Samira
address: Kathu, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Contemporary Thai villa above the bay

A contemporary variation on classic Thai themes, this villa maxes out its panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal. A wide open great room is entirely alfresco, with a reflection pond in the center flanked by stepping stones and staircases above. Rest a cool drink on the ledge of your oversized jacuzzi or dip in the 19-meter infinity pool and take it all in. Quiet Kamala Beach is just a 4-mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual vanity, Jetted plunge pool, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean
• Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual vanity, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean
• Bedroom 3: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual vanity, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean
• Bedroom 4: King size bed (or two twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual vanity, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean
• Bedroom 5: King size bed (or two twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual Vanity, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean
• Bedroom 6: King size bed (or two twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Dual vanity, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).

name: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/24503498
Clifftop haven Villa Minh, 6BR, Kamala w/ chef
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This stunning six-bedroom villa overlooks the ocean on an exclusive estate. With a private chef and fantastic facilities, the villa is close to vibrant Patong. This awe-inspiring six-bedroom villa spans five luxurious levels and hovers above the ocean on a secluded Kamala headland on Phuket`s famous 'Millionaires Mile'. You`ll have no choice but to succumb to Villa Minh`s considerable charms: each component of this grand home has been exquisitely detailed with care and thought given to integrating the modern Asian design within its beautiful natural surroundings and amazing sunset views. The villa offers a large living and dining room, TV and pool table room as well as a relaxing spa. Fully staffed Villa Minh offers the privacy of an exclusive estate. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

12 people (6 bedrooms: 4 with king-size beds, 1 with one queen-size bed, and 1 with two queen-size beds). An extra bed is available at a small cost.



LIVING AREAS

Living and dining room; cinema and games room; massage sala; large pool deck; modern kitchen with breakfast bar.



POOL

17.5m x 4m.



ENTERTAINMENT

Satellite TVs; Blu-ray and DVD players; iPod dock; home cinema room; pool table.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Barbecue; 2 massage beds; safety deposit box.



PROPERTY AREA

1,213sqm (land).



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; chef; housekeeping and service staff. 24-hour estate security. Additional staff (babysitter, masseuse) available on request at extra charge.



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand. Villa Minh lies within the Jomchang Estate along Phuket's exclusive west-coast headland known as the Millionaires' Mile.  Its hillside location offers panoramic sea views and seclusion, yet the resort towns and bustling beaches of Kamala and Patong are reached within a 20-minute drive.  Kamala, to the north of the villa, is a low-key town with casual seaside dining spots and surf/boogie board rentals, while Patong, to the south, is the hub for Phuket's nightlife, dining and shopping, with plenty of water sports to enjoy on the beach

Airport transfers, car hire and taxi pick-ups can easily be arranged with your villa manager.

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; chef; housekeeping and service staff. 24-hour estate security. Additional staff (babysitter, masseuse) available on request at extra charge.



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

name: Signature 3-bedroom beach villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This unique 3-bedroom beach villa has a style all its own. Your infinity pool and terrace extends down to the beach, giving you a private beachfront sanctuary for you and your family to enjoy. The villa is spacious and fully furnished and has plenty of space by the pool and sun loungers to relax outdoors amongst nature.

This beach villa is located in Chalong and Chalong has a wide variety of international supermarkets, restaurants and schools in the area. Chalong Pier just minutes away, is the main launch point for boats touring the nearby islands for day trips and Chalong Circle offers access to Kata and Karon Beaches as well as Phuket Town.

name: Maya Anda Villa-8 Beds Sea View (SHA Certified)
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Designed by the multi-award winning Gary Fell of GFAB Architects with experiences over South East Asia. Maya Anda Villa offers a full panoramic view of Surin Beach, one of the most prestigious beaches in Phuket. With
high society neighborhood and close proximity to top restaurants and supermarkets. The villa offers top quality finishes and facilities.

Host will be present during the reservation period

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 3 cars.

Unless agreed otherwise by the Lessor, check in time is 14:00 and check out time is 12:00. Early arrival or late departure will depend upon availability of the villa. The early check in from 08:00 and late check out before 18:00 fee is 50% of the daily rate. Before 08:00 and after 18:00, the full daily rate is applicable.

In case of booking less than 11 bedrooms, the rooms will be chosen and prepared by the villa only.

For security reasons, guests are not allow to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ etc. Otherwise, will be charged 1,500 THB per staff per hour.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20%.

Linen and towels are provided at the Villa. The linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Smoking is not permitted at any time inside the villa. Guests are allowed to smoke outdoors only and the villa manager will provide an ashtray. If guests are smoking at any time inside the villa, they will be required to pay 20,000 THB per room as a fine.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage. Any damage to artworks and antiques during the rental period will be the responsibility of the guest.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

city: ตำบล เกาะแก้ว
sectionedDescription/description: Step aboard Mami Wata, a remarkable 1954 wooden Halvorsen boat with a length of 15 meters. This vintage vessel is a true gem, perfect for unforgettable excursions such as sunset cruises and day trips around the captivating Phuket region. Whether you're embarking on an overnight charter or a day trip, this exceptional boat accommodates up to 4 guests in 2 cabins, ensuring a cozy and comfortable experience.

name: Oasis that combines both worlds.
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This mountain view villa near the beach is a captivating oasis that combines the best of both worlds: the beauty of the mountains and the allure of the sea. 
This enchanting property is ideally situated within a short distance from the sandy shores, allowing guests to indulge in the tranquility of the mountains while enjoying easy access to the beach.

Kamala Beach is a picturesque and popular destination located on the west coast of Phuket, Thailand. Known for its stunning beauty and laid-back atmosphere, it attracts travelers seeking a more relaxed and peaceful experience compared to the bustling areas of Patong and Karon.

The beach itself stretches for about 2 kilometers, offering soft golden sand and clear turquoise waters. It is a great spot for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying various water activities, making it suitable for families and couples alike. The beachfront is lined with palm trees, providing shaded spots to relax and enjoy the gentle sea breeze.

Kamala Beach also has a charming village with a diverse range of restaurants, bars, and shops, offering both local Thai delicacies and international cuisine. Visitors can explore the local markets and find souvenirs, handicrafts, and clothing.

For those interested in cultural experiences, the nearby Phuket Fantasea theme park offers a mix of entertainment, showcasing Thai traditions, music, and dance performances.

Getting around Kamala Beach is relatively easy and there are several transportation options available:

Walking: Kamala Beach is a compact area, and many of the attractions, restaurants, and shops are within walking distance from each other. Walking is a great way to explore the beachfront and nearby areas at a leisurely pace.

Tuk-tuks: Tuk-tuks are a popular mode of transport in Phuket, including Kamala Beach. These vehicles are readily available and can take you to different parts of the beach or even to nearby attractions and towns. Make sure to negotiate the fare before getting on board.

Motorbike Taxis: Motorbike taxis are another convenient option for short trips around Kamala Beach. You'll find drivers waiting at various points, and they can quickly take you to nearby places.

Rental Scooters: Renting a scooter is a common choice for tourists who want the freedom to explore the area at their own pace. Several rental shops offer scooters and motorbikes for daily or weekly use. Ensure you have a valid driver's license and wear a helmet while riding.

Private Taxis: You can also opt for private taxis or car hire services if you prefer more comfort and privacy. They are available at fixed rates and can take you to specific destinations or for day trips around Phuket.

Remember to agree on the fare beforehand, especially for tuk-tuks and motorbike taxis, to avoid any confusion later. Overall, Kamala Beach offers a range of transportation options, allowing visitors to explore the area and its neighboring attractions with ease.

sectionedDescription/name: Oasis that combines both worlds.
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
Kamala Beach is a picturesque and popular destination located on the west coast of Phuket, Thailand. Known for its stunning beauty and laid-back atmosphere, it attracts travelers seeking a more relaxed and peaceful experience compared to the bustling areas of Patong and Karon.

The beach itself stretches for about 2 kilometers, offering soft golden sand and clear turquoise waters. It is a great spot for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying various water activities, making it suitable for families and couples alike. The beachfront is lined with palm trees, providing shaded spots to relax and enjoy the gentle sea breeze.

Kamala Beach also has a charming village with a diverse range of restaurants, bars, and shops, offering both local Thai delicacies and international cuisine. Visitors can explore the local markets and find souvenirs, handicrafts, and clothing.

For those interested in cultural experiences, the nearby Phuket Fantasea theme park offers a mix of entertainment, showcasing Thai traditions, music, and dance performances.
sectionedDescription/summary:
This mountain view villa near the beach is a captivating oasis that combines the best of both worlds: the beauty of the mountains and the allure of the sea. 
This enchanting property is ideally situated within a short distance from the sandy shores, allowing guests to indulge in the tranquility of the mountains while enjoying easy access to the beach.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Getting around Kamala Beach is relatively easy and there are several transportation options available:

Walking: Kamala Beach is a compact area, and many of the attractions, restaurants, and shops are within walking distance from each other. Walking is a great way to explore the beachfront and nearby areas at a leisurely pace.

Tuk-tuks: Tuk-tuks are a popular mode of transport in Phuket, including Kamala Beach. These vehicles are readily available and can take you to different parts of the beach or even to nearby attractions and towns. Make sure to negotiate the fare before getting on board.

Motorbike Taxis: Motorbike taxis are another convenient option for short trips around Kamala Beach. You'll find drivers waiting at various points, and they can quickly take you to nearby places.

Rental Scooters: Renting a scooter is a common choice for tourists who want the freedom to explore the area at their own pace. Several rental shops offer scooters and motorbikes for daily or weekly use. Ensure you have a valid driver's license and wear a helmet while riding.

Private Taxis: You can also opt for private taxis or car hire services if you prefer more comfort and privacy. They are available at fixed rates and can take you to specific destinations or for day trips around Phuket.

Remember to agree on the fare beforehand, especially for tuk-tuks and motorbike taxis, to avoid any confusion later. Overall, Kamala Beach offers a range of transportation options, allowing visitors to explore the area and its neighboring attractions with ease.

name: 豪华一线海景别墅
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy a magnificent sea view tour in a luxurious private swimming pool villa in Beverly Hills, Patong, Phuket. Surrounded by 5-to 7-star resorts such as Rosewood, Amari and Marriott, this amazing five-bedroom villa provides the latest technology and services, as well as impressive landmark designs from the past 50 years, making you feel like a design museum. 在普吉岛芭东的比弗利山庄中享受壮丽海景的豪华私人泳池别墅中，享受壮丽的海景之旅。这栋令人惊叹的五卧室别墅周围环绕着5至7星级度假村，如Rosewood、Amari
Marriott，提供最新的技术和服务，以及过去50年的令人印象深刻的标志性设计
作品，让您感觉像一个设计博物馆。

这栋别墅面积为1,800平方米，共有4间卧室，最多可容纳12位房客，配有6张舒适的床位。此外，还有2间带沙发床的额外房间，总共可容纳4位额外房客。
别墅设有6间卫生问，包括3间带双人按摩浴缸的室内儿童房、可欣赏水母水箱的景色的室内儿童房、室外儿童游乐场、丛林烧烤区和拥有超过3000个体积的图书馆。
房客还可以享用巨大的鲨鱼水族馆，这是泰国海事部
鲨鱼保护计划的一部分，里面有2000多条鱼。别墅还设有隐私吊舱隔音办公室、2间独立厨房（一问配备10米大理石表演和一家餐厅级）、私人无边大理石
游泳池、带拍摄机的网球训练场、设备齐全的100平方米海滨健身房、瑜伽和冥想海景室、120英寸电影院，私人按摩区，以及带桑拿房、蒸汽房、45度热水池和5星级冰浴。
为了让您的佳宿更加舒适，别墅设有洗衣房和5个停车场。这栋豪华别墅距离芭东市中心、自由、天堂
和梅林海滩仅5分钟车程，非常适合在泰国普吉岛寻找真正难忘度假体验的家庭、朋友或情侣。

工作人员
别墅经理：
Nautius别墅经理负责别墅的日常运营。她的工作是监督和管理团队和房源，并在房客住宿期间提供帮助。
厨师：别墅才华横溢的私人厨师在当地和国际美食中
训练有素。她带着微笑着为您购物和准备客用餐。
客房清洁：保持别墅干净整洁
花园和游泳池服务：
确保别墅花园和游泳池符合最高标淮。
私人司机：适合您的日常动作
和我们一起享受普吉岛，入佳最大的奢华体验！

“Gold Chariot Pool Villa"
VILLA IN CHERNGTALAY,TALANG, PHUKET.

Welcome to Gold Chariot Pool Villa, a contemporary and luxurious pool villas. We are located in a private and quiet area of Cherngtalay, Talang, Phuket.
Located in Phuket, 2.4 km from Bang Tao Beach, Gold Chariot Pool Villa has accommodations with a restaurant, free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, and room service. This self-catered villa has a private pool, a garden and free private parking.
The villa comes with 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a patio with garden views. Guests at the villa can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Gold Chariot Pool Villa has a terrace.
A car rental service is available at the accommodation.

入住这处位于市中心的房源，让家人享受一切近在咫尺的便利。

Villa Mina  in Patong is a 5 bedroom villa with panoramic sunset views over the west coast of the island and verdant tropical gardens making it a truly unique escape. With five spacious bedrooms and four luxuriously appointed bathrooms, it's the perfect option for a small group.
With a private pool table and your own private pool, you'll never want to leave. Just  Gym and sauna right outside the door。

Additional charges apply for electricity and water bills.

name: Catamaran Lagoon 46 Croisière avec Skipper PK
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 5PM - 7PM and check out by 9AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Vous souhaitez vous évader seul, en famille ou entre amis ?

Votre solution : privatiser un catamaran, un Skipper expérimenté sera à votre disposition.

Notre Skipper viendra à votre rencontre pour l'embarquement.

Une fois à bord ! Dépaysement et déconnexion sont assurés, vous serez subjugué par tant de beauté, sur un voilier de dernière génération dans un confort 4 étoiles.

UN ESPACE DE LIBERTE

Le 46 renforce les fondamentaux qui ont fait de la marque une référence de la plaisance hédoniste et généreuse : liberté et audace, douceur de vivre et innovations, autant de convictions qui se réunissent dans un style que Patrick le Quément a renforcé et harmonisé au gré des nouvelles naissances.

A L'EXTÉRIEUR

Le cabinet VPLP design a su renouveler les équilibres entre les différentes zones de vie.

Le 46 combine des cockpits modulables à l’avant comme à l’arrière, une zone cuisine complète à l’arrière, un accès à la mer évident et sécurisant, tout en conservant des grands volumes dans le carré afin que Nauta Design s’y exprime pleinement.

Le Flybridge, avec son double accès, est dédié aussi bien à la manœuvre qu’à la détente. Le poste de barre centré offre à la fois protection et visibilité. Pour plus de confort, différentes protections solaires sont proposées : un cabriolet pliant ou un Bimini rigide. 

Sur des catamarans de cette taille, le système de descente d’annexe est d’habitude simple. Sur le 46 il est possible d’opter pour un bossoir classique ou une plateforme tenderlift électrique.

Cette plateforme offre un nouvel espace de vie à l’arrière du bateau tout en facilitant l’accès à l’eau.

A L’INTÉRIEUR

Signé Nauta Design, l’intérieur adopte un style raffiné, élégant et fonctionnel.

Les espaces propriétaires sont généreux et équipés d’un lit island bed pour un confort optimal.

Les autres cabines adoptent elles aussi des volumes impressionnants, en particulier la cabine avant, dont le lit n’a plus rien à envier à celui des cabines arrière.

L’accent a été mis sur les finitions soignées et la luminosité intérieure, pour améliorer la qualité de vie à bord.

La connexion entre le cockpit avant et le carré est rendue possible grâce un vitrage escamotable qui procure un sentiment d’espace sans frontière et une excellente ventilation.

UNE NAVIGATION SEREINE ET AGRÉABLE

Le 46 est un bateau performant et marin. Représentant du nouvel ADN Lagoon, il propose :

-  un plan de voilure augmenté pour un meilleur ratio surface de voile / déplacement

-  un mât reculé, directement issu de l’expérience en compétition de VPLP design, pour plus d’élancements

-  en plus d’une bôme plus courte et d’un foc auto-vireur, le 46  propose un flat winder électrique pour le chariot de grand-voile

-  un grand triangle avant pour un plus grand choix de voiles d’avant et plus d’efficacité

Les voyageurs ont accès à tout sauf aux cabines de l'équipage.

En cas d'indisponibilité des bateaux de notre propre flotte, si vous le souhaitez, notre Conciergerie JB Voyage a la possibilité de vous proposer un autre bateau disponible, soit de la même marque et du même modèle soit un bateau de la même catégorie grâce à ses Partenaires internationaux : SamBoat, Sunsail et ses Partenaires locaux : RM Croisières et Calypso Croisières.

Dans l'hypothèse où, JB Voyage fait appel à ses Partenaires pour trouver votre bonheur, afin de pouvoir payer notre Partenaire pour bloquer le bateau, nous vous ferons une offre spéciale qu'il faudra payer sur Airbnb.

Cela nous permettra non seulement de bénéficier des garanties AirCover de la plateforme et en plus, d'échanger, en direct, en toute légalité.

Une fois l'offre spéciale réglée, la différence sera à régler dans les plus brefs délais en direct et par virement bancaire.

Ainsi de notre côté, dès réception de votre virement du solde, nous serons alors en mesure de confirmer la réservation auprès de notre Partenaire.

Dans la mesure où, en passant par la plateforme Airbnb, nous recevons votre paiement environ 3 ou 4 jours après votre premier jour sur le bateau, il aurait fallu que nous avancions pour chaque Voyageur les fonds de leur propre voyage à nos Partenaires et nous ne pouvons techniquement procéder de la sorte.

Si toutefois, vous avez d'autres solutions compatibles avec les conditions d'Airbnb à proposer, nous restons ouverts.

name: One in a million 6 BR beachfront amazing Villa
address: Tambon Wichit, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
One of Phuket's most exclusive beach front villas.

Located directly on the island's most beautiful white sand beach.

Including 6-ensuite bedrooms, a private sea-view infinity pool, sea-front BBQ and dining, plus every luxury including full-time housekeeping staff and your own personal concierge being part of the wonderful surroundings.

Making it perfect for both families and those seeking an exclusive, luxurious and relaxing beach holiday.

The villa has been designed by one of Thailand’s finest architects creating a luxury villa that is contemporary, spacious and light.
It is visually stunning, but most importantly makes the occupants feel special.
Giving all occupants the maximum light and space.
In fact 5 of the 6 bedrooms enjoy sea views, whilst one has a lovely private terrace. The 5 sea-view rooms all have either a private balcony also, and all bedrooms enjoy en-suite facilities.

To give the villa a spacious feel and to ensure it is bright, huge floor-to-ceiling glass windows and doors were used in all bedrooms and living areas to enable the beautiful views of the beach, sea and islands to flood into every area of the villa. In fact of over 50% of the villas exterior is glass to give you a feeling of being part of the wonderful surroundings.

The main living area is over 100 m2 and features a huge open-plan living, dining and kitchen with seated bar. Equipped with lounge and soft seating it will be such a wonderful place to read a magazine, or catch up with friends on Facebook.

Outside there are carefully landscaped gardens, with ornamental pots, tropical plants, and palm trees. There is a fully-equipped professional bar with fridges, freezer, ice and wine coolers, and a professional BBQ. There is an infinity edge 10m swimming pool, with sunken seating, and integral Jacuzzi. Next to the pool there are sun loungers plus parasols to give you shade, or to enjoy a pool-side massage overlooking the sea. You'll enjoy wonderful sea views from every corner of the garden, and have direct access to the beach.

Outdoor Features
Direct beach access, and direct beach frontage.
Private 10m infinity-edge pool with underwater seating, giving you unparalleled panoramic views over the Andaman Sea and distant islands.
All-weather sun loungers, comfortable outdoor sofas and large parasols.
Outdoor dining next to the beach that allows you to enjoy lazy lunches overlooking the sea, or wonderful evening meals under the stars with the sound of the waves. 
Surrounded by lush tropical foliage and gardens fragrant with jasmine and bougainvillea.
Tropical gardens, with ornamental pots, lotus ponds and water features.
Outdoor professional stainless steel gas grill barbeque (gas included).
Outdoor professional bar, perfect for entertaining, sunset cocktails, or making the days spent around the pool feel special.
Multiple balconies, large terraces and private gardens for relaxing, entertaining and functions.
Covered terrace, perfect for relaxing, massage, dining or reading.
Expansive, far-reaching panoramic views.
Set on a beautiful white-sand beach for evening walks, and morning exercise.

High-speed wireless internet throughout all bedrooms and living areas.
Feature 200 sqm open-plan living-dining room with sea views, with high-ceilings and fully-opening floor to ceiling doors leading onto the pool terraces.
Extra high ceilings throughout villa and bedrooms gives a feeling of space and well-being.
All bedrooms enjoy full-width floor-to-ceiling opening glass windows with spectacular sea views.
Air-conditioning throughout.
Silent hand-cast ceiling fans with teak blades in all bedrooms and living areas. 
Indoor & outdoor plush cotton towels provided.
Full international satellite TV channels.
65" HD smart TV, with HD DVD player in living room.
Home-cinema system with 4m screen and professional HD Projector.
Extensive 2000+ movie library, of classic movies, latest releases, all Oscar winners, plus childrens and family movies too.
Surround sound speaker system, with MP3/iPhone/iPod dock.
A truly magnificent villa furnished to exceptionally high standards including Asian works of art, gorgeous hand-made furniture, cooling stone flooring, and polished marble throughout.

This beachfront villa is a very special place, a one in a million property. It is one of Phuket's finest properties when you consider it's direct beach access and seafront location, plus it's modern contemporary design. Consider the attentive service levels you will receive, with full-time housekeeping and your own personal concierge, it must become your favourite choice.
This villa is perfect for families due to the direct beach access and safe seas for children, but would also make the perfect party house for groups of friends or, combined with our larger 10 bedroom villa right next door, itwould make a spectacular location for a large private wedding too.

5 minutes to Phuket's highly acclaimed aquarium, and a must for all the family
5 minutes to Cape Panwa and it range of local boutiques, night market, coffee shops, bars, restaurants and sea promenade.
5 minutes to the luxury resort of Sri Panwa, Phuket's finest resort and home to three of Phuket's finest restaurants (Japanese, Thai and International), it also has Baba's Nest voted as the World's 2nd best beach bar by CNN Traveller. Cocktails here as the sun sets are a magical experience.
10 minutes to Phuket Town, the island's thriving capital and historical centre, with is fabulous restaurants, bars, food markets, shopping and facilities.
15 minutes to Phuket's famous Night Market with 100's of bustling stalls selling food, locally made products, gifts, handicrafts, beauty and fashion products.
15 minutes to Phuket Islands main shopping centre, with 100's of international brands, 30 - 40 restaurants, gift shops, cinema, delicatessen, 100+ fashion shops, plus international supermarket.
20 minutes to Asia's largest seated Buddha, plus Phuket's main Buddhist temple complex.
20 minutes to the nearest golf course, and a further 3 courses within 10 minutes more.
15 - 40 minute boat trip away from 8 of the most stunning islands off of Phuket's southern coast.
Kids activities (if you wish to leave Ao Yon Beach), including, on-sea inflatable water park, water park with slides, zoo/safari park, go karting, ATV rides, elephant rides and trekking, cable water skiing, jungle adventure parks, are all within 5 – 30 mins away.
5 – 30 mins away: Several golf courses, tennis and sports facilities, horse riding, rafting, 4x4 safari adventures, mountain walks, hiking, mountain and road biking, paint-ball and shooting ranges 
Private yacht charter, organised boat trips/cruises, water sports, paddle boarding, jet ski, water skiing and sailing can all be arranged locally.

The standard number of guests for in this villa  is 12 in 6 bedrooms. If required, it is possible to increase the number of guests by setting up extra beds within the existing rooms. The maximum capacity is 18 guests.

If you require more space, you can combine this villa with one or both of our villas right next to it.

Snorkelling, canoeing, and private boat trips to surrounding islands can be arrange to leave directly from the villa.
The villa has two 2-person canoes, plus a range of beach games such as badminton, paddle tennis, beach ball, Frisbee and boule.
Aerobic exercise equipment.
8-Person steam room
Private spa with twin massage beds, opening onto a zen garden with two person spa bath.
Thai aromatherapy massage plus many other spa treatments can be arranged directly at the villa, overlooking the sea, or within the private spa.
Various fitness classes such as yoga or personal trainer available.
Luxury private 76' motor yacht & captain available upon request.

All bedrooms enjoy full-width floor-to-ceiling opening glass windows with spectacular sea views.

With its impressive amount of deck space, the T11 offers unparalleled freedom of movement.

name: Exclusive Ultra Luxury Villa!
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description: Stretching from inland jungle hills to busy coastal resorts, Kathu District contains Patong Beach, where high-energy bars and discos line nightlife strip Bangla Road and visitors buy brand-name surfwear. Quieter Freedom Beach draws visitors for snorkeling and seafront dining. Families swim and picnic around gentle forest cascades at Kathu Waterfall and watch elaborate Thai-themed shows at FantaSea park.
