name: Catamaran Lagoon 42 Croisière avec Skipper PK
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 5PM - 7PM and check out by 9AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Évadez-vous en privatisant un catamaran All Inclusive avec skipper expérimenté. 

Profitez de repas et boissons inclus, servis par une hôtesse cuisinière dédiée.

Embarquez pour une aventure de luxe, offrant confort 5 étoiles et dépaysement total. 

Détendez-vous, savourez, et laissez-vous émerveiller par la beauté des lieux. 

Votre voyage de rêve commence ici.

DU STYLE ET UNE FORTE PERSONNALITÉ

Ce nouveau membre de la famille Lagoon a du style et une forte personnalité. Tout en gardant un air de famille et en conservant les caractéristiques principales de la dernière génération de Lagoon, il nous montre une nouvelle voie : une évolution tout en douceur, une approche « organique » nouvelle, à la recherche de l’harmonie entre l’espace à vivre et les personnes qui vivent à bord. Une silhouette élégante, des courbes fluides qui, grâce une accélération des lignes perceptible dans les étraves et dans le nouveau design du roof, soulignent le caractère performant et dynamique de ce nouveau modèle … Un plan VPLP bien sûr, gage de performances sous voiles !

DES COURBES DOUCES ET ÉLÉGANTES

Un seul niveau depuis la plateforme arrière vers le carré : une "révolution structurelle",

Une toute nouvelle ergonomie qui garantit un excellent agencement de l’espace et une circulation fluide à bord,

Une grande baie vitrée, qui occupe toute la largeur du roof, et permet une liaison avec les volumes intérieurs sans comparaison.

Les marches suspendues, au niveau des jupes arrière, offrent une toute nouvelle perception du bateau : une plateforme unie, large et accueillante, digne d’un grand bateau.

UN PLAN DE PONT ASTUCIEUX

Le mat reculé et le foc auto vireur, gage de performance à la voile et de facilité d’utilisation, offrent la possibilité de regrouper toutes les manœuvres à un seul endroit.

UN POSTE DE BARRE ERGONOMIQUE

Au niveau de la cloison de roof, il offre de nombreux avantages :
- communication directe entre le cockpit et le carré ,
- circulation améliorée, en avant et en arrière du siège du barreur,
- un accès direct au roof pour faciliter l’accès à la bôme,
- un bimini composite avec panneau coulissant pour garantir une bonne visibilité sur les voiles,
- une poutre de fermeture pour sécuriser le poste de barre en navigation.

4 cabines doubles… et quelles cabines !

-  lits doubles island bed pour les cabines arrière et lits avec accès latéraux pour les cabines avant,

-  les cabines arrière profitent d’une salle d’eau avec douche séparée,

-  de très grands vitrages dans les cabines offrent une belle lumière et une magnifique vue vers l’extérieur,

-  les vitrages verticaux du roof illuminent le carré : une ambiance claire et douce parfaitement équilibrée entre l’espace cuisine et l’espace salon,

-  la cuisine, en « U », parfaitement équipée avec de larges surfaces de travail et de nombreux rangements, est tournée vers le cockpit extérieur.

Le soin apporté au détail et l’exploitation des volumes font de ce nouvel intérieur un espace unique et agréable à vivre.

A L’INTÉRIEUR

L’influence de l’architecture organique résonne dans les volumes intérieurs.
De jolis bois moulés soulignent les courbes douces du mobilier intérieur, dessiné avec soin par Nauta. Encore une fois, le cabinet de design italien marie élégance et fonctionnalité, et nous offre deux versions sur ce nouveau modèle.

LE GRÉEMENT : PERFORMANCE ET FACILITÉ D'UTILISATION

Le mât reculé présente de nombreux avantages sur un catamaran de croisière :
- un génois auto-vireur pour une grande facilité d'utilisation,
- un plus grand triangle avant pour un choix plus important de voiles de portant,
- une bôme plus courte pour une grande facilité de manœuvre ,
- une grand voile plus large en haut, profitant de vents moins perturbés pour un réel gain en performance,
- le recentrage des poids qui réduit considérablement le tangage.

Les voyageurs ont accès à tout sauf aux cabines de l'équipage.

En cas d'indisponibilité des bateaux de notre propre flotte, si vous le souhaitez, notre Conciergerie JB Voyage a la possibilité de vous proposer un autre bateau disponible, soit de la même marque et du même modèle soit un bateau de la même catégorie grâce à ses Partenaires internationaux : SamBoat, Sunsail et ses Partenaires locaux : RM Croisières et Calypso Croisières.

Dans l'hypothèse où, JB Voyage fait appel à ses Partenaires pour trouver votre bonheur, afin de pouvoir payer notre Partenaire pour bloquer le bateau, nous vous ferons une offre spéciale qu'il faudra payer sur Airbnb.

Cela nous permettra non seulement de bénéficier des garanties AirCover de la plateforme et en plus, d'échanger, en direct, en toute légalité.

Une fois l'offre spéciale réglée, la différence sera à régler dans les plus brefs délais en direct et par virement bancaire.

Ainsi de notre côté, dès réception de votre virement du solde, nous serons alors en mesure de confirmer la réservation auprès de notre Partenaire.

Dans la mesure où, en passant par la plateforme Airbnb, nous recevons votre paiement environ 3 ou 4 jours après votre premier jour sur le bateau, il aurait fallu que nous avancions pour chaque Voyageur les fonds de leur propre voyage à nos Partenaires et nous ne pouvons techniquement procéder de la sorte.

Si toutefois, vous avez d'autres solutions compatibles avec les conditions d'Airbnb à proposer, nous restons ouverts.

name: Villa Napalai 4BR sea-view Surin
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Amazing 4 bedroom sea view villa for rent.
5 minutes walking from Surin Beach.

The villa has 6 levels:
- 2 kitchens
- BBQ zone
- swimming pool
- laundry room
- massage room
- billiard zone

Please, keep in mind that this villa doesn't have elevator.

We can provide one more bedroom for nanny. Please, text us for more information.
The price doesn't include electric and water.

There are 7 levels of territory and 6 levels of building:

Ground level: Outside parking zone and gates, stairs to the entrance
1 level:  Kitchen, Billiard, Massage room, Gym, Kid's zone, BBQ, terrace, toilet
2 level: Cabinet, TV zone, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
3 level: bedroom with twin beds, bathroom
4 level: kitchen, dining zone, TV zone, terrace, swimming pool
5 level: outside parking, entrance, garage
6 level: master bedroom with bathroom, jacuzzi, terrace

The price doesn't include electric and water.

name: Maha Bhetra
address: Tambon Mai Khao, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 6PM
sectionedDescription/description: This unique 90ft Luxury traditional Thai-crafted wooden yacht holds 3 palatial double cabins below a spacious open plan teak- laden salon on the top deck.  Maha Bhetra interior is mostly a neutral palate with accents provided by authentic Southeast Asian antiques from the 18th Century. Seamlessly, the ancient and modern interact in the saloon where bespoke designed louvered cabinet hides sound systems and glassware, the staterooms are adorned with tigerpatterned rugs.

name: Luxusní vila s bazénem u golfového resortu
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Vila se nachází v exkluzivní uzavřené zástavbě Laguna Homes u golfového resortu, pouhé 2 kilometry od pláže Bang Tao.
Ať už cestujete s přáteli, trávíte dovolenou s rodinou nebo plánujete romantický výlet, Laguna Phuket nabízí pro každého něco s bohatými příležitostmi pro zábavu, romantiku, relaxaci a objevování.

Laguna Phuket má ideální polohu na severozápadním pobřeží Phuketu, pouhých 30 minut od letiště a 30 minut od města Phuket nebo pláže Patong.

name: 76ft Phuket Yacht 25 Passengers
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
A floating masterpiece – she combines luxury, contemporary design and cruising perfection for the ultimate yachting experience
25 PASSENGERS | 4 CABINS

The yacht  is a fly-bridge stylish motor yacht with modern lines, featuring 4 cabins with luxurious touches. She provides a luxury 4.2-meter Tender with a 60HP Yamaha Engine allowing shallow water access in full safety enabling guests to reach the most exotic and remote private beaches. Her spacious fly-bridge guarantees pleasant views of the amazing landscapes. Elegance, refinement, comfort and a taste for the pleasures of life awaits you on board.

Snorkeling equimpent: Yes
Crew: 9
Air-condition: Yes
Water toys: Yes

staff on yacht.

Charter rates include: captain and crew, national park fee, soft drinks, water, fresh fruits, chips and nuts, welcome drink, transportation to and from the marina and other on board equipments.
Charter rates excluding food and alcoholic beverages.

SPECIFICATIONS
Yacht Type: Motor Yacht
Length Overall: 23m (76ft)
Builder: Tachou Shipyard
Max Speed: 20 Knots
Cruising Speed: 12 Knots

name: Ultramodern unique villa | Contemporary | Stylish
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Elwood Villas Phuket offers a contemporary haven by the beach, creating an ideal backdrop for an idyllic getaway. With its emphasis on unparalleled privacy and the serene atmosphere of its thoughtfully crafted villas, a stay at Elwood Villas Phuket guarantees a rejuvenating, tranquil, and truly memorable experience

GoldStar Guarantee!
Fast internet-200mbps 
Dedicated Workspace
Smart TV 
Comfortable sleeping arrangement
Private parking
Private elevator
Spa

The villa designs cater to a diverse range of travelers, accommodating couples, families, groups of friends, and even solo work-cationers.

Emphasizing privacy to create an authentic home-like ambiance, these villas seamlessly merge Scandinavian and Balinese design elements. The Scandinavian influence contributes to the modern aesthetics and up-to-date amenities, while the Balinese touch ensures a harmonious indoor-outdoor layout, providing optimal comfort while preserving the serene connection with nature

Your villa has free parking and is located in a quiet and thoughtfully designed neighborhood with 24-hour security, cafe, and restaurant.

Our world class customer service team is available before, during and after your stay. We’re just a phone call or message away for you!

> Complimentary cleaning service provided once per week to include replacement of bathroom and pool towels, bottled drinking water, and change of bed sheets

> Additional room cleaning is available upon request.  Please contact us 

> Please no smoking inside the Villa; smoking is allowed in the outdoor areas.

Security Deposit + Electricity charge:
Daily Stay  -      3,000 baht + 6 baht electric charge
Weekly stay -  10,000 Baht + Electricity charge of 6 baht per unit
Monthly Stay - 40,000 Baht + Electricity charge of 6 baht per unit

We will take a reading of the meter at the beginning and end of your stay, thank you!

GoldStar offers a wide variety of luxury pool villas in different areas of Phuket, each is exclusive to GoldStar, with its own style and charm, and our world-class guest service team! You can choose from all the properties, there is always one that suits you!

name: 豪华海景别墅
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:

name: Sunset Villa Haven
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience Beachfront Bliss.

Uncover the allure of this expansive 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom beachfront villa boasting 220 sq. meters of pure bliss. Dive into the charm of an 8.5-meter pool and soak in the views from your private roof deck. 
Nestled on a tranquil coral/tidal/non-swimming Beach, this villa is your gateway to shops, restaurants and Patong's main beach. 
Whether you seek a brief getaway or an extended retreat, this villa offers it all.

Kalim is a serene coastal neighborhood on Phuket's west coast, known for its peaceful ambiance and proximity to Patong Beach. With stunning natural beauty, beachfront living, and access to water activities, it's an ideal destination for those seeking relaxation and adventure. Enjoy tranquil moments and gourmet dining while staying close to Patong's vibrant nightlife.

For those who wish to drive their own cars, we have car rental available for your convenience. Airport pick up and drop off are also available, please reserve in advance.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No indoor smoking; penalty for violations.
3,000. THB cleaning fee at check-out.
Refundable 50,000. THB cash deposit at check-in (entry requires deposit).
Damages deducted from deposit; refund if no damages.
Electricity: 10 THB per KW.
Unregistered guests during check-in may incur extra costs or penalties.

Enjoy tranquil moments and gourmet dining while staying close to Patong's vibrant nightlife.

sectionedDescription/description: 2 Days and 1 Night trip. Siam Princess is a classic 70ft motor yacht designed for sea lovers. Cruise to your dream destinations where you can customise your journey at every turn, from exploring remote islands and diving in the sparkling waters of Thailand, to exclusive dining onboard and sunset yoga on white sandy beaches

name: Estrella, Power Catamaran 43ft
address: Tambon Talat Yai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
ESTRELLA is a powerful, well-balanced catamaran that offers a fast yet comfortable cruising experience. She is equipped with water toys to keep everyone entertained at every stop, whether to dive into the clear Andaman water. She can accommodate up to 20 guests for day cruising and 6 guests overnight in 3 double cabins with 2 bathrooms.
She is based in PHUKET and cruises in KRABI, PHANG NGA BAY, RACHA, KHAI, CORAL, MAITON and PHI PHI ISLANDS.

name: Full SeaView Villas,12 BRs, Chef\Driver\Cinema\Gym
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Two Villas locate in Cape Amarin estate with perfect sunset view, They are next to each other, ideal for big groups up to 20++.  

Villa A: MoonShadow, 6 BRs, 2000 sqm, 12 person.
Villa B: Silver Moon, 6 BRs, 2000 sqm,  12 person.

Facilities include infinite pool 15m*2, Cinema Room*2, pool table*2, Gym*2 &Lift*2.
Service Team includes In Villa Manger*1 , Chef*2, Maid* 4, Driver*2

VILLA SERVICE

-	Free Pick up & Drop off ( van: 12 seats * 2  + Small car  5 seats * 2)
-	Excluding check in/out days, drivers with two 12 seat vans on standby for 8 consecutive hours between 06:00 to 24:00. A fixed gas fee applies: 1,000 baht/day/Van. No use no pay. 
-	Chef cooking is free of charge, grocery shopping 2000 baht/meal;
-	If over 24 people, please contact us for extra bed(s), a small fee will be charged. 

VILLA TEAM

-	CHEF*2;  expertise in Thai Food, BBQ and seafood
-	MANAGER; assist guests in booking restaurants & taxi & activities (e.g Karaoke, day tour, tickets, sea tour, golf course, yoga, SPA etc.)
-	MAIDS*4; Every Day cleaning

CAPACITY 
Comfortable for 24 guests, 12 bedrooms.
Villa A:
* BR1: Full Seaview, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub, Balcony, Walk-in Cloakroom;
* BR2: Full Seaview, Kind bed, Ensuite, Bathtub, bathroom, Balcony;
* BR3: Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom;
* BR4: Garden view,  King bed, Ensuite bathroom, 
* BR5: Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub;
* BR6: Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub.


Villa B: 
* BR1: Full Seaview, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub, Balcony, Walk-in Cloakroom;
* BR2: Full Seaview, Kind bed, Ensuite, Bathtub, bathroom, Balcony;
* BR3: Part Seaview + Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom;
* BR4: Part Seaview + Garden view,  Single bed*2, Ensuite bathroom, 
* BR5: Part Seaview + Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub;
* BR6: Part Seaview + Garden view, King bed, Ensuite bathroom, Bathtub.
Baby cot & baby chairs are provided free of charge.

ENTERTAINMENT 
-	WIFI
-	Sonos music system all rooms and swimming pool area  
-	Netfilx , Apple TV
-	Pool Table *1
-	Gym*2
-	Cinema Room*2
-	Infinity Swimming Pool *2, 15 meters 
-	Sunset BBQ   

ADDITIONAL SERVICE (on request) 
-	Nanny 
-	Massage and SPA
-	Yoga Class
-	Karaoke
-	Photo shoots for family / friends/ weddings

Guests can use whole villas include private swimming pool, balcony, kitchen, deck and sala. And also all equipments like kitchenware, BBQ machine. And will be look after by Chef/Villa manager, driver. This gated community has 24 hours security. We offer the best service to make sure you have a great holiday.

1. We know Phuket very well and can help you plan your holiday in the most interesting way. We love food and can give you best advices on local restaurants. For day trips to Phiphi, Racha, Coral Island and other activities like Scuba diving, we have selected best operators that provide high quality service with the best price. And can help to book Catamaran or yacht at cost.  

2. Our staff will assist with any local information and will be able to arrange Baby-sitting, or a private masseuse to come to the Villa.

* 10 minute drive to Kamala Beach
* 12 minute drive to 7/11, Big C, fruit market
* 15 minute drive to Oasis Spa
* 15 minute drive to Patong Beach and night life
* 60 minute drive to Phuket International Airport
* around has Paresa resort (4 minute), Diavolo restaurant (4 minute), Cafe Del Mar Beach Club (15 minute)

Villa driver can take you to all site seeing or restaurant in Phuket, and Villas Parking areas big enough for 4-6 cars.

Aside from casual beach side dining at one of the restaurants that line the sand, Kamala is the perfect spot for some surfing, body boarding, or simply relaxing on the sand. 

About seven kilometres to the south is Patong Beach, Phuket's busiest resort town with plenty of water sports, shopping, dining and nightlife choices.

1.	Water and electricity bill included in rental rate
2.	Welcome Drink and Fresh Tropic Fruit on arrival;
3.	BBQ machine, baby cot, and high chair are available;
4.	Cleaning and Towels change everyday; bed sheets change every 3 nights;
5.	Smoking not allowed in the rooms, only outside;
6.	Staffs working hours from 8:00-18:00, can be flexible when necessary
7.	Check-in time 15:00, Check-out time11:00, early check-in and late check-out depend on availability and may result in extra.

name: Kamala Oceanfront 6 BR Villa
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
这是一栋六卧别墅，位于普吉岛著名的海滨社区卡马拉的中心地带，坐落在普吉岛豪华私人别墅的顶峰之中，拥有五星级的配置。在这处宁静房源中，您可以与全家人尽情放松。

别墅距离机场大约40分钟车程，只需短短的 7 分钟路程即可将您与宁静的卡马拉海滩隔开，而苏林海滩和热闹的芭东距离别墅仅 15 分钟车程。

在这个区域，您可以欣赏到波光粼粼的安达曼海。

除了风景秀丽之外，它还是一个私密的堡垒。

广阔的热带植物环绕着别墅，别墅设计将泰式和现代完美融合，专业团队—从别墅经理到私人厨师、管家和服务人员随时准备为您提供量身定制的服务，我们以五星级的为服务标准为您提供完美的度假体验。

别墅包括的服务：
私人厨师
别墅内按摩
管家
客房清洁服务和每晚夜床服务
别墅内餐饮服务，适合任何活动

房屋室内外所有设施可供客人使用。

提供中，英，泰语在线服务。

name: Hyper Luxury Cliff View I Beach Access 5BR Villa
address: Tambon Wichit, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
VVPHU26 - an expansive, ultra-modern luxury villa in the picturesque Phuket. Perched atop a cliff, VVPHU26 offers breathtaking panoramic views of Ao Yon Bay on the island's serene east coast. The villa features six lavish suites, spacious living areas, two fully-equipped kitchens, an infinity-edge swimming pool, vast sun decks, Jacuzzis, private fitness gym, and a triple space Atrium.

Meticulously finished to the highest standards, VVPHU26 is a privately-owned villa with sophisticated architecture, elegantly-designed and furnished interiors, and state-of-the-art conveniences. As a guest of VVPHU26, you'll enjoy an array of all-inclusive services and amenities, including a private chef, full-time maids and butlers, a private car for personal use, as well as breakfast, snacks, and beverages throughout your stay.

Indulge in luxury, tranquility, and inspiration at VVPHU26, your exclusive retreat in Phuket. Enjoy direct access to the secluded eastern beach, perfect for relaxation and inspiration. Discover nearby attractions like Cape Panwa, the iconic Sri Panwa , and an exquisite selection of restaurants and cafes. Plus, indulge in a private vehicle at your disposal to explore further afield.

sectionedDescription/description:
SEA SCAPE 2 is the perfect charter choice for guests staying in Phuket. 
She showcases a beautiful interior with contemporary styling. The interior has exceptional natural light from large windows that are found throughout. The motor yacht’s main deck features a comfortable main salon and lower deck helm with guest seating. Her galley is on the lower deck, which makes the main deck the perfect space for entertaining. The motor yacht welcomes six guests in three well-appointed staterooms

name: Trisara Villa 22
address: Tambon Si Sunthon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This charming two-level Residence is set within beautiful tropical gardens providing true privacy, while the upper level pool, decks and lounging areas all embrace lovely views of the Andaman sea and sunsets. The private entrance opens up to the teak decks and open living spaces surrounding the 20 meter infinity pool, all of which offer spectacular views to the sea. These decks lead into the large open plan living and dining pavilion, adorned with artwork and plants.

The villa can be rented either as a 2-3 bedroom unit, being the upper level, or as a 4-5 bedroom unit including the 2 lower guest rooms, making it the ideal residence for families with young children. Villa 22 covers 1,600 square meters of total space and embraces the jungle and the sea from all areas of the villa.

Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.

name: 1-bedroom Luxury Pool Villa - Promotion!
address: Mueng, ภูเก็ต, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
This 175 sqm, one bedroom pool villa, is part of a very luxurious 5-star resort. It is located close to the beach,  offering great views over the Andaman Sea.

The Pool Villa will offer you anything you need to ensure a perfect holiday in style. It features a large outdoor area with 7-meter long private infinity pool, a fully equipped kitchen, an indoor lounge area and a spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom.

The resort will cater to all your needs and wishes.

With the private infinity pool as a centre piece, the outdoor terrace of every one-bedroom Luxury Pool Villa is furnished with padded loungers and a shaded sofa bed for reclining and enjoying the island’s cool ocean breeze, creating a secluded personal paradise in the heart of Phuket.

The ability to open the massive indoor space onto terraces lets every guest experience the hotel’s most valuable asset; breathtaking views of the shimmering Andaman Sea and nearby Koh Pu Island.

Villa interiors are created around generous living areas for maximum comfort and convenience. This one-bedroom Luxury Pool Villa is distinguishable by its modern award-winning interior design and gorgeous furniture packages, including Natuzzi and other high-end Italian brands.

An in-villa iPad controls innovative state-of-the-art home VDA automation software combining luxury and technology on a level previously unavailable in Phuket. It allows guests single touch control of lighting, temperature, music, television, blinds and service requests.

The one-bedroom Luxury Pool Villas are ideally suited for couples, honeymooners, wedding anniversaries or those celebrating other romantic special occasions. The versatile indoor-outdoor living space of the one-bedroom Luxury Pool Villas offers unrestrictive oceanfront views and magnificent sunsets.

Villa features: 
Goose down bedding
Large working desk
Sun Bed at pool terrace
Luxurious Natuzzi furniture
Nespresso premium coffee machine
Electronic safe

Bathroom:
Signature amenities
Separate bath and walk-in shower
Luxurious bathroom amenities
Bathroom audio and TV system

Technology:
Fast, high quality bandwidth, complimentary wireless internet.
Intuitive guest services and entertainment via iPad
HD LCD TV 55 inches in living area
HD LCD TV 40 inches in master bedroom
High quality audio system
In-room interactive entertainment system, which allows iPod or MP3 integration
Home automation system
Complimentary digital movie library
Voltage 220 – 240 AC, 50 hertz

The pleasant bay of Kata, just a few minutes south of Karon Beach, entices and charms many visitors with its white sands and clear waters. Very popular with families, Kata is an all round favourite due to its spectacular palm-lined beach, great restaurants, lively but not raucous nightlife and varied accommodation options - all close to the beach. From May to October surfers flock to catch Kata's waves and from November to April the beach is alive with sunseekers.
Kata is split into two focal areas: Kata Centre, which is at the northern end close to Karon and Kata South, home to several resorts. Visitors will find an abundance of shops to browse in, from souvenir and ready-to-wear outlets, to 7-Elevens and local mini-marts, to name-brand fashion stores. 

Local points of interest:
Karon/Kata view point 
Kata Noi Beach, Surin Beach 
Dino Park mini golf 
Surf House Phuket 
Phuket Old Town, Sunday Street Market and Chinpracha Mansion
Promthep Cape Viewpoint
Patong Beach & Nightlife
Siam Niramit Phuket 
Phuket Fantasea
Flying Hanuman – Phuket Adventure

After booking we will provide your booking number and the exact address. You can take a taxi (direct or through Grab app) from the airport, but we are happy to provide an airport pick-up for 1765 THB.

Please contact us for more information via email or messaging.

The  one bedroom Luxury Pool Villa is situated at Phuket’s best luxury five-star resort that offers a seductive blend of style, serenity, signature Thai hospitality and island comfort. Our award-winning resort is world class, with its unique range of oceanfront dining experiences, innovative spa and choice of pool villas.

As an iconic five-star luxury resort overlooking the calm, crystal clear waters of Kata Beach and the Andaman Sea. We offer a fabulous location, beautifully designed Luxury Pool Villas, innovative gourmet dining and one of the most famous resort spas in Asia.

Resort  facilities: 

Dining 
Delicious signature modern cuisine with Thai specialties
International cuisine with a Mediterranean flair at The Restaurant
Relaxed poolside dining and children’s menus at our Infinity Pool
Signature bites and creative cocktails at our Bar & Lounge, offering the perfect sunset experience
Destination dining experience on the rocks with bespoke dining options
Premium wine & champagne in the contemporary surroundings of the Wine Cellar
In-villa BBQ experience with private Chefs

Spa and Wellness:
8 treatment rooms and suites
Exclusive partnership with ila-spa, offering result driven facials and bespoke skin care experiences
State-of-the art gym & fitness centre with private training
Innovative treatments including chromotherapy, using light as a source of wellness
Iso-Benessere a water massage bed for aiding spinal integration
Metronap rest pod room, to enhance recovery and reduce jetlag 
Yoga sessions ranging from group classes to private lessons
Seasonal wellness programs featuring a variety of well-known wellness visiting practitioners 

Leisure:
Thai Cooking Classes
Thai Cultural programmes
Kids Club, a signature relaxation suite for our younger guests
Infinite Luxury boutique carrying exclusive branded gifts, luxury souvenirs and signature jewellery.
Expert concierge services to recommend the best of Phuket 


Additional service charge: 
Early check in:		subject to availability
Late check out:        to 18.00 hrs: 50% of applicable rate and after 18.00 hrs: full day  charge
Laundry:       		on request

name: Salin seaview villa phuket
address: Rawai, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description: The villa offers views of the Andaman sea through floor-to-ceiling Windows. The communal table next to the kitchen caters to the dining needs of the entourage. The pool terrace has a barbecue area and sun loungers for guests to relax. The centerpiece of the villa is an infinity pool with sea views. The 3 bedrooms all have terraces overlooking the garden and the sea, and all bathrooms have bathtubs, allowing you to relax in the complete privacy of the villa and enjoy the unspoiled sea view.

name: Spacious 4 Bedroom Pool Villa with full-time Staff
address: Tambon Ko Kaeo, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 1PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Villa is the perfect place to enjoy the Phuket lifestyle and explore the island with your family. It features 4 spacious bedrooms; 2 king size bedrooms, both with ensuite bathrooms and 2 large bedrooms with a shared bathroom. Perfect for 2 -3 families with children. In addition, a large living room with TV (netflix), large inside and outside dining area + bbq and a fully equipped kitchen. Our staff will clean your house daily.

The Villa is situated in a gated community with full-time guards with plenty of parking space. Your villa is fully furnished with linen, pool towels as well as plenty of bath-towels. Next to the swimming pool you’ll find deck chairs and a sala. We provide high-speed internet. The self-catering villa features a fully equipped kitchen. Nearby the Villa is a 7-Eleven (3 minute drive), supermarket (10 minute drive) and a local wet market (1 minute drive). Laundry service is for free. For a small fee our team can cook Thai food for you at home.
Our goal is to provide you with outstanding service throughout your stay, aiming to offer true value for your money. We are here to take you under our umbrella and make sure you have the best Phuket experience with your family and friends.

Upon arrival you will be handed keys, to access the property and your large 500 M² Villa; which has 4 large bedrooms, 3 king size beds, 1 Queen size bed and 2 sofa beds (2 sleepers), two ensuite bathrooms, one large shared bathroom; a large living-room, 55” Smart TV, high speed WIFI internet and a fully equipped European kitchen, bedlinen, bath and pool towels. We offer covered parking, a large swimming-pool, deck chairs to relax and a beautiful garden with sala. The Villa is situated in a guarded gated community. A safe environment in the middle of Phuket island.

Our housekeeping team will ensure your villa remains immaculate. Laundry is included in the price.
We can arrange massages, either poolside or in the privacy of your rooms, guided tours around the island, snorkeling and diving trips, sailing classes, ziplining etc.

To ensure your comfort, the entire house is equipped with air conditioning. We kindly request that you close all doors and windows when using the air conditioners to help manage our electrical costs efficiently. Additionally, for energy conservation, please remember to turn off all air conditioning units each time you leave the house.
In adherence to local customs, we kindly ask that you refrain from wearing shoes inside the house, maintaining the cleanliness of our living spaces.
As we prioritize the peaceful atmosphere of our community, we don’t allow loud parties on the premises. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in creating a serene environment for all.
Lastly, it's important to note that the mentioned price is for the rental of the entire house. We thank you sincerely for your consideration and cooperation. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No smoking inside the property

No shoes to be worn inside the property 

12 Guests maximum in the property, the amount of guests you book for must not exceed the people staying in the property. 

Maintain a suitable noise level in and around the house to not disturb neighbouring properties

No loud parties

name: Luxury Brand New 3 Bedroom Pool Villa 50m to beach
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Brand new 3 bedroom villa provides convenience and exclusivity, supported by all the amenities and personal service. Totally unique and luxurious holiday experience in your own private pool villa on the west coast of Phuket, just 3 minutes walk to the white sand of Bangtao Beach. The villa offers a unique combination of privacy, tranquility, exclusivity. location, price and product quality for those looking for a stunning location in Phuket. Located in a gated estate, very safe and secure area.

Located on the beach road, just opposite the Bang Tao beach.
Modern and contemporary, with spacious rooms and stylish interiors, the villa embraces a coastal living style with a touch of elegance. Surrounded by lush
tropical scenery, the villa features a chic design, a hip ambiance and quality service.

Situated in the heart of the popular Bang Tao Beach, the villa commands a prime location in one of Phuket’s most attractive neighbourhoods. The villa is within close reach to the bustling Boat Avenue, the lifestyle destination resort Laguna Phuket, and the ultra-hip Catch Beach Club. There are plenty of activities and sights to explore from the villa.

Bang Tao Beach is easily accessible within few minutes walk from the villa.

address: Choeng Thale, Phuket, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
One of the biggest luxury villas in Phuket, Hideaway Phuket features 18 bedrooms and is divided into 2 separate parts. Each part has its own private 22 m long saline swimming pool. All bedrooms come with air conditioning, a private bathroom, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. A dining area and a kitchen are also included.

Set in Layan Beach in Phuket, Hideaway 18Bedrooms Villa is a spacious villa with outdoor pools and sea views. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

Guest can access all areas. There are 2 living rooms / dining rooms, full equipped kitchen, massage room, fitness room, garden..

We do also have a full karaoke system, a pool table and a tennis table.

位于普吉岛卡马拉百万富豪街价值1.2亿，坐落在半山海景180度无敌海景，25米无边泳池，6个全海景卧室，全景落地窗。
别墅亮点→上下分为 4层。
*私人别墅一层可以走楼梯到达大海，可以游泳和拍照抓海鲜钓鱼，是聚会度假，公司团建招待重要客户的最佳选择
*全景海景，可欣赏新鲜的安达曼海风
*25 米无边泳池，配有宽敞的阳光甲板和餐厅露台区域。
*超高天花板和六米落地窗
*宽敞的室内室外风格的公共起居区，室内装饰现代、简约。宽敞舒适的卧室，拥有美丽的景观和隐私空间。
周边配套：
711 便利店 300 米
卡马拉海滩3分钟
芭东酒吧街10分钟
普吉岛机场40 分钟
幻多奇乐园 10 分钟
海景咖啡厅 2 分钟
射击场15分钟
普吉大佛 20分钟
水上乐园 20分钟
查龙码头 25分钟

Key points to note in the house rules:
 1: Guests staying in the villa need to provide valid passport information
 2: The price of the house does not include the electricity fee. The electricity fee is calculated separately, 8 baht per unit, and is calculated based on actual occurrence.
 3: Guests are required to pay a rent deposit, which is 10,000 baht within 2 days. More deposits are required for more than 2 days. The housekeeper will calculate and inform the customer before check-in.
 4: You are not allowed to do anything illegal in the villa, and you are not allowed to take drugs or gamble. Any problems that arise will be the responsibility of the guest.
 5: Smoking is not allowed indoors. Violation of the regulations will result in a fine of 10,000 baht.  Smoking is allowed in the outdoor space.
 6: The normal check-in time is 15.00 pm and the check-out time is 11.00 am (if there are special circumstances, you can communicate with the manager)

name: 悦榕庄VIP私人泳池别墅/步行可达海滩与商业中心/私人管家24小时安保管理
address: Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Laguna park 是悦榕庄集团旗下重点打造普吉岛位数不多的高性价比轻奢别墅区，被称作富人区，别墅建成于2018年末，与2019年2月正式对外经营。别墅的配置与规格我们是按5星别墅的要求和规格来呈现到您的眼前。别墅距离海滩800米，小区有免费班车送往海滩，如果步行10分钟左右即可到达，（摩托艇，海上飞人，香蕉船等娱乐项目配套齐全）是普吉岛为数不多的优质海滩，海滩特点：海岸线长，海水清澈，海沙细腻，家庭出行，朋友出行首选之所。此外小区每天有免费班车往返送达商业区中心。周边商业配套齐全，超市，餐厅，酒吧，SPA，菜场。每周四，每周五的laguna夜市也是一大亮点,步行可达，不需要舟车劳顿的前往夜市。此外，普吉岛面积最大的单层购物综合体（Central Phuket)已经开业，全泰国最大的水上乐园（BLUE TREE)车程10分钟即可到达，是度假首选。完美的入住体验是我们团队服务的核心要求。入住期间免费赠送环岛一日游！KINGPOWER免税店接送及王权海鲜自助餐。（详情请咨询客服）

别墅2月全新开业，所有材料均用环保材料。请放心入住。

所有

随时

商业中心，综合体商场，设施配套完善。

租车打车包车免费班车应有尽有

不可室内吸烟 携带宠物以及榴莲

name: Grand Seaview 5BR Villa in Kalim
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Just above Kalim Beach at the northern end of the famous Patong resort town, Villa Kalim 5 is an extraordinary 5-bedroom villa with a private pool. The sweeping views of the bay and the luxurious decoration will take your breath away as soon as you step in! It's an ideal place to spend unforgettable holidays with family or friends, where everyone can relax in their own personal space or enjoy playing billiards, swimming in the pool, or dining al fresco together.

The villa is built on two levels, facing west, and enjoys unobstructed sea views.  On the ground floor, there is a very large living room, seating area, well equipped kitchen and two bedrooms. The other 3 bedrooms are on the second floor. Each bedroom is large and luxuriously appointed in a modern Thai style with local art and beautiful fabrics. They each have a king size bed and an attached bathroom. There is also a billiard on the second floor where you can have a good time.

The villa is 100% yours. The pool is private. There is a gated car-park.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Located in a secure environment immediately at the northern entrance to Patong, the villa is a stone-throw from all the famous hot spots, as well as close to the lovely Kalim Beach, just down the road, a mere 800 meters from the villa. We will be happy to indicate you the best way to move around and the local must-see places.

In 5 minutes, you will be in the heart of Patong: Bangla Road, the night life magnet, and Jung Ceylon shopping centre. 
Our team can call tuktuks (open air red vans seating up to 10 people) or 12-seater modern vans to go anywhere on the island. 
Scooter and car rentals can be arranged. The vehicles will be delivered directly to the villa and formalities are light. 
The app GRAB is also available in Phuket.

Apart from electricity, our price is all inclusive: in particular there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
Children and infants are welcome, and we can provide a baby cot and a baby chair upon request. There is no extra charge for children, until 12 years old, sharing an existing bed.
A damage deposit of 5000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
We provide one bath towel (red) and one pool towel (blue or grey) per person. Make-up cleaning and change of bed sheets and towels are provided on a weekly basis. 
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favourite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9am to 6pm for any question you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling and helpful.
Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
Electricity is charged at 7 THB/unit (kWh). We will take a photo of the official meter during your check-in and another one at check-out. We kindly ask you to settle this bill before leaving. You can expect to pay about 170 THB per bedroom per day, for a normal usage, with aircon during the night. But if you leave the aircon running while you are not in the property, you will most likely pay an additional 250 THB. While still a minimal cost, this policy is in place to avoid wastage and preserve our beautiful island!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Our goal is to provide you with a high standard accommodation together with quality hospitality services and a personal touch to make sure you have the best environment to enjoy your holidays. 
A damage deposit of 5000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
When you arrive, we will give you a check list to remind you about the following points: check-in and check-out times (as per our listing), maximum capacity (as per our listing), no smoking inside the villa (allowed in the garden and by the pool, you have a lot of space), no illegal activities, respect of the property, respect of the neighbours (no parties, no loud noise after 10pm), electricity fee (see “other things to note” section) and elementary safety precautions. In accordance with the Thai law, we will also make a copy of all passports to register the TM30 immigration forms.

Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Set on a private headland, Villa 5 features various elegantly outfitted bedroom, living and dining pavilions interspersed throughout the tropical gardens. The private entrance is surrounded by old tropical hardwoods, palm trees, garden ponds, and two upper-level guest bedroom villas with two private living salas.

Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.

name: Ultra modern Elite Villa Patong
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Elite Villa, a brandnew luxury villa in Patong - Phuket. This villa is like no other on the island featuring the largest pool  for a villa (over 35 meter long) in Phuket and a real 105 sqm club. This villa offers amazing views, also a cinema room, fully equipped gym, modern kitchen, sauna, ice pool, heated and cold jacuzzi, steam bath, star pool,garden, cat room and much more. Enjoy your huge space on over 2000 sqm usuable area , secured with 24 hours security guards + cctv

Welcome to Elite Villa a brandnew just built completed in January 2024

Elite Villa is the most luxurios and modern Villa you can find in Patong Beach area, and probably one of the best villa on Phuket island area with a lot facilities and amenities for a memorable time in Phuket. Enjoy huge luxury space on over 2000 sqm (living area is around 1242 sqm. This villa has everything for a perfect time. 

Here are some details:

- The largest pool 35 meter for a villa in Phuket with beautiful star lights features in night time

- Amazing views over Patong Beach

- In total 5 spacious bedrooms (with ensuite bathrooms) 

- 2 master bedrooms with walk in closets on second floor

- Over 4 meter high ceeiling on second floor

-Roof and pool lounge with BBQ area

- 105 sqm own private club in the villa (on request with DJ, barteneder and security guards)

 - Full equipment kitchen (on request with private chef)

- Full equipment private gym (on request with private personaltrainer) with everything you need for a perfect workout

- A real private cinema to enjoy movies on Netflix, Prime and more

-Your private spa in the villa with sauna room, steambath room, heated jacuzzi and even a ice pool room to relieve stress

- garden access

- Cat room with everything your cat will love

- Smarthome system, controll curtains, aircons, music by App or without App

- office room

- pool table

Including in the price:

electricity, soft drinks, daily cleaning, wifi
- Chef who will buy groceries and prepare meals  (chef is included for breakfast lunch and dinner) groceries bills from local markets will be charged separete.

Not including in the price and on request bookable:

- Private driver with van or other luxury cars  (price on request)
- Bodyguards who will join you everywhere (price on request)
-  DJ (price per event on request)
- Bartenders ,butlers and waitresses (price on request)
- Minibar items delivery to your villa
- Groceries bills from local markets will be charged separete.

Location:
You are in one of the best locations in Patong and are in few minutes by car on the important hotspots
- 2 minute by car  to the nearest restaurant
- 4 minutes by car to Patong Beach
- 5 minutes by car to Bangla Road and Shopping malls
- 10 minutes by car  to Karon Beach
- 20 minutes by car to Cafe del Mar
- 25 minutes to Central festival shopping mall
-  45 to 75 minutes to airport (depend on traffic situation)

About Patong Beach:
Patong Beach is the most popular beach resort town in Phuket, with a 3 km long beach and an immense choice of restaurants, bars and shops, and his legendary nightlife in Bangla Road

Questions?
My team and me are just one message away click on contact host
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Inside the rooms smoking is not allowed. Only in party room + outside area like terrace/pool/garden/roof/BBQ area smoking is allowed.
If you have a event party is only allowed to do this in the provided party room. You can use 24 hours the party room but during night time please do not use the maximum sound volume with respect to the neighbours.

sectionedDescription/description:
Phuket Villa 453 is a five-bedroom tranquil haven offering space, elegance and total privacy, just minutes away from the soft-sand beaches of Layan and Bangtao on Phuket's west coast. Ideal for extended families or groups, this spacious holiday retreat features a stunning 20-metre swimming pool and a full complement of quality services.  ( Use of 3 bedrooms only)

The villa's lush tropical landscape, seamlessly connected indoor-outdoor spaces and expansive Thai contemporary design offer a wonderful balance of private and fun spaces for families to enjoy, as well as providing a fantastic venue for weddings and special events.

Located in a peaceful residential area, this spectacular villa is a world away from Phuket’s hectic tourist centres yet it remains within easy reach of the island’s finest restaurants, spas and boutiques in and around a collection of luxury resorts in Bangtao Bay and only minutes away from the famous Nikki Beach Club.

About The Villa
A sense of majesty ensues from the moment you arrive at the villa. Entering through its oversized teak front doors is to step inside another world; a true tropical escape. A long stretch of glimmering blue meets you on arrival: the 20 by 5-metre infinity pool, where life in the villa revolves.

The spacious wooden pool deck offers a divine choice of spots to catch the sun's rays, while a lovely outdoor sala provides a shaded lounge area just a hop away from the 10-person jacuzzi. Towering fan palms and a rich variety of tropical garden plants create a vivid green landscape and a natural border that keeps the villa ultra private and secure.

Inside, adding character and colour throughout the villa, is a remarkable collection of art and antiques from traditional Thai temple spires to ancient Buddha statues to bright whimsical paintings, including several depicting Asian archetypes by Belgian artist Christian Develter.

A large living room with a gorgeous vaulted timber ceiling and two walls that open completely to the outdoors offers a nice spot for reading or enjoying a cosy chat with the family. The well-equipped TV room is a colourful, fun space for children and adults alike while a private study leading to a garden patio provides a quiet retreat. A formal dining room set in front of the superbly fitted out western kitchen has seating for 16.

Each of the five bedrooms offers a very well appointed, peaceful oasis for couples or kids. Romance abounds in the upstairs master suite, which features a two-person terrazzo bathtub that overlooks the pool from its private bathroom.  For bookings of 3 bedrooms, 2 bedrooms will be closed 

The villa manager, chef, maid and concierge service ensure that every need is taken care of efficiently and with utmost professionalism and care. Enjoy a full range of services on offer, from poolside massages to babysitting to booking a round of golf.

Features
Master Bedroom 1: Pool view balcony, fan, aircon, luxury king bed (180w x 200w) with duvet and pillows, chaise lounge chair, walk-in closet, 42" flat screen TV/DVD, landline telephone, en-suite bathroom with spacious soaker tub, dual vanities, separate shower and toilet, and safety deposit box.

Bedroom 2: Pool view, deck, fan, aircon, luxury king bed (180w x 200w) with duvet and pillows, two wingback chairs, desk and chair, walk-in closet, TV/DVD player, landline telephone, en suite bathroom with dual vanities, separate shower and safety deposit box.

Bedroom 3: Garden view, deck, fan, aircon, luxury twin beds (110w x 200w), daybed, his/hers closet, TV/DVD player, landline telephone, en-suite bathroom with dual vanities, separate shower and toilet, and safety deposit box.

Bedroom 4: Garden view, private deck, fan, aircon, luxury twin beds (180w x 200w) that can be converted to one king sized bed, generous closet space, desk and chair, TV/DVD player, landline telephone, en-suite bathroom shared with Bedroom 5 with dual vanities, separate shower and toilet, and safety deposit box.

Bedroom 5: Garden view, fan, aircon, luxury twin beds (110w x 200w) with duvets and pillows, daybed, generous closet space, TV/DVD player, landline telephone, en-suite bathroom shared with Bedroom 4 with dual vanities, separate shower and toilet, and safety deposit box.

Kitchen: Complete western kitchen with pool view, bar/breakfast nook with seating for two, kitchen table with seating for four, landline telephone, microwave, aircon, two-door fridge/freezer, double sink, and toaster.

Dining Room: Pool view, aircon, dining room table with seating for 16 people.

Living Room: The villa features a large living room area with a wrap-around sofa providing the ultimate in comfort to unwind and relax. This beautiful space opens to reveal lush gardens, an inviting 20 metre swimming pool and is the perfect space to spend time reading or enjoying the luxurious surroundings in the shade.

Home Theatre: 42-inch flat screen TV with DVD player and DVD library, 100 satellite TV channels, CD player and CD library, landline phone, BOSE surround-sound stereo, and comfortable seating for six+.

Office/Library: desk and chair, fax/copier/scanner, landline phone, library of books, sectional couch, and expansive private garden patio with seating for six.

Pool Lounge Area: 12 sun beds, 3 love seats, 10-person Jacuzzi, BBQ area with BBQ and kitchenette, speakers, and outdoor shower.

Outdoor Sala: Pool view, with coffee table and four wicker armchairs, settee with seating for eight+ additional people.

Facilities
BBQ
24-hour Security
Safe in each room
Adaptor plugs in each bedroom
220 voltage (AC 50 Hz) plugs
Swimming pool, including shaded children’s area
Sala
Extensive sunbathing area (comfortable recliners, large umbrellas)
Complimentary Wi-Fi internet access
100 Channel Satellite TV
Bose surround-sound System
Home entertainment room with giant 42-inch flat screen, multi-channel satellite TV/DVD/CD player; Bose sound system. Yoga room
Garden Furniture
DVD Library
Parking two cars
Local phone service
First aid kit
Services
Daily housekeeping
Laundry service (upon request)
Babysitting service available (upon request)
In-house Spa Treatment (upon request)
Car and driver for hire (upon request)
Car hire (upon request)
Full-time Chef (Western and Thai specialties)
Thai cooking classes (upon request)
Gated community with 24-hour estate security
Event planners and caterers for events (upon request)
Inclusions
4 villa attendances (1 manager, 2 housekeepers, 1 chef) working from 07:00 to 22:00 daily

Water, electricity and internet usage fee
Bed linens and towels laundry service 2 times a week
FB surcharge is groceries plus 20%

Location
The villa is located in the secured Layan Estate with high walls and dense foliage giving it complete privacy from neighbouring villas within the estate. Set away from the busy tourist areas, the villa has a feel of total seclusion yet it is easy to access Phuket’s superb west coast beaches and many of the island’s finest dining, shopping and leisure attractions including a two minute drive to Nikki Beach Club. Just two kilometres away is the world-renowned Banyan Tree Spa, the Laguna Phuket Golf Club, and a wonderful range of dining and shopping choices in and around the Laguna resort complex on Bang Tao Beach. The peaceful powder-sand Layan Beach, one kilometre west, retains an idyllic, sleepy feel with traditional longtail fishing boats gliding in and out of the estuary behind it. Shopping centres, nightlife entertainment, international hospitals, more golf courses, marinas and other leisure facilities all are found within a 15- to 20-minute drive.

The villa is a 25-minute drive south of Phuket International Airport.

No pets No smoking in indoor areas

Check In and Check Out: Check in time is 3.00 pm. Check out 10am. We will try and accommodate you where possible, subject to bookings.

Refundable Security Deposit: USD$1500

“Gold Chariot Pool Villa"
VILLA IN CHERNGTALAY,TALANG, PHUKET.

Welcome to Gold Chariot Pool Villa, a contemporary and luxurious pool villas. We are located in a private and quiet area of Cherngtalay, Talang, Phuket.
Located in Phuket, 2.4 km from Bang Tao Beach, Gold Chariot Pool Villa has accommodations with a restaurant, free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, and room service. This self-catered villa has a private pool, a garden and free private parking.
The villa comes with 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a patio with garden views. Guests at the villa can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Gold Chariot Pool Villa has a terrace.
A car rental service is available at the accommodation.

Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodations type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check what conditions apply to your preferred room. 
Children & Beds
Child policies

Children over 4 are welcome.

Children 13 and above are considered adults at this property.

To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.
Crib and extra bed policies
4 years old
Crib by request
	Free
Extra bed by request
	THB 2,000 per child, per night
5 - 10 years
Extra bed by request
	THB 2,000 per child, per night

Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.

The maximum number of extra beds and cribs allowed depends on the room you choose. Double-check your selected room for the maximum capacity.

All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

Age restriction

No age restriction for check-in. (Only children 4 and up are allowed)

Cards accepted at this property

Visa Mastercard  Gold Chariot Pool Villa, Phuket accepts these cards and reserves the right to temporarily hold an amount prior to arrival.

Pets are allowed on request. Charges may apply.

sectionedDescription/description:
Situated on our southern headland point and surrounded on two sides by the Andaman Sea, Villa 31 gives guests the feeling of being on a private island. The sunsets are nothing short of spectacular.

The private entrance opens to reveal a living pavilion and the upper bedroom, both of which lead out to the upper pool and an open sala.

This exceptional villa encompasses 2,500 square meters of land and embraces the sea from all areas of the villa.

Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.

sectionedDescription/description:
The villa is a hilltop tropical paradise, with the gorgeous Surin beach at your feet and panoramic view of the Andaman Sea, an impressive slice of heaven perched some 60m above sea level. The villa is built over 3 levels. The entrance is on the ground floor of the villa. Guests will also find a sea view infinity pool, a spacious lounge and inside and outside dining. All bedrooms are well appointed and fully equipped. Breakfast is included. Concierge, chef and housekeeping. Free airport transfer.

Located in Surin Beach, this Seaview Luxury Villa offers 8 bedrooms and  a large private infinity-edge swimming pool with panoramic sea view

This sea view luxury villa offers guests a peaceful and luxurious island retreat in the heart of Phuket’s most upscale beach-side enclave, Surin Beach. The expansive 8-bedroom property features a  main house with generous, open plan living spaces, all set around a 18-metre long, 5 meters width, infinity sea view pool and comfortably furnished sun terraces.

The villa features fully equipped kitchen area, BBQ, own fitness center, yoga room, massage room, beauty salon, roof top terrace with fireplace and a fully stocked bar with billiard table.

The services are provided by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeping and service of professional Chef.

Located in a private and secured project, the villa comes with a spacious living space with comfortable bedrooms and fully-equipped kitchen.
The staff can assist all guests with local information and are able to arrange baby sitting service and a private massage for guests' convenience. 
Guests will find barbecue facilities on site. 
The villa is equipped with SONOS system which allows guests to enjoy music indoor and outdoor areas
Breakfast is included, lunch and dinner can be ordered and enjoyed on one of the terraces of the villa or in the living room

There are 6 bedrooms and 2 apartments, situated on three levels. Four of the bedrooms are spacious in an individual Thai design and have special ensuite bathrooms. Each room has its own safe, Sonos audio system and smart TV with Netflix installed.

Children of all ages are welcomed and baby and child equipment such as playpen, baby cot, 2 highchairs and a baby car seat are available.
Surin Beach is a 5-10 minutes walk away, while FantaSea Show is a 5-minute drive away. Guests can reach Laguna Golf Club within a 15-minute drive. Bangla Road and Jungceylon Shopping Centre are a 20-minute drive from my Surin Seaview Luxury Villa.

Free daily cleaning and towel change.
Laundry service is available in the building for a fee.
Clothes iron on request.

Hilltop location

Modern gym. 
Massage beds

The villa is located in a beautiful gated estate. The guests can use the whole villa including private swimming pool, gym, a huge garden, kitchen and all equipments such as kitchenware, BBQ machine. The staff comes everyday to take care of the guests.

Available anytime the guests need my support.

sectionedDescription/space:
Located in Surin Beach, this Seaview Luxury Villa offers 8 bedrooms and  a large private infinity-edge swimming pool with panoramic sea view

This sea view luxury villa offers guests a peaceful and luxurious island retreat in the heart of Phuket’s most upscale beach-side enclave, Surin Beach. The expansive 8-bedroom property features a  main house with generous, open plan living spaces, all set around a 18-metre long, 5 meters width, infinity sea view pool and comfortably furnished sun terraces.

The villa features fully equipped kitchen area, BBQ, own fitness center, yoga room, massage room, beauty salon, roof top terrace with fireplace and a fully stocked bar with billiard table.

The services are provided by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeping and service of professional Chef.

Located in a private and secured project, the villa comes with a spacious living space with comfortable bedrooms and fully-equipped kitchen.
The staff can assist all guests with local information and are able to arrange baby sitting service and a private massage for guests' convenience. 
Guests will find barbecue facilities on site. 
The villa is equipped with SONOS system which allows guests to enjoy music indoor and outdoor areas
Breakfast is included, lunch and dinner can be ordered and enjoyed on one of the terraces of the villa or in the living room

sectionedDescription/summary: The villa is a hilltop tropical paradise, with the gorgeous Surin beach at your feet and panoramic view of the Andaman Sea, an impressive slice of heaven perched some 60m above sea level. The villa is built over 3 levels. The entrance is on the ground floor of the villa. Guests will also find a sea view infinity pool, a spacious lounge and inside and outside dining. All bedrooms are well appointed and fully equipped. Breakfast is included. Concierge, chef and housekeeping. Free airport transfer.

sectionedDescription/description:
Luxury Skyline villa is the best kept secret for discerning travellers and those with an aspiration for a home away from home on the lush tropical hillside above Kamala Beach. Situated on the west coast of Phuket Island, spacious suites with complement attentive services as personalised and completed you a perfect holidays.

Luxury Skyline villa offering spacious lounge, dining and outdoor living spaces ideal for your next Phuket getaway. Exclusivity and privacy with a large infinity pool whilst watching the big blue. Beautifully considered bedrooms open directly onto ocean panoramas. Plunge into a bubble bath and marvel at the sea views from your bathroom. Spacious suites with complement attentive services as personalise and completed you a perfect holidays.

Breakfast prepared by your private in-villa chef is included, for all other meals prepared in-villa, simply consult with your private chef, and we will take care of the shopping (surcharge for ingredients applies).

Security deposit 2,000THB per night require by cash at check in and return at check out.

name: Ultra modern Elite Villa Patong
address: Tambon Patong, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Elite Villa, a brandnew luxury villa in Patong - Phuket. This villa is like no other on the island featuring the largest pool  for a villa (over 35 meter long) in Phuket and a real 105 sqm club. This villa offers amazing views, also a cinema room, fully equipped gym, modern kitchen, sauna, ice pool, heated and cold jacuzzi, steam bath, star pool,garden, cat room and much more. Enjoy your huge space on over 2000 sqm usuable area , secured with 24 hours security guards + cctv

Welcome to Elite Villa a brandnew just built completed in January 2024

Elite Villa is the most luxurios and modern Villa you can find in Patong Beach area, and probably one of the best villa on Phuket island area with a lot facilities and amenities for a memorable time in Phuket. Enjoy huge luxury space on over 2000 sqm (living area is around 1242 sqm. This villa has everything for a perfect time. 

Here are some details:

- The largest pool 35 meter for a villa in Phuket with beautiful star lights features in night time

- Amazing views over Patong Beach

- In total 5 spacious bedrooms (with ensuite bathrooms) 

- 2 master bedrooms with walk in closets on second floor

- Over 4 meter high ceeiling on second floor

-Roof and pool lounge with BBQ area

- 105 sqm own private club in the villa (on request with DJ, barteneder and security guards)

 - Full equipment kitchen (on request with private chef)

- Full equipment private gym (on request with private personaltrainer) with everything you need for a perfect workout

- A real private cinema to enjoy movies on Netflix, Prime and more

-Your private spa in the villa with sauna room, steambath room, heated jacuzzi and even a ice pool room to relieve stress

- garden access

- Cat room with everything your cat will love

- Smarthome system, controll curtains, aircons, music by App or without App

- office room

- pool table

Including in the price:

electricity, soft drinks, daily cleaning, wifi
- Chef who will buy groceries and prepare meals  (chef is included for breakfast lunch and dinner) groceries bills from local markets will be charged separete.

Not including in the price and on request bookable:

- Private driver with van or other luxury cars  (price on request)
- Bodyguards who will join you everywhere (price on request)
-  DJ (price per event on request)
- Bartenders ,butlers and waitresses (price on request)
- Minibar items delivery to your villa
- Groceries bills from local markets will be charged separete.

Location:
You are in one of the best locations in Patong and are in few minutes by car on the important hotspots
- 2 minute by car  to the nearest restaurant
- 4 minutes by car to Patong Beach
- 5 minutes by car to Bangla Road and Shopping malls
- 10 minutes by car  to Karon Beach
- 20 minutes by car to Cafe del Mar
- 25 minutes to Central festival shopping mall
-  45 to 75 minutes to airport (depend on traffic situation)

About Patong Beach:
Patong Beach is the most popular beach resort town in Phuket, with a 3 km long beach and an immense choice of restaurants, bars and shops, and his legendary nightlife in Bangla Road

Questions?
My team and me are just one message away click on contact host
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Inside the rooms smoking is not allowed. Only in party room + outside area like terrace/pool/garden/roof/BBQ area smoking is allowed.
If you have a event party is only allowed to do this in the provided party room. You can use 24 hours the party room but during night time please do not use the maximum sound volume with respect to the neighbours.

name: 【Gemini B】Rawai三卧海滨别墅 私人沙滩 海景泳池 佣人 免费早餐 烧烤架 接送机
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
这是一套在普吉岛极为稀缺的，位于沙滩上的别墅。拥有私人泳池和海景卧室。出门既是沙滩，您可以和孩子随时在沙滩嬉戏；黄昏和爱人在海滩漫步；夜晚在露台享受海风带来的凉意，一起数漫天的繁星和远处摇曳的渔火。这处独具特色的房源让你充分享受海岛度假的美妙乐趣。
别墅和一个大型酒店在一起，由酒店管理周边环境和沙滩，所以这里非常安全。
这套别墅交通和生活都极为便利。位于Rawai（拉威）区的最主要的公路旁，在The beachfront hotel 内，和酒店共享沙滩，可以享用酒店的沙滩酒吧和餐厅，极大的方便了您短暂的度假时光。步行范围就有餐厅、超市、按摩店、摩托车出租等等生活便利设施。
到通常出海一日游的Chalong Pier(查龙码头）仅仅3分钟
到著名的Raiwai Seafood Market （拉威海鲜市场）仅仅5分钟
到Patong（芭东区） 25分钟
到Phuket International Airport（普吉机场）45分钟。
在这处独具特色、适合家庭入住的房源中留下美好回忆。

这套别墅拥有私人泳池和三个卧室。时尚优雅的装饰风格，各处布满了典雅而奢华的装饰物件。一楼是私人泳池、客厅、餐厅、厨房和一个小型卧室（带独立卫生间）。二楼是海景主卧室和一个客卧。女佣根据您预约的时间上门烹饪免费早餐，并提供日常清洁
【每日早餐】每位入住登记的客人都可以前往餐厅享用免费的自助早餐
【房屋设施亮点】 智能电视、洗衣机、全区域空调、烧烤架、游泳圈 
【厨房&洗手间设施】 燃气灶、微波炉、烤箱、面包机、热水壶、电饭煲、厨具&餐具、电吹风、浴巾、毛巾、洗发露&沐浴露 
【关于卫生和打扫】 每日清洁，每位房客退房后，我都会请专业的保洁团队对全屋进行清洁、消毒和打扫。并更换所有的床单、被罩、枕头、毛巾和一次性用品，以确保下一位房客的放心使用。
【房屋爱护和环境保护】 每组房客入住时需支付10000泰铢的押金，我们都希望房屋内的设施设备保持完好无损，请您像自己家一样爱护，为了节约能源电力需要支付8฿/度，入住与退房时管家会和你一起拍摄电表读数，请您在离开前仔细核对并支付电费。
【机场接送】我们的丰田vpn10座商务车可以往返于机场和别墅，单次的费用800泰铢；当你们到达时，我们的管家会在别墅等候为你们办理入住。

整体出租：入住期间所有区域均归房客所有，拥有24小时的安保服务。

----配套服务----
【24hr Multi language at your service】
【 全天候多语言管家服务】
【Airport pick up】

【别墅包车、出海游玩服务】
【BBQ&Dining Service】
【别墅漂浮早餐、烧烤、火锅、海鲜餐预约服务】

别墅位于The Beachfront Hotel Phuket，私密安全，周边商业、旅游度假、餐饮发展成熟，度假生活非常方便。  
周边海滩:
Rawai海滩：多达数十家的餐厅酒吧坐落于此。近年来成为普吉岛游客最受欢迎的海滩之一 Nai Han海滩：坐拥普吉最豪华酒店及惊艳的日落，拥有多种娱乐游玩项目设施。 Yanui海滩：最美水质海滩，自然原生态。  
周边游玩信息：  
【Rawai海鲜市场】 普吉岛最全最好吃的海鲜市场，海鲜售卖和加工餐厅集为一体。 
【查龙码头】普吉岛最大的码头，可乘游艇、帆船、快艇等前往众多岛屿，体验出海之旅 。
【神仙半岛】最佳观赏日落之地，拥有得天独厚的宽阔风景，普吉之旅必到之地 。 
【Gold Shooter Club射击俱乐部】 普吉岛射击设备最全的俱乐部，也是我最喜欢的射击俱乐部。 
【查龙寺】 普吉岛上最大的佛教寺院。查龙寺是全普吉岛29间隐修院中最宏伟华丽的最大的佛教寺院，供奉着108尊金佛的佛堂给人留下的印象颇深。  
【普吉大佛】 普吉大佛离查龙寺不远，位于查龙湾（Chalong Bay）附近的山顶上，面向东边攀牙湾，背向安达曼海。由于大佛坐落在普吉岛的较高处——西南部山顶，所以从普吉岛的很多地方都可以看到它。游客爬上山顶可远眺海岛美景，山顶的观景台可谓是普吉岛较佳的观景点，能更好地将普吉岛风光尽收眼底。 
【Naka夜市】 每周六、日开放，吃喝玩乐、小商品、酒吧、街头艺人演出；精彩不容错过！
【普集镇老街夜市】 每周六、日开放，吃喝玩乐、小商品、酒吧、街头艺人演出；精彩不容错过！

交通便利：
私人海滩:步行至 1分钟
神仙半岛:4km 6分钟
拉威海滩:2.5km 4分钟
奈涵海滩:5km 7分钟
拉威海鲜市场:2.5km 4分钟
卡塔海滩:6km 10分钟
卡伦海滩:9km 15分钟
Patong海滩:20km 35分钟
尚泰商场:20km 35分钟
Phuket international airport机场:40km 70分钟

别墅的设施非常新，设备齐全。但与闹市街道的酒店或者青旅的区别在于，度假别墅的位置非常私密安静，步行距离内没有酒吧、和其他娱乐。您如果在意位置，想要轻松到达热闹拥挤的游客区域建议您租汽车或者摩托车自驾~别墅停车非常方便，选择Grab和Bolt打车也是非常方便的。
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1、在您入住期间，我们收取7泰铢/度的电费。我们鼓励节约能源，请离开房间时关闭空调。
2、泰国法律规定禁止在任何室内空间抽烟。我为您在室外花园设有休息区及烟缸。如发现在室内抽烟，我们将收取5000泰铢的异味消除费用 。
3、热带地区蚊虫无法避免，请注意随时关闭门窗 。
4、请尊重泰国习俗，进屋请脱鞋。
5、严禁在别墅进行任何违反泰国法律的事情。

sectionedDescription/notes: 别墅的设施非常新，设备齐全。但与闹市街道的酒店或者青旅的区别在于，度假别墅的位置非常私密安静，步行距离内没有酒吧、和其他娱乐。您如果在意位置，想要轻松到达热闹拥挤的游客区域建议您租汽车或者摩托车自驾~别墅停车非常方便，选择Grab和Bolt打车也是非常方便的。
sectionedDescription/space:
这套别墅拥有私人泳池和三个卧室。时尚优雅的装饰风格，各处布满了典雅而奢华的装饰物件。一楼是私人泳池、客厅、餐厅、厨房和一个小型卧室（带独立卫生间）。二楼是海景主卧室和一个客卧。女佣根据您预约的时间上门烹饪免费早餐，并提供日常清洁
【每日早餐】每位入住登记的客人都可以前往餐厅享用免费的自助早餐
【房屋设施亮点】 智能电视、洗衣机、全区域空调、烧烤架、游泳圈 
【厨房&洗手间设施】 燃气灶、微波炉、烤箱、面包机、热水壶、电饭煲、厨具&餐具、电吹风、浴巾、毛巾、洗发露&沐浴露 
【关于卫生和打扫】 每日清洁，每位房客退房后，我都会请专业的保洁团队对全屋进行清洁、消毒和打扫。并更换所有的床单、被罩、枕头、毛巾和一次性用品，以确保下一位房客的放心使用。
【房屋爱护和环境保护】 每组房客入住时需支付10000泰铢的押金，我们都希望房屋内的设施设备保持完好无损，请您像自己家一样爱护，为了节约能源电力需要支付8฿/度，入住与退房时管家会和你一起拍摄电表读数，请您在离开前仔细核对并支付电费。
【机场接送】我们的丰田vpn10座商务车可以往返于机场和别墅，单次的费用800泰铢；当你们到达时，我们的管家会在别墅等候为你们办理入住。
sectionedDescription/summary:
这是一套在普吉岛极为稀缺的，位于沙滩上的别墅。拥有私人泳池和海景卧室。出门既是沙滩，您可以和孩子随时在沙滩嬉戏；黄昏和爱人在海滩漫步；夜晚在露台享受海风带来的凉意，一起数漫天的繁星和远处摇曳的渔火。这处独具特色的房源让你充分享受海岛度假的美妙乐趣。
别墅和一个大型酒店在一起，由酒店管理周边环境和沙滩，所以这里非常安全。
这套别墅交通和生活都极为便利。位于Rawai（拉威）区的最主要的公路旁，在The beachfront hotel 内，和酒店共享沙滩，可以享用酒店的沙滩酒吧和餐厅，极大的方便了您短暂的度假时光。步行范围就有餐厅、超市、按摩店、摩托车出租等等生活便利设施。
到通常出海一日游的Chalong Pier(查龙码头）仅仅3分钟
到著名的Raiwai Seafood Market （拉威海鲜市场）仅仅5分钟
到Patong（芭东区） 25分钟
到Phuket International Airport（普吉机场）45分钟。
在这处独具特色、适合家庭入住的房源中留下美好回忆。

name: Baan Tranquility, 8 Bedroom Kamala
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Tranquility, unrivalled luxury, Phuket’s most exclusive property. 
This one of the best and highest Villas in the Kamala area with stunning 180-degree sunset views over Kamala Bay from all aspects of the gardens and the villa.

This one of the best and highest Villas in the Kamala area with stunning 180-degree sunset views over Kamala Bay from all aspects of the gardens and the villa.

The villa boasts 8 bedrooms and 24 hour live-in staff.

This stunning 8 Bedroom villa enjoy beautiful views of the Andaman Sea and Kamala village all day long, with plenty of space to for a large family or group with several living rooms as well as a media/games room, balconies and terraces.

Two lavish master bedrooms suites of around 110m2 and 4 spacious ocean facing bedroom ensuites built around a spectacular infinity pool with spacious terraces, outdoor lounge area with beautiful garden, barbecue area and outdoor rooms , 2 large living rooms and a media/game room ensure total privacy.

This ultra-luxe island escape is decorated with the best designer furniture and beautiful antiques and comes with full time live-in staff including a master chef among its impressive range of amenities

Features

6 ensuite bedrooms
2 bedrooms with 1 shared separate bathroom with shower on lower floor
1 games room
1 living dining room
1 family room
Fully equipped kitchen with diversity of china-ware
Spacious foyer
2 outdoor salas
Infinity pool (24x7 meters) with jacuzzi and massage faucet)
Staff quarters with separate kitchen, sleeps 4 domestic staff
Laundry room
Garage for 2 cars
Transport to the beach and Andara beach clubs with all facilities.
Large well equipped gym on site
Spa, restaurant, nanny service, concierge etc. available upon request

The full time housekeeping service takes care of everything during your stay, while the private villa chef will cook up delicious Thai and international meals as per your requirements.  The 5-star resort comes with 24 hour concierge service and a buggy service will take you to one of the two comfortable beach-clubs and restaurants. A fully equipped gym with available personal trainers is on the complex as well as a kids-club.

This postcard perfect state of the art villa is ideal for families and groups, and a dream destination for a tropical wedding.

Rental Minivan with Driver for 8 hours : THB 3,500. Extra hour is THB 500 per hour.
Airport transfer is THB 1,500 (Airport – Bangtao/ Surin/ Kamala/Patong), further distance may incur more cost.
Rental Baby Cot / High Chair / Car Seat : THB 400/item/day.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
*Minimum stay* 
Low and High Season: 5 Nights
Peak Season (Dec - January) : 14 Nights

**Security Deposit**
A refundable security deposit at one night villa rate is required for every booking confirmed. It will be returned after the stay.

sectionedDescription/description:
Experience luxury on the Hype Yacht with its incredible flybridge featuring 360-degree sea views, spacious dining tables, and sun loungers. The air-conditioned cabin boasts a large DJ booth, bar, and comfortable sofas. Relax with friends at the outdoor dining table or lounge on the massive sun loungers with coffee tables and shades. For added comfort, bathrooms and indoor-outdoor showers are available on board, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable yacht experience.

PRIVATE  CHARTER
PRICING BASED ON SEASON

Low Season 01 May-31Oct  Overnight  240,000 THB
High Season 01Nov-30Apr Overnight  280,000 THB
Peak Season 15Dec-15Jan  Overnight  320,000 THB

CONTACT US

ROYAL PHUKET MARINA
KOH KAEW,PHUKET 83000 THAILAND

PHUKET ISLAND SERVES AS A CENTER POINT FOR TRAVELERS TO BEGIN EXPLORING THAILAND AND ITS HIDDEN GEMS ...

It is surrounded by several exciting islands with an exceptional climate and natural beauty in abundance. With HYPE Boat Club, discover these paradise locations on a luxurious 55-foot yacht.

HYPE YACHT offers incredible cruise trips with a selection of routes and options to make your yacht charter trip memorable, whether day or night.

PHANG NGA BAY with its traditional limestone karsts, where movies like James Bond or Bridget Jones were filmed, is one of the most breathtaking destinations and is conveniently accessible all year round. 

PHIPHI ISLAND, are also one of the most fascinating and popular destinations, where the award-winning movie "The Beach” with Leonardo DiCaprio was filmed.These are only some of the most popular destinations offered by our HYPE Yacht charter service, experience the true natural 
beauty of every island in the best way while being fully pampered 
by our professional crew

OVER-NIGHT INCLUDES 1 BREAKFAST, 2 LUNCH AND 1 DINNER : THESE PRICES APPLY TO A GROUP OF 6  PEOPLE OR LESS. FOR ANY ADDITIONAL PERSON ON BOARD, A 4000 THB EXTRA CHARGE WILL BE ADDED. 10,000 THB WILL BE CHARGED FOR ANY EXTRA HOURS OF NAVIGATION. FOR OVERNIGHT CRUISES 40,000 THB WILL BE CHARGED FOR THE EXTRA FUEL TO SIMILAN.

WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO CHANGE THE FUEL PRICE FOR EXTRA HOURS DEPENDING ON THE FUEL COST

Hype Boat Club reserve the right to alter or cancel bookings due to unexpected events such as equipment issues, weather, or unsafe water conditions. In case of cancellation, an alternative date will be offered, or full refund will be provided
