-GOVERNMENT TAX OF 7% 
-TRAVEL INSURANCE
sectionedDescription/summary: Experience luxury on the Hype Yacht with its incredible flybridge featuring 360-degree sea views, spacious dining tables, and sun loungers. The air-conditioned cabin boasts a large DJ booth, bar, and comfortable sofas. Relax with friends at the outdoor dining table or lounge on the massive sun loungers with coffee tables and shades. For added comfort, bathrooms and indoor-outdoor showers are available on board, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable yacht experience.

name: 10 BR Villa on Phuket's most exclusive beachfront
address: Tambon Wichit, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
A brand new luxury beach villa, located in the Ao Yon Bay, Phuket's most beautiful white sand beach- offering  365 days a year of swimming.

5  from the bedrooms enjoy sea views, private terrace or balcony and en-suite facilities.

Huge floor-to-ceiling glass windows and doors to enable the beautiful views of the beach, sea and islands to flood into every area of the villa.

Over 50% of the villas exterior is glass to give you a feeling of being part of the wonderful surroundings.

this luxury villa that is contemporary, spacious and light. It had to be visually stunning, but most importantly make the occupants feel special. the villa is made of two separate buildings connected by a sky bridge. This gives all occupants the maximum light and space. In fact all 10 bedrooms enjoy sea views, all have either a private terrace or balcony, and all enjoy en-suite facilities. ar sister property  with the same inspiration, is located just next door and can be used when more space is required for larger groups.
To give the villa a spacious feel and to ensure it is bright, we used huge floor-to-ceiling glass windows and doors in all bedrooms and living areas to enable the beautiful views of the beach, sea and islands to flood into every area of the villa.  over 50% of the villas exterior is glass to give you a feeling of being part of the wonderful surroundings.
Continuing the theme a high ceilings placed in all areas. The main living area is over 200 sqm and features a huge open-plan living, dining and kitchen with seated bar. Equipped with lounge and soft seating it will be such a wonderful place to read a magazine, or catch up with friends on Facebook.

Outdoor Features
Direct beach access, and direct beach frontage.
Private 12 x 5m infinity-edge pool with underwater seating, giving you unparalleled panoramic views over the Andaman Sea and distant islands.
All-weather sun loungers, comfortable outdoor sofas and large parasols.
Unique sunken seating located next to the beach that allows you to enjoy lazy lunches overlooking the beach, or wonderful evening meals under the stars with the sound of the waves. This also converts to a 7m long beach-club style day bed located next to the beach perfect for massage, or catching up on Facebook. 
Surrounded by lush tropical foliage and gardens fragrant with jasmine and bougainvillea.
Tropical gardens, with ornamental pots, lotus ponds and water features.
Outdoor professional stainless steel gas grill barbeque (gas included).
Outdoor professional bar, perfect for entertaining, sunset cocktails, or making the days spent around the pool feel special.
Multiple balconies, large terraces and private gardens for relaxing, entertaining and functions.
Twin covered terraces perfect for relaxing, massage, dining or reading.
Expansive, far-reaching panoramic views.
Set on a beautiful white-sand beach for evening walks, and morning exercise.

High-speed wireless internet throughout all bedrooms and living areas.
Feature 200 sqm open-plan living-dining room with sea views, with high-ceilings and fully-opening floor to ceiling doors leading onto the pool terraces.
Extra high ceilings throughout villa and bedrooms gives a feeling of space and well-being.
All bedrooms enjoy full-width floor-to-ceiling opening glass windows with spectacular sea views.
Air-conditioning throughout.
Silent hand-cast ceiling fans with teak blades in all bedrooms and living areas. 
Indoor & outdoor plush cotton towels provided.
Full international satellite TV channels.
65" HD smart TV, with HD DVD player in living room.
Home-cinema system with 4m screen and professional HD Projector.
Extensive 2000+ movie library, of classic movies, latest releases, all Oscar winners, plus childrens and family movies too.
Surround sound speaker system, with MP3/iPhone/iPod dock.
A truly magnificent villa furnished to exceptionally high standards including Asian works of art, gorgeous hand-made furniture, cooling stone flooring, and polished marble throughout.
8-Person steam room
Private spa with twin massage beds, opening onto a zen garden with two person spa bath.
Two-person Jacuzzi with chromotherapy lighting system

Outside there are carefully landscaped gardens, with ornamental pots, tropical plants, palm trees, and a 200 years old tamarind tree. There is a fully-equipped professional bar with fridges, freezer, ice and wine coolers, pizza oven and large BBQ. There is an infinity edge 12m swimming pool, with sunken seating, and integral Jacuzzi. Surrounding the pool there are sun loungers plus umbrellas to give you shade, or enjoy to enjoy a pool-side massage overlooking the sea. You'll enjoy wonderful sea views from every corner of the garden, and can access the beach and sea directly from the garden.
The villa also enjoys a fully equipped spa, with a two bed massage room, plus 8-person steam room. Within the spa there is also a private outdoor two-person Jacuzzi with chromotherapy lighting system. Our massage therapists will come to the villa and you can enjoy a whole range of relaxing treatments.
This is a very special place, a one in a million property. It is arguably Phuket's finest property when you consider it's direct beach access and seafront location, plus it's modern contemporary design. Consider the attentive service levels you will receive, with a personal driver and mini-bus plus full-time housekeeping and it must become your favourite choice.the villa  is perfect for families due to the direct beach access and safe seas for children, but would also make the perfect party house for groups of friends or a private wedding too.

5 minutes to Phuket's highly acclaimed aquarium, and a must for all the family
5 minutes to Cape Panwa and it range of local boutiques, night market, coffee shops, bars, restaurants and sea promenade.
5 minutes to the luxury resort of Sri Panwa, Phuket's finest resort and home to three of Phuket's finest restaurants (Japanese, Thai and International), it also has Baba's Nest voted as the World's 2nd best beach bar by CNN Traveller. Cocktails here as the sun sets are a magical experience.
10 minutes to Phuket Town, the island's thriving capital and historical centre, with is fabulous restaurants, bars, food markets, shopping and facilities.
15 minutes to Phuket's famous Night Market with 100's of bustling stalls selling food, locally made products, gifts, handicrafts, beauty and fashion products.
15 minutes to Phuket Islands main shopping centre, with 100's of international brands, 30 - 40 restaurants, gift shops, cinema, delicatessen, 100+ fashion shops, plus international supermarket.
20 minutes to Asia's largest seated Buddha, plus Phuket's main Buddhist temple complex.
20 minutes to the nearest golf course, and a further 3 courses within 10 minutes more.
15 - 40 minute boat trip away from 8 of the most stunning islands off of Phuket's southern coast.
Kids activities (if you wish to leave Ao Yon Beach), including, on-sea inflatable water park, water park with slides, zoo/safari park, go karting, ATV rides, elephant rides and trekking, cable water skiing, jungle adventure parks, are all within 5 – 30 mins away.
5 – 30 mins away: Several golf courses, tennis and sports facilities, horse riding, rafting, 4x4 safari adventures, mountain walks, hiking, mountain and road biking, paint-ball and shooting ranges 
Private yacht charter, organised boat trips/cruises, water sports, paddle boarding, jet ski, water skiing and sailing can all be arranged locally.

The standard number of guests for in this villa  is 20 in 10 bedrooms. If required, it is possible to increase the number of guests by setting up extra beds within the existing rooms. The maximum capacity is 30 guests.

If you require more space, you can combine this villa with one or both of our villas right next to it.

Snorkelling, canoeing, and private boat trips to surrounding islands can be arrange to leave directly from the villa.
The villa has two 2-person canoes, plus a range of beach games such as badminton, paddle tennis, beach ball, Frisbee and boule.
Aerobic exercise equipment.
8-Person steam room
Private spa with twin massage beds, opening onto a zen garden with two person spa bath.
Thai aromatherapy massage plus many other spa treatments can be arranged directly at the villa, overlooking the sea, or within the private spa.
Various fitness classes such as yoga or personal trainer available.
Luxury private 76' motor yacht & captain available upon request.

All bedrooms enjoy full-width floor-to-ceiling opening glass windows with spectacular sea views.

name: The Sawan Villa, 7 Bedroom in Kamala, Phuket
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Sawan Villa

This amazing luxurious paradise Phuket Villa boasts over 3,400sqm of exclusive ocean frontage, overlooking the Andaman Sea on the pristine West coast of Phuket in Kamala Beach.

Breathtaking sea views, private infinity pool, this secluded villa is the only choice for the ultimate holiday experience

7 Spacious bedrooms that open directly over boundless ocean views, providing you an excellent pampered vacation experience. 
State-of-the-art interior, Luxurious deco, and the high end Traditional Thai style of the exterior.
There are 2 Master suites with ensuites and each boasting private living areas and an additional 5 private comparable en-suite bedrooms. 
8th Room . The 2nd Master suite on the pool level has a large living room which can be converted to an 8th room sleeping space for up to 4 single beds can be placed for children or guests (4 single beds provided complimentary). Making Total Sleeping Capacity 18 guests. 

This villa the optimal choice for romantic getaway and fun vacation with the whole family or friends.
The villa has a multifunction room with gym equipment, table tennis, air hockey and fuseball. great for private Yoga lessons and entertaining.

The villa is fully equipped with Asian and Western kitchens.

Services & Amenities

Full time maids provide the guest 5 star hotel service.
Food Policy
A dedicated chef will prepare delicious Thai feasts or Western cuisine upon your request. 
There is a detailed Menu to select preferred dishes all at a very reasonable cost per menu item. They are family style portions. 
Menu prices are plus VAT. 
If guests prefer to buy their own ingredients shopping and have the cooks prepare, a US$100 per day cooking fee will apply.

Rental Minivan with Driver for 8 hours : THB 3,500. Extra hour is THB 500 per hour.
Airport transfer is THB 1,500 (Airport – Bangtao/ Surin/ Kamala/Patong), further distance may incur more cost.
Rental Baby Cot / High Chair / Car Seat : THB 400/item/day.

guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
European-style elegance at coastal garden estate

This spectacular oceanfront villa is located within Trisara, a magnificent resort on the west coast of Phuket. The home enjoys extraordinary seclusion on a private headland, with breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea. Nestled on a lush, 6,500-square-meter estate, the villa features expansive outdoor living areas, a 30-by-9-meter infinity swimming pool, beautiful and spacious interiors, and a fabulous private staff that includes security and a talented chef. Seven superb bedroom suites accommodate fourteen guests, ideal for families with children.

The beautiful entrance to the villa opens to an expansive, artfully landscaped garden terrace, with exquisite native trees, aromatic flowers, and enchanting water features. Ample floor space forms an ideal venue for receptions or cocktail parties with sweeping ocean vistas. The lower terrace is ideally designed for sumptuous relaxation, with an infinity pool and plentiful sun loungers facing the horizon. A secluded yoga sala welcomes serene rejuvenation in the sea-kissed air.

The main interior living area is level with the pool, comprising a gorgeous living room and two dining areas. The upper level includes a luminous, stand-alone pavilion with glass walls enclosing a TV lounge. Ceiling fans complement the enchanting breezes throughout the villa, and there is air conditioning in every room.

The villa features six king suites—three on each level—as well as a kid-friendly room on the lower level with two twin-size beds. The king bedrooms are all essentially master suites, with balconies or terraces and ensuite bathrooms with showers and tubs. Each includes deluxe media features and air conditioning, and most of the rooms include private lounges. Several of the rooms enjoy enchanting ocean views.

The villa balances the privileged privacy of a secluded home with convenient access to extraordinary resort amenities, including splendid restaurants, a beautiful beach, the renowned Jara Spa (extra cost), fitness facilities, and a central pool—all within walking distance. Several other beaches are within easy reach by car, and Laguna Phuket Golf Club is less than seven kilometers away. Proximity to Phuket International Airport ensures easy access for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM

Separate Pavillion
• Bedroom A: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Outdoor shower, Lounge area, Television, Sound system, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Private terrace, Outdoor furniture, Safe, Desk,
• Bedroom B: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Outdoor shower, Lounge area, Television, Sound system, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Private terrace, Outdoor furniture, Safe, Desk,
• Bedroom C: King size bed (or 2 twin size beds), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Lounge area, Television, Sound system, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Private balcony, Safe, Desk, Ocean view

Main House
• Bedroom D: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Outdoor shower, Television, Sound system, Air conditioning, Private balcony, Safe, Desk
• Bedroom E: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Lounge area, Television, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Terrace, Outdoor furniture, Safe, Desk, Ocean view
• Bedroom F: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Lounge area, Television, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Terrace, Outdoor furniture, Safe, Desk, Ocean view
• Bedroom G: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Air conditioning, Terrace, Direct access to pool, Safe


FEATURES & AMENITIES
 
 


Included:
• Resort privileges
 
• More under “What this place offers” below

Extra cost (advance notice may be required):
• Activities and excursions
• Laundry service

• More under “Add-on services” below

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).

sectionedDescription/description:
Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place. 9 bedroom beachfront villa with 9 king beds and bathrooms suitable for families and big groups. 

Located at Rawai beachfront with stunning ocean views. Daily cleaning is included.

The different furnishings and room layouts create a distinctive character and ambiance such as the charming Chino rooms influenced by Phuket's cultural past. 

The grand suite is a highlight. The top floor suite has an expansive private outdoor terrace, spacious indoor lounge and dining area, kitchenette and work desk as well as a luxury bathroom including a beautiful free-standing bathtub with a tropical garden view.

间

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
入住须知
-下午3点后可入住，中午12点前退房
-入住时，需支付2万泰铢押金。除电费外，我们一价全含。
禁止*
禁止在房间内食用榴莲山竹等强气味性食物
禁止在房间内抽烟
如有违反规则我们将收取5000泰铢清洁费
*电力*
电费为8.0串/单位（千瓦时）。您抵达并退房时，将从电表中拍摄一张照片。您可以随时通过访问电表箱来监控您的耗电量。
这确保了主人和客人的公平性和透明度。
这种做法鼓励有意识地使用能源。很多时候，客人不负责任地使用它，去旅行时忘记开空调。
费用必须在您结账前结清。

name: Luxury Villa for Families w/h Kids in Kamala Beach
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Ideal for family holidays with children of any age, this elegantly outfitted villa offers all manner of facilities and space for families and friends. The interior is modern and luxurious blended with oriental art, a good sense of Feng Shui allowing energy to flow. The layout is well thought through, designed for families to be both comfortable and practical. Incredible outdoor experience with a 21 x 6 metre pool with jacuzzi plus kid’s pool, a large lawn & garden, BBQ area 
​

Both authentic Thai and western cuisine prepared by your personal chef. Your choice to have dinner served at the unique Sala with sea views or at the luxurious style dinning room.

​The villa offers an incredible outdoor experience with a 21 x 6 metre pool with jacuzzi plus kid’s pool, a large lawn with beautiful garden that children can be entertained while adults can enjoy cocktails at the private poolside bar. The villa also offers facilities to host BBQ parties.

Other unique features that make Andara Villa 2 a perfect place for family holidays include three sets of two bedrooms that are interconnected with individual living rooms, which makes this villa perfect for families. The Villa offers a fully-equipped private gym, a games room with pool table and ping pong table, a kid’s den where kids to enjoy their time among themselves, and a professional spa room with two massages tables for parents to relax and unwind. All in all, everything provided here at Andara Villa 2 is tailored for guests enjoy a unique and luxurious family holiday experience.

Shuttle Service by Andara Resort & Villa & Local Taxi Service

Rate Inclusions
-Government tax and service charges
-Daily housekeeping & turn-down service
-Concierge service
-Full-time private chef for breakfast & in-villa dining (food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handing fee)
Andara Resort's gym
-Andara Resort's kids club
-Buggy transportation services around Andara Resort & Villas
-Shuttle bus to Kamala Beach
-Andara beach club at Kamala beach
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- No wedding parties allowed
- Smoking not allowed, violate the fine of 10,000 baht/room.

address: Pa Klok, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
sea view 海景花园别墅位于普吉岛东部的奥铂海湾,出门就是奥铂码头,出海非常方便,周围有很多普吉岛的高端社区,我们有独立的大花园,海景庭院,环境秀丽,非常漂亮的泰式园林景观,别墅有一个海景天际泳池,庭院和房间都有很大的空间提供给客人,客房的全部面积加上庭院的面积达到1500平米,非常适合您带着家人和朋友远离城市的喧嚣｡
在一座庭院里,我们一共有4个卧室提供给您｡您的每天入住,我们都包含饮用水,咖啡,茶,洗漱用品,冷热水,毛巾浴巾,鲜榨橙汁,您选择适合的早餐,泰式中式西式,我们负责为您提供｡
您的每天我们负责提供的配套服务还含有厨师服务,我们有菜单提供给您,包括泰菜西餐和海鲜,部分中餐,根据您提供的菜单,我们的工作人员会去购买新鲜的食材
含有中文管家服务,现场和线上,您的任何都可以通过现场或者线上的管家帮您沟通解决｡
如果需要,我们会有偿2000泰铢提供给您8个小时的包车服务,您可以去环岛,您可以去商场,去您想去的地方
周围有玛丽娜船公司,可以去长岛,攀崖湾,皮皮岛等,只需要步行5分钟路程,出海非常方便,步行五分钟路程有便利店,别墅随时有佣人为您服务!

可以通过平台、电话、短信、邮件、WECHAT、Line、WhatsApp等工具沟通。

房屋守则
入住需要实名登记！
不可留宿非登记人员！
入住收取5000泰铢押金！
禁止吸烟
禁止吸毒
禁止进行任何违法活动

22:00以后请保持安静｡ no drug and durians 请保持安静,勿扰民 请勿将房间用于违法活动 爱护屋内设施,损坏照价赔偿

name: Panwa luxury Residence
address: Tambon Wichit, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅坐落在悬崖边，享有海湾的壮丽全景，位于普吉岛东海岸的Ao Yon村附近。
        Ao Yon 实际上是两个海滩的所在地，它们被岩石岬角隔开，可以通过从别墅楼梯直接通往海滩。
        对于那些希望远离大城市的喧嚣和拥挤空间的人来说，这里是寻找休息，放松和灵感的理想场所。与岛上其他地区相比，附近的海滩几乎空无一人，居住的主要是当地人。
        当然，对于那些想要探索周围环境的人来说，周边地区还有很多事情可以做。附近是攀瓦角，标志性的斯里攀瓦酒店以及一系列令人印象深刻的餐厅、酒吧和咖啡馆。

当您预订住宿时，豪华的住宿只是您租金所包含的一部分。您还将免费获得一系列额外福利和服务，包括：
•全天24小时提供全方位服务
•机场往返接送（仅限同一航班）
•私家车
•一瓶迎宾香槟
•入住期间包括早餐和非酒精饮料/咖啡
•入住期间包括小吃和水果
•充分利用别墅设施，如游泳池、健身房、会所、蒸汽浴室等。
•免费高速互联网连接
•全套卫浴用品每天更换
•全套毛巾每天更换
•儿童友好
•完全访问所有电视和国际频道列表
•夜床服务

✨别墅设有六间豪华套房、宽敞的起居区、两个设备齐全的厨房、一个无边泳池、宽敞的阳光甲板、按摩浴缸、私人健身馆和一个三重空间中庭。
✨这是一栋私人别墅，拥有精致的建筑，优雅的设计和装修以及最先进的便利设施。
✨作为别墅的客人，您将享受一系列全包服务和设施，包括私人厨师，全职女佣和管家，供您个人使用的私家车以及住宿期间的早餐，小吃和饮料。

房屋室内外所有设施可供客人使用（除工人房外）。

提供在线中、英、泰语服务。

Grand Private Pool Suites at Impiana Private Villas in Kata Noi, conveniently located on the 1st floor; the largest of our pool suites in a modern style. This luxurious suite in Kata Noi Phuket comprising of a king size bed, spacious living area and the sea viewing bathtub feature with rain shower.

• A private van at THB 1,600 per van per way. (max 7 persons)

name: 卡塔无边泳池3卧海景别墅，免费接机，可预约泰国私厨与司机，位置出行非常方便
address: Karon, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
* 1-2晚免费接机或送机*1趟 ，3或3晚以上免费接机和送机*1趟 （12座面包车*1，带行李只能坐10人）；
* 8小时司机服务：入住期间可提前预约12座面包车跟司机8小时（任意6:00am-24:00间连续8小时，2500泰铢/辆）；
* 泰国厨师上门服务，服务费为2000泰铢/顿+食材费用，按单收取；
* 中文管家服务：协助行程安排、餐厅、租车、游艇、高尔夫等私人行程预定；
* 每日清洁；
* 免费停车；
* 无额外水电费。

现代化风格别墅，宽敞舒适。离卡塔海滩仅2分钟车程，交通方便。客厅连通泳池，可享受绝美海景和日落。3个卧室均有独立卫浴，堪比奢华酒店。可预约私厨上门服务，出行可提前约车。走路到小卡塔闹市区和海滩不到10分钟，便利店超市餐厅都有！呆在别墅泡泳池或者出门玩耍都超级舒服！别墅旁边就是卡塔新晋网红咖啡厅 Cannelle，旁边就是网红酒店 The Sea Galleri，早午餐/下午茶/鸡尾酒都唾手可得！

2019年建成的全新现代海景别墅，占地约为1000平，建筑面积450平，共3层，拥有3个卧室，均带卫浴，顶楼露台可烧烤，可住6人。

别墅最上层，有3个卧室 ：
卧室1：卧室1: 1.8米大床，主卧室，海景，含独立卫浴，带浴缸、阳台；
卧室2： 1.1米单人床*2张，含独立卫浴，带阳台；
卧室3：1.5米双人床，含独立卫浴，带阳台；

别墅中层为泳池层，全海景客厅，厨房餐厅（厨具齐全） ；

别墅最下层洗衣房和储物间，车库，健身房，儿童游乐室，管家办公室。

此小区共有3套联排别墅，这个为其中一套。房客可使用整栋房源。地下一层为健身房和儿童游乐区，还有管家办公室，停车场。可能会与小区内其他两套别墅的客人共用。

行程前会帮忙规划好交通和行程，随时推荐当地好吃好玩的地方，入住时或入住后有什么问题可以随时联系我们！

别墅位置
卡塔海滩：2分钟车程（1KM）
普吉机场：60分钟车程
巴东酒吧街：20分钟车程
拉威海鲜市场：15分钟车程

别墅周边
全家超市:320m
Nook Dee 夜市: 280m 
网红咖啡厅 Cannelle Kata Bekery: 40m
Kata Surf house 冲浪俱乐部: 1.2km
周边步行可达餐厅选择很多如Dawn Til Dusk at the SIS(350m), Twilight Sky（350m）

预定后我们提供12座面包车接机一趟，或者送机一趟（或送至岛内下一个酒店）。携带行李可能需要额外加订小车，否则坐不下。日常出行可以用grab或者inDrive打车，定位准确，非常方便。

* Please be note there is construction beside of villa, and working time is from 9:00-17:00
别墅前有一处工地正在施工，9:00-17:00之间。

1. 入住时间 15:00以后；退房时间 11:00以前。提前入住和延迟退房需要视具体房态，可能会收取相应费用；
2. 房价和其他服务费用仅限于本别墅特定人数，含儿童婴儿超出8人（成人6人），可能会相应加收清洁费和服务费；
3. 室内不允许抽烟，室外可以；
4. 员工工作时间为9:00-17:00；
5. 晚上22:00以后室外不能放音乐和派对；
6. 如果你要在别墅举行活动、婚礼或者主题派对，请提前告知。

*每组客人入住时别墅会准备定量的瓶装水，软饮，和少量为了方便客人刚到，来不及出门采买，而提前预备少量的吐司、鸡蛋和香肠。入住期间需要的额外早餐食材和饮用水需要自行采买。

name: Kamala Luxury 7 BR Villa
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
新时代奢华的缩影

别墅坐落在普吉岛西海岸一个安静的岬角上，可欣赏海湾的壮丽景色，在独特的天堂环境中为客人提供无与伦比的七居室豪华和舒适入住体验。在这处宁静房源中，与全家人尽情放松。

这座僻静的别墅于 2022 年的年中完工，建筑面积为 1,000 平方米，是一栋三层楼的建筑，屹立在安达曼海的岬角上。
它配备了大型家庭团体和成人聚会所需的一切设施，可以放松身心，只需一个电话，即可获得专业服务团队24 小时服务。
在阳光明媚、海风清新的白天，您可以在 19 米长的无边泳池中消暑，在宽敞的泳池甲板遮阳伞下享受户外用餐，或者在两个大型起居区之一的空调房放松身心。
然后欣赏太阳落下地平线，沐浴在柔和的夕阳下，远处社区的闪烁灯光在海湾连绵起伏的山丘上栩栩如生。在这个迷人的氛围中，令人难忘的餐饮、社交和娱乐之夜即将到来。
尽管别墅处在宁静私密之地，但距离普吉岛的许多景点也很近——令人兴奋的夜生活、生态旅游活动、壮观的高尔夫球场和各种海上游玩应有尽有。

别墅包含服务：
1趟往返接送机服务
私人厨师
私人别墅经理
管家
敬业的服务人员
礼宾服务
生活必需品
别墅内用餐
令人愉快的早餐准备
家政服务和每晚夜床服务

房屋室内外所有设施可供客人使用。

提供中，英，泰语在线服务。
sectionedDescription/interaction: 提供中，英，泰语在线服务。

name: 12 bedrooms beachfront villa
address: Pa Klok, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description: Villa Arun presents a lavish holiday residence located on the captivating and private eastern coastline of Cape Yamu, Phuket. This retreat offers guests an exquisite vacation experience, combining opulence and seclusion with its beachfront setting. Boasting a total of 12 bedrooms, each equipped with a private bathroom, this elegant dwelling is ideal for accommodating extensive families or large groups.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1. Check-in 15:00 PM Check-out 12:00 PM 
2. Guests and visitors should comply with the parking regulations 
3. No shoes inside the home. 
4. Non smoking room FINE $500 ** Only smoke on balcony and designated area. Cigarette butts must be disposed of in the ashtray provided in the backyard of the property. Please do not smoke cigarette or e cigarettes on ground floor and on any other public area 
5. Parties or events can be arrange with additional charge.
6. No unregistered guests or visitors allowed. 
7. Quiet time during 12:00 PM - 06:00 AM
8. No eating or drinking in bedrooms. Please enjoy your meal in the dining room.
9. Please dispose of the garbage in the trash bin.
10. Kindly keep a close eye on your kids while being on the balcony.
11. No pets allowed on the premises.
12. We enrolled in  “Go Green and less carbon footprint” Kindly make sure to turn off the lights, air conditioning, and any electronics when you leave the room. 
13. Please report any damages and/or breakages in a reasonably timely manner. Damages exceeding the security deposit amount must be paid by guests and will be reported to Airbnb.
sectionedDescription/name: 12 bedrooms beachfront villa
sectionedDescription/summary: Villa Arun presents a lavish holiday residence located on the captivating and private eastern coastline of Cape Yamu, Phuket. This retreat offers guests an exquisite vacation experience, combining opulence and seclusion with its beachfront setting. Boasting a total of 12 bedrooms, each equipped with a private bathroom, this elegant dwelling is ideal for accommodating extensive families or large groups.

name: Kamala 5BR Infinity Pool Villa
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
一座豪华的海滨别墅，位于普吉岛西海岸风景如画的卡马拉。

这栋全新的别墅提供五间宽敞的卧室，每间卧室都享有壮丽的海景。

我们提供全方位服务的别墅拥有独特的设施和专业团队，包括私人别墅经理、私人厨师、管家和服务人员，为难忘的假期提供了一个私人绿洲。

name: Kamala 5 BR villa
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅由备受推崇的泰国建筑师 Charupan Wiriyawiwatt 设计，完美地融合了泰式和现代设计风格，其斜顶主亭内设有装饰华丽的起居区、餐厅和现代化厨房整个空间采用玻璃封闭采光充足又通风。
推开玻璃门可通向宽敞泳池露台，配有15 米的大理石泳池，是娱乐或休闲放松的理想场所。
别墅还配备有池畔休闲区、超大户外沙发、Spa理疗室等丰富设施及空间。
别墅坐落在卡马拉海滩附近 Amarin Cove Estate 阴阳别墅岬角的悬崖上，沿着普吉岛广受欢迎的“百万富翁的一英里”。
Villa顶层入口区让您第一次感受到这个豪华度假胜地的宏伟气派，设有休息区和摆放着沙发的凉亭，邀请您在抵达时短暂休息。
楼梯通向主展馆，那里有一个大型开放式空间，设有起居和用餐区以及客用厨房，滑动玻璃门通向带家具的泳池露台。
磨砂玻璃楼梯通向别墅的下层，三间客房排列在一条长长的走廊上。

房屋室内外所有设施可供客人使用。

提供在线中、英、泰语服务。
sectionedDescription/interaction: 提供在线中、英、泰语服务。

name: Villa Saan
address: Tambon Kammala, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat, Phuket, Thailand
city: Tambon Kammala, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Thai modernist villa above the Andaman Sea

Set on a rocky headland, this modern villa's soaring peaked roof and open walls look out over the Andaman Sea. Take in the views from a bubbling hot tub on the master balcony—or from the infinity pool and loungers on the lengthy terrace below. A gym, bar, and home theater offer plenty of places to unwind, and if you're looking for adventure, 3 of Thailand's best beaches lie within a 6-mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

BEDROOM & BATHROOM

Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Private hot tub, Television, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean

Bedroom 2: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Television, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean

Bedroom 3: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Television, Balcony, Safe, View of the ocean

Bedroom 4: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Balcony, Safe

Bedroom 5: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Balcony, Safe

Bedroom 6: King size bed (or 2 twins) Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Balcony, Safe

Bedroom 7: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Balcony, Safe

Bedroom 8: King size bed (or 2 twins), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Television, Balcony, Safe


OUTDOOR FEATURES
• Water feature
• Heating lamps


STAFF & SERVICES
Included:
• Ground & Pool maintenance
At Extra Cost – advance notice may be required:
• Laundry service
• Groceries and beverages - subject to an additional 20%+tax service fee

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Early check-in from 12:00 PM onwards and late check-out until 6:00 PM is at a fee of $500.00 USD.
Chef services requires petty cash, $300-$500 USD per day, on arrival, for food and beverage during the stay. 
Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

sectionedDescription/summary:
Thai modernist villa above the Andaman Sea

Set on a rocky headland, this modern villa's soaring peaked roof and open walls look out over the Andaman Sea. Take in the views from a bubbling hot tub on the master balcony—or from the infinity pool and loungers on the lengthy terrace below. A gym, bar, and home theater offer plenty of places to unwind, and if you're looking for adventure, 3 of Thailand's best beaches lie within a 6-mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

Peaked-roof contemporary villa near Nai Thon Beach

Play in the surf along your very own stretch of sand at this beachfront estate. Enormous sliding glass walls connect an open-plan great room with a backlit infinity pool perfect for nighttime dips. After a long day in the sun at Nai Thon Beach, withdraw into your cozy primary suite and slip into blissful slumber.

name: Seaview haven Villa Samira, 4BR, Kamala w/ chef
address:
Kamala, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
A fully staffed, six-bedroom villa in a secured estate near Kamala Beach with a chef, a 17m pool and jacuzzi, media room and spectacular sea views.This villa offers a reduced 4-bedroom option for smaller groups. With spectacular ocean views, Villa Samira is a six-bedroom hillside haven in a secured estate near Kamala Beach ideal for families or groups. Step through its magical entrance arch and find a 17m pool and jacuzzi, sumptuous indoor and outdoor lounging areas, a media room with projector screen, games room with a pool table, spa and fitness room and a modern kitchen and dining room. A team of full-time staff, including a chef, offers friendly, five-star service while many island delights including yacht trips, golf and soft-sand beaches are close at hand. Perfect for a relaxing tropical holiday or a special event.

The 6-bedroom Villa Samira offers a reduced 4-bedroom option for smaller families or groups. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of 4 bedrooms and listed facilities
.


FULL VILLA CAPACITY

12 people ( 1 king-bedded master suite; 5 guest bedrooms are king-size beds while 3 of which are convertible to twin).  An additional bed may be set up on extra cost.

The 4 bedroom option sleeps 8 guests. 2 rooms will be locked and will not be used.

LIVING AREAS

Living room with two sofa sets; indoor dining for 12; media room with projector screen; games room; furnished pool terrace.



POOL

17 x 4m salt filtration.



ENTERTAINMENT

Media room with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TV in living room; book and magazine library.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and on master bedroom terrace; safety deposit boxes; gym.



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security.  Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra charges apply).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Samira is one of a handful of luxury private villas in the Cape Amarin estate.  This exclusive estate lies on a headland between Kamala and Patong beaches, along a sought-after stretch of Phuket's west coast known as ?Millionaires' Mile'.  Set on the hillside with spectacular ocean views, the villa overlooks a small bay.  Just six kilometres to the north is Kamala Beach, a two-kilometre curve of soft golden sand and shallow waters.  Popular with families, it's an inviting beach for surfing, body boarding or simply relaxing on the sand, with several open-air restaurants lining the beach.  About 15 minutes by car to the south is Patong Beach, Phuket's infamous party town with a good range of water sports, shopping and dining choices beyond its neon-lit bar scene.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
Please note that the rates shown here is for the 4-bedroom option. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security.  Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra charges apply).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

sectionedDescription/description:
Contemporary Thai villa on Ao Yon Bay

Uninterrupted views of the Caribbean Sea follow the lines of a sky bridge connecting the upper rooms at this south coast estate. Wade into the spillover swimming pool and sip from a sunken beachside lounge as the leaves of a 200-year-old tamarind tree rustle in the breeze high above. Spa and steam rooms hit the pinnacle of relaxation after a day cruising the coastline on a private yacht available for hire.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

name: Andaaman Beach Villas - Villa Anda, 6BR, Kamala
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Anda is a six-bedroom beachfront villa in Kamala, Phuket. It has a big pool, huge living area, TVs, pool table and an in-house chef. Villa Anda is an absolute beachfront villa in Kamala, Phuket. Ideal for families, groups of friends, weddings and honeymoons, the villa has a large pool, a huge living/dining area, free WiFi, a pool table and large smart TVs with an array of streaming services. The villa sleeps 12 in six luxury bedrooms, two of them master bedrooms with magnificent sunset views. On the beach and off it, guests can enjoy beach volleyball, snorkelling, kayaking and stand-up paddle boarding.The villa staff includes the Villa Manager, dedicated in-house chef and a team of ever-helpful villa attendants and housekeepers. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
Wifi Internet access
Personal service by the villa staff including villa manager, chef/cook, and housekeeping
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

12 people (6 Bedrooms: 2 with king-size beds and 4 with twin beds). 2 extra beds are also available at extra charge.



ENTERTAINMENT

Pool table; board games; large smart TVs in both master bedrooms with movies, live TV and streaming services.



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa Manager; chef; security (night); villa attendants.



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Tucked away on a quiet road in Kamala, Phuket, Villa Anda lies 26km from the airport. Tranquil Rayee Beach, a haven for locals collecting shellfish at low tide, sits just steps away.

High-end resorts like Cape Sienna, Andara, and the Hyatt Regency with their acclaimed restaurants are within walking distance. A short drive takes you to Kamala's vibrant main beach and the renowned Phuket Fantasea with its elaborate stage show. The town itself offers a diverse culinary scene, from classic Thai to Turkish, Arabic, Indian, and Greek. Or you could venture south to Patong, Phuket's bustling nightlife hub, known for its phenomenal restaurants, diverse shopping, and energetic atmosphere.

Airport transfers and other transport can be arranged. Extra fees apply.

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.

On the beach and off it, guests can enjoy beach volleyball, snorkelling, kayaking and stand-up paddle boarding.The villa staff includes the Villa Manager, dedicated in-house chef and a team of ever-helpful villa attendants and housekeepers.
sectionedDescription/summary: Villa Anda is a six-bedroom beachfront villa in Kamala, Phuket. It has a big pool, huge living area, TVs, pool table and an in-house chef.
sectionedDescription/transit: Airport transfers and other transport can be arranged. Extra fees apply.

sectionedDescription/description:
A fully staffed, six-bedroom villa in a secured estate near Kamala Beach with a chef, a 17m pool and jacuzzi, media room and spectacular sea views.This villa offers a reduced 5-bedroom option for smaller groups. With spectacular ocean views, Villa Samira is a six-bedroom hillside haven in a secured estate near Kamala Beach ideal for families or groups. Step through its magical entrance arch and find a 17m pool and jacuzzi, sumptuous indoor and outdoor lounging areas, a media room with projector screen, games room with a pool table, spa and fitness room and a modern kitchen and dining room. A team of full-time staff, including a chef, offers friendly, five-star service while many island delights including yacht trips, golf and soft-sand beaches are close at hand. Perfect for a relaxing tropical holiday or a special event.

The 6-bedroom Villa Samira offers a reduced 5-bedroom option for smaller families or groups. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of 5 bedrooms and listed facilities
.


FULL VILLA CAPACITY

12 people ( 1 king-bedded master suite; 5 guest bedrooms are king-size beds while 3 of which are convertible to twin).  An additional bed may be set up on extra cost.

The 5 bedroom option sleeps 10 guests. 1 rooms will be locked and will not be used.

LIVING AREAS

Living room with two sofa sets; indoor dining for 12; media room with projector screen; games room; furnished pool terrace.



POOL

17 x 4m salt filtration.



ENTERTAINMENT

Media room with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TV in living room; book and magazine library.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and on master bedroom terrace; safety deposit boxes; gym.



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security.  Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra charges apply).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Samira is one of a handful of luxury private villas in the Cape Amarin estate.  This exclusive estate lies on a headland between Kamala and Patong beaches, along a sought-after stretch of Phuket's west coast known as ?Millionaires' Mile'.  Set on the hillside with spectacular ocean views, the villa overlooks a small bay.  Just six kilometres to the north is Kamala Beach, a two-kilometre curve of soft golden sand and shallow waters.  Popular with families, it's an inviting beach for surfing, body boarding or simply relaxing on the sand, with several open-air restaurants lining the beach.  About 15 minutes by car to the south is Patong Beach, Phuket's infamous party town with a good range of water sports, shopping and dining choices beyond its neon-lit bar scene.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.
Please note that the rates shown here is for the 5-bedroom option. This means that the other rooms will be locked during your stay.

name: Surin Ocean-View Villa in Phuket
address: Choeng Thale, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Surin Oceanview Luxury Villa! We're delighted to host travelers who appreciate quality service and embrace new trends. Our villa offers an exclusive experience tailored to your needs, with personalized service ensuring an extraordinary stay. Experience luxury at Surin Oceanview Luxury Villa, where every detail is designed to exceed expectations.

Villa Space:

Our rooms are meticulously appointed with all the essentials, including air conditioning, a mini-bar, a safe, plush bathrobes, SmartTV, and Wi-Fi. We understand the importance of these amenities in enhancing your comfort. Additionally, we provide complimentary continental breakfast and one round-trip airport transfer, ensuring a seamless arrival and departure experience.

The villa was renovated in 2022, ensuring that it is in excellent condition and meets our highest standards of luxury and comfort.

The villa's unique three-level design ensures maximum privacy for each guest. Whether you seek relaxation in your room or wish to enjoy the common areas, our aim is to provide a serene and tranquil environment throughout your stay.

Services:
To cater to your needs, we offer daily services including a dedicated Villa Manager, chef, and housekeeping. Our attentive staff is available around the clock to ensure your stay is stress-free and enjoyable.

We look forward to welcoming you to Surin Oceanview Luxury Villa, where every detail is crafted to elevate your experience and create unforgettable memories.

Experience unparalleled luxury at Surin Oceanview Luxury Villa on Phuket Island. Relax by the expansive 15 x 6m private infinity swimming pool and revel in the tranquil seclusion of this exquisite retreat.

Indulge in the villa's unique blend of Asian and Western furnishings, creating an ambiance that is both distinctive and stylish. Fine art pieces scattered throughout the space add a touch of sophistication and allure.

With 6 bedrooms, including 4 sea-view rooms and 2 without, you'll find ample options to suit your preferences. Each room boasts a balcony or terrace, allowing you to immerse yourself in the breathtaking surroundings. The spacious en-suite bathrooms ensure comfort and convenience during your stay.

Rest assured, every room is fully equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning, a mini-bar, a safe, plush bathrobes, Smart TV, and Wi-Fi, providing a seamless and connected experience for all guests.

The villa's three-level design, characterized by its slope-hugging architecture, ensures maximum privacy in every corner. Notably, as of June 2023, an elevator has been installed to accommodate up to 8 guests, further enhancing accessibility and convenience for all.

Guests can contact Nui via Airbnb messages

Location

Surin Ocean view Luxury Villa offers an idyllic retreat situated approximately 3 kilometers from the renowned Laguna area. Nearby, you'll discover Boat Avenue, a vibrant hub boasting supermarkets, restaurants, bars, banks, and more. On Friday nights, immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of the night market, complete with dance performances and live music. Additionally, the villa is conveniently located just 3.5 kilometers from the esteemed Ban Yan Tree Golf Course and a mere 800 meters from pristine beaches.

Getting Around

Perched high atop Baan Thai Surin Hill, our villa boasts unparalleled panoramic views of Surin & Bang Tao beaches. Along the main road, you'll find a variety of dining options, a supermarket, pharmacy, ATM, and motorbike rental services. We're a mere 4 kilometers from Boat Avenue, Central Porto, and Laguna, making exploration effortless. For golf enthusiasts, BanYanTree Golf, nestled within Laguna, is a short 5-kilometer drive away.

Discover nearby beach clubs such as Cafe Del Mar (3 kilometers), Carpe Diem Beach Club (1.5 kilometers), and Catch Beach Club (2.5 kilometers). The Beach House at Anantara Layan is approximately 7 kilometers away. Phuket Old Town is easily accessible, a 35-minute drive, while bustling Patong awaits just 25 minutes away. Traveling to and from the airport is convenient, with a 35-minute drive. Boat Lagoon and Royal Marina are a short 20-minute drive, while AoPo Marina is approximately 35 minutes away.

30 Mins from Phuket International Airport to the villa

As for the security deposit, a payment of 50,000 Thai baht is required upon arrival. This deposit will be refunded in full during check-out, provided that there are no damages or breakage incurred during your stay. A request in cash, any currency, equal to $1500 USD.

As for accommodation, please note that there is an additional charge of 3000 baht per person, per night after 12 adults, maximum 14 guests allowed. This ensures that we can maintain the quality of service and amenities for each guest.

The rental rate encompasses a comprehensive package of amenities, which includes the expertise of a skilled Villa Manager, a culinary maestro as your personal chef, and a committed cleaning staff. These individuals are available for a generous 9 hours a day, ensuring that you receive top-notch service throughout your stay.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: More than 12 guests, we charge 1500 THB per night per extra bed. To be paid in the villa on arrival.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Guests can contact Nui via Airbnb messages

name: Kamala Seaview Villa Moon Shadow 7 bedroom,w/chef
address: Kamala, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious resort is located in the luxurious Kamala Cape Amarin Manor, and Villa Moon Shadow (Moon Shadow Villa) is located in the manor. It is one of the most spectacular villas, which can enjoy the beautiful seascape and sunset on the west coast of Andaman Sea, an amazing dream private resort.

Villa Moon Shadow, a famous villa with 3 floors and 7 bedrooms, offers magnificent sea views and sunset, making it an amazing vacation destination. This villa is located in a separate private estate near Kamala Beach, blending unique modern design with lush tropical slopes for stunning results. There is a 15 meter long swimming pool in the center of the villa, and the spacious indoor and outdoor living space is the perfect place for parties or simply a haven to relax with family and friends. The home/gaming room, tenant kitchen, and jacuzzi add a touch of luxury, and full-time staff including chefs will provide you with five-star service.

This villa has all the luxuries imaginable -- daily breakfast, wireless network access, welcome fruit plate, personalized services provided by the villa staff, including full-time villa manager, housekeeper, chef, security personnel and waiters, and exclusive access to the whole villa and the facilities inside.

Accommodation capacity
14 people (7 bedrooms: 7 rooms are equipped with extra double beds, and additional beds can be paid for).

living room
Open living room and dining room (can accommodate 14 people), leading to the pool terrace and garden; Sunbathing area by the swimming pool; Outdoor dining and barbecue areas; Tenant kitchen with a restaurant that can accommodate 30 people; Family room with TV, billiards table, and games.

swimming pool
15 meters.

entertainment
IPad controlled AVC audio system; Satellite channel TV, private cinema, Sonos speaker system, Netflix mobile phone with screen projection capability; Chess games and toys, fully automatic mahjong machines, books, billiards tables.

Additional facilities
Barbecue; Sea view bathtub; Safe deposit box.

Housing area
2000m in total ² (Indoor 1100 m ²， Outdoor 900m ²)。

Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes: Villa manager; full-time villa attendants; private chef; handyman; estate security staff. Additional staff (babysitter, massage therapist) available at extra cost. 

Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

The luxurious Cape Amarin estate is located on the promontory of the "Millionaire Residential Area" between Camara Beach and Padang Beach, while the Villa Moon Shadow is located within the estate and is one of the most spectacular villas, offering stunning sea views and sunset views. Drive north for 10 minutes to reach Camara Beach, a soft and golden beach that is loved by many families. Since the fashionable HQ and Delma Cafe opened at the northern end of the beach, there have been more and more seaside bars here. In addition to leisurely dining in restaurants by the beach, Camara is also the perfect place for surfing, board surfing, or simply relaxing and resting on the beach. Badong Beach is the most prosperous Resort town in Phuket Island, 7 kilometers south of the villa. There are many water sports, shopping, catering and nightlife for you to choose from.

You can ask the villa manager to arrange airport transfers, car rental services, and taxi transfers, at a lower cost, to enjoy convenience and ease.

By booking this property, all tenants agree that they have read the check-in instructions and all relevant information regarding the property.

name: Villa Talaefun
address: Ayara Kamala, Kamala A Kathu, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Perched on one of the most exclusive headlands on Phuket, this villa offers a towering view of the calm blue Andaman sea beyond. The interiors are peerless amongst the Kamala beach villas; spread over two levels with peaceful garden paths and contemplative balconies. Inspired by traditional Thai design, the villa is just a few minutes by car from both the FantaSea cultural park and Patong town.

Villa Talaefun’s position is nothing short of enviable. The villa has been constructed around the unimpeded ocean view. Guests entering the villa are instantly struck by the vertical grandeur of the property, as the pointed Lanna-style roof reaches into the sky. Guests can relax and recline in the sumptuous interiors, replete with masterfully carved furniture, delightfully comfortable furniture, and soft white curtains which can be pulled to create a calm, cool space as the sun dazzles down outside. The artful pathways and walkways of the villa’s gardens and green spaces invite thoughtful walkers, with the outdoor dining area a dream spot for group gatherings at the end of an active day.

Located on the Millionaire’s Mile, the villa is just a handful of minutes from Kamala beach to the north, and just slightly further from Patong Beach to the south, each of which offer broad expanses of tropical sands, shady trees and enjoyable beach bars. Set forth and explore the delights that Phuket island has to offer, from delicious, roadside street food in the local towns, to exciting day-cruises exploring offshore islands and hidden coves. When night falls, guests can take in the moonlit waves and ship lights at sea from the terrace with a cool drink in hand, while planning further trips around this paradise island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Walk-in closet, Safe, Desk, Television, Direct access to pool area, Ocean view
• Bedroom 2: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Television, Private balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 3: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Television, Private balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 4: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Ceiling fan, Desk, Television, Private entrance, Ocean view
• Bedroom 5: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Ceiling fan, Desk, Television, Private entrance, Ocean view
• Bedroom 6: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Dual vanity, Ceiling fan, Desk, Television, Private balcony, Ocean view


OUTDOOR FEATURES
• Ocean view
• Security cameras - outward facing

• More under “What this place offers” below

STAFF & SERVICES

• Food and beverages charged at cost plus 20% handling fee
• Activities and excursions

• More under “Add-on services” below

All credit card holders must be aged 25 years or older at the time of booking.

Please note that this listing requires an on-site security deposit of TBH 30,000 at check -in via cash, which will be held and resolved by the Host

name: Villa Chan Grajang
address: Cherngtalay, Thalang, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Contemporary coastal oasis above Surin Beach

Located in the ultra-desirable Surin Beach enclave on the West Coast of Phuket, Villa Chan Grajang enjoys exquisite views over Surin Beach and Bang Tao. The house stands high above the bay facing northwest with sunsets out over the Indian Ocean you’ll look forward to night after night. Villa Chan Grajang is comprised of two villas, over a total of over 2,272 square meters.

In the grounds of the villa, the Balinese outdoor wooden table seats 12 and is ideal for BBQs or breakfast, while the dining room with its solid teak table and views out over Surin Beach offers a cooler internal option. The games room sports a 3/4 size snooker table, dart board, bar area, as well as television and DVD player. The main villa boasts a stunning infinity pool ideal for recreation or laps. There is a Sala for those in-house massages, as well as a fully functional exercise room with cable television and equipped with exercise machines.

The first villa has four double bedrooms and the second has two double bedrooms. All bedrooms are en-suite. The villa can sleep up to 12 comfortably, with parking for six cars and offers choices from a six bedroom hire all the way down to a single couple. Four of the six bedrooms have their own furnished deck areas.

Unique to the house is a 30 metre all-weather chipping and putting area on the lower lawn, providing hours of entertainment for kids as well as an extensive grassy areas for them to play in. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM

sectionedDescription/description:
Baan Laemson 1, 
Phuket 6 bedroom luxury villa. With a tranquillity that puts nature at ease with its inhabitants, overlooking the Andaman Sea, refines paradise with a taste of elegance.

Baan Laemson 1, our exclusively managed Villa, With a tranquillity that puts nature at ease with its inhabitants, overlooking the Andaman Sea, refines paradise with a taste of elegance. Boasting 6 bedrooms, this stunning villa is the perfect option for family reunions or a group of friends wishing to vacation together.

The house was built by the Architect of the Amman Hotel Group on a rock point at the end of a peninsula overlooking Kamala Bay and the Andaman Sea with 275 degrees view.

Villa Features

Dining/Sitting room 72 sq.m. with wide screen TV.
Outside, roofed, dining pavilion with 275 degree sea view (seating 12).
Three double bedrooms pavilions with own bathrooms.
Two double bedrooms with one bathroom and nanny room.
One double bedroom with shower.
A large platform on the rocks to have drinks with your family/friends and two small seating areas above the rocks.
Cinema room (with games console), gym with sauna & steam room. Full electronic security and 24 hours watch men.
Computer with internet connection.
All rooms are centrally air-conditioned.
House is fully staffed with English speaking head of staff/cook, two maids and driver (all in uniform).
All bedrooms have satellite TV.
17 meter Riviera superfast fishing and diving yacht (9 rods, air compressor, 5 diving tanks, 2 underwater scooters) can be rented separately (sleeps 6 with two bathrooms)at US$2500 per day. Ask for details.)
Special Notes

The villa sleeps a maximum of 12 people, 10 adults and 2 children only
There is a 5% service fee (tip due to staff and billable at final payment).

Rental Minivan with Driver for 8 hours : THB 3,500. Extra hour is THB 500 per hour.
Airport transfer is THB 1,500 (Airport – Bangtao/ Surin/ Kamala/Patong), further distance may incur more cost.
Rental Baby Cot / High Chair / Car Seat : THB 400/item/day.
There is 5% service fee (tip due to staff and billable at final payment)
F&B system : Groceries bill plus 20% handling fee
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
*Minimum stay* 
Low and High Season: 5 Nights
Peak Season (Dec - January) : 14 Nights

**Security Deposit**
A refundable security deposit USD $1,500 is required for every booking confirmed. It will be returned after the stay.

sectionedDescription/description:
Gallery-like villa perched above Ao Sen Beach

Lush lawn, saltwater pools, and a foot path form the perimeter of this architectural masterpiece just above the white sands of Ao Sen beach. Start your day with chef's service and a trip to the gym, then pick your perch on a balcony or at the bar with pool and games tables. Two guest houses and a main all linked by a covered terrace feel like a private resort, and Big Buddha is just a 10-mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

Eleven bedroom suites and panoramic views of the sea set the scene at this resort-like villa within walking distance of Surin Beach. sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please note that this listing can accommodate 22 guests.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

sectionedDescription/summary:
From the hilltop of Phuket’s Millionaire’s Mile, this contemporary/traditional villa enjoys sweeping ocean views and easy access to the island’s best bars, restaurants, and Kamala Beach. Spend your mornings lounging by the pool. Keep up with your daily routines in the fitness room. Later, sit for an alfresco dinner on the terrace, followed by a night in the game room with friends. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

sectionedDescription/description:
Designed by award-winning Architect Gary Fell with GFAB, this prestigious villa enjoys views of Surin Beach from one of Phuket’s most exclusive neighborhoods. Making the most of its perch, every bedroom has an ocean view. You’ll love the open-air layout, alfresco dining, and sunbathing on the pool deck. Inside, melt your cares away in the sauna, shoot some pool, or watch a movie in the theatre.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.


BEDROOM & BATHROOM

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please note that this listing can accommodate 22 guests.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

name: Seaview haven Villa Samira, 6BR, Kamala w/ chef
address:
Kamala, 
    , Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 7PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
A fully staffed, six-bedroom villa in a secured estate near Kamala Beach with a chef, a 17m pool and jacuzzi, media room and spectacular sea views.

Contact us for reduced occupancy rates for smaller group size. With spectacular ocean views, Villa Samira is a six-bedroom hillside haven in a secured estate near Kamala Beach ideal for families or groups. Step through its magical entrance arch and find a 17m pool and jacuzzi, sumptuous indoor and outdoor lounging areas, a media room with projector screen, games room with a pool table, spa and fitness room and a modern kitchen and dining room. A team of full-time staff, including a chef, offers friendly, five-star service while many island delights including yacht trips, golf and soft-sand beaches are close at hand. Perfect for a relaxing tropical holiday or a special event. This villa comes with every conceivable luxury -
Daily breakfast
WiFi internet access
Welcome fruit bowl
Personal service by the villa staff including full time villa manager, housekeeper, chef/cook, security and attendants
Exclusive use of the whole villa and listed facilities
.


CAPACITY

12 people ( 1 king-bedded master suite; 5 guest bedrooms are king-size beds while 3 of which are convertible to twin).  An additional bed may be set up on extra cost.



LIVING AREAS

Living room with two sofa sets; indoor dining for 12; media room with projector screen; games room; furnished pool terrace.



POOL

17 x 4m salt filtration.



ENTERTAINMENT

Media room with projector screen; Apple TV/audio system with built-in speakers indoors and out; flat-screen TV in living room; book and magazine library.



ADDITIONAL FACILITIES

Jacuzzis in pool and on master bedroom terrace; safety deposit boxes; gym.



Once you arrive at the villa, you will be looked after and pampered by our villa staff which includes:

Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security.  Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra charges apply).



Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

Villa Samira is one of a handful of luxury private villas in the Cape Amarin estate.  This exclusive estate lies on a headland between Kamala and Patong beaches, along a sought-after stretch of Phuket's west coast known as ?Millionaires' Mile'.  Set on the hillside with spectacular ocean views, the villa overlooks a small bay.  Just six kilometres to the north is Kamala Beach, a two-kilometre curve of soft golden sand and shallow waters.  Popular with families, it's an inviting beach for surfing, body boarding or simply relaxing on the sand, with several open-air restaurants lining the beach.  About 15 minutes by car to the south is Patong Beach, Phuket's infamous party town with a good range of water sports, shopping and dining choices beyond its neon-lit bar scene.

Don?t hesitate to ask the villa manager to call a taxi, or to organise day or half-day car and driver hire for sightseeing (additional cost).

By booking this property, all guests agree that they have read the house rules And complete listing content. Our complete booking terms And conditions are available for viewing under the Elite Havens website.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All guests are required to have a valid photo and verified account profile which should match the valid identification to be presented upon arrival. No third party bookings are allowed. Visitors (non-registered guests) to the villa or those not staying overnight, need to be requested for approval prior to arrival.

Please contact us For any pricing Or special requests prior To sending an instant booking request. This includes but Is Not limited To: bedding arrangements, room assignments, airport transfers, meal requests, change in number of guests, change in stay dates, check in / check out times outside standard schedule, etc. Extra charge applies for Babysitter.

Events: Hosting special occasions such as weddings or birthday celebrations maybe subject to special terms and restrictions at the villa or by the neighbourhood, and these may require special arrangements and incur additional costs. Please let us know in advance to avoid unnecessary inconvenience.

Travel Insurance: We encourage all our clients to take up a comprehensive travel insurance so if for any reason (e.g. medical, accidents, etc.) your trip is cancelled, you can reclaim any lost monies.

Please feel free to reach us via Airbnb messaging if you have questions about our property or if you need assistance with your holiday plans in Phuket, Thailand.

address: Chang Wat, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Hillside villa with ocean views and sleek design

Take a swim in a 50-foot infinity pool that extends toward the Andaman Sea like a ship preparing for voyage. This modern villa, inspired by traditional Thai stilt houses, commands a private slope on Phuket’s western coast with bold spaces that take alfresco living to a whole new level. Enjoy art-like ocean views as you lounge on an L-shaped sofa or dine at a big table made from rainforest wood.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved


BEDROOM & BATHROOM
• Bedroom 1 - Primary: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower & bathtub, Dual vanity, Lounge area, Television, DVD Player, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 2: King size bed(or two twin size beds), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to shared balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 3: King size bed(or two twin size beds), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to shared balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 4: Kingsize bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to shared balcony, Ocean view
• Bedroom 5: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to terrace
• Bedroom 6: King size bed (or two twin size beds), Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Television, Ceiling fan, Safe, Desk, Direct access to terrace


FEATURES & AMENITIES
• Spectacular views of the Andaman Sea

• More under “What this place offers” below

At Extra Cost – advance notice may be required:
• Laundry service
• Babysitting service
• Activities & excursions
• Groceries and beverages - subject to an additional 20%+tax service fee

• More under “Add-on services” below

Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7

No other destination provides visitors a more complete Thai experience than Phuket. Travel to wondrous natural landscapes, eclectic city markets and immerse yourself in a nightlife that renders even the most experienced travelers speechless. A hot tropical climate, the temperature changes very little over the course of the year. Average annual high of 32 °C (90 °F).

name: Brand New 4BR Villa with 15m Pool
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This exquisite 998 sq.m villa is part of the picturesque gated residence Anchan. Situated just a 15-minute drive from the beautiful Bangtao Beach, known for its turquoise waters and relaxing tropical atmosphere, the vibrant street of Boat Avenue with a variety of restaurants to suit every taste, and the prestigious Laguna area with its golf and beach clubs. Our idyllic villa, with four elegant bedrooms, a 15m pool, and an ideal location, will give you an unforgettable holiday experience.

The villa boasts an elegant design and an open-plan concept with expansive glass windows and floor-to-ceiling doors, providing excellent natural lighting and seamlessly blending the indoors with the outdoors, creating an immersive atmosphere. Milky-white tones and teakwood furniture add an extra touch of sophistication and charm to the interior.
The inviting living room is adorned with ceilings almost 6 meters high, designed in a vaulted style with oakwood accents, complemented by a comfortable modern sofa. It opens onto a terrace with a pool where you can relax and enjoy the natural beauty of the colorful sky reflected in the sunset. The space also includes a spacious, bright, and fully equipped Western-style kitchen, along with a dining area. Behind the kitchen, there is a pantry and a laundry room. All bedrooms have bathrooms, and the master bedroom has a separate bathtub and a rain shower. Two bedrooms have direct access to the pool with a Jacuzzi and a spacious terrace with a Sala, making it ideal for a relaxed and joyful time in a tropical atmosphere.

The villa is 100% yours. The pool is private. There is free parking, along with 24/7 security.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.

The villa is located in a picturesque area,  just an 15-20 minute drive away from some of the most sought-after destinations in Phuket: beautiful Bangtao Beach with beach clubs, the upscale area of Laguna, the vibrant street of Boat Avenue with its shops and restaurants, and the thrilling Blue Tree Water Park. Nearby, Porto de Phuket Mall offers a wide array of options for every taste and preference.

To enjoy the area, it can be nice to rent either a car or a scooter. We can help with these arrangements and your vehicle will be directly delivered to the villa. If you prefer not to drive, we can help you get a taxi at any time, it is not expensive at all. The apps GRAB and BOLT are also available in Phuket.

Apart from electricity, our price is all inclusive: in particular there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
A damage deposit of 20000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Children are welcome. There is no extra charge for children, until 12 years old, sharing an existing bed.
Make-up cleaning and change of bed sheets and towels are provided every three days. You can order it more often for a small additional fee.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favourite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9am to 6pm for any question you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling and helpful.
Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
Electricity is charged at 7 THB/unit (kWh). We will take a photo of the official meter during your check-in and another one at check-out. We kindly ask you to settle this bill before leaving. You can expect to pay about 170 THB per bedroom per day, for a normal usage, with aircon during the night. But if you leave the aircon running while you are not in the property, you will most likely pay an additional 250 THB. While still a minimal cost, this policy is in place to avoid wastage and preserve our beautiful island!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Our goal is to provide you with a high standard accommodation together with quality hospitality services and a personal touch to make sure you have the best environment to enjoy your holidays. 
A damage deposit of 20000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
When you arrive, we will give you a check list to remind you about the following points: check-in and check-out times (as per our listing), maximum capacity (as per our listing), no smoking inside the villa (allowed in the garden and by the pool, you have a lot of space), no illegal activities, respect of the property, respect of the neighbours (no parties, no loud noise after 10pm), electricity fee (see “other things to note” section) and elementary safety precautions. In accordance with the Thai law, we will also make a copy of all passports to register the TM30 immigration forms.
