Land area 1566 sq.m., 1320 sq.m.
In-room entertainment: billiards, soldier balls, massage room, gym, cinema, Netflix, 20m sea view swimming pool
10 mins walk to Cape Yamu private beach.
Daily private chefs arrange a rich and delicious special breakfast, full-time villa staff and hotel manager ready to serve you.

name: Kata Sea View Villa海景别墅，轻奢舒适，私人泳池，近卡塔海滩，适合家人朋友度假休闲
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
这座现代装修风格的五卧室海景别墅坐落在环境优美的半山之上，轻奢幽静，配套设施齐全，拥有极其宽敞的室内空间和一座超大泳池。周围环境优雅，绿树成荫，非常适合度假休闲，让您与家人、朋友可以在舒适的环境中欣赏日出和日落，感受海洋带来的宁静与和谐。此外，别墅的地理位置十分优越，您可以轻松前往普吉各大景点和周边的大型超市，SPA，餐厅。别墅距离卡塔海滩车程仅5分钟，可以让您随时享受海浪和阳光的沐浴。
    欢迎入住，Kata Sea View Villa海景别墅将为您带来无与伦比的住宿体验，让您尽情享受假期的舒适、惬意，留下美好的回忆。

city: ตำบลเชิงทะเล
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience ultimate luxury at Anchan pool villa, four elegantly furnished bedrooms, each room have a comfort en-suite bathrooms and fully kitchen equipped for your culinary adventures.
A private pool oasis surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for tranquil afternoons. The villa located not far from Bang Tao and Surin Beach, perfect for sunbathing, swimming, and water sports.
A short drive to Boat Avenue, Catch Beach and Laguna Phuket, offering world-class golfing, spas, and dining experiences.

- Security deposit will be required 50,000 THB or USD in cash upon arrival

- Cleaning service every 3 days

address: Pa Klok, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12AM (midnight)
sectionedDescription/description:
看风景不如住进风景里，普吉岛为数不多对外开放的顶级豪宅，占地7000平米，由海滩延伸至别墅，让你足不出户就可以享受私人的海滩与阳光，别墅12间超大豪华卧室，双泳池，电影院，SPA房，大型户外酒吧等配置。我们配有大型的管家与保姆服务团队，您只要在别墅享受美好的度假时光，省下的交给我们。另外，小区为封闭式，24小时安保管理，为您增添一份安全保障。
   满眼的蓝色治愈一切，在别墅私人的沙滩上，坐着发呆，海水清澈，海风温柔，是每个热爱生活得人最完美的度假生活。
   我们真诚的期待与您见面。
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1.室内禁止吸烟。
2.请遵守泰国的法律法规

name: Luxury Living Style*4BR*Anchan
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This exquisite 987 sq.m villa is part of the picturesque gated residence Anchan. Situated just a 15-minute drive from the beautiful Bangtao Beach, known for its turquoise waters and relaxing tropical atmosphere, the vibrant street of Boat Avenue with a variety of restaurants to suit every taste, and the prestigious Laguna area with its golf and beach clubs. Our idyllic villa, with four elegant bedrooms, a 15m pool, and an ideal location, will give you an unforgettable holiday experience.

The villa boasts an elegant design and an open-plan concept with expansive glass windows and floor-to-ceiling doors, providing excellent natural lighting and seamlessly blending the indoors with the outdoors, creating an immersive atmosphere. Milky-white tones and teakwood furniture add an extra touch of sophistication and charm to the interior.
The inviting living room is adorned with ceilings almost 6 meters high, designed in a vaulted style with oakwood accents, complemented by a comfortable modern sofa. It opens onto a terrace with a pool where you can relax and enjoy the natural beauty of the colorful sky reflected in the sunset. The space also includes a spacious, bright, and fully equipped Western-style kitchen, along with a dining area. Behind the kitchen, there is a pantry and a laundry room. All bedrooms have bathrooms, and the master bedroom has a separate bathtub and a rain shower. Two bedrooms have direct access to the pool with a Jacuzzi and a spacious terrace with a Sala, making it ideal for a relaxed and joyful time in a tropical atmosphere.

The villa is 100% yours. The pool is private. There is free parking, along with 24/7 security.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

The villa is located in a picturesque area,  just an 15-20 minute drive away from some of the most sought-after destinations in Phuket: beautiful Bangtao Beach with beach clubs, the upscale area of Laguna, the vibrant street of Boat Avenue with its shops and restaurants, and the thrilling Blue Tree Water Park. Nearby, Porto de Phuket Mall offers a wide array of options for every taste and preference.

To enjoy the area, it can be nice to rent either a car or a scooter. We can help with these arrangements and your vehicle will be directly delivered to the villa. If you prefer not to drive, we can help you get a taxi at any time, it is not expensive at all. The apps GRAB and BOLT are also available in Phuket.

Apart from electricity, our price is all inclusive: in particular there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
A damage deposit of 20000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Children are welcome. There is no extra charge for children, until 12 years old, sharing an existing bed.
Make-up cleaning and change of bed sheets and towels are provided every three days. You can order it more often for a small additional fee.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favourite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9am to 6pm for any question you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling and helpful.
Our driver can pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the property (1200 THB) where we will be waiting for you for the check-in, at any time of the day or night.
Electricity is charged at 7 THB/unit (kWh). We will take a photo of the official meter during your check-in and another one at check-out. We kindly ask you to settle this bill before leaving. You can expect to pay about 170 THB per bedroom per day, for a normal usage, with aircon during the night. But if you leave the aircon running while you are not in the property, you will most likely pay an additional 250 THB. While still a minimal cost, this policy is in place to avoid wastage and preserve our beautiful island!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Our goal is to provide you with a high standard accommodation together with quality hospitality services and a personal touch to make sure you have the best environment to enjoy your holidays. 
A damage deposit of 20000 THB is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
When you arrive, we will give you a check list to remind you about the following points: check-in and check-out times (as per our listing), maximum capacity (as per our listing), no smoking inside the villa (allowed in the garden and by the pool, you have a lot of space), no illegal activities, respect of the property, respect of the neighbours (no parties, no loud noise after 10pm), electricity fee (see “other things to note” section) and elementary safety precautions. In accordance with the Thai law, we will also make a copy of all passports to register the TM30 immigration forms.

Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.

During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

name: Maya Anda Villa-10 Beds Sea View (SHA Certified)
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Designed by the multi-award winning Gary Fell of GFAB Architects with experiences over South East Asia. Maya Anda Villa offers a full panoramic view of Surin Beach, one of the most prestigious beaches in Phuket. With
high society neighborhood and close proximity to top restaurants and supermarkets. The villa offers top quality finishes and facilities.

Host will be present during the reservation period

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 3 cars.

Unless agreed otherwise by the Lessor, check in time is 14:00 and check out time is 12:00. Early arrival or late departure will depend upon availability of the villa. The early check in from 08:00 and late check out before 18:00 fee is 50% of the daily rate. Before 08:00 and after 18:00, the full daily rate is applicable.

In case of booking less than 11 bedrooms, the rooms will be chosen and prepared by the villa only.

For security reasons, guests are not allow to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ etc. Otherwise, will be charged 1,500 THB per staff per hour.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20%.

Linen and towels are provided at the Villa. The linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Smoking is not permitted at any time inside the villa. Guests are allowed to smoke outdoors only and the villa manager will provide an ashtray. If guests are smoking at any time inside the villa, they will be required to pay 20,000 THB per room as a fine.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage. Any damage to artworks and antiques during the rental period will be the responsibility of the guest.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

name: 仙女别墅-卡塔五卧海景泳池别墅，免费早餐，全职女佣，200米到海滩及步行街-Villa Apsara
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
仙女别墅拥有最佳位置！步行200米就可达小卡塔海滩以及布满大大小小便利店和餐厅的购物街，不需要租车也可以度过整个完美的假日。
最美落日！满天绚烂的晚霞裹挟着傍晚轻抚的海风，倚靠在泳池边的少女，那一刻的静谧仿佛坐拥整个世界。
最高雅脱俗！Apsara飞天而来，拥抱普吉岛的西海岸，在清风海树之间吟唱着大海之歌。

位于普吉岛西海岸卡塔海滩的南区，是全球最著名的度假胜地之一。这一带是卡塔海滩最热闹的地方，遍布了大大小小各种五星级酒店和极具特色的风味餐厅，其中最为出名的有Boathouse船屋以其惊艳的餐厅，还有网红打卡胜地KATA Rocks 以其拥有绝佳的海景用餐体验出名，都是值得一去的。我们的别墅距离小卡塔海滩仅200米的距离，卡塔海滩坐拥一片超级广阔的沙滩，令人惊叹的湛蓝大海和一座美丽的小岛矗立在海湾中央，能让你拍出绝美壮丽的落日照片，也是冲浪爱好者的天堂。沙滩上方是一排全景餐厅：After Beach 和 Baan Chom View。也可步行1到2百米到达步行街，到处是便利店，各种路边餐厅，小酒吧，兑换点等。无论您第几次来普吉岛，我们别墅得天独厚的地理位置，景观和服务都值得您拥有。

仙女别墅占地1000平方米，分两层，一共有五间卧室，五间卫生间，可住10人，并配备私人停车位一个，另外小区还配有公共停车场。走进别墅推开门映入眼帘的便是我们第二层的会客厅以及室内外用餐区和一个开放式厨房。其中一间侧卧直通会客厅和厨房，随时可以取水用餐，非常方便。二楼的另外两间主卧面朝大海，一推开门就能享受到海风的吹佛。其中一间主卧拥有开阔的视角，站在带有郁葱的树木与蓝天大海相交的阳台，别有一番情致。房间内摆放着1.8*2米的大床，还有一个舒服沙发休息区，棕灰色格调中点缀着蓝色，显得格外的温馨，梳妆台和衣帽间与浴室相连，超大的落地镜，可以360度审视自己的穿衣打扮。另一间二楼的主卧， 拥有最佳超广角海景，一杯美式咖啡，一本书，不知不觉中就度过了一个惬意宁静的下午。卧室内还配备了超清三星智能电视机，可看Netflix，海量电影随你挑。浴室内配有星空顶椭圆形冲浪按摩浴缸，一边泡澡一边红酒一边仰望星空。
第一层同样是有两间海景主卧，其中一间是最优雅舒适卧室，土耳其进口地毯与棕双色泰式屋顶交相辉映，全屋暖色调的温暖融合，安详睡眠。另一间一楼的主卧直通泳池，打开门可以直接跳进泳池，畅游其中。
一间设备齐全的私人影院娱乐室同于位于一楼，两卧之间是15米长的海景无边泳池，泳池边伫立着东南亚风尖顶凉亭，是休憩欣赏落日的最佳视角。畅想一番，三五好友，打着台球，看着电影，听着音乐，泳池嬉戏，开着party，欣赏着绝美落日，是一种多么惬意的享受。

整套别墅

我们有一支热情，专业，可爱的迎宾团队，将协助您在入住期间的各种需求，并免费为您分享我们地区的旅游攻略及小贴士。为您精心挑选各种旅游活动及帮忙提供叫车租车，出海包船等出海活动，和当地的一日游路线和景点预定，例如丛林飞跃，射击活动，参观大象营，人妖秀等项目预定。

1.电费每度7泰铢。在您办理入住时,我们会把电表的读数拍下来;当您退房时,我们会再次把电表的读数拍下来。请您在离开前仔细核对并支付电费账单。对于正常使用情况，预算每间卧室消耗每天约150泰铢的费用，并于夜间使用空调。这虽然不是很多,我们制定这个政策的目的是为了避免浪费,保护我们美丽的普吉岛。
2.为了我们有个舒适清新的休息环境，室内请不要吸烟以及携带宠物等
3.我们的别墅最多可容纳10人，不提供加床服务
4.我们的别墅提供厨师服务，食材可以自己购买，服务费需要支付150泰铢/人（必须8人以上），如果食材需要厨师帮忙购买，则需额外再付食材10%的跑腿费。
5.侧卧配有套间洗手间，但是无淋浴，洗澡需要与二楼其他房间共用。

name: Impiana Kata Noi - Family Private Pool Villa
address: Tambon Karon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The Family villa; Family and Friends who wish to enjoy their holidays in Phuket together, conveniently located on the 2nd floor. The luxurious villa comprising of the lounge area, luxury bathroom with bathtub and shower and private pool overlooking the panoramic view of Andaman Sea. This stunning villa features two bedrooms with the Master suite, with king size bed and the Junior Suite (no sea view) with a queen bed and boasts a stylish and luxurious décor.

Airport transfer:
• A Private car at THB 1,300 per car per way. (max 3 persons)
• A private van at THB 1,600 per van per way. (max 7 persons)
• An additional charge during 22.01 – 05.59 hours is THB 300 per way.

Located on Phuket's quiet Kata Noi Beach, guests can enjoy a sea cruise on a luxurious yacht.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: •	The standard check-in time is 15:00 hours and the check-out time is 15:00 hours (noon).Early check-in (before the official 15:00 hrs check-in time), the room must be booked the previous night with a one-night room charge applicable. Late check out to 18:00 hours (upon availability), 50% charge of the applicable daily room rate applies. Late check-out after 18:00 hours (upon availability) one-night charge will be applied.

name: The Bright 5-bedroom Mountain View
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
An authentic Thai traditional-style villa perfectly located in the heart of Rawai, 5 minutes from Rawai Beach, 3 minutes from local shops and restaurants, and only 8-minute drive to Naiharn.

This private pool villa features 5 bedrooms and 5 tastefully appointed bathrooms that can accommodate up to 10 guests and is definitely very suitable for groups or family This unique villa offers an exquisite retreat that combines the luxury of cultural heritage with nature that you would not want to miss.

The villa is thoughtfully designed, with the option to open up all the windows, allowing the gentle tropical breeze to flow through and envelop you in refreshing airflow. 

Enjoy the pleasure of a private swimming pool measuring an impressive 11x5 meters, inviting you to bask in the serenity of your surroundings. 

Fully furnished with impeccable taste, the villa exudes elegance and comfort. The expansive plot size of 2000 sqm ensures ample space to unwind and rejuvenate. Whether you choose to relax indoors or lounge by the pool, this villa provides the perfect oasis for your tropical getaway.

This Private Swimming Pool villa is strategically located within an hour driveway from Phuket International International Airport and close to some of Phuket’s best attractions and tourist destinations including.

•	Chalong Temple 
•	Chinpracha House 
•	Phuket Seashell Museum
•	Chalong Pier
•	Kata Viewpoint
•	Kata Beach Community Park
•	Windmill Viewpoint
•	Phuket Botanic Garden
•	Promthep Cape
•	Khaokhad View Tower
•	Phuket Aquarium
•	Suan Luang Park
•	Saphan Hin Mining Monument
•	Clock tower
•	Chinpracha House
•	Thai Hua Museum
•	Kathu Mining Museum
•	Two Heroines Monument
•	

Restaurants & cafes
•	Cafe/bar Mi’s cafe
•	Restaurant Brown Rice 
•	Cafe/barI lyushino cafe

Beaches in the neighbourhood
•	Chalong Beach
•	Mu Ban Tan Khu Beach
•	Rawai Beach
•	Kata Noi Beach
•	Kata Beach

Public transport
•	Phuket Bus Terminal
•	Phuket Bus Terminal 2


With its perfect combination of comfort, style and tranquility, this villa is an absolute choice for your retreat in Rawai, Phuket – Thailand. 

Book your stay with us and experience an unforgettable stay like never before.

During your stay at our villa, you will have full access to all the amenities and spaces within the property. This includes:
- The entire villa, including all bedrooms, living areas, and bathrooms.
- The private swimming pool, perfect for relaxing and taking a refreshing dip.
- The fully furnished kitchen, equipped with a fridge, oven, hood, electric hob, and gas hob.
- A washing machine for your laundry needs.
- The library corner, offering a cozy spot for reading and relaxation.
- The pool bar, where you can enjoy drinks and conversation in a tropical setting.

At inter property Phuket, our utmost priority is ensuring that your stay is nothing short of exceptional. We are dedicated to going the extra mile to make your experience seamless, comfortable, and unforgettable. Whether you have inquiries, require assistance, or seek local recommendations, our friendly team is here for you every step of the way. Your satisfaction is our reward, and we're committed to making your time with us truly remarkable.

Book with Inter Property Phuket for a personalized touch. Once booked Enjoy a dedicated 24/7 villa manager for trip planning, car/motorbike rentals, and any assistance you need. Need extra beds? We've got you covered at 1000 each for added convenience. Your comfort is our priority.

We apply some additional charges to comply with our rental regulations as follows:  

•	Electricity Usage : Charged at 7 baht a unit. Meter readings will be recorded on arrival and departure dates. Payment shall be settled in cash before check-out. The cost per day will depend on how much you use the air conditioners, if you only use at night the approximate cost will be around 300-350 baht per day, if you use them all day & night the cost will be around 500-600 baht per day

•	Security Deposit : A 5,000 Thai baht security deposit will be collected at check in and will be refundable at check out. Any damages to the property during the guest stay,  the damaged items shall be repaired or replaced at the Guest’s expense and will be taken from the security deposit.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We apply some additional charges to comply with our rental regulations as follows:

• Electricity is billed at 7 baht in cash before departure. Various clients have different rates, with some paying 500 baht per day and others contributing 1,500 baht for heavy usage. It's important to note that we don't profit from electricity; these charges are remitted directly to the government. Additionally, the meter is checked upon check-in and again upon check-out to ensure accurate billing.

• Security Deposit : A 5,000 Thai baht security deposit will be collected at check in and will be refundable at check out. Any damages to the property during the guest stay, the damaged items shall be repaired or replaced at the Guest’s expense and will be taken from the security deposit.

name: kamala 6 bedrooms luxury villa
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
kamala 6 bedrooms luxury villa坐落在丛林覆盖的山坡顶部，俯瞰着卡马拉和苏林的新月湾，在僻静的环境中提供五星级度假村的设施。 
kamala 6 bedrooms luxury villa是泰国普吉岛全包式别墅度假体验的一部分。普吉岛卡马拉安达拉别墅度假酒店附近设有舒适的水疗中心、最先进的健身中心、大型泳池以及一流的餐厅和酒吧。精致的设计和个性化的服务使这些私人别墅成为家庭、朋友和情侣希望享受普吉岛最好的体验的完美选择。

name: ⭐Star View Villa 7BR w/ Infinity Pool Near Beach
address: Tambon Kamala, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious villa has 7 bedrooms that can comfortably accommodate up to 14 guests. Located on the hillside overlooking the Andaman Sea, this villa is perfect for those who prefer a more quiet and laidback holiday with everything you need. Kamala Beach can be reach in 5 minutes and Patong is just a 15 minute drive. With a large private infinity pool and spacious living area, it is perfect for a group of friends or an entire family.

Upon entering the villa you will be overwhelmed by the magnificent decor and sea views. Keep yourself refreshed in your very own private infinity pool and there are plenty of places by the pool to relax in. You will find cushioned deck chairs, table and chairs on the Sala areas shaded from the sun surrounded by the ocean breeze and lush gardens. 

There are 7 spacious bedrooms in the villa. Two master bedrooms comes with king sized beds, walk in closets, living areas, dual vanities, safe boxes, desk and chairs, private balconies and stunning ocean views. Three other bedrooms comes with king sized beds, walk in closets, living areas, dual vanities, safe boxes, desk and chairs, incredibly ocean views and direct access to the terrace. The sixth bedroom has a king/twin sized bed, walk in closet, desk and chairs, safe box and a living area. The last bedroom has a queen sized bed, walk in closet, safe box, desk and chairs and a living area. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, ceiling fans and free WIFI. Four of the bedrooms has pristine ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and bathtubs. The other two bedrooms also has pristine en suite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and dual vanities.

In the villa, there are two immaculate living areas with each unique in design and have stunning ocean views . Both living rooms consists big comfortable lounges, flat screen TV, air-conditioning and ceiling fans. You can enjoy meals on a large wooden table dining set with 12 seats or there are tables and chairs outside in the Sala area for al fresco dining.

The stylish modern kitchen has granite countertops with a bright social ambience and the breakfast bar. It is fully equipped with a stove, oven, microwave, rice cooker, refrigerator/freezer, coffee maker, ice machine, pantry items, dishes and utensils. 

Daily maid service is provided to ensure your holiday home remains in the finest condition for the entirety of your stay.

Guests can access the entire property.

We will give guests their space but are easily contactable to help assist our guests. We offer many additional services such as tours, breakfast, private chef, barbecues, airport transfers, car & motorcycle hire. Please don't hesitate to ask if you would like something arranged to enhance your stay.

Although the temptation will be to stay in your luxurious surroundings, there are plenty of opportunities to visit local attractions. You are close to the Phuket FantaSea and Kamala Market and there are many excellent seafood restaurants right on the seashore. Kathu Waterfalls can be visited en-route to the Tiger Kingdom Phuket and many other attractions will mean those days out are filled with interest. Kamala Beach is just a 5 minute drive and Phuket’s non-stop city centre can be reached in 15 minutes. You really do have the perfect, tranquil location with easy access to many different attractions.

We can help arrange vehicle hire or single trip transportation.

6,000 THB (per day) Damage deposit due on arrival to be refunded on departure less any damages.

No Smoking Indoors Please, violations will be fined.

No Pets

Breakfast Included 2 (guests) per room

Chef Service Included

24 hrs Villa assistant

Any reservation checkin in 25 Dec, hotel will impose compulsory stay until 3 Jan

Chef Service Included.

name: Studio Deluxe 2 Bedroom Connect at The Mangrove
address: Tambon Wichit, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Studio Deluxe 2 Bedrooms is ideal for families or groups of up to six with a connecting door between two standard rooms. Only a few steps out of the room, guests can indulge in a great view of the mangrove beach against the mountains adorned by the Big Buddha. Situated at the centre, guests are entitled quick access to hotel’s facilities, whether it be the infinity salt water pool and Grove Cafe.

The Mangrove Panwa Phuket Resort offers 32 spacious and airy rooms comprising of Studio Deluxe; Studio Villa Garden; Studio Villa Ocean; and Studio Deluxe - Connecting - 2 Bedrooms.

All studio rooms & villas have been built with the same size and a balcony offering a relaxing space surrounded by tropical freshness of the mangrove greenery.  Rooms with facilities within the comfort of your quarters including satellite LCD TV, microwave, and complimentary Wi-Fi access.

Our front desk available 24 hrs.

It’s 15mins drive from Phuket Town, 45mins from the Airport by car, 30 mins drive to Patong.

name: Leelavadee @ Eva Beach - Beachfront Pool Villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This luxury villa is premium quality development, located on the beach front, offering unique beach activities and boat trip opportunities from your foot steps. Located in the South east coast of Phuket, between the quite Chalong bay and Rawai.

Our villa caters comfortably for six guests. This 3-floor villa has 3 bedrooms and ensuite bathrooms. All bedrooms are equipped with king/queen-sized beds and air conditioning. 

The villa includes a 4x9m private swimming pool overlooking the beach.

Private access to the whole villa and access to the beach.

In-house Wifi available.

Guests can request services for an additional charge. 

𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗳: 3,000 THB / per day (equivalent to 8-hours) 
𝗠𝗮𝗶𝗱 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲: 1,000 THB / per time (equivalent to 2 and a half hours) 
𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗻𝘀 + 𝗧𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗹𝘀: 1,000 THB / per time 

** Please inform us 2 days in advance so that we can prepare ahead of time. **

𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸-𝗶𝗻 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲: 15:00
𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸-𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲: 12:00

𝗘𝗮𝗿𝗹𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸-𝗶𝗻:
From 10:00 - 12:00 - 50% of the regular daily rate will be applied.
Before 10:00 - 100% of the regular daily rate will be applied. 

𝗟𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸-𝗼𝘂𝘁:
From 15:00 - 18:00 - 50% of the regular rate will be applied.
After 18:00 - 100% of the regular daily rate will be applied.

Please be informed that the maximum capacity is 6 people(s). 
Parties and events are not allowed on premises.

Full crew dedicated professionals to ensure an unforgettable experience - a Captain to navigate the seas, a Hostess/Chef to tantalize your taste buds, and a Deck Officer to cater to your every need.
Toys: Inflatable Slide / Snorkeling and fishing gears / Kayak / Stand-up paddle board / Floating Jacuzzi / Floating big mat / Noodle seats 
Phuket-Phang Nga-Krabi-Lanta
All-inclusive for 24 hours.

We provide private mini van transfer from the airport or your hotel to the marina to board the boat.

sectionedDescription/description:
别墅坐落在普吉岛卡马拉（Kamala）的中心地带，坐落在广受赞誉的安达拉别墅度假村（Andara Resort & Villas）内，是奢华和优雅的巅峰之作。

作为庄园中最大的别墅，它横跨两块广阔的土地，承诺为家人和朋友量身定制一个豪华的 6 居室绿洲。V

name: Signature Ocean View Pool Suite
address: Tambon Si Sunthon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Within the luscious shade of artfully managed old-growth canopy, an intimate community of luxurious pool villas and residences nest and offer panoramic ocean views.

Sun decks crafted with planks of bleached teak, an expansive infinity pool marching toward the horizon, a bird’s eye view of the Andaman Sea. Generous indoor and outdoor living spaces and a breakfast nook make family gatherings a warm, festive affair. The serene hillside perch leaves endless space for imagination to wander freely.

Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.

name: Luxury & Homey 5 Bedroom Pool Villa
address: A Thalang, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Our luxury Thai & Modern style 5 bedroom holiday homes are located in the stunning East Coast of Phuket where you can find and enjoy the green tropical nature. It offers ultimate privacy with living area of 500 square meters including  5 bedroom, 5 bathroom furnished with bathtub and shower, a private pool, children play area and BBQ facility. Private car parking space is also available free of charge.

Recommend Restaurants nearby;
Kin-Dee Cafe Bar & Bistro, only just right next to our place. They serve Thai and Wester Cuisine, available daily from 7am to 10pm 

BBQ Stove;
Complimentary BBQ stove for your special party with friends and family subject to request and the availability.

Private Massage;
Our property manager will be happy to arrange you In villa massage to make you enjoy the most privacy and relaxation at our resort, the advance arrangement is required.

Tours and activities;
The information will be provided upon requested, we have plenty of Phuket Activities available such as Island Tours, Eco-Tours, Safari, sightseeing, shows and etc.

Rental Service;
Car rental: 600 thb per day, Toyota Vios or Honda City (petrol excluded)
Car rental: 1,200 thb per day, Honda Fortuner (petrol excluded)
Motorbike rental: 175 thb per day, Honda Click (petrol excluded)
Bicycle rental: Free of charge

We have 24 hours duty manager on site.

• Please note: Electricity is NOT included in price of stay. It is charged separately at the rate of 6 Baht per Kilowatt.

This policy is to ensure the best rates to our guests who are concerned about saving electricity and our planet; as we believe it wouldn't be fair for guests who are concerned about saving electricity and our planet to have to pay higher fixed rates to cover for others who use electricity excessively.

name: Bluesiam Villa–10 Beds,closest to Surin beach(SHA)
address: Phuket, *, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Bluesiam Villa sits on a hill overlooking a prestigious Surin Beach.
One of the only private villas in the area that can give you 100% sea-view with 100% privacy and in walking distance to the beach.
A private villa that accommodates up to 22+ people with all 11 bedrooms facing the ocean and various in-house facilities you could enjoy.
With our Villa Manager and his team at your service to ensure your well-being and provide the best comfort like no others.

Bluesiam Villa sits on a hill overlooking a prestigious Surin Beach.
One of the only private villas in the area that can give you 100% sea-view with 100% privacy and in walking distance to the beach.
A private villa that accommodates up to 22+ people with all 11 bedrooms facing the ocean and various in-house facilities you could enjoy.
With our Villa Manager and his team at your service to ensure your well-being and provide the best comfort like no others.

Rental prices upon bedrooms use.

Guest have full access to the villa facility no matter how many bedrooms booked.
To go to the beach, the guest can simply walk to the security box to the beach.
It is also walking distance to convenient stores (7-Eleven & Family Mart) & restaurants.

Our staff are at the villa from 9am-9pm every day, they will be at the staff area on the main floor standing by if there's any service the guest may need, in the same time keeping an optimum distance from the guest for privacy.
For any emergency, the Villa manager can be contacted 24hours and he/she will be at the villa within 15 mins.

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 10 cars.

Maybe some construction noises nearby until the end of May 2019.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Our staff are at the villa from 9am-9pm every day, they will be at the staff area on the main floor standing by if there's any service the guest may need, in the same time keeping an optimum distance from the guest for privacy.
For any emergency, the Villa manager can be contacted 24hours and he/she will be at the villa within 15 mins.

name: Потрясающая 5 спальная вилла в Лагуне. Экслюзив.
address: Tambon Thep Krasatti, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Потрясающая просторная вилла с большим участком, частным  бассейном,  патио, зоной барбекю, и т.д.. 300 м до лучшего пляжа Пхукета, Бангтао. Невероятный вид на озеро.  
Вилла полностью готова к приему гостей, краткосрочному и долгосрочному проживанию.  Тихо и спокойно.
Великолепный вид на озеро, много зелени,  и солнце и тень. Шаговая доступность -  до кафе и ресторанов, Boat avenue. Сервис 24/7.  Отличная семейная вилла, которая раньше никогда не сдавалась.
Абсолютно уникальное предложение!

Лучший район о. Пхукет, Бангтао  -  Лагуна. Гольф поля международного класса, теннисные корты, рестораны и бары,  пляжные клубы Top 10 Global,социальная инфраструктура международного уровняю

name: Exquisite 6BR Villa Rooftop Pool Above Surin Beach
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience a luxurious stay on the hill of Surin Beach at Exquisite 6BR Thai Boutique Villa 5 Mins Surin Beach. This stunning villa offers a rooftop pool, free WiFi, and captivating ocean views. The spacious non-smoking rooms feature air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, and elegant decor. 

Enjoy sea views from large windows and indulge in en-suite bathrooms with bathtubs. The villa is conveniently located, just a short drive from Phuket Town, Patong Beach, and the airport.

Bedroom 1: 1 King-size bed
Bedroom 2: 1 King-size bed
Bedroom 3: 1 King-size bed
Bedroom 4: 1 King-size bed
Bedroom 5: 1 King-size bed
Bedroom 6: 2 Single beds

Villa's features:
- Villa is situated on a steep hill, offering unique views and a tranquil setting
- Total area of 2,734 square meters
- Free transfer to Surin Beach and Bangtao Beach which is just  (5-10 mins) away and service available at 09:00 - 17:00 hrs
- Private rooftop swimming pool and sunlounger
- Balcony with sea, pool, and mountain views
- Rooftop pool with panoramic sky views
- Air conditioning in every bedroom and ceiling fan
- Spacious living area
- Flat-screen TV
- Soundproofing 
- Coffee machine
- Free wireless internet (WiFi)

Noted
- Continental breakfast included
- Complimentary round-trip airport transfers
- Dedicated Villa Manager to ensure a seamless stay
- Professional Chef available for culinary delights
- Cleaning staff provided a tidy and comfortable environment

Please be informed below information before booking; 

- Villa located on a steep hill, recommending the rental of a motorbike, or small car, or using taxi services for convenient transportation.

- Walking from the villa to the beach is an option for those looking to incorporate exercise into their routine.

- Staff is available to assist with grocery and drink purchases upon request.
A 20% service fee will be charged on the original bills.

- Private chef on-site, specializing in Asian cuisine for the enjoyment of guests.

- Additional single beds can be added upon request for a fee of 3,000 THB per night per bed.

name: 1 bedroom beachfront infinity pool villa in Kata
address: Karon, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This villa style accommodation is offering beautiful sea views and 5-star beachfront living with your own private pool above one of the most desirable destinations in Phuket – Kata Noi Beach. This adult-only development has a main infinity pool, pampering spa and free Wi-Fi.

Fitted with stylish wooden flooring and fully air-conditioned , the villa features large clear glass doors which open up to a private sundeck. A flat-screen TV, minibar and bathroom with bathtub is only few of the villas’ features . Experience the ultimate blend of luxurious seclusion and boundless space . This sea view villa features a private infinity pool, sunken lounge, bath with rain shower and amazing views of the ocean . It is a 20-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Airport transfers are provided at an extra charge.  With a sophisticated interior design that combines soft colors and natural textures with gentle oriental touches , enjoy delightful sunset views while zipping in a delicious cocktail ….life cannot get any better .

It is a 20-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Airport transfers are provided at an extra charge.  With a sophisticated interior design that combines soft colors and natural textures with gentle oriental touches , enjoy delightful sunset views while zipping in a delicious cocktail ….life cannot get any better .
sectionedDescription/summary: This villa style accommodation is offering beautiful sea views and 5-star beachfront living with your own private pool above one of the most desirable destinations in Phuket – Kata Noi Beach. This adult-only development has a main infinity pool, pampering spa and free Wi-Fi.

name: Montrésor Luxury Residence Phuket Bang Tao
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Montrésor Residence is a 10,000 sq.ft., 7-king size bedroom luxury smart home. Located near Bang Tao beach and Boat Avenue, it offers a mix of serenity and vibrancy. 

Enjoy a multi-sports court, a full gym, a heated jaccuzi, a deep pool with a diving board, and a ping-pong deck. Relax in the heated spa or steam shower. The double island kitchen and family room are perfect for hosting, complemented by a billiards and media room. 

Montresor is an oasis within the action of Bang Tao, Phuket

name: 1 bed beachfront villa Maikhao
address: Mai Khao, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This is a magical, enchanting, sumptuous, pervasive luxury and embracing elegance beachfront pool villa. Decorated in an Asian luxury style, it is here to provide you an experience you never had before. This beachfront project defies your imagination in size, service and solitude. This is a holiday dream come true. Luxuriate in this extravagant villa. The single-story, pool villa is an overwhelming property of pure luxury and top-notch service.

Rub away all of your stress in a soothing, euphoric, eco-harmonious spa. Stroll in happy solitude on a sun-swept private beach. Discover your perfect private sanctuary nestled amidst tropical greenery. Designed with teak-plank walls, the 410-sqm beachfront villa offers guests direct access to the soft sandy beach. The spacious bedroom and living area blend seamlessly with the elegant sundeck that is adorned with a private swimming pool and outdoor jacuzzi. Exquisite Thai and Continental furnishings include fine Thai silk and hand-painted walls.

Mai Khao Beach, often called Haad Mai Khao by the Thai themselves, is a lot less visited compared to Phuket’s popular beaches like Kata, Patong and Karon. The beach is situated in the far north of Phuket, next to Phuket International Airport (HKT). Needless to say, it’s a lot calmer here. Especially in relation to the size of the beach. With a length of nearly 10 kilometers, the beach is the longest beach on Phuket. It feels nice having a beach all to yourself!

name: Kamala Infinity Pool 6 BR Villa
address: Ko Kaeo, Phuket, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
这是一栋六卧别墅，位于普吉岛著名的海滨社区卡马拉的中心地带，坐落在普吉岛豪华私人别墅的顶峰之中，拥有五星级的配置。在这处宁静房源中，您可以与全家人尽情放松。

别墅在僻静的环境中提供全包式度假体验，配备五星级度假村的设施。

度假村和别墅位于普吉岛卡马拉的安达拉度假村和别墅，设有水疗中心，最先进的健身中心，广阔的游泳池以及一流的餐厅和酒吧。

包含服务：
私人厨师
管家
敬业的服务人员
礼宾服务

包含的必需品：
每日客房清洁和夜床服务
别墅内餐饮服务，适合任何活动
前往卡马拉海滩的班车服务
度假村周围的越野车服务
使用度假村的 5 星级健身房
使用度假村的网球场
使用度假村的儿童俱乐部

房屋室内外所有设施可供客人使用。

提供中，英，泰语在线服务。

name: Maya Anda Villa-9 Beds Sea View (SHA Certified)
address: Tambon Choeng Thale, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Designed by the multi-award winning Gary Fell of GFAB Architects with experiences over South East Asia. Maya Anda Villa offers a full panoramic view of Surin Beach, one of the most prestigious beaches in Phuket. With
high society neighborhood and close proximity to top restaurants and supermarkets. The villa offers top quality finishes and facilities.

Host will be present during the reservation period

Surin Beach area is considered one of the nicest beaches in Phuket, as well as the most high-end neighborhood of Phuket. With many restaurants, supermarket, beach clubs and shopping places in the area, all within 15 mins drive from the villa.

Our trusted driver is on standby all day from 9am-9pm (unless discussed otherwise).
The rate is depending on the destination.
If the guest is renting a car, we do have rental services and enough parking for 3 cars.

Unless agreed otherwise by the Lessor, check in time is 14:00 and check out time is 12:00. Early arrival or late departure will depend upon availability of the villa. The early check in from 08:00 and late check out before 18:00 fee is 50% of the daily rate. Before 08:00 and after 18:00, the full daily rate is applicable.

In case of booking less than 11 bedrooms, the rooms will be chosen and prepared by the villa only.

For security reasons, guests are not allow to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ etc. Otherwise, will be charged 1,500 THB per staff per hour.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20%.

Linen and towels are provided at the Villa. The linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Smoking is not permitted at any time inside the villa. Guests are allowed to smoke outdoors only and the villa manager will provide an ashtray. If guests are smoking at any time inside the villa, they will be required to pay 20,000 THB per room as a fine.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage. Any damage to artworks and antiques during the rental period will be the responsibility of the guest.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Early check-in from 8:00 AM and late check-out before 6:00 PM is at an extra 50% of the daily rate. Before 8:00 AM and after 6:00 PM, the full daily rate applies. 

Only the number of persons stipulated in the Rental Agreement may reside at the Property as Guests. 

Noise shall be kept at a minimum, especially during the hours of 11:00 PM-8:00 AM. 

The working hours of villa staff are from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM unless discussed otherwise.

Additional services such as those of chefs, babysitters, and/or drivers can be sourced in advance or on-site upon request. 

Guests are not allowed to bring any outside staff or services such as masseuse, chef, bartender, DJ, etc. Otherwise, will be charged.

All food and beverage items purchased on behalf of Guests will be charged to guests at cost plus 20% or a minimum of 50 THB per trip.

Linens are changed every 3-5 days, or as deemed necessary. Towels will be replaced when they are placed in the towel basket. If more frequent changes are required, there may be extra charges.

Additional bedding is available upon request and at additional cost.

All villas contain several precious contemporary and antique art pieces. This collection is part of the uniqueness of the villa. Guests must be aware of the unique nature of these works of art and antiques and be especially cautious to avoid any damage.

name: 3-bedroom ocean view pool villa
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Perched at the beachfront, this cozy three bedroom pool villa and two bathroom enjoys amazing sea views and is only a few steps away the shore. Your infinity pool and terrace extends down to the beach, giving you a private beachfront sanctuary for you and your family to enjoy.

The villa is spacious and fully furnished and has plenty of space by the pool and sun loungers to relax outdoors amongst nature. Connecting doors are available for family gatherings or large groups.

We offer daily cleaning service included within your reservation.   

Breakfast is available from 07.30 -10.30 hours daily at our restaurant at extra charge, where guests can start the day with a fresh coffee and cooked meal listening to the gentle waves lap ashore with beautiful scenery all around. During the stay, guests can enjoy relaxing surrounded by mature parkland home to swans, deer, buffaloes, horses, geese, turkeys, bantams and many bird species, a true nature's hideaway. Also bike around with free bicycle rental. 

BREAKFAST 
Net price: THB 320.- per person
Breakfast hours: 08:00 - 11:00 (Last order: 10:30)
Type: American breakfast (set menu)
Salad bar: Toast, croissant, butter, jam, yogurt, milk, fresh seasonal fruits, fruit juice, coffee, and tea
Location: Neighbourhood Café

Guests can do BBQ in the backyard using BBQ grill available on site.

BEACH ACCESS 
This is not a swimming beach since we are located on the east coast of Phuket. However, our seashore is calm, relaxing, and offers the panoramic view of Chalong Pier and nearby islands. The beach is exposed by low tides and submerged by high tides. Enjoy "clam digging" activity when it is low tide.  The closest swimming beach is Nai Harn Beach, just 15 minutes' drive from our property.

NEARBY RESTAURANTS & SHOPS
A selection of restaurants and conveniences are available within an easy stroll just next door at Fisherman Way Business Garden. Supermarkets are just a 5-minute walk.

There are excellent support services for utilities such as water, electricity and telephone/internet cables and refuse collection, and security staff guard and patrol the estate 24 hours a day.

name: Trisara Villa No. 20 (Signature 2 Bedroom Villa)
address: Tambon Si Sunthon, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 2PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and panoramic sea views, this spacious two-bedroom villa with an additional smaller third bedroom is perfect for families of two to three couples.

The villa features a large central living and dining pavilion, two large ocean-facing bedrooms, an additional third bedroom, a fully functional kitchen, an infinity lap pool, and an expansive outdoor deck for lounging and dining.

The villa is cared for and serviced by one dedicated cook and one housekeeping staff who prepare home-cooked Thai and Western dishes from the modern kitchen.

Complimentary access to 5 stars hotels' facilities I.e Tennis court, Gym, Heavenly Spa and Restaurant by the beach etc.

Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our resort's reception is open 24 hours.
sectionedDescription/name: Trisara Villa No. 20 (Signature 2 Bedroom Villa)
sectionedDescription/space: The villa is cared for and serviced by one dedicated cook and one housekeeping staff who prepare home-cooked Thai and Western dishes from the modern kitchen.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and panoramic sea views, this spacious two-bedroom villa with an additional smaller third bedroom is perfect for families of two to three couples.

The villa features a large central living and dining pavilion, two large ocean-facing bedrooms, an additional third bedroom, a fully functional kitchen, an infinity lap pool, and an expansive outdoor deck for lounging and dining.

name: Luxury Villa on The Hillside of Nai Harn Beach
address: Tambon Rawai, Chang Wat Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Villa is set on 4 rai of land plot, a combination of modern comfort and exquisite design in traditional Thai style. The residence, with a panoramic swimming pool and tropical garden, is located on a hilltop with magnificent views of the sea and sunsets.

The villa, with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, is great for relaxation, wedding celebrations, parties, or any other event in Phuket. Inside, you'll find a stylish and exclusive design, light-filled spacious rooms with breathtaking views of the sea, mountains, and tropical gardens, quality and comfortable furniture, and a relaxing atmosphere. 

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning. In the living room and bedrooms, there are large flat TVs and sound systems. The kitchen has all the necessary appliances and utensils for cooking your favorite dishes. For your comfort and relaxation, the villa has a two-person staff, including a personal Thai chef. There is a games room with a billiard table, a pool table, a gym room, a library, a cinema room, and a wine room. In the bedrooms, there are king-sized beds; personal dressing rooms; large baths; private terraces; and views of the sea and sunsets.

Outside, the villa is surrounded by a tropical garden. There is a golf course with 18 holes, a tennis court, and a helipad. There is underground parking under the helipad for up to 10 cars.

Whole Villa with common facilities Golf Course, Tennis Court, Sauna, fitness and car park.

We will leave you to your privacy, but we are always available to assist you during your stay. 

Contact Line ID: fluke.kankawee

Situated in a wonderfully tranquil location, The Villa gives access to the best of Phuket, white sandy Naiharn beach, Kata Beach and Rawai Beach. With restaurants close by, you are ideally located to choose a relaxing evening dining by your pool or sampling the local and international cuisines on offer a few minutes drive away.

Travel Distance:

7-11: 2.4 km
Nai Harn Beach: 3.3 km
Rawai Beach: 4.4 km
Chalong Pier: 7.4 km
Kata Beach: 5.5 km
Restaurant: 4.4 km
Phuket International Airport: 48 km
Bangkok Phuket Hospital: 19 km
Makro Rawai: 5.5 km
Lotus Tesco Express: 1.7 km
International School of Phuket: 6.1 km
Central Festival Phuket: 17 km
Phuket Old Town: 16 km

HELP US CONSERVE ENERGY & WATER
Room rates are include electricity usage at 100 unit meter per day. Over usage we will charge at THB6 per unit meter. So please turn off the lights and air conditioning when you are not using them.

SECURITY DEPOSIT
A security deposit of 3,000 THB or 100USD shall be paid on check-in hereof as a Security Guarantee for the utilities and any damage and/or loss inside the Villa 

LOCATION
The Property is not walking distance to the main road or shops. Private transport is HIGHLY recommended. We can help you arrange car/bike hire.

CHECK IN/ CHECK OUT
Guests should assume that check-in time is after 3pm, and check-out time is prior to 11am, unless otherwise agreed. Check in and checkout times are usually flexible but this is not guaranteed, so please ask in advance.

POOL TOWELS
Pool towels are available by the villa.

PARKING
Parking garage for 4 cars.

KITCHEN
The kitchens are fully equipped and ready for use. Please ensure all equipment is left clean.

CLEANING
Please be informed that we have an in-house maid. She will work from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., and she can help with laundry. We will change bed linens and towels every 3 days.

SWIMMING POOL
The salt water pool system size is 12 x 5 meters with a depth of 1 to 1.5 meters.

FACILITIES
Guest can use the cinema room, sauna, gym with full equipment, and pool table. Outside, the villa is surrounded by a tropical garden. There is a golf course with 18 holes, a tennis court, and a helipad. There is underground parking under the helipad for up to 10 cars.


* Please read HOUSE RULES. Thank you

SERVICES
In order for Guest to feel welcome and comfortable, we also provide some extra services below:

- Car rental can be arranged.

- Transfer pick-up from the airport can be arranged. Please inform us in advance with details of your arrival flight, domestic or international. The transfer fare isTHB 1200 for the car with 4–9 seats.

- Thai Chef for breakfast, lunch, and dinner service can be arranged with a cost. 

- We have contact with travel tours, restaurants, beach clubs, golf, private charters, and spas. Let us guide you around Phuket.

- In-house massage, pedicure, and manicure can be arranged with a cost.

- Cleaning service and laundry service are available at a cost.

I WILL BE HAPPY TO PROVIDE ANY LOCAL SERVICE AS WELL AS ADDRESS ANY QUESTIONS OR ISSUES THAT MAY ARISE DURING YOUR STAY!

Please read HOUSE RULES. Thank you!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
STONE MOUNTAIN GOLF VILLA HOUSE RULES:

We aim to make your stay more comfortable as it can possibly be! We would like our guests to treat and create beautiful memories in our villa. We would truly appreciate it if you can follow these house rules. Thank you in advance and truly appreciate your cooperation!

HELP US CONSERVE ENERGY
Room rate are include an electricity usage of 50 unit per day over usage will be charge at THB 6 per Kwt upon check-out, calculate by meter reading. So please turn off the lights and air condition when you are not using them.

NO PARTIES OR EVENTS
Be considerate to your neighbors, avoiding loudness and noise particularly between 10 pm and 8 am. Surroundings is quiet and peaceful. we would like to stay that way. 

LOSS OR DAMAGES
You are personally responsible for anything you damage. Contact us as soon as possible to declare it. You are also responsible for your personal belongings. We recommend to purchase traveler insurance in your country. In case of personal injury you should always contact your own insurance company. House owner or the agency cannot be held responsible but are available if you need help.

SWIMMING POOL
Use the swimming pool on your own responsibility. Keep the children under constant supervision. Take a shower before the use of swimming pool. Do not go wet into the house or use indoor furniture.

FOOD AND BEVERAGE
No eating or drinking in the bedrooms.

BARBECUE AND FIREPLACE
Keep the fire under constant control, everything around is very dry during the summer and easy flammable. Use a small amount of water to safely turn off the fire in the outdoor barbecue.

SHOES
we do provide slipper in the room. No Shoes Inside The Home Please.

DO NOT USE THE PREMISES FOR ANY ILLEGAL ACTIVITY.

BATHROOM
Do not flush sanitary/feminine hygiene products, wet baby wipes, used diapers, hand towels, cotton balls into the toilet, please use container provided for this purpose.

CLEANING SERVICE
Housekeeping will clean the villa before check in and after check out only.

SMOKING
No smoking inside the room. A fine of THB5,000 will be applied. Smoking is permitted on the balcony but you must keep the balcony doors closed. 

ENJOY YOUR STAY!
sectionedDescription/interaction:
We will leave you to your privacy, but we are always available to assist you during your stay. 

Contact Line ID: fluke.kankawee
sectionedDescription/name: Luxury Villa on The Hillside of Nai Harn Beach
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Situated in a wonderfully tranquil location, The Villa gives access to the best of Phuket, white sandy Naiharn beach, Kata Beach and Rawai Beach. With restaurants close by, you are ideally located to choose a relaxing evening dining by your pool or sampling the local and international cuisines on offer a few minutes drive away.
sectionedDescription/notes:
HELP US CONSERVE ENERGY & WATER
Room rates are include electricity usage at 100 unit meter per day. Over usage we will charge at THB6 per unit meter. So please turn off the lights and air conditioning when you are not using them.

SECURITY DEPOSIT
A security deposit of 3,000 THB or 100USD shall be paid on check-in hereof as a Security Guarantee for the utilities and any damage and/or loss inside the Villa 

LOCATION
The Property is not walking distance to the main road or shops. Private transport is HIGHLY recommended. We can help you arrange car/bike hire.

CHECK IN/ CHECK OUT
Guests should assume that check-in time is after 3pm, and check-out time is prior to 11am, unless otherwise agreed. Check in and checkout times are usually flexible but this is not guaranteed, so please ask in advance.

POOL TOWELS
Pool towels are available by the villa.

PARKING
Parking garage for 4 cars.

KITCHEN
The kitchens are fully equipped and ready for use. Please ensure all equipment is left clean.

CLEANING
Please be informed that we have an in-house maid. She will work from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., and she can help with laundry. We will change bed linens and towels every 3 days.

SWIMMING POOL
The salt water pool system size is 12 x 5 meters with a depth of 1 to 1.5 meters.

FACILITIES
Guest can use the cinema room, sauna, gym with full equipment, and pool table. Outside, the villa is surrounded by a tropical garden. There is a golf course with 18 holes, a tennis court, and a helipad. There is underground parking under the helipad for up to 10 cars.


* Please read HOUSE RULES. Thank you

SERVICES
In order for Guest to feel welcome and comfortable, we also provide some extra services below:

- Car rental can be arranged.

- Transfer pick-up from the airport can be arranged. Please inform us in advance with details of your arrival flight, domestic or international. The transfer fare isTHB 1200 for the car with 4–9 seats.

- Thai Chef for breakfast, lunch, and dinner service can be arranged with a cost. 

- We have contact with travel tours, restaurants, beach clubs, golf, private charters, and spas. Let us guide you around Phuket.

- In-house massage, pedicure, and manicure can be arranged with a cost.

- Cleaning service and laundry service are available at a cost.

I WILL BE HAPPY TO PROVIDE ANY LOCAL SERVICE AS WELL AS ADDRESS ANY QUESTIONS OR ISSUES THAT MAY ARISE DURING YOUR STAY!

Please read HOUSE RULES. Thank you!
sectionedDescription/space:
The villa, with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, is great for relaxation, wedding celebrations, parties, or any other event in Phuket. Inside, you'll find a stylish and exclusive design, light-filled spacious rooms with breathtaking views of the sea, mountains, and tropical gardens, quality and comfortable furniture, and a relaxing atmosphere. 

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning. In the living room and bedrooms, there are large flat TVs and sound systems. The kitchen has all the necessary appliances and utensils for cooking your favorite dishes. For your comfort and relaxation, the villa has a two-person staff, including a personal Thai chef. There is a games room with a billiard table, a pool table, a gym room, a library, a cinema room, and a wine room. In the bedrooms, there are king-sized beds; personal dressing rooms; large baths; private terraces; and views of the sea and sunsets.

Outside, the villa is surrounded by a tropical garden. There is a golf course with 18 holes, a tennis court, and a helipad. There is underground parking under the helipad for up to 10 cars.
sectionedDescription/summary: The Villa is set on 4 rai of land plot, a combination of modern comfort and exquisite design in traditional Thai style. The residence, with a panoramic swimming pool and tropical garden, is located on a hilltop with magnificent views of the sea and sunsets.

name: Sea view Patong Grand villa
address: Patong, Phuket, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Patong is a BIG FUN VILLA in the center of Phuket’s famous West Coast, in a beautiful tropical forest at the north end of Patong Bay, in a quiet seaside town called Kalim. Only 5 minutes from Patong Beach - Asia’s capital for holiday entertainment and activities of every possible kind. Yet it's TOTALLY PRIVATE AND SECLUDED at the villa.
Only 5 minutes to Kamala and 10 minutes to Surin Beach for a different experience. So you can have the best of both worlds on your holiday.

PLEASE BE SURE TO READ THE HOUSE RULES BEFORE YOU BOOK

Villa Patong is in a private Estate of only 5 villas 50 meters above sea level - on a small mountain.
Set in a tropical forest – a natural and refreshing scene. 
Direct sea views of Patong Beach and the city. It's really quite beautiful at night time, as the city lights sparkle.

You won't find a villa with more privacy in Patong Bay. There are no properties on either side of the villa. 
Land:  1,800  sqm
Villa:    1,300  sqm built area
Villa:       800  sqm internal area 

Total 6  bedrooms:
x 5 double bedrooms (1 King size bed)
x 1 twin bedroom (2 single beds)
Every bedroom has a full en-suite with shower, except one of the double rooms has a bathroom en-suite with toilet and basin, but no shower.

15 meter main pool. The pool is only 1.2 meters deep, so you can stand in it and have a beer! 
Plus a Children’s pool 5 meters x 5 meters in size and 20cm deep. 
BBQ and outdoor dining area on the pool deck
Sound system on pool deck.
Pool shower on pool deck
Large garden and grounds. 

Upper level - main building has a very large living area, combining open kitchen, dining and lounge. High exposed timber ceilings, wrap around tall windows, open up onto an extensive terrace to create a great entertainment space.
Child safe glass barriers around the top deck. Let the youngsters play.

Big TV in the living room and sound system
Satellite TV with 100 channels 
TV in every bedroom (except 1)

Big 80 sqm master bedroom suite  - walk in wardrobe - walk through luxury shower.
Note the jacuzzi in the photos is just a decoration. It's out of order, but we left it there for now.

All the bedroom floors have been changed to cream color luxury tiles. They look and feel better than the wood floors, everybody says so.

Fully equipped kitchen with 2 main fridges, so you can stock up big time.
Air conditioning 
HI Speed Wi Fi    
Lock safes  in every bedroom
Washing machine and dryer for guests use
Garden and Pool service
Undercover double garage 
Security Guards on site 6pm to 8am
Check in/out times can be flexible, by prior arrangement.

Everywhere. The whole Villa is yours.

The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.

Villa Patong is located right in the middle of Phuket’s famous west coast, at the north end of Patong Bay in a quiet seaside town called Kalim. The villa is 50 meters above sea level, on a small mountain - in a secluded private Estate.
Kalim has many fine dining restaurants, including some of Phuket's best, as well as many local well priced places to eat.
A short 5 minute drive to Patong Beach, nightlife, restaurants and spas ... everything from major shopping malls, night markets, to vendors selling street food and fruits roadside. 
Only 10 minutes drive north along the coast to quieter Kamala, and trendy Surin Beaches for a different style. Kamala is a popular destination, highlights of the area include Kamala beach, Phuket Fantasea, Carnival Magic, Oasis SPA, Tsunami Memorial, Wat Baan Kamala temple, Scuba Dive Center and Cafe del Mar beach club. 
At the Villa you will enjoy total privacy. There are no properties on either side of the villa. Security guards on site from 6pm to 8am for peace of mind.

THE PRICE INCLUDES:
Daily maids on duty 8am to 5pm for service and cleaning.
The maids will cook an amazing breakfast feast for you. 
Cost of food is paid by the guests. If the maids do the food shopping for breakfast, there is a 15% mark up on the cost of the food.
Any shopping done for the guests by the maids/staff has a 15% mark up on the cost of the shopping.
A villa manager will meet you at check in, and be available for assistance as required.

OPTIONAL EXTRA COST:
- Taxi minivan service on call 24/7. Pay per trip like a taxi point to point, or rent whole/half days.
- A GREAT Chef service for lunch or dinner is available on a casual basis.
- if you need a Chef for lunch or dinner, this should be booked in advance.
- Restaurant food deliveries can be used easily
- In villa massages (suppliers will come to the villa)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Maximum 12 people permitted in the villa at any time - including registered guests of the booking and casual guests. Please ask us if you have any questions about this. 

- For groups not accompanied by parents or guardians, the age of all the registered guests must be over 25.

- Casual guests are permitted to visit, but not stay/move into the villa.

- Stays over 27 days, electricity is charged at 7 baht per unit

- Smoking is only permitted in the outdoor areas of the villa. (there are so many)
- Vaping is permitted in the Living room area only.

- Security deposit in case of damage to the villa of 30,000 Thai baht (or equivalent currency) required cash on check in. If a claim is made the security deposit must be topped up and kept at 30,000 Thai Baht at all times.
sectionedDescription/interaction: The villa is a private home managed by Lofty, so if you have any questions, requests or issues, please message or call us directly, we are always happy to help.
